Title: Cosy, quirky, split level annex.
Description: Quirkyopen-plan,split levelself-contained annex attached to a 16th century farmhouse (with tennis court)which is situated on a nature reserve lake. 15 min drive to Central Reading and a 20 min walk (1 Mile) to Theale train station-38 mins to London Pad (please not that part of the walk there is not a pavementso it maybe be best to come by car or taxi).The spaceThe space.A self containedopen-plansplit level annex with separate entrance and small private garden areafull of character with wooden beams set in the beautiful Berkshire countryside. Kitchen and private bathroom with shower/bath. Superkingsize bedsky television and wifi available. Use of private outdoor tennis court (overlooking lake which is a nature reserve not suitable for swimming or SUP) and direct access to nature reserve walks via the main garden."Guest access.Private access to guest annex and own garden area . We have a tennis court too which can be used by guests but will need to be booked in on arrival (for guests only). Sleeps twobut if required we have a blow up bed/travel Cot for baby if requiredfor a short (overnight) stayit is all open planso its probably only suitable for a small child/baby. Not suitable for older children.For guests staying 3 nights or moreif notice is given prior to arrival keys can be supplied for our indoor heated swimming pool. (Pool is fitted with an electronic safety cover for children safety). Please check if the pool is on if you would like to use itas we tend to turn it off over the deep winter months."Other things to note.We are situated just off the the M4 corridor which has great access to LondonAscotWindorBathBristolOxford and the Cotswoldsdepending on what you plan on doing on your stay we are ideally located to really get the most of your vacation here in the UK.

Title: 5 Star Luxury Coastal Retreat holiday home
Description: NEW for 2022 - baby/toddler package - bed guardtravel cotbooster high chair provided free of charge if requiredNEW for 2022 - beach/pool towels providedOur privately owned 2 bedroom holiday home is just perfect for everyone who loves the freedom of self catering holidays but the quality and standards of a good hotel.Coastal Retreat is fitted out to provide you with home from home comfort. Guests in 2021 agreedwe really had thought of everything.The space"The space.Our modern & well looked after holiday home has a relaxing & peaceful feel.The holiday home sleeps 4 comfortablyas is ideal for a family or two sets of friends.You will find good quality fixtures & fittings - exceeding the typical standard you may find in many other holiday homes. Just because its a caravandoesnt mean you cant have some home comforts. We want our guests to enjoy a fun & relaxing holidaywith everything you might need during your stay.Accommodation includes -Living room -.The bright & airycomfortable & cosy lounge with plenty of seating is a perfect place to relax & chill after a busy day exploring the local beachestowns & villages. Patio doors lead on to the decking. Fitted with a feature fireplace & electric fire for cosy nights watching TVreading or playing games.Kitchen & Dining area -.Fitted with a full size fridge/freezer (with the important wine bottle rack!)electric oven & grill & built in microwave oventoasterkettleand equipped with plenty of crockeryglassespot/pans & utensils. Enough to cook a meal or dish up a take away and hopefully everything you will need for your stay.The dining area consists of a proper dining table & 4 chairs - not wobbly stools!We provide you with a good stock of kitchen essentials for cleaning & washing up & managing the bins & recycling as well as tin foilcling film & food bags for picnics & days out. We also supply toilet rolls to start you offkitchen towel & similar items for your arrival. There are also bottles of hand soap & hand sanitiser. You just need to bring your own toiletries & personal care items.When you arrive you can expect a food welcome pack waiting for you to get you started.Master bedroom en suite bathroom -.The master bedroom is fitted with a king size bed. The room has a large fitted wardrobe with plenty of hanging space & coat hangers provided. There is also a chest of drawers with TV & a dressing table & stool.An ensuite bathroom with bath & shower overwc & basin.Second bedroom -.The second bedroom can be made up in a twin with 2 single beds or as a double. When made up as a doublewe push the two single beds together & use a topper & double fitted sheet to create a second double bed. The room has a small wardrobe (coat hangers & shelf hanger provided) for your holiday clothes.(When booking please let us know the configuration of the second bedroom so we know how you would like the beds made up)All bedding is provided for both bedrooms - mattress toppersmattress protectorshypoallergenic duvetshypoallergenic pillows & feather pillowspillow protectorsall duvet covers & pillow cases.Family shower & WC -.With wash basin and WCmirrored cabinet & a large shower cubicle.Both bathrooms have fitted central heating towel railsideal for warming through towels & robes (2 supplied for master bedroom guests) & making them nice to use all year round.Towels & laundry -.We provide the following for your use during your stay -.1 bath sheet per person.1 hand towel per person.1 hair turban per bedroom.1 bath mat per bathroom (plus a rubber non slip shower/bath mat).NEW FOR 2022 - 1 beach/pool towel per person.1 bath robe for each guest in the master bedroom.Kitchen - tea towelshand towelsoven glovesWe launder all of the linen & towels at each changeover. We do not provide a daily service for making beds/cleaning etc.Outside deck -.Surrounded by glassits easy to fasten back the main door & double patio doors & let the sunshine in. The large sunny decking with plenty of space to sunbathe or eat dinner is the perfect place to sit backchill & relax. Enjoy a coffeeglass of wine or dinner sat at the rattan effect table & 4 chairs.There is a storage box to stow away cushions to keep them dry & always useable.There is plenty of parking in the adjacent parking area.Leisure facilities -.A Leisure Club pass is available at ¬£50 for up to 6 guests for up to 7 nights .. excellent value for a family. This allows use of the indoor pooloutdoor poolgym and entertainment facilities. We will send you a form to completeprior to your stayin order for us to apply for the passes for you as our guests.We recommend you read all our informationthe booking terms & conditions and the site rules before booking your holiday at Coastal Retreat.""Guest access.There is plenty of on site parking around the home with 2 parking areas within walking distance of the home and no designated parking spaces.Hoburne Park is in a great central position for exploring ChristchurchMudefordBournemouth & surrounding villages. A 10-15 minute walk will take you to a choice of great local beaches. A 5 minute drive and youll be in the beautiful New Forest.""Other things to note.Your holiday home will be completely set up and ready for your arrival with good quality bed linen and towels provided in the nightly price plus other homely extras for your stay. We also include robes for guests in the master bedroom.NEW We now provide 1 pool/beach towel per guest.NEW To save you loading your car to the roof and bringing everything except the kitchen sink ..... We can now provide a travel cotbed guardbooster high chair - please request these when booking.A welcome pack will be waiting for you - exact items included depend on the number of guestsage etc . Your surprise awaits!!!All water and electric charges are included in your holiday rental charge.***** Special Occasions *****.Whatever the occasionwe can help to make your stay extra special - balloonscream tea hampercelebration hampera choice of breakfast packs. Just send us a message after youve made your booking for further information and prices"

Title: Beautiful S.Downs cottage w/gate to the Downs
Description: A private gate takes you directly onto the South Downs with some lovely foot and cycle paths on your doorstep. Close to the beach and cityChichesterPortsmouthSouthhamptonWinchesterGoodwood and Witterings beaches are in easy reach while Liphook station takes you to Waterloo in an hour. Ripsley is a place to get away from it all. Great for cyclistswalkerscouples and families.The spaceThe space.The Cottage has a private entrance and parking for up to three/four cars. It is a 30 second walk through the grounds to the private gate that takes you onto the South Downsas there are no roads to cross walks and cycle rides are easy with children .Guests have exclusive use of a private patio area with BBQ and a large garden outside of the cottage (there are garden gamesfootball postsswing ballBadmintoncroquet etc). Guests also have use of the azalea grove where the fire pit is located - a great place to relax in the evening and logs are in full supply from the log shed.There are two sitting areasone in the kitchen/dining area upstairs and downstairs in the main sitting room/games room where French doors lead onto the patiogarden and azalea grove.In the sitting room/games room there is a 52" smart TV with Netflixgreat for cosy nights of film watchinga woodburning stove and DVD library that includes some of the latest releases as well as a large double sofa beddownstairs w/c and table tennis and pool table. There are also garden toys/board games and indoor toys available for children of all ages.Apart from central heating there are two woodburning stoves - one in the sitting room/games roomthe other in the master bedroom.The kitchen has a dining table for seven (a high chair is available) an American fridge freezer and kitchen amenities including a dishwashercafetiere and blender. To ease your way into your stay with us we supply a starter 3 day supply of goods including: coffeeteasugardishwasher tabletswashing up liquidtoilet rollrubbish bags and basic cooking ingredients - oilsalt/pepper/spices.There is a shower room upstairs with power shower and w/ca w/c downstairs and an ensuite bath to the master bedroom with a roll top bath and basin.In the master bedroom there is a woodburning stove and king size bed. In the second bedroom there is a double bed and a French sleigh/day bed that can be used as a bed for a child up to aged 9yrs. For a seventh and eight adult guest there is room in both bedrooms for two additional single bed truckle mattresses.We know babysitters we can recommend for your stayhousekeepers for extra help and a masseur who will make home visits. We supply a PDF of the areaincluding recommended places to visit/ walkslocal recommended pubs/restaurants and things to do.Guest access.The entire cottagepatio and lawn outside of the cottage leading up the main house is available to guests.The gate that leads from the grounds directly onto the South Downs is a thirty second walk from the cottage through the grounds.The cottage has a private patio area with a BBQ and space for sitting outside. Children are welcome to play in the azalea and the grove and on the sunny garden leading up to the main house at any time. This has a tree swingswing ball and football net and we leave outside toys in the cottage.If two guests would like to use both bedrooms there is an additional payment of ¬£25. If three guests would like to use two bedrooms and the sofa bed/ truckle mattress there is an additional payment of ¬£25. If extra beds are used we can prepare linens for ¬£20.Due to family life the cottage is not recommended to guests who would like to entertain visitors."Other things to note.We have a family doga 5 yr old chocolate labrador called Maddie. She has no access to the cottage. but if she set you she may come up and say hello.We offer a housekeeping service. Our housekeeper will wash and press clothes for ¬£13 per hour. Otherwise there is a laundromat and laundry service available.For guests staying longer than a weeklinens/towels are changed weekly and there is a weekly ¬£26 ( 2 hr) cleaning fee paid directly to the housekeeper after the first week.Sorrylegalesebut if you do wish to use the garden games/fire pityou use them at your own risk and are solely responsible for the health and safety of your guests and other party members during the stay.There is an ordinance survey map at the cottage and links in the PDF sent prior to your arrival for you to plan walks/trips prior to your stay. We also recommend local pubs/restaurants and send contact info. for local things to do.The cottage is a shoe-free zonethank you!If you would like any more information or require anymore helpplease message us and well do our best to help."

Title: Romantic Shepherd‚Äôs Hut Retreat very private.
Description: A beautiful hut within its own private garden with a bbq areafire pit and bench overlooking paddock.It has a kitchenwith fridgemicrowavetwo hot platesa cafeteria,kettle,toastera tablestoolsa comfortable 6ft 6 in by x 4ft double bed as well as a shower with sink and loo fully plumbed in.A small TV/DVD and wood burning stove just perfect for rainy days and wifi connection.For those who love being close to nature with all the luxury of being at home.No pets allowed.The spaceThe space.For people looking for a cosy break from the hassle of life these days.Guest access.During the months that our wonderful pool is open (usually between early June and early September) you are welcome to share it with our family and guests in our cottage.It reaches a max temperature of 26 degrees by early July. Please bring your own swimming towels. Kindly replace cover if the day is chilly.It is our family pool and as a courtesy we invite you to share it. Please do not expect to have this to yourselfalthough often you may. We do not charge for the use and rules apply as with the use of table tennis/ skittles and darts in covered barn.Other things to note.You may hearthe cockerel and horses and some road noise from farm vehicles during the day.

Title: Shrove, rural idyll with breakfast hamper
Description: Relax and soak in the peace and quiet at Shrove Cottagean idyllic little gem of a property which is self-contained with its own private entranceroomy modern bathroom with underfloor heatingfully equipped kitchen and bedroom/sitting room area with beautiful views up the Chedworth Valley. A perfect central location for workrest and play. Breakfast with home-made bread included for you to prepare and eat at your leisure.Available at Shrove CottagePancake Hill.(URL HIDDEN)The spaceThe space.Our pool and sun patio area are both for your exclusive use during your stay. The pool is 3m wide5.5m long and 87cm deep. It is heated naturally by the sun.The property is totally self-contained and is set out as an open-plan loft apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and bedroom/dining room area. Downstairs is the hall and the bathroom which has a generous size shower and underfloor heating.Guest access.There is safe off-road parking on the driveway for your vehicle which is large enough to park five cars. You have use of all the patio area around the pool where seating and tables are provided for your enjoyment and the property itself is totally separate from our house. The patio is a secluded private space surrounded by hedges and clematis-covered fencing.

Title: Avon Farm House, Hot tub, BBQ area, Luxury Living
Description: BS31 3ET Bath and north east Somerset council.Superb detached period home located in a secluded position on the outskirts of the pretty village of Saltford. Immaculate accommodation comprises 5 bedrooms4 reception rooms.The house has 3 acres private useincluding a lake. You will also have access to the 230 acres farm and the owners small holding or animals.* Hot Tub.* BBQ area.* Heated Pool (summer only).* Suitable for family groups onlyThe spaceThe space.Centrally located in the swathe of countryside that connects the beautiful cities of Bath and Bristolthe Farm House is the largest and grandest of the Avon Farm Cottages.The farm house 3 acres for your private useincluding a lake. You will also have access to the 230 acres or arable land and the owners small holding or animals.The current owners have owned and previously lived in the property since 2005. Sleeping 10 guests across 5 bedroomsis ideal for families and groups looking for some extra space. Offering everything that you could want from fabulous holiday homefeatures 3 bathrooms (2 en-suite)a wonderful fully-equipped kitchensnug off the kitchenlarge living roomdining area for 8and an impressive outdoor space with plenty of seatinga gas BBQprivate swimming pool (May 19th to October 31st) with changing room and bathroom and your own private 6-seater hot tub!.The 230 acres farm also houses Avon Farm Cottages which comprises six individual holiday cottages that can be booked separately or all together to accommodate larger groups and families.Please noteno properties at Avon Farm are suitable for events or parties. No additional guests allowed unless previously agreed. A list of approved contractors will be sent out after booking has been confirmed.INTRODUCTIONOnce you have reached the bottom of the tree-lined you will immediately be struck by the property‚Äôs impressive Georgian staturewater feature within the turning circle as well as the 3 acres of land that surround the property. Some of the original parts of the building standing at over 400 years old.Recently refurbished to a very high standardAvon farm has everything that you could need for a comfortable and relaxing break. The property is immaculately designedclean linesglass and chrome furnishingsspotlightsas well as plenty of natural light ‚Äì the Farm House is for guests who love a modern twist on country living. With five king size double beds in the main housethere‚Äôs plenty of space for a good night‚Äôs sleep. single z beds can be available on request for flexible sleeping arrangements.FACILITIES- Sleeps 10 in 5 bedrooms.- 4.5 bath or shower rooms.- Private parking for 5-6 cars.- Private garden with private use of the swimming pool.- Hot tubuse in strict compliance with hot tub rules.- Outdoor seating.- All bed linenbath towels and tea towels provided.- Hairdryers.- Dining table.- Welcome Pack: cerealbreadbiscuitsbuttermilkteacoffeesugar.- Kitchen essentials: dishwasher tabletsclothwashing up liquidbin bagssalt + pepper.- Bathroom starter pack: hand soaptoilet papershampooconditioner and shower gels for each guest.- Heating and hot water via gas/oil central heating with individual thermostat controls.- Free Wi-Fi.- 65‚Äù Flat Screen Bang and Olufsen TV in living area with sky. bedroom,.- Fully equipped kitchen with toasterkettleutensilscrockerycutleryglassware (champagne flutestumblers and wine and water glasses) cafeti√®rebakewarefood preparation (graterjugsievesaucepansetc).- 4 x wall-mounted ovens /microwave.- Dishwasher.- American style fridge/freezer with ice dispenser.- Washer.- Ironing board + ironclothes airer.- Vacuum cleaner.- Safety equipment: fire extinguisherfire blanketcarbon monoxide monitorsmoke alarm.FULL DESCRIPTION.Ground FloorEntrance Hall.to the left‚Ä¶Living roomDining roomKitchenA lightbright and contemporary space offering guests the chance to cookrelax and dine togetherwith stunning views over the land and great sunsets thanks to the glass walls. The kitchen has everything you will need to cook a fabulous mealrange oven and hobsAmerican-style fridge/freezerkettletoastermicrowave and plenty of crockeryglassesutensils and cookware! A large dining table with bench seat and additional chairs is the perfect place to enjoy a meal togetherSnugBack into the hallway and‚Ä¶UpstairsStraight along the corridor to‚Ä¶Bedroom One.Master bedroom ensuite.master Bedroom dressing roomBedroom TwoBedroom ThreeA cosybeamed bedroom decorated in lightrefreshing cream toneswith a comfy king size bedbedside tableschest of drawers and beautiful garden views.Into the‚Ä¶.Bedroom Four.A spacious double bedroom with comfy bedlarge wardrobe and flat screen television. This lovely bedroom has beautiful views of the front garden thanks to two large windows.Bedroom fiveOutside:There‚Äôs plenty of outside space and seating at Avon Farm for you to enjoyincluding the large decking area with an under cover all year round hot tubthe heated swimming pool (generally available May 19th to October 31stplease note the pool will be partially drained outside of these times). Children should be supervised at all times and not allowed onto the field with the animals.Pool room:The pool room offers a space to get changed ready for the pool or the hot tuband includes pool towels for your use.The pool room also includes a showertoilet and sink.BBQ Area:Next to the pool room is partially enclosed (covered) outdoor BBQ area. Gas is provided. Please only use this BBQ if you are confident in using the equipment and are happy with the fire safety pre-cautions.Lake:In the adjoining field to the house is the lakewith a basic lake house. Fishing hereor on the river is permitted during fishing seasonbut not we do not provide equipment.Around the Farm:See guest access. We also hire bicycles payable locally.For a tour of the house take a look on my insta at holidayletmyhome.Guest access.Enjoying the Farm and our Facilities.One of the biggest benefits about staying on a farm is there‚Äôs loads to see and do without even leaving the siteit‚Äôs great for familiesfriends and couples alike!.Please help yourselves to chicken eggs. The chickens are beyond the car park through the opening onto the fields.Not far from the chickens are a family of goats. They like being fed vegetablesfruiteven bananas!.Walk past the past the goatsfollow the path down to the river and take a riverside walk either way along the public foot paths.The horses do not belong to the farm and are looked after by their owners who come daily to see them. Please do not feed the horsesbut they are always happy for a stroke on the nose and a hello.Next to the chickens is the poly tunneland when there is fresh produceyou‚Äôll find some in your welcome packand can refill this when there is plenty. Feeling green fingered?.The grounds of the farm are always in need to somethingso feel free to help us keep the farm looking lovely. Whether that be a bit of weedingdead headingor just advicewe will welcome any help!.All around this field are many blackberry bushesplease help yourselves when they are ripe.There are other tenants on the farm that either live with us in the converted barnsor just let a stable and field. They are all very niceand always happy to answer any questions!

Title: Cotswold Cottage, Pool & Spa, Jacuzzi, long stays
Description: Spa complex with indoor swimming pooljacuzzi & Tennis Astro Court. For parties and families wanting relaxed & civilised luxury stays. Wonderful walkingcycling and country pubslocal babysitterspa lady.Cheltenham FestivalsWorcestershire and GloucestershireThe spaceThe space.This is a perfect place to work from with strong wifi and peaceful areas. Please contact me for great deals on longer bookings.Spa complex with an indoor swimming pooljacuzzi & Astro Court (Tennis & Football). The cottage is set within 80 acres at the edge of the Cotswolds and at the foot of Bredon Hillwith beautiful walksscenery and country pubs.Our family home is adjacent and the property has an Astro Court (Tennis Court April - OctFootball pitch Nov - March)Indoor Swimming PoolSteam room and Jacuzzi which you are welcome to use. The Pool and Spa are attached to the cottageso you don‚Äôt have to go outside to access it and can come down in your dressing gowns to relax and swim. and it is specifically for your use as guests in the cottage and for our family onlythere are no other properties with access to the Spawhich makes it a unique luxury stay! The cottage has its own gardenfacing out onto fields and beautiful views. We are a family with 3 young children and have designed this cottage as an ideal holiday cottage which we would want to stay in - comfortluxury but practical living with lots of activities to do to keep everyone happy - SwimmingTennisWalking (Bredon HillThe Malverns)CyclingFootballPub and Farm Shop EatingCulture & Shopping (Shakespeare country 40 minsBroadway 15 minsCheltenham 40 mins) We are 20 minutes from Cheltenham Race Course with room to land a helicopter if required and 40 minutes from Soho Farmhouse.If you give us details about your group and / or familywe will cater your stay towards you and make every effort to provide extras such as toysgamesbikesbaby equipment etc to help you bring less and enjoy your stay more. We are happy to help you organise babysittersspa treatments etc.The master bedroom and 2nd bedroom can either be used with twin beds or Super King. All sheets are 300 thread 100% cotton.If you are a slightly larger group - dependent on your make upwe are able to offer 2 more beds available in the property. (e.g. family of 5 plus grandparents).As per the house rulesone well behaved dog in the uncarpeted areas per party. Dependent on the make up of the partywe may on occasions allow a 2nd dog but this needs to be approved in writing before you book the property.This is the perfect place to come and cycle - mountain or racing bikes and we have a secure lock up to keep your bikes.Finallyalthough our set up offers something similar to a boutique hotel offering - we are not a hotel and the cottage is part of our home and should be treated as suchwe do the cleaning and changeovers ourselves and expect you to leave the cottage as you found it.If you are looking for more of a spoiling hotel type stay and would rather have other people clear up after yourselves then we can recommend a lovely hotel called Dormy Housejust down the road in Broadway.Guest access.Our family home is adjacent and the property has an Astro CourtIndoor Swimming PoolJacuzzi and Steam Room which you are welcome to use.The Astro Tennis Court is accessible via the back of the housewithout having to go through our private garden.Other things to note.Check in is any time from 3pm - please whats app your eta when you are on your way so that we can try and be here to welcome you.Check out is before 10am on the day of your departure.If you or any of your party are showing any symptoms of Coronavirusplease cancel your booking. Please take COVID tests before you arrive at Well Furlong to ensure that you are negative.The Cottage and Spa are deep cleaned between each party of guests. The chemical levels in the pool and jacuzzi are checked dailyusing high strength chemicals. Before and after we cleaneverything is sprayed with antibacterial solutionincluding all handlesdoor knobstv. remotekeyskey pads etc. We operate a self check in and outfollowing advice on social distancing.

Title: Indoor Pool near Goodwood  - Boxgrove Chichester
Description: Welcome to our lovely homewith indoor tropically heated swimming pooland hot tub - Situated within a 15 minute walk or a 2 minute car drive from the Goodwood estate. We have 3 en-suite bedrooms and 2 smaller rooms - 4 bathrooms and masses of parking. The house is set in the historic village of Boxgrovewith great walks and a pub with a lovely warm fire. Ideal for a short break.We also have a small room suitable for two at our annexe in Strettington - Look for Goodwood Barn on AirbnbThe spaceThe space.The house is perfect for a get away - We have an indoorsecurity covered swimming pool heated to 30 degrees and hot tuband luxury bathrooms with power showers.The house as 5/6 bedrooms with 3 double ensuite bedrooms with shower and/bath. Additional shower room and loo downstairs.TV in large sitting room and conservatorylarge American fridge and open fire in sitting room. Garden has BBQ and ample seating.Driveway for 6 cars - Electronically Gated and secureOutside there is a BBQ and Outdoor seatingNearby attractions :-- Tennis - 3 minute driveOur private house has its own private Tennis court for your use at any time during your stay- Goodwood Aerodrome - 2 minute drive - Fly a spitfireor take a pleasure flight around the Isle of Wight- Goodwood Motor circuit - 2 minute drive - Take your car around the historic track. The only original track in the world- Goodwood Golf - 1 minute drive - Two high quality courses and driving range- Goodwood Races 5 minute drive - The premier flat raving in the country- Goodwood House - 2 minute drive. A fine example of a blend of Jacobean and Edwardian architecture - The Seat of the Duke of Richmond. Take afternoon tea there!Tinwood Vinyard - 2 minutes - try our very own local fizzwith regular tasting and cheese afternoons - Not to be missed!- West Wittering Beach - 20 minutesthe UK‚Äôs finest sandy beachWe have another property just down the road in Strettington. - See Goodwood Barn with TennisGuest access.Swimming Poolhot tubgated home"Other things to note.Its a brilliant place to beso near Goodwoodwith a super pub up the road! The Anglesey Arms is not to be missed for their food is awesome!"

Title: The Pool House
Description: Set within the grounds of our Georgian Manor houseThe Pool House provides a wonderful retreat for those looking to escape to the country whilst being a short drive from the seaside town of Sidmouth and nearby city of Exeter. The Pool House has just been renovated (May 2021) to a very high specification providing spacious contemporary accommodation with use of heated outdoor swimming pool (June to September) and sauna.The spaceThe space.Guests will love the modern comfortable decor in the Pool House. Downstairs offers a great opportunity to drink your morning coffee at the kitchen barenjoying the vaulted ceilings and natural light from the bifolding doors leading straight onto the pool area. A huge walk in showermarble counters complete the newly renovated bathroom. Upstairs is a very cosy living areaand bedroom with magical views over the church and fields opposite.Guest access.Guests are welcome to enjoy the pool area (shared) and the front gardens. The rear gardens are not for guests use other than when accessing the Pool House.Other things to note.The kitchen area includes a 2 ring induction hoband microwave for cooking. It does not have a oven or dishwasher.

Title: One bed apartment use of hot tub & pool available
Description: Wraysbury is a beautiful village. Ideally located for HeathrowWindsorAscot and mainline trains to London (45 mins).LEGOLANDThorpe Park and Chessington.Our apartment is walking distance of all village faclities and the station is a 15 min walk.The property offers exclusive use of the pool during summer months.The property has 1 double bedroomopen living area with smart TV incl Amazon Prime and Netflix and modern kitchen with granite worktops with views of the pool and gardens.The spaceThe space.IMPORTANTHot tub.For new bookings from 12th March 2022 for March and April 2022. Charges for use for jacuzzi will be payable upon arrival.Charges will be ¬£30 per overnight stay use from 8.00am to midnight.24 hours notice required to ensure water is 38-40oC on arrival.We do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noise.*** New Inflatable hot tub area open from 1st October - End April*** The hot tub is then closed and the pool opened.Pool open 1st May - closes 30th September. The pool is heated but heating is only switched on when outside temperatures are in the late teens. For further information please refer to guess access.The apartment has a modern interior and layout. Comprising a large open plan livingdining and kitchen space. One double bedroom with double bed and compact en-suite bathroom with modern showerbasin & WC.It is ideally suited to accomadate 2 adults or 2 adults & 2 children The children would sleep on the very large corner sofa(see pics) or a folding bed can be provided.Maximum 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 children.Facilities include a 55 inch smart tvNetflix and free view channelsblue tooth sound system and free access to the Internet. A modern kitchen with hobmicrowave combination and granite work topscrockery etc.Thermostaticly controlled electric heating throughout. Bedding and towels provided.Please look at our photos for more details.Please note due to close proximity to Heathrow. Guests may incur aeroplane noise.Guest access.Guests have exclusive use of our heated outdoor swimming pool during the summer months (May-September) and exclusive e cross to the hot tub during from October to end April) (local charges apply). Use of all the facilities within the barn to prepare meals and make yourself comfortable. All we ask is that you respect the fixtures and fittings so that they are in as good a condition for the next guest as you found them during your stay.Other things to note.We do not allow parties of any type and do not tolerate bad behaviour or excessive noise.

Title: Self contained Annex with log burner
Description: This really is the most beautiful of getaways - The space is beautifully decoratedcosy and clean.Easily accessibleunder 2 miles from junction 27 M5 and Tiverton Parkway.Musicians and Writers find this a useful retreat to work in.Dogs are not allowed in the bnb but they are welcome to stay with our dogs in the lobby next to the bnb where they can be as wet and muddy as they pleasejust so long as they are well behaved.The spaceThe space.Although it is easily accessiblewe are in the heart of the countrysidesurrounded by farmland. There are no street lights so the stars look wonderful most nights.The pool has a swim pump that was developed for Olympic swimmers so it can be fierce - or as gentle as you like. There is a boat building workshop on the premisesand I am about to renovate the old stable so there is usually something going on though you have your private spacewith a garden. There are plenty of herbs growingand I have labelled most of themso do help yourselves.Guest access.You have the annex and there is a private garden just for guests.Other things to note.If you would like to bring your dogplease contact me. Your dog can stay in the lobby next to the annex with my dogs (or I can put my dogs in my kitchen) or in a stable or your car under shelter if they prefer.If you want to bring a horse I have separate stablespaddocks and an arena. You will need to contact me to make arrangementsand I would prefer it if you could visit first.

Title: Stunning Barn conversion with heated swimming pool
Description: Courage Cottage is a two bedroom detached barn conversion in a Georgian farmyard.The barn was converted in 2013 so has all modern conveniences including underfloor heating. It is very individual and situated in a quiet rural setting. It has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The village of Martinstown has an excellent pubshop and Post Office. Dorchester is 2 miles away and has every facility including good rail connections in all directions.Swimming pool (shared ) open May to Sept.The spaceThe space.This quiet valley in an Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty is located between Dorchester and Weymouth and therefore within easy reach of shopsrestaurants museums and the numerous seaside activities available in and around Weymouth. The Abbotsbury Swannery and gardens are within easy reach as are many footpaths leading to the coast as well as the many remote beaches reached situated along the famous Jurassic Coastline which is a World Heritage Site. The properties are in the old farmyard and reached down a private road and therefore well away from traffic.Golf: Several Golf courses within a few miles in stunning sceneryGuest access.The heated swimming pool is available form May 1st to September 30th. We can‚Äôt guarantee it will be available outside of these times.Guests are free to enjoy the old walled garden which is a quietsecluded haven.Other things to note.The second bedroom has a steep spiral staircase which is perfectly accessible but not for anyone who is a little unsteady on their feet.The swimming pool is only shared with owners who use it rarely. It is outdoor and open from May to September only.

Title: Priors Mesne Coach House, Wye Valley
Description: Priors Mesne Coach House is a converted open plan loft barn space romantically located on a secluded farm estatehalf a mile down a lime tree avenue and 100 yards from the main house. Breathtaking views over the Severn it is the perfect get away for a couple (plus dog) with easy access to walking and cycling in the Wye Valley and Forest of Dean or canoeing on the Wye. Dog walking and a picnic table are available in the adjacent field and there is a boules pitch with small terrace and seating.The spaceThe space.The Coach House living space is located on the first floor accessed by an external stone staircase. The accommodation is open plan with far reaching views over the estuary. A cosy sitting room area equipped with log burner TV DVD and a large sofa and daybed. There is a candle lit dining table adjacent to a king size bed in the sleeping area with another TV and DVD. Micro kitchen for cookingheating small meals with ovensink4 hobsmicrowavefridge freezerkettletoaster and kitchen utensilscutleryplates etc. There is a separate bathroom with toiletbath and shower.Guest access.- Outside seating on Boules pitch garden.- Dog walking field with picnic table.- Tennis by arrangement.- Swimming by arrangement (Mid May until beginning of September )Other things to note.There are long walks from the house as the Gloucestershire Way runs along the wood above.We provide in the kitchen some breadmilkeggsfilter and instant coffeetea and sugar for your arrival as well as a basket of logs and kindling. More logs can be bought at the petrol station on the A48 in Alvington.

Title: The Little Stable for 2  & Indoor Heated Pool
Description: "Edge of village converted stable at Flos Cottages for 2 only 2K from towncountryside setting with rural views. A bolthole for couples with countryside walks from the doorstep.A fully equipped kitchenliving areashower room and indoor heated pool.Enjoy the patio in the evening sunenjoy the views or grab a blanketsnuggle up & enjoy a beautiful starry evening after a day out exploring the local countryside & coastline."The spaceThe space.Only 10 minutes from the A303 but utterly peacefulThe Little Stable is tucked away down a quiet country lane on the edge of picturesque East Cokeronly a mile from Yeovil. There are 2 pubs in walking distance (20 minute stroll) and plenty of excellent places to eat nearby and the beautiful Jurassic coast only half an hour away.The heated indoor pool is just a few steps away with access reserved for Stable guests 9am-1pm. At 13 metres longit‚Äôs enough to get a few laps in!Please note The Little Stable is not suitable for babiestoddlers or children. It is what it says on the tin so if you‚Äôre after something palatialThe Little Stable might not be what you‚Äôre looking for!

Title: Priors Mesne, Keepers Yard, Wye Valley
Description: Keepers Yard is the perfect romantic or family break; a converted loft in the Coach House on a peaceful farm estate100 yards from the main househalf a mile down a lime avenue with lovely views over the Severn. It is ideally located for access to walking in the Wye ValleyForest of Dean; canoeing on the Wye or bicycling on miles of off road tracks Dog walking & a picnic table are available in the field. There is access to an outdoor areaa pool and tennis court by arrangement(in summer)The spaceThe space.The Keepers Yard living space is located on the first floor accessed by an external stone staircase. The accommodation is two bedroomsa bathroomboot room and an open plan living room and kitchen with far reaching views over the estuary; equipped with log burnerTV DVD WIFI and a large sofa and armchair. There is a candle lit dining tablea king size bed open plan kitchen with ovensink4 hobsmicrowavefridgelarge freezerdish washerkettletoaster and kitchen utensilscutleryplates etc. There is a separate bathroom with toiletbath and shower. There is a laundry with clothes washer and dryer located directly beneath the property. All sheets and towels are provided with the rooms ready prepared and one basket of logs for the fire are provided for your arrival. More can be bought at the petrol station in Alvington on the A48.Guest access.- Outside seating on balcony.- Dog walking field with picnic table.- Tennis by arrangement.- Swimming by arrangement (Mid May up to beginning of September)Other things to note.There are long walks from the house as the Gloucestershire Way runs along the wood above.We provide in the kitchen some breadmilkeggsfilter and instant coffeetea and sugar for your arrival as well as a basket of logs and kindling. More logs can be bought at the petrol station on the A48 in Alvington.

Title: The Pool House at Upper Farm (near Thame/Oxford)
Description: Enjoy the tranquillity and seclusion of our spacious pool house chaletcomplete with private seasonally heated (1 May to 30 September) outdoor swimming pool and all year round hot tub Jacuzzi spalocated on our 30 acre farm and equestrian centre in the rural hamlet of Henton on the outskirts of ChinnorOxfordshire.The Pool House is an ideal location for couplesfamilieswalkerscyclistscoarse/carp anglers and business travellers.The spaceThe space.COVID-19 Restrictions for England.Guests can book with confidence that we will refund any reservations that needs to be cancelled due to government COVID restrictions.Due to the additional cleaning and sanitisation required to keep our guests safewe are unable to offer any form of early check-in or late check-out.Opened for the first time as a holiday let in 2016 (and refurbished again in 2021)we are sure that The Pool House at Upper Farm Henton will be your home away from home.With its own private outdoor swimming pool (heated from 1 May to 30 September) and an all year round hot tub jacuzzi spayou\ll be surrounded by acres of green paddocks and with our 1 acre carp and coarse fishing lakeour self-catering chalet is the perfect setting for those who want to get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.The Pool House at Upper Farm Henton is ideal for couples looking for a romantic getawayor as a base for familieswalkerscyclistsanglers and business travellers and as we are only 40 minutes from Heathrow airport it‚Äôs also ideal for international visitors.Located in an area of natural beauty and with spectacular views over the Chiltern Hills to Bledlow Ridgeit is the perfect setting for those who want a relaxing break in the beautiful Oxfordshire countryside. The village of Chinnor is 1.2 miles away with convenience stores and a few eateriesplus we have the historic Chinnor Steam Railwaythe town of Princes Risborough is just 4 miles awaywith a good rail service into London Marylebone (40 to 50 minutes) and the historic market town of Thame is 7 miles away.For birdwatchersour fishing lake is surrounded by trees and is the home to red kiteskingfisherssparrow hawkswoodpeckersbuzzardskestrelsducksmoor henspheasants and some very friendly robins and wrens. In the evening you are like to see foxesbadgersrabbits and munt jack.With two public footpaths running through the farmwalkers and cyclists can quickly and easily get on to the Phoenix trail and The Ridgewaywith miles upon miles of footpaths and bridleways to explore.Angling guests at The Pool House have unlimited and inclusive access during their stay to fish our 1 acre carp and coarse lake located 100m from your holiday accommodation.The Pool House is a studio chalet featuring:Sleeps between 1 to 4 guests.Main Studio Room (360 sq ft).- King size bed with tempur memory foam mattress and bedside tables (bedding included).- L shaped sofa.- 2 Large double wardrobes with 6 draws and plenty of hanging space.- 4 seater dining table and chairs.- 46" Wall Mounted Adjustable HD LED TV with Freeview and Sky+ HD (MoviesSports & Entertainment Packs).- Music system with AirPlay/Bluetooth streaming.- Large patio doors leading to PoolHot Tub and GardenKitchen (70 sq ft).- Electric Induction Hob.- Electric Oven & Grill.- Full sized Fridge Freezer.- Slimline Dishwasher.- Kettle.- Microwave.- Potspanscrockeryglassware and cutlery.- Iron and Ironing Board.- Teacoffee and sugarBathroom (47 sq ft).- Electric shower.- Bathroom cabinet with LED lighting and shaver charging point.- Heated electric towel rail.- WC and hand basin.- Towels included.- Toiletries included (Body Wash/ShampooConditionerHandwash & Hand Cream)Entrance / Boot Room (65 sq ft).- Electric Radiator.- Storage for bikesboots and soiled clothing.- Door leading to PoolHot Tub and Garden.- Optional small double folding bed - sleeps 2 adults or 2 childrenSwimming PoolHot Tub & Garden.- Outdoor Seasonally Heated Swimming Pool - 12m (40ft) Long6m (20ft wide)Shallow End ‚Äì 90cm (3ft)Deep End - 2.1m (7ft).- Hot Tub Jacuzzi Spa with Bluetooth Sound System (Available all year round).- Non slip artificial grass garden area ‚Äì 21m (69ft) Long13.6m (44ft) Wide.- Pool loungers.- 4 Seat Patio TableChairs and ParasolGeneral.- Free WiFi.- Free off-road parking.- Minimum stay applies depending on time of year.- Maximum of 4 guestsIMPORTANT EXTRA INFORMATION.We have a zero tolerance policy on drugs. Anyone found smoking or taking drugs or any other illegal substance will be reported to the police and evicted from the property immediately. There will be no refund for any unused nights and you will forfeit the full security deposit.There is no smoking permitted inside the accommodation. Smoking is permitted outside only. Please use the ashtray provided.No excessive outdoor noise after 11pm.Absolutely No parties or events.Maximum of 2 well behaved dogs per property. ¬£15 per dogper stay charge (payable on arrival).Guest access.Guests have private use of our outdoor seasonally heated swimming pool (May to September)year round access to the hot tub jacuzzi spa and 24 hour access to our carp and coarse fishing lake.Other things to note.The Pool House is ideal for 1 to 4 guests. Please note that we will not accept any bookings with more than 4 people.Please make sure that you are happy with the sleeping arrangements and bed configurations prior to booking.Please contact the host if you require further information.We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any booking where there are more than 4 guests in the party.We also reserve the right to charge an additional ¬£15 per personper night for extra guests not declared at the time of booking.

Description: Swallow hosts x 2 guests has been recently been refurbished. It has an open plan living - kitchen area.The single-storey cottages at Champernhayes have been created from the conversion of the original farmhouse buildingswhich date back to 1482. Swallow cottage is situated around a central courtyardhave been awarded 4 star Gold by the Visit England (The AA) for comfortlocationd√©cor and facilities. The traditional country-style kitchen is open planwith a dining areaand comprehensively equipped. The bedroom has their own en-suite bathroomsand you will find your beds already madewith towels provided. Relax in your very own country retreat complete with digital television and DVD player/recorderwe can supply a selection of moviesbooks and board games.The space

Title: Beech Tree Cottage @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description: Beech Tree Cottage is a delightful cottage nestled in the beautiful hills of Somerseton the south side of a wooded valley beside the River Tone. Nearly 200 years oldthis lovely cottage has been newly updated to create a charmingwell-equipped holiday home.The shared grounds are a paradise of fieldswater meadows and gardensa haven for wildlifeand star-gazing in our dark skies. Our heated indoor swimming pool and play area are shared between our cottages and offer fun for everyone.The spaceThe space.Originally the grain storage barn for the millBeech Tree Cottage nestles in the hillsideoverlooked by a huge beech tree.This charming and characterful cottage is approached from a flight of pretty stone steps. It has a comfortable sitting room with an original exposed stone wall and a dining arealeading into the new open planwell-designed compact kitchen.All on the same level a short inner hall leads to the bedrooms. Bedroom 1 has a king size bed and Bedroom 2 has a zip-link bed which can be twin beds or a super-king bed.Beech Tree Cottage is south facing with river and garden views and an outside eating area. Guests are also welcome to take advantage of the rest of the beautiful grounds and river banks which are shared with our other cottagesMill Coach House and Bankside Cottage.Our facilities include:.‚Ä¢ Electric stove.‚Ä¢ Refrigerator with small freezer compartment.‚Ä¢ Microwave.‚Ä¢ Toaster and kettle.‚Ä¢ Smart TV.‚Ä¢ Free wifi and 4G mobile access.‚Ä¢ Bathroom with a showerwashbasin and WC.‚Ä¢ Shared heated indoor swimming pool.‚Ä¢ Shared children‚Äôs play area.‚Ä¢ Shared Barbecue.‚Ä¢ A separate shared utility has a washing machine and tumble drier.‚Ä¢ Ample free parkingLinen and bath towels are included but please provide your own swimming and beach towels.We‚Äôre sorry but dogs are not allowed. We do have twovery friendlywaggy tailed labradors who live on site and are a part of our family. They have free use of all the gardens so you will meet them wandering around.

Title: Safari Tent at Pennard Hill Farm
Description: The Safari Tent offers an escape from the normwith stunning views over the Mendip Hills offering you the chance to relaxrest and enjoy the tranquility of the Somerset countryside.Please note the safari tent is off grid!The spaceThe space.The Safari Tent is a brilliant place to bring children as there is endless space for them to run around. There is plenty to dosuch as build a den in the woodshunt for bugsgo for long walksmeet the cowsplay hide and seek and climb trees.A holiday in our safari tent is a great way to relax and and switch off from the fast pace of life. Take some deep breathsinhale that fresh Somerset air and while away your days curled up with a good book or exploring the countryside.The safari tent sleeps six people in total in two twin bedsone double and one king sized bed. Snuggle into crisp white sheets and fluffy feather duvetsthis is glamping at its best! There is a kitchen with a wonderful wood burning stove which is perfect for cooking and it will keep you warm on the coldest of days. There is a seating area with a comfy sofa and lots of games for the children to enjoy. The kitchen is fully equipped with crockerycutlery and everything you should need to cook a delicious meal and there is also a kitchen table to seat six. There is an undercounter fridge with a small freezer section too. At the back of the tent there is a hot shower and separate loo but these are all within the tent itself so there is no creeping across fields to find the loo in the middle of the night.We‚Äôve decided not to have electricity in the safari tent. We use oil lamps and candles for light. We do provide battery powered phone charging packs but there is no need to tell the children that!There is so much to do in the area surrounding Pennard Hill Farm from balloon rides to golf and clay pigeon shooting. Longleat Safari Park is only a 30 minute drive away and Fleet Air Arm museum is under 20 minutes. There‚Äôs an abundance of fantastic pubs and restaurants if you feel like a night off cooking.Please note the Safari Tent is situated on a steep hill and is sadly not suitable for those with trouble walking.No pets are allowed in the Safari Tent unless its been requested and agreed with the owner upon booking.

Title: Hitchin Barn conversion
Description: Set in beautiful Hertfordshire countrysideyet only minutes away from Hitchin Town Centre and Luton Airport we offer a relaxed and peaceful stay in our detached 17th century tithe barn. Up to four bedroomsone ensuiteone family bathroomtwo shower rooms and a separate toiletindoor private poolgames room with full sized snooker tablelarge kitchen/diner and galleried lounge overlooking pool.The spaceThe space.Very near to A1 M1 and Luton airportfive minutes from the lovely market town of Hitchin30 minutes by train to London Kings Crossyet tucked away in beautiful countryside. A totally detached 17th century barn which includes a private pool just for your use. A games room with a full sized snooker table up to four bedrooms and sleeps up to eightGuest access.Price is for hiring whole barn conversion including exclusive use of pool.Other things to note.The bedrooms are as follows. A first floor double bedroom with five foot beda second floor twin bedroomboth these have access to bathroom and toilet. On the ground floor is a large room with double sofa bed and a fold up bed to be used as required. Please bring your own bedlinen for these. Access to first floor bathroom and also two ground floor shower rooms and toilet. One newly added ground floor double bedroom with five foot bed and ensuite shower room and toilet.Minimum booking is two nights.All bedlinen and towels provided.Child safety.Due to a recent review we have now fitted child safety gates at the top of each staircase limiting access to the pool for children. There is also recently fitted Perspex in the viewing gallery area stopping children from climbing onto the room divider. A double door (lockable) has been fitted to the new ensuite bedroom for child safety and to limit noise.Pets.We regret to say that we cannot have pets staying because of the swimming pool.The pool is heated to between 24 and 30 degrees

Title: Summer Lodge
Description: The Summer Lodge boasts uninterrupted and unrivaled views of the Fleet Lagoon and world famous Chesil Beach from its elevated position on the Jurassic Coast path. Located just one mile from the Isle of Portlandthe home of the 2012 Olympic sailing events and a short drive from Weymouth town centre and harbourour stunning holiday home is perfectly situated for anyone wanting a coastal escape.The space"The space.The LodgeThe Summer Lodge boasts a glass frontagewhich allows guests to enjoy the changing tides and wildlife from the comfort and warmth of the large and tastefully furnished open plan living and dining area. Sunsets here really are an incredible spectacle not to be missed and a large verandah complete with outdoor sofas and dining table allows you to relax and take in the view.Modern furnishings are a staple of the propertywhich is finished to a high spec throughout. The stylish kitchen contains everything you hcould possibly want and more for your staywith potspanscrockery and glassware galore.There are two double bedrooms each with large fitted wardrobedressing table and ample space for you and your belongings to spread out after a busy day. Additionallythere are two bathroomsone with a bath and the other a double shower.There is a small double sofa bed in the lounge areawhich can also be used. Please note - there are no blinds on the large feature window. Please take this into consideration if you plan on using this space for guests to sleep.All bed linen and towels are provided as well as toiletries and kitchen essentialsso there is no need to pack the kitchen sinkall you need to bring is yourself!.The Holiday ParkSummer Lodge is situated on the five star family run holiday park Chesil Vistapart of the Waterside Holiday Group. It is located in the private owner‚Äôs areawhich is separate from the rest of the park and extremely quiet. Chesil Vista Holiday Park boasts plenty of facilitieswhich you are more than welcome to take advantage of during your stay.As a guest at summer lodge you will have access to:- Indoor leisure complex with gympoolsauna and solarium. *Please note* there is a small charge for use of this facility - ¬£5 adult day pass¬£4 child day pass¬£25 adult week pass and ¬£20 child week pass (Prices are correct as of January 2020)- On site entertainment- Bar & Breeze Restaurant- Laundry- Soft play area- Amusement arcade- Outdoor adventure play area- Outdoor gym- Chesil Venue- Outdoor terrace area- Sports field"Guest access.Summer Lodge is completely self contained. Guests have a private entranceparking for two cars and complete use of the two bedroomstwo bathroomsloungekitchen and veranda.Other things to note.- Wifi - You can use up to five devices on the Wi-Fi. To ensure everyone has a good experience each device can use up to 1GB of data per daywhen you use up your data allowance the connection will be suspended until midnight when the allowance will be reset the following day. Any unused allowance does not roll over. Video applications and streaming will rapidly use up your allowance.*Disclaimer* Wifi access is controlled by Chesil Vista rather than ourselves and as such any problems with accessibility should be directed at reception. Efforts will be made to ensure connectivity throughout your stayhowever in the unfortunate event of breakdown refunds will not be offered.- Laundry - washing machines and tumble dryers are located in an on site laundry rather than in the lodge itself.- Pets - we are pet friendly and welcome one well behaved dog (sorry no very young puppies) into our home. We respectfully ask that pets are not allowed on the furniture and are not left unattended in the property for any period of time.We endeavor to give your holiday experience a personal touchproviding complementary baked goodssnacksrefreshments and cosmetics during your stay so that the lodge feels like a home from home.We are always here to helptherefore should you require any further information or have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.

Title: Patch: Beautiful country cottage with outdoor pool
Description: This natural stone cottage is set in the beautiful countryside out the way of any noise making it the perfect place to relax. The cottage benefits from:. Double bedroom. Brand new fitted kitchen. Log burner. Free Wi-fi and Smart tv with Netflix. Sofa bed. Patio with tables and chairs. Shared swimming pool access. Shared games room. Shared tennis courtThere are lots of beautiful walksif you fancy an explore. Including the strawberry line that stretches from cheddar to Congresbury.The spaceThe space.Located in an area of outstanding natural beauty. Private drive . Beautiful views. 4 cottages located in 36 acres. Swimming pool and shower blocktennis courtgames room and laundry.The cottage itself has a brand new kitchen with breakfast bar. Open plan living area with log burner. Double bedroom and bathroom with bath/shower. Outside patio area with furniture and beautiful viewsThis beautiful region of Somerset offers walking for all abilities along with some great locations to visit including Crooks PeakCheddar GorgeClevedon Pier. Winscombe village is a short drive or 20-25 minute walk good range of shops including bakerybutcherPharmacylocal pubsCo-op and cafes.Close to CheddarWeston super mare and Bristol

Title: Beautiful Cottage in Stokenham overlooking the Sea
Description: "A lovely attached cottageown private gardenparking spaceshared use of the main house gardens and pool looking out to sea in the heart of the South Hams. A beautiful historic house renovated with cool retro decorsuper-fast WiFihardwired TV with Netflix in a cosy sitting room. As a charming old buildingthe cottage has some low doorways that the taller amongst us need to be aware of! Great bathroom. Well equipped eat in kitchen and comfortable bedrooms with fresh linen and towels."The spaceThe space.We live in the main house next door and are happy to help with any querieslocal knowledgetransport info etc There are two pubs in walking distance in the village and the sea is a 10 minute walk.Guest access.Would recommend having a car but we are on a bus route that runs between Dartmouth and Kingsbridge. Guests have full use of all the grounds and of course the swimming pool which has been refurbished and upgraded for the 2021 season. It is closed normally from around October until things warm up in the spring.Other things to note.The cottage is beautiful old and comfortable with all the mod cons. Important to know for any taller guests some of the doorways and entrances are lower so must take care and that there are two flights of stairsone from the front door to the main landing and one up to the twin and single room. There is a stair gate on the top landing and on the lower landingit is easy to close doors to it.Alsothe pool is open from the spring until about the end of September but our beautiful grounds are always here to explore.

Title: The Bakehouse. Eco-friendly vegan country annexe
Description: The Bakehouse is a smallbut beautiful self contained annexe on a quiet country lane with a private walled garden. Offering a comfortable double bedliving space with dining table for twoshower room and well equipped kitchen (fridgesinkkettletoasterinduction hob). Situated within gorgeous South Downs countryside with plentiful walking opportunities but just a 10 minutes drive from historic Lewes and 25 minutes from Brighton. Perfect for a rural retreat (No TV but fast guest WiFi).The spaceThe space.The Bakehouse is a small but well equipped self-contained annexe with sunny private walled garden (chairs and table provided). Wake up to the sound of birdsong and have a chance to truly relax in this peaceful location.There is also a heated outdoor saltwater pool available for exclusive hire (¬£20 per hour) during your stay. * Please note the outdoor pool is closed in the winter months. Enquire when booking as to pool availability.Guest access.The village of Barcombe is a mile walk away either over the fields or around the country lanes. A car or bike would be handy if you wish to venture further afield.Other things to note.Owned and run by a vegan familywe try to be as earth-friendly and ecological as possible and being vegan is part of this philosophy of life.Our space (inside and out) is vegan so we ask you to respect our beliefs and not to bring or consume any animal products on our property.* Please note the outdoor pool is closed in the winter months. Enquire when booking as to pool availability.

Title: Holiday cottage 2 people 30 m2 10 minutes from Honfleur
Description: 10 minutes from Honfleuryou will find an ideal place to recharge your batteries. The cottage 2 people (30m2) is located in the property on a landscaped and enclosed garden of almost 2 hectares.Composed of a room (bed 160x200 and a lunch area with table and 2 chairs).a bathroom and kitchen.View of the parkgarden table and chairumbrelladeckchairs and weber barbecue.Parking on the property and free access to the pool (from April to October - 11m by 5m) heated to 27 degrees.Guest access.Parking located inside the propertyswimming pool heated to 27 degrees from mid-April to late October.Other things to note.Numerous activities nearby:.Numerous hiking trailsSt Gatien golf courseequestrian center 5 minutes awaymuseumsfishingtennis ....The charming town of Honfleur with its museums and lively poetic alleysits small harbourits Saturday market is a 10/15 minute drive.Deauville/Trouville at 25 minutes.You will be less than an hour from the majestic cliffs of Etretat.

Title: Holiday Bungalow East Witterings  Bracklesham bay
Description: We would like to welcome guests to our Holiday bungalowyour canine friends will be very welcome.Sleeps 4 with all bedding supplied. There is a TV with Freeview free WiFi and fully equipped kitchenThe Park is situated near a nature reserveand is 5 minutes walk from Bracklesham bay beach (East Wittering ) Onsite facilities Medmerry arms pubseasonal heated outside pool.a Crazy Golf coursetwo tennis courtstable tennis and a dog agility courseplus a dedicated washroom for dogs.The spaceThe space.You have the bungalow and free access to all facilities on the holiday parkGuest access.Guest have free access to all facilitiesOther things to note.The pool is shut from end of September until the spring

Title: Secluded hideaway, heated pool, walks, fossils
Description: The Annex is brightcomfortable and cosy with a new wood burner last winter. The public footpath crossing our garden next to the river Char links with many others - great for dog walkers. We are close to Charmouth beach and Lyme Regis ‚Äì renowned for their fossil treasures. Love swimming? our freshwater pool is generally heated to a very cosy 29 - 30 degrees (warm bath temperature) and can be used at all times of year.With advance noticethe twin beds can be connected to form a king size bedThe spaceThe space.Whilst the Annexe is attached to the Main Houseprivacy would be respected at all times. Full refurbishment has recently been completed and a private deck added. There is plenty of off street parking and you will have a warm welcome from Stephen and Di. We have two friendly dogs of our own and your own dog/s are welcome too.The Kitchen is well kitted out but but there are also a number of excellent places to eat in the areaincluding the famous River Cottage in Axminster.Guest access.Guests will have access to all parts of the garden and swimming pool. Please note that it is a freshwater pool so babies will need the double nappy system to ensure no pees in the pool!Landscaping and garden improvements are ongoing!Other things to note.The historical town of Bridport is 5 miles away and offers excellent street markets on Wednesdays and Saturdays. Broadchurchthe dramawas filmed nearby at West Bay near Golden Cap cliffs - the highest point in Dorset with unparalleled views of the coastline. Eating out: the famous River Cottage in Axminsterthe Tytherleigh Arms (our favourite about 15 mins by car)the Iilchester Arms on the nearby Symondsbury Estatewhich also has its own excellent caf√©/restaurantand the Railway Carriage in West Bay.Note: there are no hidden charges in our pricing - e.g. no cleaning fee

Title: Fingals Green Oak Barn with shared swimming pool
Description: We built this traditional Carpenter Oak green-oak framed barn in 1987. Constructed with heavy oak beams and trusses over a large open plan area it is glazed between the uprights giving it a wonderful lightrusticwarm and spacious feeling.It is situated by the pool on two levels with the downstairs bedroom opening onto it‚Äôs own private patio garden.The Barn has a private balcony overlooking the grass tennis court with stairs leading down to the shared indoor heated pool .. perfect!The spaceThe space.The Fingals Barn is a unique living space - one huge room with green oak trusses in the roof. This is an early frame built by the local firm Carpenter Oak. The Balcony over looks the tennis court and the garden and during the Summer months is a wonderful spot to have your early evening aperitifs and eat alfresco. There are three bedroomstwo upstairs a twin with a toilet and a double with a shared bathroom. Downstairs is a kingsize bed with ensuite bathroom with shower. The large sitting room upstairs is open plan with a wonderful grand piano at one end. The dining area also upstairs adjacent to the sitting room has a large dining table and open plan kitchen with all mod cons. Larger parties might want to book The Wisteria suite (sleeps 4) next door to the barn and share meals.Downstairs the double bedroom has its own private patio surrounded by greenery.Other things to note.There is no mobile phone signal here - it is so peaceful and quiet! Howeverthere is free wifi everywhere so you can stay connected to the outside world if you need to!

Title: Pear Store cottage, rural location & indoor pool
Description: A beautifully furnished cottage in Ovingjust 4 miles outside Chichester4 miles from Goodwood and great beaches / walks nearby. Large master bedroom with King Size bed and ample off road parking outside. Our local pub is 200 yards away. Pet free propertyThe space"The space.A lovely self contained annex cottage attached to the main Farmhouse in Oving village. The open plan livingdinning and kitchen area has a great airy feel with its high ceiling and is beautifully finished. The kitchen is well equipped with modern appliances. The large master bedroom offers a comfortable King Size bedfull wall fitted wardrobesvanity table and luxurious White Company bed linen. The bathroom has a fitted shower over the bath to soak away the day. A stair ladder off the main living space leads to a further mezzanine level containing two single beds - perfect for two extra adults or children aged over 7 years (due to steepness of stair). Also Ideal for a couple with a baby to occupy the master bedroom with travel cot. Secluded location off roadwith ample parking for up to 2 cars just outside."Guest access.Located on a private rural farm estate there is discreet parking for up to two vehicles outside the property. Your own separate patio and garden with seating and BBQ area.The tennis court is available between 10am and 5pm only due to the proximity of another holiday let and ask you to respect other guests.There are a selection of well loved rackets in the Laundry room for guest use but request they are wiped down after use with the spray provided. We suggest bringing your own balls to play.The Pool is now available all year round (as from October 2020 - November 2021). It is shared with another 2 bedroom holiday lets all year as well as our home (which is also a holiday let July to September).During peak seasons Swimming times will apply to ensure everyone has one slot per day There is also open swimming time but guests must only swim with their household and not enter if someone else is using the facility.We suggest bringing robes and flip flops for ease of moving from your accommodation to the pool. Arrive swim ready

Title: Three Bedrooms With Own Pool, Isle of Wight
Description: With the exclusive use of a heated swimming pool and three bedroomsWillow Lodge will be a popular holiday home for families and is the best brand new holiday home we have seen on the island..Designed and built in 2021 specifically for holidaymakersWillow Lodge is south facing.Willow Lodge is in the grounds of Westridge House - if Willow Lodge alone is booked Westridge House will not have holidaymakersjust the owners.The space"The space.The lodge comfortably sleeps six people with three bedroomstwo king size beds and a twin bedroomwith the king size bedrooms enjoying the use of a Jack and Jill bathroom with a walk-in-showerthere is also a family bathroom with a walk-in-shower.While it may be tempting to stay in and around the lodge and swimming pool during a holidaythe beaches of Seaview and Puckpool Park are just a five minute drive away with Bembridge (Countyfile magazines recent Village of the Year winner) is ten minutes and ideally located to explore all parts of the island.The spaciouslight and comfortable living and dining room with a 50 inch television overlooks the swimming pool with bi-folding doors and leads to the modern well equipped kitchen which includes work surfacesdishwasheroven and hobmicrowavetoasterkettle and a fridge/freezer.The doors from the living room can be opened on warm days to allow free flow from the lodge to the swimming pool area.Also included in the utility room is a washing machine and tumble dryer.WifiLinen and towels and central heating are included and there is free off road parking.Willow Lodge is able to accept one small to medium size dog at ¬£50 a week.The Latest Reviews:Just wanted to say we had the most wonderful time at Willow Lodge. Many thanks for your help in arranging it. We were very sorry to have to leave and would definitely return. Luiza & Family 24th August 2021Stylish and fresh property with clear attention to detail throughout. Liz and Graham really have thought of everything to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable. Lovely clean pool very much enjoyed by the children. Temperature of pool perfect for us. Big thanks to Roger for arranging the ferries for us. This was greatly appreciated. Would highly recommend. Sonia & Family 12th July 2021Willow Lodge was a fantastic new holiday homeset in beautiful grounds. The place has been finished and furnished to a very high standard. The hosts Graham and Liz were so very welcominglovely hosts. The swimming pool was heated to 28 degrees and was the warmest pool I have been in. The whole place was immaculately presented. Thank you so much for having us. Nicholas & Family1st June 2021."

Title: Cosy barn conversion with connecting indoor pool
Description: Pennard Hill Farm is a family farm with breathtaking views over the Mendip Hills. Our holiday cottages are very individual and have bags of character and charm.The Haybarn is a beautiful barn conversation next to the indoor heated swimming poolacross the courtyard from the main farm house.There is plenty to see and do nearby such as Longleat Safari ParkHauser & Worth Art Galleryexploring the local towns of WellsFrome and Glastonbury and enjoying long walks right on the doorstep.The spaceThe space.The Haybarn cottage is opposite the main farmhouse and next to a shared indoor pool. The open plan bedroom upstairs is large with space for a cot. There is a sofatelevision and writing desk. There is a bath upstairs with a hand held shower.Downstairs is also open plan with a fitted kitchenfarmhouse table and chairsarm chairs and a television.Guest access.Parking is next to the property.The pool is shared with our two other cottages between the hours of 10am and 6pm. Outside these hours it is exclusively for your use. You are of course welcome to use the pool during the day time too if you wish.Other things to note.Smallwell behaved dogs are welcome (a maximum of one unless otherwise arranged) but there is an extra charge of ¬£25 per dog. There is no garden at the Haybarn so dogs must be kept on leads at all times. This needs to be requested and agreed with the owner upon booking.There is a pub within about 45mins - 1hr walk awaydo ask for directions.

Title: Cottage with tennis court and pool
Description: A tranquil environment to unwind and enjoy some peace and quiet. A single storage cottage close to Ashdown Forest offering an all weather tennis court and outdoor swimming pool (heated June - August). The cottage sits in its own enclosed garden.The spaceThe space.Brickyard Farm Cottage is the perfect place for a memorable break. A single storage cottage on the edge of Piltdown golf course offering an all weather tennis court and outdoor swimming pool (heated between June and August). The local area offers excellent golfcyclingfishing and walking. The cottage sits in its own enclosed garden. The heated swimming pool is within a separate secluded secure garden. There is a barbecue area and seating for al fresco dining. There is a barn which can be used for the safe storage of bikes and there is ample parking for a number of cars. (Minimum two night booking)The neighbourhoodThe Peacock Inn is in walking distance and is the quintessential country inn offering a wealth of historic features. Old Spot Farm Shop is one milestocking a wide variety of farmhouse producemuch of it sourced locally. Supermarkets are within easy distance.Other things to noteThe pool will be heated 27 May - 18 September. The temperature is set to 28 - 30 degrees but it is heated by a heat exchangerwe can never guarantee that it will achieve this temperature. Although we do our utmost to keep the pool in tip top conditionit has been known to get algae bloom and had to be closed for a couple of days until safe to swim again

Description: Very contemporarily styled small 2 room simple cottage on ground floor set on a rural farmstead. suited to a couplesingle or couple with young baby.Fresh white linen. Marshall iPhone compatible music speaker..The spaceThe space.Our setting is uniquebeautiful walks a few steps from the door. Our Highland CattleGoats and horses are part of the family. Title: Luxury Lake Side Holiday Lodge Sleeps 4
Description: This is a beautiful lake side luxury private holiday lodge. It has 2 bedrooms so can sleep up to 4 people. This is for the entire place.It is situated in a quiet area of billing aquadrome holiday park. It has private parking for 1 carprivate decking and a private garden area.Situated on a private lakeyou can relax on the decking. The area is quiet and tranquil with ducksswansmoor hens on the lake.55‚Äù smart tv with Netflix in main lounge and a tv and DVD player in master bedroom.The spaceThe space.Detached Private Lake Side Lodge for private use. You are renting the whole unit privately. Our lodge provides wonderfulrelaxing self catering accommodation with a fully fitted kitchencentral heating and a family bathroom and includes free parking right next to the lodge for 1 car plus free WiFi. Please note only one car will be permitted per stay.The kitchen has all utensils and crockery you will need to cater for a lovely holiday. It also has a washing machinedishwasheroven and hob and large fridge and freezer.There is private WiFi and two digital TVsone 55‚Äù in the lounge (with Netflix included) and a smaller TV in the master bedroom with built in DVD player.The bathroom has a bath and over bath shower with a rain head and also a hose head.The master bedroom has a walk in wardrobe and double bed.The second bedroom has two single beds.There is also private decking with patio furniture so you can sit and enjoy the sun or watch the wildlife on the private lake.

Title: Luxury 2 bedroom barn with pool and tennis court
Description: Cherry Tree Barn is located in the grounds of Hazeland Lodgean old hunting lodge for Bowood House estate. A peaceful locationwith stunning views and lots to do on the doorstep (including heated swimming pool available 1st May to 30th September and tennis court available all year)come and enjoy your own little piece of the Wiltshire countryside.The spaceThe space.Cherry Tree Barn is a fantastic converted barnwith 2 bedrooms sleeping up to 4 (plus 1 infant in a travel cot) and 1 bathroom with shower/bath. One double with kingsize bed and one twin that can be made up as a super king double on request. Fluffy feather duvets and pillows (or anti-allergy bedding on request). Bath towelshand towels and pool towels (when pool is open) all provided.Minimum stay varies - 4 nights May to Sept (7 nights during summer holidays Sat-Sat)otherwise 3 nights (with some exceptions). For 2 week bookings a change of linen/towels is provided. For long stay discounted bookingsa charge for a weekly change of linen/towels can be added if required.Mezzanine dining area overlooking the tennis courtlounge with wood burnerTV with sky package and free WiFi. Kitchen with dishwashermicrowave and washing machine. Please note that there are 5 steps from the main living area to the mezzanine dining area off which the 2 bedrooms and bathroom are located.Patio and BBQ next to the heated swimming pool (open May to Sept) and tennis court (open all year). Playhouseslide and swings for little ones. Large wooded garden to explore. Facilities are shared with owners.Nearby fishinghorse ridingwalks and a pub 5 minutes up the road for food and drink.A 5 minute drive away is the wonderful Bowood House and Gardens with kids adventure playground. Also close to Lacock AbbeyLongleatthe City of BathAvebury and Stonehenge and many more local attractions.
