Title: The Buttery
Description: This luxury Grade II Listed award winning self catering holiday cottage is located three miles from the City of Cambridgeset in 23 acres of private parkland.This Cottage is perfect for romantic getawaysbusiness and solo travellers alike. Come home to a roaring log fire whilst enjoying a well deserved gin and tonic from the honesty bar.The spaceThe space.The Buttery comprises of a Sitting room with a kitchen & dining area with a log burning stove along with a good sized double bedroom and ensuite shower room. There is underfloor heating throughout.Guest access.Parking is available in the Courtyard situated behind the Cottage.Access to the Cottage is from the front garden area.

Title: Norman cottage 10 minutes from Honfleur
Description: 10 minutes from Honfleuryou will find an ideal place to recharge your batteries. The cottage 4 people (85m2) is located in the propertyon a landscaped and enclosed garden of almost 2 hectares.On the ground floor : entranceliving room (TVfireplace)toiletlarge fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher.Upstairs2 bedrooms :.1 with 1 bed 160 by 200 and 1 with 2 beds 90 X 200.bathroomwashing machine/dryer.Park viewgarden table and chairsdeckchairsumbrellaweber barbecue.Guest access.Guests have parking located on the property and have free access to the current pool April to the end of October (11m by 5m) heated to 27 degrees."Other things to note.There are plenty of activities nearby.Numerous hiking trailsSaint Gatien golf courseequestrian center 5 minutes awaymuseumsfishingtennis....The charming city of Honfleur with its museumsgalleries and lively poetic alleys all year round.Deauville/Trouville.Youll be less than an hour from Etretat and its majestic cliffs."

Title: Peace & Comfort within a Hampshire walled garden
Description: The Coach House sits within a beautiful walled garden. Both pool( heated from June 1st - Sep 30th) & garden are shared with the main 17th Century house. Just 1hr from London5 mins from the M3 & perfect for a break or business. Good local places to eat & country walks.We operate a min. 2 night stay policy and sleeps 3. Cont. breakfast included.Recently renovated. Luxury beds. Antique furniture and faded linens. Restful and relaxing. English afternoon Tea served Apr-Jul on Wed. & Thurs.The space"The space.The Coach House is separate from the main house and your own private space to enjoy for a minimum 2 night stay. Upstairs there is a light double aspect bedroom with 5ft Vi-Spring luxury bed & quality bed linen. Running the width of the building is an elegant relaxed sitting/dining room with TVWificomfortable sofa and furnishingsa generous table for dining/work space and views (double aspect) over the garden. A bright modern kitchen (with fridgetoasteriron & board) leads off the dining area and tea & coffee making facilities are provided. You are welcome to prepare light meals if you wish.A separate lobby leads to a newly-fitted bath room with power shower over the bath. There is also a shaving point.Downstairs there is a small bedroom that can be rented in conjunction with the space upstairs (shares upstairs bathroom). There is a standard 3ft Vi spring bed and there are limited views over the garden.We want you to feel at home and you are welcome to explore the lovely 1.5 acre gardenplanted with yew hedges and to form a series of distinct garden rooms. You can lounge on luxury chairs and day beds and swim in the outdoor heated pool in summershared with the hosts. There is a small Weber BBQ available for your use. Talking of eggs we keep rare-breed chickens up the garden and they lay tinypretty eggs that you can try!Please be aware that whilst we are delighted to accept small childrenparents are responsible for ensuring that the furnishings are not spoiled in any way or we will need to make a charge for replacements."Other things to note.Included in your stay:As well as coffee and tea-making facilitieswe provide a basket filled with things to get you started for breakfast including orange juicemilkgranola and mueslisourdough breadbutterjamsmarmalade & local honey.New for 2022! You may book AFTERNOON TEA in the main house at 3.30pm on Wednesdays and Thursday between the start of April and end of July. Tea is served as a series of 7 individual courses and needs to be booked in advance on our dedicated website. We are able to accommodate up to 10 people each afternoon and the price is ¬£25/head. Do let us know if you are interested and we can check availability over the time you are with us.

Title: Elm Park Barn, Chewton Keynsham, BS31 2SS
Description: We are midway between the popular cities of Bristol and Bath with great views and a large indoor heated swimming pool and outdoor Jacuzzi for your exclusive use. (¬£30 sur-charge paid for heating).3 charming outdoor seating areas.Easy access to Bath and Bristol \Park and Rides\.TVs in bedrooms55" lounge TV. DVDWIFIBluetooth Boom Box.Equipped Kitchen with dishwasherwashing machine and microwave.Not suitable for children under 18 or pets. Car essentialThe space"The space.We are a tale of two citiesBath and Bristolbut there are many more places within an hours drive. Walesacross the Severn Bridges; Exmoor in Devon; Thomas Hardy Country in Dorest; Westonbirt Arboretum and Prince Charles home in the Cotswolds; many National Trust stately homes. Plenty to provide a wonderful week or two holidayexploring the South West of the UK.Cheltenham Races in MarchBadminton Horse Trials in May (5th - 7th)Bath Christmas Market - Thursday 24 Nov -Sunday 11 Dec20 mins away.WESTONBIRT ABORETUM - Christmas Wonderland. Every Fri,Sat,Sun from 25 Nov -18 Dec. 45 mins awayRelax at Elm Park Barn afterwardswith open log fire in Winter; heated swimming pool and hot Jacuzzi. What could be better?"

Title: Ivy's Sussex sleeps 8 Swimming Pool Pet friendly

Wifi broadband Amazon fire Sticks for TVs"The space"The space.Ground Floor.Twin/double bedroom with en-suite shower room .Walk in shower with grab rail & shower seat available. Ideal for those who dont do stairs.First Floor.Master bedroom king size bed with Jack & Jill shower room. Lovely private room with atmospheric LED lighting. Additional sofa bed sleeps two.Double bedroom room with access to balcony with countryside view.Twin roomthe Aft Cabin with full size single beds with roof window with lovely views.TVs in all rooms.Wash Rooms.Ground floor large family bathroomBath & Shower.First Floor shower room with toilet/wash basin.Ensuite shower room.Living space.Country Kitchen withdouble ovenceramic hob fridgemicrowave coffee machine kettle toaster dishwasher & breakfast table.Utility space washing machine tumble drier & large additional fridge/freezer. Title: Mill Coach House @ The Manor Mill near Exmoor
Description: Mill Coach House is a delightful cottage nestled in the beautiful hills of Somerseton the south side of a wooded valley beside the River Tone. Nearly 200 years oldthis lovely cottage has been newly updated to create a charmingwell-equipped holiday home.The grounds are a paradise of fieldswater meadows and gardensa haven for wildlifeand star-gazing in our dark skies. Our heated indoor swimming pool and play area with swingsmini fortress and trampoline offer fun for everyone.The spaceThe space.Originally a barn for the horses and carts which transported the wool and corn from the millMill Coach House is entered through a useful porch area. It has a new kitchen with dining area and a comfortable sitting room.On the first floorBedroom 1 has a double bed and Bedroom 2 has a zip-link bed which can be twin beds or a super-king bed.Mill Coach House is south facing with river and garden views and an outside eating area. Guests are also welcome to take advantage of the rest of the beautiful grounds and river banks. :.At Mill Coach House the facilities include:.‚Ä¢ Induction hobelectric oven and microwave.‚Ä¢ Dishwasher.‚Ä¢ Refrigerator with small freezer compartment.‚Ä¢ Toaster and kettle.‚Ä¢ Smart TV.‚Ä¢ Free wifi and 4G mobile access.‚Ä¢ New bathroom with a showerwashbasin and WC.‚Ä¢ Shared heated indoor swimming pool.‚Ä¢ Shared children‚Äôs play area.‚Ä¢ Shared barbecue.‚Ä¢ A separate shared utility has a washing machine and tumble drier.‚Ä¢ Ample free parkingLinen and bath towels are included but please provide your own swimming and beach towels.We‚Äôre sorry but dogs are not allowed. We do have twovery friendlywaggy tailed labradors who live on site and are a part of our family. They have free use of all the gardens so you will meet them wandering around.

Title: Westcountry house, hot tub, & outdoor heated pool
Description: On the edge of ExmoorLittle Burston is a beautiful country home set in 110 acres of our own farmland close to Dulverton. Surrounded by naturevery comfortable and well equipped. It can sleep up to 6 people. Your own private garden with hot tub and patioown drive and ample parking. Heated pool at the main house 1st May to end September. For your and our use only.We welcome up to 2 well behaved dogs.I charge extra for dogs as the house gets an extra clean after their stay.The space"The space.The cottage is secluded and surrounded by nature - red deer and roe deerfoxes badgers and a large variety of birds in and around the adjacent farmland. You are free to walk the farmfish in the trout pondplay tennis and enjoy the heated pool at the main farmhouse during the summer (May to end of September). There is a heated games barn near the main house. Inside are table tennis and table football tables and gym rings. It‚Äôs a lovely space to do Yoga with a large window looking down the valley.The cottage is cosy and warm with comfy sofas a 42 plasma TV freesat and DVD player and bluetooth speaker. There are DVDs to watch and a selection of family games and books. There is a well equipped kitchen and a dining table and chairs. The cottage has wifi.Upstairs are three rooms. 2 bedrooms - one with twin beds and ensuite bathroom with bath and shower. The other has a king size bed with ensuite bathroom with shower. In between is a study with a king size sofa bed. Linen and towels are provided.The cottage has its own private garden with patiopergolatable and chairs - a real sun trap when the sun shines. There is a barbecue for guests to use. The garden has a large grassed area with a netted trampolineswing and football net for those with children. No hard ball games near the cottage please.Its a place to relaxrecharge your batteries away from the relentless pace of modern life.The farm has horses grazing and neighbouring farms with sheep and for that reason we ask that dogs are on leads when near livestock."Other things to note.The cottage has wifi - the code is EVhJf4KTiVtvRn.When walking the farm please close all gates and only walk in the areas we describe. We have several horses who live with us. Please especially close the deerproof fences as the red deer eat all the trees!

Title: The Party Barn
Description: Wonderfully rural annex providing self contained accommodation comprising open plan Living/Dining Room/Kitchen and use of indoor swimming pool by arrangement. No pets allowed.The spaceThe space.The Party Barn is modern yet cosy and very easy to relax in. Fully fitted kitchenTVWiFi its easy to stay in touch as well as switch off. The annex has a great double bedroom with en suite shower and ideal twin room with additional single bed.Guest access.The Party Barn has a separate access to our house so you can come and go at ease with keys to your own front door. There is an indoor swimming pool that can be used by arrangement but during term time it is limited due to the operation of my swim school that runs six days a week. I am a qualified ASA swimming teacher so lessons can also be arranged for children.Other things to note.If you want to arrange a babysitter then we can help as well as drivers to take you out to dinner.

Title: Idyllic Dorset Hideaway
Description: "Our traditional English Shepherds Hut sits deep in the rolling hills of the Dorset countryside. We have created an idyllic escape where you can switch off from the cares of the outside world with nothing but birdsong to disturb your peace. Take a walk around our beautiful gardens and lakeenjoy a dip in our poolwarm up next to the log burning stove or while away an evening around the fire pit as you barbecue your supper."The space"The space.Our Shepherds Hut contains a very comfortable double bedmade up already for your arrivalwith an electric blanket. The hut is warm and cosy even in winter with the log-burning stove lit. There is a microwave combi-oven and a single gas ring. There is also a fir pit outside to barbecue your supper. We provide tea and coffee and our own apple juice and milk can be found in the large cold box just outside. Our local pub The Mitre which serves good food will give you a warm welcome and is only ten minutes walk away.The bathroom is alongside the Shepherds Hut and contains a showerbasinloo and a sink for washing up. Towels are provided.Outsidewe have a prize-wining herd of grass-fed Dexter cattle grazing in our fields. People have commented that our beef tastes like it used to and that it is more delicious than any other beef ever sampled. Jointssteaksstewing steakminceburgers and sausages are available (frozen) to our guests if ordered in advance or on arrival.We can now also supply pork breakfast sausages (plain or with honey and apple) and pork chops from the pigs in our woods."

Title: Self contained studio apartment
Description: A self contained first floor studio apartment with private entrancefully equipped kitchen and bathroom located in the beautiful Painswick Valley. The studio is a attached to a large house and guests are welcome to enjoy our gardens and swimming pool when not in use by our family. It sleeps 4 (1 double and 1 sofa bed in the same room). Self catered- but can stock fridge in advance on request. Easy access to StroudCheltenhamGloucesterTetburyCirencester. Beautiful local walks and pubs.The spaceThe space.The studio apartment has solid oak flooring throughout. There is a large open plan space with a table and chairsa sofadressing table and a large walk in wardrobe with ample hanging space and shelving. A small kitchen has a sinkdishwasherfridge and an electric cooker with all basic utensils supplied. The bathroom has a showersink and loo and towels will be provided.Guest access.There is private access to the apartment with a entrance hall with coat racksa storage area and stairs up to the first floor. Guests are welcome to walk through the extensive gardens and if the swimming pool is up and running guests are welcome to use it by arrangement with the family.

Title: Lower Mill Estate.Cosy 1 Bedroom Cottage with Pool
Description: Tinycutecosy 1 bedroom cottage in Lower Mill Estate. Use of Mill Village heated outdoor pooltennis courtslakes. The cottage is good for couples & solo adventurers but can sleep up to 3 people. Fantastic location in a 550 acre nature reserve with outdoor activitiescyclinglakes and restaurant. Gigaclear WiFi now installed at the cottageThe spaceThe space.Follow on Instagram @firefly_lowermillestate - Cosycute1 bedroom cottage (approx. footprint 5m x 5m) suitable for solo travellercouples or 2 adults and 1 child. Fabulous location set in Lower Mill Estate with access to heated outdoor pool and the wider estate facilities (excluding ArtSpa).My tiny cottage in the Mill Village area of Lower Mill Estate has 1 bedroom with a small double bed and a single bunk bed above. There is a separate shower room with loo and sink as well as a washing machine. The kitchen & lounge area is open plan with a sofatub chair and footstoollog burnerdining table and chairsFreeview TV with a selection of DVDs and board games. The kitchen area is compact but has everything you will need - fridge with small freezer compartmentdishwasherovenportable induction hobskettletoastermicrowaveironironing board and all the essentials.Outside there is a communal courtyard with outdoor seating which is a real sun trap in the afternoon and evening.Gigaclear wifi now installed at the cottage.THE COTTAGE CAN NOT BE BOOKED TO USE AS A PLACE TO STAY FOR COMMUTING TO AND FROM A PLACE OF WORK.THE MEZZANINE AREA IS NOT AVAILABLE FOR RENTAL GUESTS AND ACCESS IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN.PLEASE NOTE WHERE I HAD TO CANCEL A BOOKING LAST DECEMBER IT WAS DUE TO A SMALL LEAK AND I WAS UNABLE TO RESOLVE IT OVER THE CHRISTMAS WEEK. I OFFERED THE GUEST A DISCOUNT IF THEY STILL WANTED TO STAY OR TO CANCEL WITH A FULL REFUND WHICH WAS WELCOMED BY THE GUEST.

Title: The Duck Wing, quirky dog friendly apartment
Description: "The Duck Wing is a quirkyself contained apartment within Plenty Cottage. Ideal for two people (and pets) its beautifully appointed for a relaxedcarefree stay in a wonderfully rural environment. Nothing is too much trouble. It sleeps two in double bed in a pretty bedroom and has a double sofa bed too. Own bathroom/showera separate WC and a warm spacious living area. The pub is 7 mins walk away and the beaches a 5 mins drive. The privateheated swimming is available 1st April - 31 Sept"The space"The space.Prettyself contained with everything you need. We have ample off-road parking and storage for bikesequipment etc. You have your own access front door code. Deep in the countrysideits the land of Peace and Plenty surrounded by The National Trust. The swimming pool is warm in a fantastic poly tunnel(!) and wonderful during the summer months (April to September inc) and the dog/child friendly pub is only a ten minute stroll down the lane. The garden is prolific and peaceful ( dogs love it!).""Guest access.The front door key code enables you to come and go as you wish and I am here to greet you. The largeabundant garden is at your disposal as too is the summerhouseBBQ and pool. Theres loads of parking and storage space""Other things to note.The Five Bells serves home cooked food too and its only a 10 minute stroll. We have no street lights (yeah!) but Ill provide a torch. There are wonderful restaurants in nearby Lyme RegisBridport and Seatown. Go to The Hive at Burton Bradstock too!"

Title: Farm View - tranquil retreat near hills & coast
Description: "Farm View is located in the middle of Sampford Brett - a quintessential English village between Exmoor National Parkthe Quantock Hills & Somersets coast. It provides bright spacious accommodation and is fitted to a high standard with comfy bedsfitted carpetsmodern bathroom & country pine furniture. Central heating keeps the property snug and warm even in the depths of winter. Outside there are spacious grounds with a swimming pooltrampoline and climbing frame. Free Type 2 EV charging."The spaceThe space.Farm View has a spacious double bedroom with plenty of room for a cot which we can provide on request. The second bedroom is smaller and has bunk beds which are 3 foot wide. Both bedrooms have a wardrobechest of drawers and bedside tables.The largebright lounge has a comfy setteematching bed-settee (which will sleep an extra 2 people)dining table and coffee table. There is a wall mounted TV with a DVD player and FreeSAT box. WiFi internet is available throughout the property.There is a kitchen area off one end of the lounge (an L-shaped room) which is fully equipped with cookerfridgemicrowave oventoaster etc.The modern bathroom has a bath/showertoiletwashbasinshelving and heated towel rail.Please note that access is up an external flight of 8 steps so the accommodation is not suitable for people who find steps difficult.

Title: The Potting Shed - cosy country cottage
Description: The Potting Shed is part of the original Gardners Buildings of a large country house. Beautifully updated to provide a truly snug and romantic place to stay. A log burner is the focal point of the lounge/living area as well as exposed wooden beams and stonework. WifiSmart TV and all you will need for a memorable get away. Well fitted kitchen with fridgemicrowave and dishwasher. Double bedroomshower/WC. Ample Parking. We want to make your stay cosycomfortable and enjoyable."The space.We want to welcome you to our Potting Shed which is a beautifully restored cottage.The Potting Shed is located in the grounds of an old family home now updated and offering a complex of converted barns including a cafebeauty parlourhairdresser and gym. Please see our other cottages The Apple Store and The Cellar Barn which could be booked with extended family groups. The complex is set in 12 acres of groundsgardens and an old apple orchard. Guests are invited to take a walk down the Orchard to see the beautiful views across to Cheddar Gorge or stroll around to meet the friendly animals.Our neighbours Crossfit Wyvern allow our guests to use their gym and leisure facilities including for the summer season: swimming poolhot tub and sauna. This can be arranged by booking and payment online directly with them. There is also a cafe on site selling delicious homemade food.In the Potting Shed we have included all we can to give you home-from-home comforts in peaceful country surroundings. We offer a welcome pack when you arrivethere is free Wifi (just in case you want to contact the outside world) ! A log burner is available- please bring your own logs or they can be purchased at our local store in the village. We are very flexible so please ask if there is anything we can do to make your stay more comfortable or anything that you need.Outside the Potting Shed is a table and chairs for you to sit and have your morning coffeeand a small BBQ. As well as this there is a larger grass area with BBQ and seating for the use of guests located just across from the parking area. Or if you would like a little walk you can wander across the grass area of the walled garden and through into our apple orchard with a seating area looking out across the Somerset Levels towards Cheddar Gorge - if you come in September you are welcome to try the different varieties of apples.If you like animals a walk around the grounds gives you the opportunity to meet some unusual friends including : 2 friendly pigs : Pepper & BarryPigmy Goats - Murph and Cindyand some Alpacassheep and chickens as well as our friendly cats and dogs. Or if you would rather just sit in the orchard you can see the views of the beautiful Somerset Levels out towards Cheddar Gorge or watch the sun go down with a glass of wine.There is a laundry room opposite the Potting Shed - washing machinetumble drieriron and ironing board are available for the use of our guests. A rotary clothes line is located in the small guests garden across the car park.The cafe next door serves homemade food and delicious coffee and cafe. It is accessed via the wooden gate and across the car park. Down the driveway from the cafe is a gym and swimming pool which guests can book in to and use on a pay-as-use basis. There is also a nails and massage parlour and hairdresser in the gym/cafe complex.The village has a well-stocked grocery store for all your food and drink needsa post office and 2 pubs within walking distance.If its the countryside you like then there is Shapwick Heath and Ham Wall Nature Reserve (10/15 mins)Cheddar Gorge or the Quantock Hills (30 mins) or the sea at Minehead (45 mins)or simply go down on to the Somerset Levels for some fantastic walks around the area.The village is on the Somerset Cycle route so an idea place to stay during a cycling break to see the wonderful Somerset Levels or take the challenge of the steep climb up Cheddar Gorge. Chilton Polden is on many Somerset cycle routes. For more information about some of the routes that pass the door look up Overview of cycling in Chilton Polden.The near town of Street (5 miles away) boasts the large retail outlet of Clarks Village if you are in to shopping.A file with information of local places to visit is available in the Potting Shed along with tourist information leaflets."Guest access.Our postcode brings you to Broadway via SatNav but you will need directions to get to our accommodation. We will send these through to you via air bnb message after booking.Other things to note.We have 2 small dogs - Bertie(dad) and Albe (his son) - they may come and say hello when you arrive because they are very friendly and love all our guests.Do not charge electric cars from the property - the supply is not set up for this.

Title: Family & dog friendly static caravan on 5* park
Description: SPACIOUS 3 BEDROOM FAMILY & DOG FRIENDLY STATIC CARAVAN IN A QUIET LOCATION ON SHOREFIELD COUNTRY PARKA 5* HOLIDAY PARK5 MINUTES FROM THE BEACH & ON THE EDGE OF THE NEW FOREST NATIONAL PARK. It has every amenity including indoor and outdoor swimming poolsbarsrestaurantindoor & outdoor play areasfitness suitehealth spalarge supermarketsmall fishing lake etc. Wi-fi is freely available throughout the park including in the caravan.The space.The home is a modern 3 bedroom property that sleeps up to 6 guests with 1 double and 2 twin bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. It has a secure decking area safe for children and dogs and a garden backing on to woodland.The unit itself is complete with all the facilities that you would expect. There is central heating and double glazing and usb charging sockets in every room. The kitchen has a gas hob with fan assisted electric ovenfridge / freezermicrowavekettle and toaster along with all the cutlerycrockery and utensils. The living room has a large sofa with a 32" smart tvDVD playerHiFi system with internet radioDAB radiocd playerusb connectivitya portable weatherproof bluetooth speaker / lantern / power-bank for outside or insidea large variety of family film DVD\sgames and books. All of the bedrooms have plenty of storage with wardrobes with drawers and hangerscharging socketsbluetooth DAB clock radios and a hairdryer. The main bedroom also has another 32" Smart TV. Please note that the bedrooms are a little bit snug / compact as with most static caravansso please bear this in mind. Update - 1 of the single bedrooms now have full sized adult bunk beds which offers larger beds and more room in the bedroom. The living space on the other handyou could quite comfortably fit in at least 12 people with room for more! The bathroom has a very large powerful showerhand basin and toilet. There is also a second toilet and hand basin. An ironironing boardclothes dryervacuum cleaner etc are all provided as is bedlinen. Please bring your own towels. The outside decking area has a dining area and additional seating with small drinks table4 led security lights and a floodlight for al fresco dining.A travel cot and high chair are also provided.If you want somewhere to get away from it allthen this is the place for you. The amount of wildlife right by the caravan is truly extraordinary - Whether they are rabbitssquirrelsdeergreen woodpeckers [ my favourite! ]. pheasanta huge array of titsfinches and other birds that feed off the bird feeders providedthere is always something to see. Please feel free to top up the bird feeders when necessary from the food provided as they seem to get through it at an astonishing rate. There is also a bird bath for our feathered friends.Other things to note.A family pass to access the swimming pools and the fitness centre etc is ¬£50 per week.

Title: The 'Cart Shed' - cosy space in a scenic setting
Description: Situated in the scenic Chalke Valleyan Area of Outstanding Natural Beautythe Cart Shed provides a welcoming and comfortable base to relax in and explore the numerous sites of WiltshireDorset and Hampshire.Newly renovatedit is a warm and well furnished private space to enjoy the surrounding countryside.The spaceThe space.The \Cart Shed\ has been extensively renovated to create a well proportioned self-contained private outbuilding to the farmhouse. The living space has everything you would need; flexible sleeping arrangements (Twin or Super King) for 2 personsin a gallery bedroom overlooking the large living/dining room.There is a separate well equipped kitchenwith Nespresso machinefridgedishwashermicrowaveoven & induction hob. Opposite a modern shower room with guest amenities.The living space has a large central wood-burner with three large sofas. There is a 42" TV at one end of the spacewith Sky TV (Sports / Movies)Blu Ray player connected to a Bose surround sound system. At the other enda dining table and work desk with chairs. There is also a large chest of drawers.

Title: Crocus at Stancombe Manor, pool and tennis
Description: Crocusapartment on the ground floor of Stancombe Manor‚Äôs tithe barnis a place of peacetranquility and beauty.Sleeps 2-4perfect for a couple or small family.Shared use of Stancombe‚Äôs facilities: indoor pooltennis7 acres of lovely gardens.Close to award-winning beaches and fabulous walking.Half-way between Salcombe and Dartmouth.Great pubs and restaurants a short drive away.One well-behaved dogThe spaceThe space.Crocus is a recently renovated apartment on the ground floor of the tithe barn at Stancombe Manora walled Devon hamlet listed in the Domesday Book. It‚Äôs a great base for a couple or small family to explore SalcombeDartmouth and the surrounding beaches. There are 17 privately owned properties which share 7 acres of gardens. This part of Devon is known for beautiful countryside and beachessecret green lanesand a host of good pubs and restaurants. We are 3 miles from the sea at Torcrossand 10 miles from both Salcombe and Dartmouth.Here is what the apartment includes:OPEN PLANLiving area.- one 3-seater sofa and armchair.- TV and DVD/blue ray player with some DVDs.- comfortable pull-down double bed (4‚Äô 6‚Äù wide) if neededKitchen.- under counter fridge with small inbuilt freezer.- oven and hob.- dishwasher.- kettle and cafeti√®re.- crockerycutlerycupspans and all you need for meal preparationDining.- breakfast bar for 2.- dining table and chairs for 4BEDROOM.- comfortable extra large bed (6‚Äô) OR 2 single beds (3‚Äô wide).- cot if needed.- large wardrobes.- bedside tablesSHOWER ROOM (en-suite).- large shower.- towels.- underfloor heating.- heated towel railEXTRAS.- WiFi - we are in a very rural part of the country and WiFi can be intermittent.- gas central heating.- combi boiler.- storage roomOUTSIDE.- 7 acres of grounds shared with other Stancombe properties.- shared indoor pool.- barbecues.- seating.- parking a few steps from the front door.- outdoor tennis court.- snooker room.- children‚Äôs games room including table tennis.- pitch and putt.- outdoor children‚Äôs play area.- There are many ancient green lanes nearbyone of which runs through Stancombe and leads down to the church at Sherfordanother leads down towards the sea.Guest access.Guests have access to the whole flat which is on the ground floor of a restored tithe barn.It has its own entrance with a key box by the front door for easy 24-hour access.Other things to note.As well as the super-king bed (or twin beds) in the bedroomthere‚Äôs a very comfortable pull-down double bed in the lounge which makes it an economical option for a family.Crocus can accommodate a couple or small family (2 adults and 2 children) - it‚Äôs a squeeze for 4 adults.The lanes around us are very narrow with passing points.Although we have WiFiit isn‚Äôt a strong signal due to the rural location.

Title: Bucks Green Place Beautiful Converted Barn
Description: A recently converted barn finished to a very high standard set in the grounds of a Grade II Georgian country house. Situated in idyllic Sussex countrysidenestled close to the Surrey Hills and South Downs. With stunning views across seven acres of garden and open pastures.The spaceThe space.Beautifully appointed small barn conversionwith original oak beams and features. Well proportioned open plan kitchen living space with breakfast barcomfy seatingnew kitchen with all mod cons. Flat screen Smart TV. Upstairs a spacious double bedroom with luxurious king size bedbuilt in wardrobes and cupboardsflat screen TVdressing table. Ensuite shower room stylishly designedheated towel rail and heated floor. Space for a single air bed or travel cot upstairs and / or double air bed downstairs in living area.The barn is located within our family garden next door to our outdoor swimming pool. We have assigned an area of the garden for your personnel use.Guest access.Coded electric gate access to secure parking. Guests will have access to 7 acres open pastureleading onto public footpaths. Access to our private swimming pool in the summer months can be arranged upon requestOther things to note.Long term let Monday - Friday is also available for working professionalsplease enquire if you are interested in this arrangement.

Luxury fittings throughout & state of the art entertainment system. Title: Luxury Studio Apartment with Pool, near London
Description: A largeluxurious modern studio apartmentsleeping up to 3. Set in a large private garden with heated indoor/outdoor pool (pool open May-September inc); ideal for relaxing after a hard day at worksightseeing or having fun.Off-road private parking; 5 minutes drive to Redhill station and 30 mins train to central London. Gatwick is 15 mins drive as are the M25 and the local amenities of Redhill/Reigate.The traditional local village pub is 2 mins walkideal for dining and entertaining.The spaceThe space.This location is ideal for links to London and the South East. In additionlocal amenities include water sportsmountain bikingSurrey Hillscyclingaerodromes and traditional Surrey villages. Famous tourist attractions in London plus otherse.g. WindsorHampton Court and Thorpe Park are all less than 1 hr away. WimbledonAscotHenleyLordsWembleyTwickenhammany famous football and rugby stadiums and entertainment venuesare within easy reach (less than 1 hr) by car or public transport.Guest access.The apartment is stand alone in the large lower garden. You have independent private access to the apartment. The lower garden is available for useas is the large pool. The pool enclosure is fully retractable to create an outdoor pool when weather permits. In those days that it is sunny but "cool" the enclosure creates a 25 deg+ indoor environment. Note: The pool is shared access with householder. The pool and lower garden can be provided as sole private access for for you and your guests for an additional charge of ¬£150 per day. Title: Deluxe en-suite bedroom in Manor House
Description: "1 of 3 amazing rooms. Approach through a secure gated entrance with long tree - lined drive. Set in a peaceful rural location within the main Manor house is a beautiful large room recently re-furbished ideal that peaceful break away. With an enormous walk in shower and free standing bathits pure luxury. You have your own private balcony overlooking the landscaped garden. Breakfast is not available although Tea and coffee is provided in the room."The spaceThe space.There is a fully equipped home gym and heated indoor and outdoor (seasonal) pools which are included in your stay.Guest access.Guests will come through the main door at the rear of the property. Tea and Coffee provided in room.

Title: The Duck House. A child/dog friendly rural chalet
Description: "The Duck House is a lovely child/dog friendly chalet nestling in the orchard at Plenty Cottage.The perfect retreat for a family/group - and dogs are especially welcome! Open plan living is around a pot-bellied stove and it‚Äôs a comfortable and home from home. A wonderful rambling gardensummerhouseBBQ and a (free) heated swimming pool (1st April - 31st Sept). The mantra is No Stress. Ample parkingdog/child friendly pub 7 mins walk away. Wonderful NT beaches just five min drive. Relax."The space"The space.The Duck House is fully furnished. Its centrally heated but in additiontheres everything you need to light the wood burner. The second bedroom is child orientated with a double bed and a single bed so it sleeps three kids (or adults!). There are strict safety rules regarding the pool but other than thatthe garden/BBQ are for you to enjoy.""Guest access.The Duck House is completely separate in the orchard near the swimming pool. You have your own key so you can come and go as you wish. Theres plenty of free off-road parking.""Other things to note.The pub The Five Bells is ten minutes walk. It serves food and is both child and dog friendly. The Shave Cross Inn is a thatched ye olde pub and worth a visit (two miles). Felicitys Farm Shop is just up the road too. Charmouth beach is great for dog walking"

Title: The Bothy at Launceston Farm, cottage with indoor swimming pool & sauna
Description: The Bothy is one of the two small self catering cottages at Launceston Farm near Blandford in Dorset. This single storey cottageattached to the main farmhouse has its own private courtyard with outdoor bateau bath for soaks under the stars. Popular with dog ownersyou can step out of the front door onto farm tracks which run for miles across the chalk downlands of the surrounding Cranborne ChaseArea of Oustanding Natural Beauty. Guests have access to the farmhouse gardens and the indoor swimming pool. The local pub is a five minute walk into the village.If it‚Äôs not walking weatherwhile away the afternoon in the 12m indoor swimming pool and sauna (available to guests 7:00am-7:00pm). Curl up on the sofa in front of the wood burner with a DVD or a good read. If you don‚Äôt feel like cookingorder one of Sarah‚Äôs two course farmhouse suppers delivered hot to your door or take a 5 minute stroll down to the award winning village pub.Take a trip to the World Heritage Jurassic Coast for a paddle in the ocean and the catch of the day. Enjoy a large slice of British heritage at one of the nearby National Trust and English Heritage Properties including Corfe CastleStourhead Gardens and Stone Henge. Nature lovers must visit Monkey World and Abbotsbury Swannery. Shop in independent boutiques for homewares and fashion in the Georgian market towns of ShaftesburySalisburySherborne and Wimborne.

Title: Large luxury house & pool in Henley on Thames
Description: A new award-winning house set in extensive grounds with a view over an area of outstanding natural beauty and backing on to Henley Golf Course. Set amidst mature gardenslawns and a large wildflower meadowthe house sleeps 4 adults and 4 children very comfortably. It is not intended for use as a venue for large receptions or parties but is ideal for large families who enjoy luxury living and lots of outdoor fun and games to include a heated (covered) poolfootball pitch and much more.The spaceThe space.Designed in contemporary style with a touch of mid-century chiceverywhere you go within Incline Cottage you will experience a feeling of space from the 12 seater circular dining table for fab diner parties to a sitting room with 2 x 4 seater sofas and 3 bedrooms with en suite bathrooms (2 of which have large balconies!) You have 3 rooms to watch Sky/Netflix/Amazon and a large playroom crammed with games for all ages. You even have a large pool house/bar with 2 x outdoor sofas and a firepitas well as additional dining table and chairs on the decking outside the kitchen.Guest access.Guests have full access to the house and garden.Other things to note.The property featured on Extraordinary Extensionshosted by Tinie Tempah. Winner of Best Modern Home - Chiltern Awards and Home Extension of the Year- British Homes Award

Title: The Pool House
Description: The Pool House is a contemporary spaciousprivatehideawayperfect for a romantic getaway or just a stay to explore the surrounding area. Styled with a shabby chic vibe.THE SPACE IS ONLY SUITABLE FOR TWO ADULTS & TWO CHILDREN AGE 12 AND UNDERNEW FROM MARCH 22A LUXURY HOT TUB SPA IS NOW AVAILABLE ALL YEAR ROUND.PLEASE NOTE THE POOL & POOL AREA IS CLOSED FROM OCTOBER TO THE 29th OF APRIL 22The space.Set behind privateelectricgates and within the grounds of a large converted barnThe Pool House is completely self containedit has a king size bedwith a very comfortable Emma mattress.A dining table and 4 chairsa comfortable sofa bed for extra accommodationfor childrena dressing table and mirrorwith a hair dryer in the drawer. A dressing mirror with a hanging rail. It has heating and air conditioning.The wide screen smart television can be used to watch channels with your own login detailsvia the WiFi. Also you will have use of a blue tooth speakerand a Pure digital radio.The space has a door leading to a kitchenettewith a fridge freezera James Martin electric table top grillthat will cook baconeggssausageschicken breastsalmonvegetablesetca microwave ovengrill.ToasterkettleNespresso coffee machinecafeti√®reslow cookercrockerycutlerywater & wine glasses. Complimentary teamilk & coffee podssugarsalt & pepper.Separate door leading to the WC.Walk through doorway leading to the stunning shower room with complimentary use of premiumtoiletries.Finally a door leading out to the swimming pool areawhich has its own large cushioned seating area. It has a bar area with stools and a table and chairs. Sun loungers and various floats.THIS DOOR WILL BE LOCKED FROM OCTOBER TO APRIL.The owner cannot accept any liability for using the pool area. Guests use it entirely at their own risk!Extras.Breakfast can be arranged by prior arrangement with the host who offers a Continental or a full English breakfastfor an additional cost.We can also provide delicious sharing boards.Special occasions can be catered forby prior arrangement.Check in anytime after 3pm Check out by 11am Early and late check in available at small extra charge.Access to the Pool house can be gained by a key safe next to the entrance gateswhich will contain a gate fob and keys to the Pool House.The host lives on site and will be available for any help or advice.Guest access.The pool house is completely self containedset in a private area away from the main house.It has security lighting around the buildingwith secure parking adjacent to the property.Guests will have access to their own outdoor area with a table and chairsfire pit and barbecuewith far reaching views of the beautiful surrounding countryside. The hosts horses use the paddock next to the Pool House.From the beginning of May to the end of September guests will have direct accessfrom the kitchenette to the heated swimming pool.The pool will have shared access with the hostsat separate times. The host is very flexible arranging private access. The hosts own garden sides on to the pool areabut the hot tub and bar area does have partial natural screening and is not overlooked from the hosts house. However the pool seating area can be seen from the hosts house as shown in the photos of the pool seating area.Please note the pool is not suitable for anyone unable to swimwith the exception of babes in arms!Towels are provided but please bring your own swimming towels?No glass is allowed in the pool areabut plastic glasses will be provided.We are animal lovers and have 5 dogs and 3 horses and 2 miniature Shetland ponies on site. They love fuss and attention. Please be aware that horses may walk past from 8.30am when they are taken out riding. Also the dogs can be vocal at timesbut they are quiet most of the time.One well behaved dog is allowed(possibly twobut please request firstsubject to size?) but strictly dogs are not allowed on the furnitureor bedplease! Dogs must also be kept on a lead in the pool areaand the open area outside of The Pool housebecause of the horses!Please be mindful that staying within the vicinity of horsesdogs and farm animalsthere are associated noises of being in the countryside!Other things to note.Please note that the pool and the pool areawill be closed from October to May!

Title: Luxury Apartment with pool,indoor heated.
Description: Pitfield apartment is in a lovely old village. We are in-between Exeter and Taunton. Easy access from M5. Exeter offers shoppingrestaurantscathedraland scenic quay area with lots to do. We are very close to The Grand Western canalwhich provide some pretty walks or bike rides. Near the Blackdown Hillsthe coast is about a 35-minute drive away. Great place to explore beaches too. They are lots of lovely pubs to walk or cycle too. As well as the countryside. Breakfast provided.The spaceThe space.It is in a lovely old village with lots of country pubs nearby. It‚Äôs a very peaceful and safe area. It‚Äôs a lovelybeamed room with double bed and sofa bed suitable for two children to share. Or one adult. We also have a travel cot available. A kitchen with small fridge and combi microwave. A bathroom with shower.Guest access.You will have access to a very sunny courtyard and use of an indoor heated pool (times restricted). We have lessons taking place at various times during the day.On arrival you can book slots to use the pool. You may book as many as you likebut just not back to back.Please note the courtyard and pool is shared with one other apartment.Other things to note.Slippersbath robes and pool towels are provided for your use during your stay. Please note - there is a two-night booking minimum.

Title: NEW 'Bluebell Beach'  Luxury Lodge @ Hoburne Park
Description: "Bluebell Beach is a luxury 2 Bed 2 Bath lodge in a tranquil and peaceful destination sited on the 5* Hoburne Parkwith beautiful beaches and the New Forest on your doorstep but all the fun for the family with the onsite facilities."The spaceThe space.Our 36\ x 20\ Pathfinder lodge is located in stunning Christchurch on 5* Hoburne Park and designed to make those precious moments for relaxation priceless. A time to unwind is a luxury in itself nowadaysthat‚Äôs why from its bedroom suites to living quartersthis two bedroom luxury lodge is the perfect solution. There is parking adjacent to the lodge.As a self-catering lodgeyou\ll find everything you need for a perfect stay. The kitchen has a fridgefreezergas hob with 4 burners and electric ovena toasterkettlewith complimentary teacoffeesugara dishwasherwashing machine and microwave. The lodge is a perfect place to relax and offers a 50" Smart HDTV in the loungea 32" HDTV in the master bedrooma 19" tv in the twin bedroom.This lodge has 2 bedrooms and can comfortably sleep 4. In the first bedroomyou will find a king size double bed. The second bedroom contains 2 6 x 3 ft single beds.There are 2 bathrooms. The first bathroom is ensuitehas a toilet and sink and a walk-in shower. The second bathroom has a toilet and sink and a bath with shower hose.There are also essentialsa hair dryeran ironmini ironing board and clothes dryer to make your stay more comfortable.All bed linenbathroom towelskitchen towelsoven gloves are provided.* You will need to provide your own beach / swimming towels *HOUSE RULES:- Check-in time is 3:00pm and check-out is 10amunless agreed prior with host.- Smoking is not allowed anywhere inside or outside on the decking area.- Sorrypets are not allowed at the property.- The washing machine /dishwasher are included for your use.LOCATION:Bluebell 22 is located in a quietspacious areaclose to the main facilities of Hoburne Park in ChristchurchDorset. Just a 10 min walk to Friar‚Äôs Cliff beach it is also only 10 mins drive to The New Forest. Nearby golf courses includeHighcliffeBrockenhurst ManorBarton-on-SeaThe New Forest Golf Club and Remedy Oak and are all in easy driving distance.The lodge is perfect for families and couples alikedue to it‚Äôs location you can choose to get involved with the park‚Äôs activitiesor be left to enjoy the peace and quiet.On-site facilities include: two heated swimming pools (indoor and outdoor - summer months only)gymmini-golfbarsoutdoor playgrounds for toddlers and older childrena multi games areaboules courtrestaurantcafeindoor play areaarcade and entertainment venue.Temporary Membership passes for access to the clubhouse activitiesentertainment etc are available. The cost is ¬£50 and this gives up to 6 peopleaccess for up to 7 nights or ¬£25 for 1 day. We require 72 hours notice to process the passes which are collected from reception. Please contact the Hosts for more details.Access to the beach at Steamer Point and Mudeford Quay are also within walking distance. Sainsbury‚ÄôsWaitroseLidl and Aldi are all nearbyand there‚Äôs a local Spar is located just outside of the park boundary for that emergency pint of milk! Nearby attractions include the New ForestBeaulieuSwanageDurdle DoorBournemouthMonkey Worldas well as some fantastic pubs and restaurantsincluding The Waterloo ArmsJames & WhiteThe Noisy LobsterThe Boathouse and the Kings Arms Hotelto name just a few!Highcliffe Castlethe Isle of Wight and the quaint port town of Lymington are all well within reach.LODGE FACILITIES INCLUDE:‚Ä¢ Adjacent parking for several cars ‚Ä¢ Largeprivate decking area ‚Ä¢ Rattan decking furniture with seat/back cushions ‚Ä¢ Linen & towels provided for master and twin room ‚Ä¢ LG 50" HD Smart TV in living area (NetflixAmazon PrimeYouTube) ‚Ä¢ Sound Bar for tv and your own device connection ‚Ä¢ Electric real effect fire in lounge ‚Ä¢ King size bed in master bedroomwardrobe and storage ‚Ä¢ En-suite shower room and toilet off master bedroom ‚Ä¢ LG 32" HD TV in master bedroom ‚Ä¢ Hairdryer ‚Ä¢ Twin room with two 6 x 3ft single bedswardrobe ‚Ä¢ Family bathroom with toilet and bath ‚Ä¢ Washing machine ‚Ä¢ Kettle (teacoffee and sugar provided) ‚Ä¢ toaster ‚Ä¢ Microwave ‚Ä¢ Dishwasher (rinse aid/dishwasher salt is monitored and refilled on changeover day) ‚Ä¢ gas hobelectric oven and grill ‚Ä¢ Fridge ‚Ä¢ Freezer ‚Ä¢ saucepans and oven trays ‚Ä¢ Kitchen utensils ‚Ä¢ Crockery ‚Ä¢ Cutlery ‚Ä¢ Dining table & 4 chairs ‚Ä¢ Gas central heatingPLEASE NOTE: Although we‚Äôre happy for babies and infants to enjoy the lodge toowe do not supply cots or high chairs. Of courseplease feel free to bring your own.Guest access.Parking adjacent to lodge.Park facilities very close byLocal bus service outside park or short walk away.Nearest mainline station Hinton Admiral1.4m awaywith access to BournemouthPooleSouthampton etc.

Title: Silverwood Coach House, with Indoor Swimming Pool
Description: Part of the idyllic Bleets Farm Private EstateSilverwood Coach House offers the perfect countryside stay. Remote enough for quiet walks in acres of adjacent landbut still only a few miles from the award-winning townFrome. Also LongleatBathWells & Glastonbury are a short drive from Silverwood Coach House. This makes an ideal hub for an action packed break. If time to unwind is just what you needyou can kick back and relax in the countryside.Check pool availability prior to booking.The space"The space.Silverwood Coach House is a brand-new holiday cottage situated on the Bleets Farm Estate. In direct view of the main housethe Coach House is above the quadruple garage with nobody below (so no risk of being disturbed). With ample free parking and a garden seating area amongst fruit treesyoull be sure to have the perfect stay.Insideat one endyou have the open-plan lounge/kitchen area which is spacious and modern with a brand-new fitted kitchen. The master bedroomwith a luxurious double bed and en-suite is at the opposite end of the Coach House. In between there is another bedroom with 2 lowsmall single beds and a family bathroom; equipped with a sunken bath and shower.If you would like a disposal BBQwe keep some onsite at ¬£5.00 each. Please message if you would like one so we can arrange payment.Free use of our private heated indoor poolhoweverplease ensure you check the availability prior to booking as it is not always available."Guest access.Upon arrivalthere is a short private drive with an exclusive free private car park suitable for 4 cars. There is a short gravel walkway to the right of the electric gatesthrough a small orchard and under an archway onto the main drive where you will arrive right next your accommodation. The painted grey door is your front door.

Weber charcoal BBQ.

Title: Relaxing pool house
Description: Whitmoor FarmWhitmoor LaneGU47QBis in the heart of Surrey in Sutton Green between the towns of Woking and Guildford. Beautiful and relaxing two bedroomtwo bathroom pool housewith loads of charm. Very cosy living room overlooking the sparkling blue swimming pool. The pool is not heated but great in the summer. The Farm also offers a tennis court and trampoline. Unfortunately we do not allow visitors to guests for security reasons. Only booked guests allowed on site.The spaceThe space.Two bedrooms with King size beds. Two bathroomsone with a shower and one with a bath. Ideal for two couples or a small family. Located between Guildford and Woking towns.Guest access.The Pool and tennis court is shared with 3 other units on the farmbut there‚Äôs loads of space for everyone. The pool is not heated but great in the summerOther things to note.We supply a few coffee PODs for the Nespresso machine and dishwasher tablets as a starter packbut please bring some with you for your stay.

Title: Homely Rustic Country Retreat within National Park
Description: "Escape to a secluded retreat within the National Trusts Hindhead Commons and Devils Punch Bowlonly an hours drive from London. Enjoy local nature in extreme privacy. The house is set in beautiful surroundings with a large garden with swimming pool and a walled garden with outdoor fireplace for magical evenings. The house offers rustic English charm for the perfect country getaway. From the property there is direct access to the national park for walkinghiking plus many cycle tracks."The space"The space.The house is full of rustic charm. There are many bookscuriosities and snug reading corners in the large lounge overlooking the garden. There is a formal and informal dining room with dinnerware and glasses to match and a downstairs WC. There is an office area with a BT Smart Hub 2 with Wi-Fi Disc allowing Wi-Fi connection throughout the property and the formal and informal dining rooms can be used as further office spaces or breakout areas. The fully equipped kitchen comes with two ovensone conventional and an Aga style oven with hotplateplus a large fridge/freezermicrowavedishwasher and walk in larder fully stocked with dishes and gadgets for cooking and baking. Through the kitchen is the utility/boot room with washing machinedryerdetergentsironing board and iron plus access to the garden. Upstairs there are 5 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with one being en-suite to the master bedroomboth bathrooms have power showersshampooconditioner and shower gel. There are three fireplaces in the houseone open fireplace in the loungea wood stove in the formal dining room and an outdoor open fireplace in the walled garden. There are also three TVs in the house; the one in the lounge has a Amazon Fire Stick and DVD playerthere is also one in the informal dining room with a DVD player and one upstairs in the master bedroom which has a built in DVD player. Outside there is a beautiful garden with wysteriasa large lawnbenches to sit to watch the local nature and an outdoor unheated swimming pool. Private pool is available for use from April to September for an additional fee. *Pool closed for Winter* At the back of the house is the walled garden; a beautiful secluded area with a water featuregas BBQ and outdoor fireplace. There is private parking with room for 4 vehicles.The house is the most perfect venue for a special occasionstaycationwork-from-home alternative or as a remote working office for small businesses. The house is not ideal for wild parties as we are in a quiet neighbourhood surrounded by a national park.Due to the recent pandemicwe would like to reassure you that the house is professionally cleanedand we are taking extra care to disinfect frequently touched surfaces and provide alcohol gel in the house for our guests."

Title: Cosy Coach House with Private Garden and Pool
Description: Luxury newly renovated 2 bedroom coach house set in the grounds of a Georgian Manor House with its own private gardens and duck pond over looking the National Trust Tithe Barn.The Coach House is within walking distance of the quaint village of Bredon which boasts 2 pubsa village shop and playground. Bredon is ideally located for MalvernCheltenham and the RacecourseWorcester and the rest of the Cotswolds.The Owners live in the Manor House so are at hand for any questions.The space"The space.Decorated in a classic and restful stylethis home away from home features carefully sourced artworks and antiques.The Master Bedroom is situated on the first floor along with the main bathroom which has a large shower and a large free-standing bath and luxury toiletries from Bramley Products are supplied for you to enjoy during your stay. At the top of the spiral staircase there is a charming reading nook with a large comfy armchair and plenty of natural light. The downstairs bedroom can be arranged as a twin or superking with ziplink mattresses.The cosy sitting room is perfect for relaxing in after a long day out or for lazy weekends. The kitchen is well stocked with seating for 4 people and there is the added bonus of a large utility room with washer/dryer and butlers sink for cleaning up after muddy walks. There is an additional shower room on the ground floor.One well behaved dog is welcome to join youwe will even provide a dog bed and luxury toiletries for your four legged friend as well!The mature garden is an ideal sun trap and there are 4 sun loungers provided as well as a BBQ and outdoor seating. You will be able to enjoy use of the large swimming pool (May to September)shared with the owners who rarely use it during the weekand luxury pool towels are provided for your stay."

Title: Holiday Home in Poole
Description: Our holiday home is situated on the lovely Rockley Park in PooleDorset. Great for families or anyone looking for a relaxing break away. The caravan is a shortless than 5 minute walk from the amenitieswhich include a number of restaurantsa pool with waterslidesrock climbing and lots of activities for the kids. The park has its own private beach along with water sports and sun loungers and is great in the summer. Entertainment passes can be purchased at reception when you arrive.The spaceThe space.Our holiday home sleeps 6with 2 bedrooms and a sofa bed. The kitchen is fully equippedand outside you will find a parking space (along with additional spaces elsewhere) outdoor seatingand space for the kids to play.Other things to note.Rockley Park has lots of activities and entertainment availableall of which can be booked at reception on arrival. Message me when booking for more info and the play pass form which needs to be filled out in order to book activities!.Please notemost of of the facilities are shut in November & December. If you are looking to go for a swim with the kids in these monthsthe Dolphin Leisure Centre in Poole has a pool and a saunaor if not I‚Äôd be happy to recommend places a little further away :)

Title: Cosy and modern with outdoor pool open in summer
Description: Gavenny Cottage is a self contained annex that has an enclosed private courtyard and a private outdoor swimming pool that guests can use from 26th April - 30th September 2021. ***THE POOL IS CLOSED OUTSIDE OF THESE DATES FOR AUTUM/WINTER.***Situated on the edge of Abergavenny town with views of the BlorengeGavenny Cottage is the perfect little base for any walkingcycling or foodie break away.Inside you will find everything you need for a comfortable stay.The space"The space.The property is modern inside and has an equipped kitchenwi-fismart TVcomfy seating and dining area and a large bedroom upstairs with extra seating.We have an electric stove heaterwashing machineiron and ironing board.We have two enclosed outdoor areas: a small private patio with seating and a raised patio with an outdoor swimming pool. The pool is 24 foot long and is 3 foot deep at one end and 6 foot deep at the other. It is open to our guests from 26th April through to 30th September but it is closed during autumn/winter.Covid-confident stayWe want our guests to have a very enjoyablerelaxing stay at Gavenny Cottage. We have all been living through a very stressful time so we want to remove as much worry as possible for your stay. Therefore we have introduced the following important changes to protect you and all of our guestsstaff and community and to help minimise the risk of contracting and spreading coronavirus:.- Enhanced cleaning on top of our already meticulous standards.- Extra cleaning supplies and hand sanitizer/soap and available inside the cottage.- Socially distanced check-in and out with no-contact key collection.- Amended check-in and out times (check-in: 3pm and check-out: 10am).- Keys are disinfected before your arrival and Gavenny Cottage is not entered after its deep cleanWe are constantly monitoring and adapting to the most uptodate government advice and our changes and new rules will be constantly revised and are subject to change with government advice and best practices."

Title: Shepherds Hut with use of Pool, Hot Tub & Sauna
Description: Our beautiful Shepherds Hutlocated within our gardens is a unique self-catering accommodation with interior and exterior design to a high specification. Set in seven acres of grounds and surrounded by delightful countrysideManor Barn is a special place to spend your holiday.Bedroom with a quality double bed.Open plan living area with a fully equipped kitchen.Bathroom with a shower.Use of the 12 metre indoor heated Swimming Pool with Jacuzzi and Sauna.Patio and landscaped Gardens.The spaceThe space.Surrounded by the Cotswolds and Malvern Hillsyet conveniently located close to the historic towns of Cheltenham SpaTewkesburyGloucester and Malvern.This fully equipped accommodation has an open plan living area consisting of a bedroom with a quality double bedlivingdining and kitchen area. The kitchen has an oven and a hob. The en suite bathroom has a shower. The living area has a Smart TV and WiFi.You have your own space with views across the garden to the horse paddocks. Outside there is a decked terrace area to sit round at the end of the day and relax whilst making plans for the rest of your stay!.The accommodation features use an onsite heated indoor swimming pooljacuzzi and saunapatioand beautiful grounds. There is a barbecue and a fire pit.Manor Barn is close to ancient sites including Neolithic barrowshillforts and Roman remains. You are near to the Cotswold Wayso if you like walking you can follow one of the walks from the National Trailwhich can be downloaded from their website. The Malvern Hills are also nearbywhich also provide pleasant walks and spectacular views. The River Severn is also a short walk away.

Title: Cosy rural retreat with hot tub and indoor pool
Description: Nestled in the stunning Wye ValleyMay Hill View barn offers a relaxing and fun break. Whilst at May Hill View barn you can enjoy our indoor heated pool (march to September) and outdoor hot tub. You can also use the garden and paddock for a quiet afternoon or a game of rounders. May Hill View barn is also in easy reach of many great days out including the Wye Valley Area of Outstanding Natural Beauty (5 mins) and the Forest of Dean (20 mins).The spaceThe space.May Hill View is a self-contained converted barnand you will have the entire place you yourself. It has two bedrooms and sleeps four.May Hill View is adjacent to our main houseLower Ryelands. The accommodation is private and has its own entrance. Cosy and warmand with all the usual amenities. The accommodation is all on the same floor and consists of a kitchen arealoungebathroom first bedroom and master bedroom.The kitchen area has an undercounter fridge with small freezer compartmenta two ring electric hoba kettlecoffee machinetoaster and a microwave that also works as an oven.The first bedroom has two single beds and a chest of drawers.The master bedroom has a king-size bedchest of drawers and bedside tables.There is also free wi-fia TVvarious board games and maps of the area. There is one shower in the barn and two in the pool house. Bedding and towels are included.Access to May Hill View is via an outside stairway (see Checking-in Details). There is space for two cars on the private driveway. Bike storage and cleaning facilities are also available. There are no street lights by the barn (prepare for spectacular skies on clear nights)and so there are motion-activated security lights. You will find a torch in the holiday letbut we recommend bringing your own if you plan to take the short stroll up to the Moody Cow.Other things to note.The pool is solar thermal heated and therefore available from March until September.

Title: Self Contained Studio The New Forest National Pk
Description: Enjoy the studio and secluded patio plus access to our heated pool (*open mid April to end Oct. Pool temp varies on the time of year*) all in lush surroundings in a quiet neighbourhood.1000 pocket sprung medium firm king-size double bedwet room with sliding doorwifismart TVsilent fridgemicrowave tea coffee toaster.Donkeysponiescows & deer roam freely (pigs close by too) step into the National Park71.000 acres of protected land within 140,000 acres of The New Forest.The space"The space.The studio is new (transformed in 2021) it has a contemporary feel along with the new secluded patio with outdoor furniture.The 25x12 ft pool is what Airbnb classes as a shared space seeing as we use it too. Guests can use the pool between 9am and 7pm - we‚Äôre often at work. Ask about sole use of the pool if required. Pool towels are provided.""Guest access.Access to the room is down by the side of our house. The key will be in the keysafe by the doorwell give you the code nearer the check-in date. Parking is on our drive to the right of our garage."Other things to note.The en-suite has a macerator toilet which only takes toilet paper NOTHING ELSE! No wipeslatex or food etc. Thanks.The en-suite has ‚Äúcountryside plumbing‚Äù : a shower and sink pump - so excuse the momentary pump sounds and suction soundsThanks again!WE CLEAN AND SANITIZE:.- sanitize high-touch surfacesdown to the doorknob.- use approved cleaners and disinfectants.- wear protection to help prevent cross-contamination.- refer to cleaning checklists to thoroughly clean the room.- provide extra cleaning suppliesso you can clean as you stay.Due to carrying out the extra safe cleaningwashing and laundry expenses we have added a small cleaning fee.

Title: Brummell Barn with indoor pool on Isle of Wight
Description: "Lovely old converted barn on a beautiful working farm with animals and amazing views.Suited to large family occasions and celebrations.Sleeps 12 in 5 bedrooms.Large kitchen/diner.Upstairs sitting-room with picture window.Free use of indoor pool - shared with one other cottage with simple booking system.Childrens playgound.Snooker room.Games room.Farm butchery.Allows 2 well- behaved dogs.Sorry no stag/hen parties.""The space.We would recommend that the house has a maximum of 11 adults as one bed space is a bunk bed. We offer guests the use of an indoor heated swimming pool which is shared with one other holiday property but with a private booking system. We also provide a games roomsnooker room and childrens playground. Guests can walk or cycle on our 730 acre downland farm and buy superb dry-aged meat from our own award - winning farm butchery. Two miniature donkeyspigschickensbeef cattle and sheep can be enjoyed. Brummell Barn has far reaching countryside views from the spacious upstairs living-room. The large kitchen diner can seat 12 adults comfortably."

Title: Newly Renovated Cottage with Far Reaching Views
Description: The Orchard is a beautiful3 bedroom & 2 bathroom newly renovated cottage in the heart of the South Downs with spectacular views. Ideally situated with a host of stunning walks from the doorstepyet close to the pretty town of Haslemere. Also conveniently placed for Cowdray PoloGoodwood events & the Witterings. The property has its own pretty gardenseated terrace area & bbq. A tennis court and heated swimming pool are available for use on request. Long term lettings are also available.The space"The space.The property has its own private parking area and is approached by a gravel path winding through a pretty orchard garden leading up to the Cottage. Tucked away with its own front door the Cottage is on the edge of our garden and driveway. The orchard garden has a sunny terraced area fitted with new comfortable garden furniture to be enjoyed with over a morning coffee or evening drink. There is also a Weber BBQ for al fresco meals.Inside the Cottage is designed upside down so the 3 bedrooms2 bathrooms & utility cupboard (with washing machine/hoover etc)are located on the ground floor. The open plan sitting roomdining area and kitchenare on the first floorwith windows spanning the entire length so that the far reaching views can be fully enjoyed.The entire Cottage has been newly renovated and the kitchen has granite surfaces and all the mod cons you could wish for including ovenfridgefreezermicrowavedishwasher and nespresso maker. The kitchen has a convenient breakfast bar and stoolsideal for working from homeor just reading papers.The Living Area has been designed in a boutique style with a range of luxurious upholsteries & cushions and is a lovely space to relax and unwind. Board games are included and the Satelitte TV is equipped with Netflix etc. Wifi is available throughout the property.The 3 bedrooms are all spacious with luxurious bedlinentowelschest of drawersnew carpet and fully lined and interlined curtains. Bedroom 2s singles can be joined and the mattress zipped together producing a very comfortable super king size bed. Bedroom 3 has 2 envelope single beds - so additional sleeping is available (for one additional guest on prior request). The bathroom and shower room are also newly fitted. The main property has a tennis court which you are very welcome to use on request.We are happy to welcome one small pet on request."

Title: Stunning Cotswolds Water Park
Amenities:
['About this space', 'Enjoy a discount for booking 7 nights or more.

Modelled on the style of local villages, Forge House is set in a secluded, traffic free location within the Water Garden on the exclusive Lower Mill Estate. Built in a traditional Cotswold style, this well furnished and welcoming property comprises of 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms a good sized lounge and dining area with cosy wood burning stove and French doors leading to an enclosed decked area, which is perfect for sitting and for children to play.', 'The space', 'The space
Forge House is a delightful Cotswold stone cottage offering a tranquil haven for nature lovers (5 large lakes within 500 acres of secluded parkland).

Complimentary Wifi is available, which has an ultra fast connection, ideal if you need to make video calls or use your time here to ‚Äòwork from home‚Äô. Use of our Netflix account is also included.

We welcome pets but please note this is limited to two maximum.

A high chair and a good-sized travel cot is available for our smaller guests to use.

There is also a Dolce Gusto coffee machine
So feel free to bring your own pods (a few complimentary will be provided).

You can enjoy cooking some great food on the BBQ and the wood fired pizza oven.

An outdoor heated swimming pool, sauna, tennis court, table tennis, playground and indoor soft play area complement this stunning property and is included in your stay. Please bring extra towels if you wish to use the pool or sauna - towels will be provided for use in the house.

Bikes, kayaks and canoes are available on site for rental and local fishing is also available on the estate.

Please note that we do not have access to the onsite spa.', '', '']

Title: The Burrow - Luxurious Pet Friendly, 3 Bed Lodge

All bedrooms have ample storage space.Maximum capacity 6 people.There is a family shower room as well as a separate toilet and washbasin room.Outside there is a table and chairs on the decking."Other things to note.We do have other lodges on site so if you are staying in a group please contact us.You are welcome to bring up to 2 Dogs ‚Äì charged ¬£20 per dog (paid after booking)

Title: Idyllic country cottage with Heated Pool (May-Sep)
Description: In a stunning rural location 4 miles from the Jurassic coastThe Granary is beautifully equipped with outstanding views over the lawns and tennis court to the surrounding countryside. The pool is open from the beginning of May to end of September and is shared with a small number of other guests. Games roomtennis court. One well behaved dog is welcome at ¬£20 per pet (if more please ask first). There are lovely walks all around. Historic Colyton is 2 miles away with pubseateries and shops.The spaceThe space.Liz and Gordon provide a warm welcome and the cottage is extensively equipped with welcome pack of basic foodhousehold and toiletry itemsso you can cut down on your packing. It has a private garden with furniture and barbeque.All linen and towels (two each) are provided.The Bunk bedroom is not suitable for two adults.

Title: Stylish converted Stables in Dulcote nr Wells
Description: The Stables is located in Dulcote villagejust a short walk from Wells in Somerset.The spaceThe space.The Stablesto the rear of the main houseis furnished with an eclectic mix of modern and period furniture. A large open plan living space contains an extremely comfortable squishy sofaa 46‚Äô flat screen TVI-phone dock (cunningly disguised as a retro radio) and of coursesuper-fast Wifi. A well equipped kitchen has everything you could possible want to create a feast ‚Äì and after a visit to the delectable farmers‚Äô market in Wellsyou may well want to! A stylish zinc-topped dining table completes the picture.Beds are supremely comfortable with pocket sprung mattresses and crispwhite cotton bedlinen. There is a modern bathroom containing a bath with a shower over and underfloor heating . A second bathroomboasts a large walk-in shower. Outside there is an enclosed area for your own private usewith deckingseating and a BBQ. The cottage is on one level so is suitable for allalthough there is a small step up to the front door. In the summerguests may share our 12m outdoor heated swimming poolsituated in the walled courtyardbetween 11am and 6pm. We open the pool at the start of June/May half term and close it at the end of August: Weather permitting of course! It is quite a deep pooleven at the shallow endso is not suitable for non-swimmers or young children (sorryNO TODDLERS or UNDER 5s).Although we are unable to welcome under-5sthe property is great for those with babes in arms and we have a travel cot and high chair you may use. There is also a pram-friendly path that leads from Dulcote directly into Wells ‚Äì just long enough to get them off to sleep! We can also arrange babysitting if you so require.DURING JULY & AUGUST WE ONLY TAKE ONE WEEK BOOKINGS STARTING ON A FRIDAY. At other times there is a 3 night minimum stay midweek and 2 nights at weekends.From September till May (except bank and school holidays) our WEEKEND RATE includes a late check out - whenever you like on Sunday.GLASTONBURY WEEK - 5 night minimum stay. We also have 2 b&b rooms in the main house sleeping an extra 4 people should you be a party of 8. Please ask for rates.We are in a great location for exeat visits to the following schools: Millfield Prep (15mins)Millfield (20mins)Downside School (20 mins)Wells Cathedral School (2mins)All Hallows Prep (20mins).The following local attractions are also nearby: Bath & West ShowgroundWookey Hole CavesGlastonbury Festival SiteKilver Court Designer Village and the Mulberry Factory Shop. Bath and Bristol are both a 45 minute drive away.We have tried to think of everything to make your stay as relaxing and comfortable as possible but we or our trusted friends in the village are always on hand should you need anything else.We own a very friendly Labrador Retriever who may come and greet you when you arrive. Please let us know if this may be a problem and we will keep her inside. Note: She is NOT allowed in The Stables or in your private decked areanor are any other dogs/pets.

Title: Contemporary Georgian Coach House with Heated Pool
Description: Set within the ground of our Georgian Manor housethe Coach House provides a wonderful retreat for those looking to escape to the country whilst being a short drive from the seaside town of Sidmouth and nearby city of Exeter. The Coach House was renovated in 2020 to provide a high standard of accommodation perfect for familiesproviding a King bed and 2 single beds in the 2nd bedroom (rollaway available) Set behind a private gatefacilities include a sauna and heated swimming pool (seasonal)The spaceThe space.Guests will love the cosy yet modern decorthe tranquil front gardens and use of the heated outdoor pool (from June - September.)A additional rollaway bed is available for an extra charge.For families of 6 or morethe Pool House may also be booked in conjunction with the Coach House. https://abnb.me/jnnxlVyrugbGuest access.We are happy for our guests to relax by and use the pool between 11am and 6pm. We are happy to share the pool with our guests but do not offer exclusive use as our family and friends also use.Guests are invited to enjoy the front gardens. Rear gardens are not accessible to guests other than for access to the pool.
