Title: The original Spice Bus from 1997 movie Spice World
Description: This is the actual and original Spice Bus that fans will know and love from the movie Spice World - but with an interior makeover. Working with some incredible designerswe have turned it into accommodationso that you can stay the night and live out every fan‚Äôs wildest dream. The bus has the bonus of being situated in a stunning location overlooking Island Harbour Marina. There is a BarRestaurantand a small shop on site. You can reach us by landseaor air!The spaceThe space.The outside of the bus shows off its famous Union Jack exterioras it did in the Spice World movie. Insideas huge fans of the bandwe have tried to include as many little touches as possibleinspired by the girls and their musicto make the interior just as iconic as the outside!Insideguests will have the run of both floorswhich have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the Spice Girls and some bold interiors. The bus can sleep up to three peoplewith two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bed.DownstairsThe driver‚Äôs seat remains at the front of the bus ‚Äì sadly no Meatloaf! Towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three Union Jack cinema-style chairsfor relaxing in front of the TV or listening to Wannabe on repeat on the old-school CD player.UpstairsThere is a double bed at the back of the busas well as a day bedwhich can accommodate a third guest if needed. There is also a separate dressing room areacomplete with rail and dressing table ‚Äì perfect for Spice Girl-inspired makeovers.Please notewe have no official affiliation with the Spice Girls ‚Äì We just want fellow fans to enjoy the Spice Bus as much as we do. We are looking for guests who share our love of the Spice Girlshave a verified Airbnb profileand have great reviews! Please also identify your guests when requesting to book.The outside of the bus shows off its famous Union Jack exterioras it did in the Spice World movie. Insideas huge fans of the bandwe have tried to include as many little touches as possibleinspired by the girls and their musicto make the interior just as iconic as the outside!Insideguests will have the run of both floorswhich have been lovingly renovated with little nods to each of the Spice Girls and some bold interiors. The bus can sleep up to three peoplewith two sharing a double bed and one on a single day bed.DownstairsThe driver‚Äôs seat remains at the front of the bus ‚Äì sadly no Meatloaf! Towards the back of the bus there is a spacious seating area with a table and three Union Jack cinema-style chairsfor relaxing in front of the TV or listening to Wannabe on repeat on the old-school CD player.UpstairsThere is a double bed at the back of the busas well as a day bedwhich can accommodate a third guest if needed. There is also a separate dressing room areacomplete with rail and dressing table ‚Äì perfect for Spice Girl-inspired makeovers.Please notewe have no official affiliation with the Spice Girls ‚Äì We just want fellow fans to enjoy the Spice Bus as much as we do. We are looking for guests who share our love of the Spice Girlshave a verified Airbnb profileand have great reviews! Please also identify your guests when requesting to book.A facilities block is located a few steps from the bus for your private use. In the facilities blockthere is a toiletsink and shower roomas well as toiletries and towels. Within this block there is also a kitchenette area with a sinkkettlemicrowavecutleryand crockery. There is a mini fridge inside the bus. Notethere are no bathroom facilities on the bus itself. As the bus still has its original structurethere are stairs and so unfortunatelyit is not suited for all accessibility needs.Other things to note:‚Ä¢ There is no partition between the double and single bedboth situated on the top deck.‚Ä¢ There are no kitchen facilities or running water on the bus.‚Ä¢ There are shops and a restaurant within two minutes‚Äô walk.‚Ä¢ There is no Wi-Fi on the busbut there is free Wi-Fi at the onsite bar/restaurant.‚Ä¢ The bus is located at Island Harbour Marina.‚Ä¢ All guests must be 12 years or older.‚Ä¢ The bus sleeps three people.‚Ä¢ Height restrictions are 1.7 metresso watch your head!‚Ä¢ Towels will be provided in the separate facilities block.‚Ä¢ The bus has electricity points.‚Ä¢ Please also note that there is no smoking on the bus or within the grounds; and sadly no pets are allowed!Other things to note.Due to the originality of the listingheight restrictions apply. All guests must be age 12 or olderno pets and strictly no smoking!

Title: Cow Shed: Daisy at Easton Farm Park
Description: A unique place to stay! The Cow Shed is a mix between campingglamping and a caravan. Situated on a clean and quiet farm parkthe Cow Shed provides a great place to escape to.The accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a three-quarter bed above. Able to sleep four peoplethe Cow Shed provides a base in the Suffolk countryside with the benefit of included access to the farm park.(please note that the Wi-Fi can be intermittent)The spaceThe space.Daisy can sleep up to four people. The accommodation has a ground floor double bed with a three-quarter bed above. Linen and towels are providedas well as tea/ coffee making facilities. BBQ and tools are available for hireat an extra charge of ¬£10. The toilet block and shower shed are both within 20 meters. Admission to the farm park is included. Guests are welcome to have access to the park out of hours and see our team in actionfeeding and mucking out the animals.Guest access.The Cow Sheds are situated within the grounds of Easton Farm Park. Guests have access to the toilet block and shower shedboth within 20 meters. Our cafe and gift shop is open during the day.Other things to note.Enjoy the full farm experience. Guests can explore the farm out of hours and can even help give the animals breakfast and clean out their stables in the morning. Staff are on hand to answer any curious questions!

Description: Great Field Farm is set in 45 acresincluding gardenspaddocks and the great field with different crops each year.Bumble Barn is the newest addition to our eco-friendly holiday lodges. Built to Passiv house standards with smart technology and a beautiful living sedum roof that bees love.The views from the sitting room and patio over open fields and sky are stunningwith wildlife all around.Truly quiet and ruralyet CanterburyFolkestoneHytheChannel Tunnel only 10 minutes drive.The spaceThe space.Bumble Barn has a large sittingdining and kitchen areaopening onto the patio with views of the horse paddocksopen field and trees.Sitting Room has a smart 4K TV.Fully equipped kitchen with large fridge/freezer.Main bedroom with king sized double bed and en suite shower room. Optional colour changing LED lighting.2 twin bedrooms. Main bathroom with bath/shower

Title: NEW! Longhorn at Barrow Hill Barns- with Outdoor Bath
Description: Longhorn is nestled in the rolling hills of the South Downs National Park. This secluded retreat has all the creature comforts of home whilst enjoying unspoilt 360-degree views of Barrow Hill Farm.Longhorns domed design with wooden interior has a cosy open plan living space and decking area to enjoy dinner with sunset views. The large outdoor roll top bath is perfect for romantic bathing under the stars.Just a short walk from the famous South Downs Way and other stunning trail. Longhorn is also a short drive to the historical town of Petersfield and the cities of WinchesterChichesterand Portsmouth.The spaceThe space.Longhorn is situated on a working farmhowever in a secluded corner with minimal disturbance. Access is via foot along a 400m track from Barrow Hill Barns (our cottages site) or along a track for suitable vehicles.Longhorn offers a king-sized bedkitchenTVSuperfast WiFi and separate shower and toilet. Towelssheets and REN toiletries are provided. There is also charcoal BBQ for alfresco cooking!Other things to note.Longhorn is designed for those looking to escape the ways of normal lifethis is why we do not allow children or pets of any size.There are a number of factors as to why but mostly because as parents we felt it was somewhere to enjoy a couple of nights off from the home life.

Title: The Tree Tent
Description: Brand New Tree Tent!.If you are desperate for a change of scene and are yearning for some fresh countryside airlook no further.The Tree Tent is a suspended spherical structure strung between two trees overlooking the gorgeous Mendip Hills. It offers the ultimate escape into the outdoors. It‚Äôs an absolutely magical retreat which captures the true romance and cosiness of a camping but in a luxurious and unique way.The spaceThe space.The Tree Tent offers a comfortable double bedLED lighting and a wood burning stoveperfect for those chilly evenings. The bed even folds into a sofa for daytime lounging!Step out of the suspended bedroom pod across the rope bridge to find a gorgeous decked seating area nestled among the trees. Here there is a fully equipped kitchen with a fridgegas hobsinksaucepanscrockery and cutlery. There is a firepit which is perfect for cooking your evening meal if you are keen to hone your inner Bear Grylls or start simple by toasting some marshmallows whilst sipping a hot chocolate.There is no wifi or electricity here so it is the perfect place to switch off and really relax.There is a wonderful outdoor shower with hot water and separate loo. We have ensured there is everything you could want to create the most memorable of stays. More pictures of this are coming soon!Please note no pets allowed. The bed is a small double.

Title: 1920s Showmans living wagon,experience times past.
Description: "Set in the sussex countryside our beautiful showmans wagon is now resting. She has spent many years looking after showman travelling around the countryside housing show folk and fair ground people. Her history and that of the travelling community is a magical fascinating part of history. It is a privilege for us to own and gives us pleasure to be able to share with anyone who would like to stay.The garden and surrounding countryside are part of the charm of our wagon in summer and winter."The space"The space.The wagon has a cosy seating areaa fold down tablewe have equipped her with a double plug in electric hobkettle and toaster for light cookingsaucepans cutlery plates cups glassesthere is a very small 4ltr fridge just big enough for a bottle of milk and a can or twoa 5ltr pump flask is there with water and can be filled from outside tap. There is two heaters that keep the wagon nice and warm. A picnic basket with picnic plates glasses and cutlery are also provided should you want to have a picnic.Tea coffee and sugarBread ,MilkButterMarmalade or Jam are all provided and we leave a welcome basket with a few extra goodies for you to enjoy.The bedroom area has a standard double bed and there is a dvd tv with some dvds so you can watch some films should you wish to.Clean bedding sheets and towels are all providedwe do ask that you dont take the towels to the beach and bring your own beach towel.Outside is a table and chairs a small BBQ overlooking a large private garden which is reached by some steps for you to use should you wish to.The old outside toilet has been turned into a wet room with a corner loo sink and shower. Please note that due to the rural location the water pressure can sometimes dropif this does happen the shower may not work for a short time it is something that we are used to living with and does not happen very oftenwe apologise should this happen it is just part of living in such a beautiful setting. If you should be visiting us in the colder months the shower room can be a little chillybut once the hot water gets going it soon feels warm.The wagon unfortunately is not suitable for dogs so we have decided it is best that we dont allow them.Unfortunately due to bad connection the wifi does not always work."

Title: Comfortable riverside landed houseboat

Comfortably-heated throughout with fully equipped open-plan kitchenliving area and patio.The spaceThe space.Truly unique! Accommodation is in a spacious modern converted WW2 landing craftconveniently dry-docked in a riverside garden with two cosy en-suite double/twin bedrooms. An open-plan kitchen and living room offers ample spaceopening to a sunny morning patio.Other things to note.Single beds 2ft6in/Double 5ft.Families warmly welcomed but parental supervision required in waterside location.The AirBnB pricing section contains an immovable "extra guest" charging provision which can cause confusion. Title: The perfect chalet
Description: Lovely fully equipped self catering chalet on a spacious holiday park 3 minutes walk from the sea.Come to Kingsdown where you can enjoy the pebbly beachesenjoy food and drinks at local pubs and restaurantswalk or ride on flat ground to Deal and beyond or walk onto the white cliffs for views over to France.There are 3 King Henry VIII castles to explore - Dover Castle for lots of history and AV tours; Walmer Castle for beautiful gardenscannons and tea room; Deal Castle for interest.The spaceThe space.The chalet is in a great peaceful location within the park and is fully equipped with bed linenstowelsall kitchen crockeryovenhobmicrowave - step in and enjoy.

Title: Breathtaking Mountain views in cozy Birdbox
Description: Enjoy the relaxed and comfortable enclosure of the Birdbox. Sleep right beside nature and its amazing surroundings. Lay down and look at the spectacular mountains all around you. Put on your skis and have a breathtaking journey around the nearby trails. Hike down to Langelandsvatnet in the summer and enjoy swimming in energizing water. Your imagination is the limit for what you can experience.The space"The space.The Birdbox is situated 15 minutes by car from F√∏rde. After parking your car at Langeland ski resort there is a 15 minute hike up the hill to the Birdbox.The closest grocery store is in F√∏rde so its important that you bring enough food for the stay.Contact us for more information about this."Guest access.Enjoy the relaxed and comfortable enclosure of the Birdbox. Sleep right beside nature and its amazing surroundings. Lay down and look at the spectacular mountains all around you. Put on your skis and have a breathtaking journey around the nearby trails. Hike down to Langelandsvatnet in the summer and enjoy swimming in energizing water. Your imagination is the limit for what you can experience.Other things to note.Enjoy the relaxed and comfortable enclosure of the Birdbox. Sleep right beside nature and its amazing surroundings. Lay down and look at the spectacular mountains all around you. Put on your skis and have a breathtaking journey around the nearby trails. Hike down to Langelandsvatnet in the summer and enjoy swimming in energizing water. Your imagination is the limit for what you can experience.

Title: The crystal dome under the stars, bed and breakfast
Description: Totally unusual accommodation.Ideal for dreamy nights for couplessummer and winter.A bubble three meters high in the middle of nature to observe the stars. What could be more romantic and restful.You will have access to a nice en-suite bathroom a few meters from the bubble. From your cozy nest you will have seen the mountainsthe natural pool and the horses.A French breakfast will be served on the private terrace of your bubble.The bubble is heated in winter.The spaceThe space.The bubble has beautiful views of the foresthorsesthe pool and the starry sky.An extraordinary night not to be missed in all seasons.Guest access.We are located in the middle of natureon the edge of the forestyou will find all the shops and restaurants necessary for your stay in Th√¥nes about 6 km,.You can go to Lake Annecy via Menthon St Bernard and its castle just ten kilometers away.Annecy is a little 15 minutes away and you ride the skis at La Clusaz or Au Grand Bornand in 20 minutes. You will understandwe are conveniently located between lake and mountain.Other things to note.Magical night guaranteed.Real comfort under the stars with real beds and heating in cool seasons.

Title: The Arctic Hideaway - Lower fat pod -1 double bed
Description: Head north in Norway and experience our tiny-hotel on a remote island. The Arctic Hideaway is an architecturally playful and stunning collection of ten individual buildingswhere four are sleeping cabins. The shared areas are the iconic Tower Housekitchen housestudio buildingbathhousecrab shack and sauna. In limited periodswe will offer single cabins for rent on Airbnb. Included in the stay is breakfast and use of the saunathat we will fire up once a day for every guest to enjoy.The spaceThe space.The Arctic Hideaway is an experience like few others. Our space is as much as a mindset as it is a physical location ‚Äî a place to unplug and unwind. It is a place that will give you visual tranquillity. It is truly a transformative experience staying here. We have a minimum 2-night stay as we believe this will provide you with the best experience at our unique place. And most of our guest wish they could stay longerso maybe book a week?The Arctic Hideaway is nestled into S√∏rv√¶ret of the Fleinv√¶r islands; these cabins provide guests with beautiful views of the Norwegian seanearby islandsbirdssealssunrises and sunsetsthe northern lightsthe midnight sun and so much more. The architecture is designed to push you out into naturewhich means that you move between the cabins for bathroom and kitchen usage. Look at the map for the location of your cabin in regards to the other buildings.THE CALENDAR IS NOT OPEN ON THE DATES YOU WANT TO STAY.The whole compound can sleep up to 10 guests. And it is an ideal location for retreats and workshopor maybe you want to rent the entire Hideaway by yourself? At this moment we only have availability during May here on Airbnb with four cabins with space for two people in each. If you are interested in visiting us at another time or arrange an eventplease do send us an email and we will do our best to help you coordinate and epic experience at our facility.

Title: Emotional Healing in Lee Cheon-si, Seoul
Description: Tongui-shaped cottage in a two-thousand pottery art village. A large monolithic house with a three-floor terrace of the Serra Guitar Cultural Museumrenowned for its distinctive facade in a two-thousand pottery art village that blends very well with nature.Enjoy a relaxing emotional healing holiday in a cozy and welcoming room. You can take in the open nature on the third floor of a village without a tall buildingor you can take a picnic on the lawn in front of a Tongui house.If you preferyou can also take Ukurelle lessons on the first floor of the buildinga handcrafted workshop and other venue.# Directions Youare 15 minutes by car from Lee Cheon Station and 8 minutes by car from Sindun Station. If you have a carit should take less than an hour from Seouland you can park it.

Title: Minimalist Modern Cabin - Amazing Views
Description: With some of the best views in the high desertthis unique dwelling situated in the hills of yucca valley has everything you could want in a desert getaway. Its clear walls take the "indoor - outdoor" experience to a whole new level. It has its own deck and propane fire pitis completely off grid and generates its own power from the sun. The detached kitchen and full bathroom are just yards away. It is one of three other short term rentals on the property.The space"The space.Made out of corten steel and polycarbonatethis cabin is unlike anything you have stayed in. It comes with a detached full bathroom with hot watera kitchen with stovesinkall types of cooking equipment and a dining area. Because it is completely off gridwe are limited on a few thingsmainly power. We have power for lightswater and heatingbut we dont have enough for full time refrigeration or power outlets. We have USB chargers for your phone and tablets though. We do have a cooler so please bring ice. There is a Fire pit so make sure to bring plenty of firewood. The gas for the stove is provided."Guest access.The cabin is on a 100 acre property with three other short term rental locations. The cabin has its own detached yet private bathroom and kitchen and is a good distance from the other three locations. So you do have your own privacy but may see the occasional guest driving by or hiking. Speaking of hiking there are many hiking trails right off the property so you will never need to leave!Other things to note.-Due to the property being off-grid we have water brought in for guest usage. Please be mindful of your usage! We DO NOT allow personal pools to be filled!.-There are two other short term rentals on the 100-acre property.-We are powered by 12 volt solar and battery backup so we do not have power outlets. We do have USB chargers for your phone and tablets.-We do not have a fridge but we do have coolers so bring ice.-Our mini-split AC unit is on a timer due to power restrictions and is available from 8 am-5 pm. There is a swamp cooler available to use in the evenings and overnight.-Please keep all doors or screens closed as we are in the desert and there are critters around. While we do have a pest control company out regularlycritters can still slip in through open doors from time to time.-Events and photoshoots will only be allowed with written permission.-Pets are allowed but we charge an extra $40 cleaning fee.-Please check the weather prior to your stay so you can be properly prepared. We are in an area that can get very hot in the summervery cold in the winter and during certain times of the year can experience very high winds. We will not issue refunds for weather issues that are out of our control.

Title: Luxury suite overlooking the Wadden Sea, Harlingen
Description: The luxurious spacious suite is furnished with a cozy seating areaflat-screen TVminibardouble box springdouble sinkjacuzzihairdryerbathroom with spacious rain shower and toilet.A luxury breakfast is served every morning.From the suite you have a unique view of the largest tidal area in the world: the Unesco World Heritage Site "The Wadden Sea".We will do everything in our power to ensure that you have an unforgettable stay in the Funnel!The space"The space.Enjoy a snack and drink with a unique view of the Nieuwe Willemshaven and one of the largest tidal areas in the world: the Wadden Sea. The Wadden Sea is special in its kind. No less than twice a day the world changes there. One moment youll find miles of expansive mudflats and the other moment everythings underwater. From your room you have a direct view of arriving and departing ships and in clear view you can even see the Wadden Islands Vlieland and Terschelling. The setting evening sun creates a romantic ambience."

Title: Luxe Boulder 'Barrett House' on Mtn Peak w/Hot Tub
Description: There‚Äôs no better place to experience Colorado than at ‚ÄòBarrett House,‚Äô a spectacular 3-bedroom3-bathroom vacation rental in beautiful Boulder! Nestled at an elevation of 7,000 feet on a scenic 3-acre mountain peak in the foothillsthis stunning home borders Roosevelt National Forestensuring endless outdoor activities right outside the door. With a fireplacetheatre roomand unique decorthis lovely home promises a memorable getaway with your fellow outdoor-loving friends and family!The space"The space.Private Hot Tub | Unique Architecture | 3,000 Sq FtThis eclecticmid-century modern home is the perfect space for you and your loved ones to relax and restore in between outdoor adventuresoffering all the space and modern luxuries needed for an unforgettable Colorado getaway!Master Bedroom: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Queen Bed | Bedroom 3 (Loft): 2 Full BedsARCHITECTURE: In 1971Barrett House was designed by celebrated Colorado architect Charles Haertling for noted artist Clotilde Barretthe house has maintained its architectural significance with recent earth-friendly renovationsincluding cork flooring and soft rugs made with recycled plastic bottles.OUTDOOR LIVING: 3-acre mountain peakprivate balcony w/ outdoor dining tableforest & mountain viewshot tubsecluded locationoutdoor seatinghammock.INDOOR LIVING: High ceilingsskylights & ample natural lightMad Men-inspired bar & dining roommodern & trendy furnishingsopen layoutoffice areatheatre room w/ 80-inch HD screenSmart HD TVsdesktop computerprinterBose sound systemceramic artspa-like en-suite w/ petrified wood sinkspa jet shower & electric heated flooringgame room.KITCHEN: Fully equippedstainless steel appliancesmid-century finishesKeurig coffee makertea kettledishwashercooking basicsdishware & flatwarekitchen table.GENERAL: Free WiFilinens/towelsin-unit laundry machinescentral heatingcomplimentary toiletriesfirst aid kittrash bagspaper towels.FAQ: Exterior security cameras (3all facing out).PARKING: Driveway (3 vehicles)"

Title: Snow igloo
Description: "Snow igloo with real beds inside. Nice atmosphere with led lights and white walls. Outside the igloo is possibility to see northern lights if you are lucky. Come to Lapland and explore the wilderness.Its always minus degrees inside the igloo. We provide warm sleeping bag but you should bring your thermos layerswarm hatsocks and cloves. Also headlight or flashlight is handy. Warm apartment available 24 h in case of cold feet."The spaceThe space.We are a small family run business located next to the lake Pyh√§j√§rvi and Pyh√§-Luosto National Park.Once in a lifetime opportunity to sleep in a snow Igloo that we make ourselves every winter.Guest access.Each party/group have their own igloo (max 4 persons/igloo). Apart from the igloo there is a warm house with toiletsshowerliving room and small kitchen that guests are free to useOther things to note.Lucky Ranch is a horse farm and activity center. We have two different base camps located 1 km from each other. Depending of the booking situation the location of snow igloo accommodation is either organized at the horse farm where the owners live or at Lucky Ranch Saloon next to the lake.We provide light self service breakfast. Please note that all restaurants and a supermarket are 10 km away at the ski resort. If you want you can bring some food with you. There is a microwave and fridge in the kitchen but no oven or stove.

Title: The Chaos Oasis
Description: The Chaos Oasis is the first construction made entirely from recyclable materials in the district. It is situated right next to the Mayan ruins and archeological park of Lubaantun. The village of San Pedro Columbia is a 10 minute walk from uswith chocolate makingriver swimming and bird watching.We welcome couplessolo adventurersand families (with kids)I say we are not suitable for pets as we have so many animals of our own: dogscatsa horseduckschickens etc!The space"The space.We have a bottle / recycled house for your useand will give you a tour of the Earthship and our whole recycling project. We are always working on a new projectso some spaces will be available and others under construction! We are completely off gridso you can feel good about helping the environment if you dont mind the quirks that involves! So we have solar lights and cold showerswhich can be great plus in the heat! and if youre into recycling its the biggest recycling project in Southern Belize.We also have a 25 acre farm with cacaocoffee and many fruit trees and our own ruins on the property."Guest access.Your casita has a double bedhowever if you are a family and need more beds / rooms it can be arranged. There is a separate bathroom with two toilets and showersbut the bottle house catches its own rainwater and there is an outside shower adjacent to the house for those who wish to really experience the wild!

Title: The Roundhouse : Rainforest & Mountains
Description: The Roundhouse is located in a place of spectacular beautywith views of Quamby Bluff and the Great Western Tiers on all sides. The property is surrounded by World Heritage Rainforest which is a result of the protracted Jackeys Marsh Forest Protests. The fresh aircrystal clear waterabundant wildlife and pristine environment are all environmental values prized by the people of Jackeys Marsh. We would now like to share our unique heritage with the rest of the world.The spaceThe space.The Roundhouse is a self-contained home set apart from the other buildings on the property. It gives you the privacy and independence to do your own thing. The interior is warm and comfortable with extensive windows to highlight the amazing views of the mountain valley of Jackeys Marsh.The Roundhouse is full of architectural features. From the handmade stonewall basementthrough the curved wooden features of the main floorto the onion top cupola that caps off the building. It is a truly unique property that continues to create special memories for all who visit."People respond to the shapes that I make. They enjoy the playfulness and freedom of lineand see the resemblance of natural forms in the designs. They appreciate the skill required to make such shapes from straight timberfollowing Nature\s design rules.".Kim Clark - Curved Wood Creations ( search this name to see website.)Guest access.Our guests will have exclusive access to the entire houseand are welcome to explore the rest of the propertyincluding the self-guided walk to the old Nut Garden and into the rainforest.Guests are asked to respect the privacy of the other buildings on the property. Guided tours are available on request.

Title: Charming Wood-roof Simple Survival Earthship
Description: A small and humble Earthship nestled in the high desert of TaosNew Mexico. Earthships offer the opportunity to experience off-grid living with the amenities of modern-life but without the strong dependency on a fossil fuel-based grid infrastructure.The spaceThe space.The house was built about two years ago in what is known as the "gravel pit" of the Greater World Communitythe largest (legal) off-grid sub-division on the planet! It is situated in a very private place which is perfect for those looking for a retreat.All of the utilities that one would normally use municipal infrastructure for are taken care of by the house itself. With electricity captured from sunlight and storedrain and snow melt collected into large cisternsand a wall of thermal masscharged by the sunthat keeps the house at a relatively constant 72¬∞F all year round.With all of thatthere is a full-sized fridgea stove and oven for cooking your delicious mealsInternet accessand a standing shower.There is a single full-sized bed that can comfortably fit two and an air-mattress that can fit another two.The house is about 20-25 minutes to the Ski Mountain and 15 minutes to get into downtown Taos. Close enough to town for accessbut far enough away in nature for contemplation.

Title: HIDEOUT HORIZON - Eco Bamboo Home
Description: Hideout Horizon is the largest addition to the Hideout Family. The most adventurous all-bamboo home is ready to welcome those seeking a little jungle adventure in East Karangasem. Your perfect little staycation in Bali is right here. We take relaxation seriously.Now more than everwe can be your safe hide-away from the world epidemic. Special discounts running now!Follow our social media hideoutbali for the special promo!The space"The space.Fun! Unique! Adventurous! Open! Bamboo! Those are all the words that will be buzzing in your head when you stay in the Horizon. :) Well-known open bamboo house is ready for you and your friends for a quick staycation. Make it your basecamp once you explore Karangasem regionwe will make sure you will have the best time. We are most happy with environmentally thinking guestswho treat this little bamboo home with love and care.If you read furtheryou can find much important and interesting informationbut for those in a hurrythese are some key points to know! :).1. Breakfast is included in the priceserved in the house (Lunch and Dinner can be ordered from Hideout Bistro for an extra chargevegan options as well.).2. Scooter for free during your stay!.3. There is an equipped kitchenunlimited drinking waterfridge filled with cold Bintang.4. Two places to sleep - main round bed (dominant in pictures) with two-layer mosquito netand two single beds (can be put together) with mosquito net on the top floor.5. There is wifimusic stereo system in the houseand a hot shower!.6. We can help to arrange your transportfind you the right guidesgive you the best Balinese massage in-house or organise a great cooking class at Hideout Bistro.7. Check-in from 3 pmplease no late-night arrivals. Check-out at 11 am.8. We are in the middle of the jungleplease expect some wildlife. :)IMPORTANT INFORMATION.Due to the ongoing pandemic of COVID19:.- All guests will be measured by a professional no-contact thermometer for their body temperature. If their body temperature is repeatedly measured as above 37,5 Celsiusthey will not be allowed to check-in as this can be a sign of ongoing illness such as COVID19.- All guests will sign a declaration of their current health status.- All guests need to wear a face mask during check-in/check-out or when in contact with our team.- Houses are cleaned and sanitized after each guest.- We provide hand sanitisers in the house.THE SPACE.Horizon is our most adventurous all bamboo-home with open space designon the ground flooryou can find a neatfully equipped kitchen with stove and smaller fridgecozy living/relaxing area (with extra hanging hammock)bathroom with outdoor showerand indoor-outdoor plunge poolcovered from rain by large overhanging grass roof.There is no private bedroom in Horizonall space is openso the traveling party should be well accustomed to sharing the house together. It is a very playful and adventurous space - with large net overhanging the poolyou can climb up there by bamboo shelves or get there through the master bed.Following the bamboo rampit leads you to a large round bed (240cm wide) with two-layer mosquito netproviding safety and privacy. And extra two guests can share the very top of the buildingclimbing the bamboo ladder leading from the ramp. There are two single beds therethat can be used for any kind of relaxation during the day if you are only two travellers. What a place for readingcuddling and relaxingthe perfect place for meditation. Bamboo is well-known for its temperature stabilitythanks to natural ventilationthere is no need for AC or a fan. It can be very cold up here. :)At your arrivalyou can be looking forward to a welcome basket full of seasonal fruits. In the kitchenyou will always find Balinese coffeeteaoilsugarand salt. If you dont feel like cookingdont worrywe have a delicious Hideout Bistro - a kitchen concept! We provide breakfast (included in the price)lunch and dinnerand all are brought to your house. We do not yet have restaurant seatingbut you can enjoy the meals in the privacy of your Hideout.Scooter for free! During your stayyou will have available one simplebasic and olderscooter with two helmets. If you are a motorbike racer you might be disappointed :). Towels and beddings are also provided."

Title: Naturalist Boudoir
Description: Nestled in the heart of the Big Thicketour Naturalist Boudoir B&B has everything you need to revitalize your senses. Extremely private area for the naturalist with outdoor hot tub and shower. We welcome all guests to experience our lovely Naturalist Boudoir and reconnect with your special someone. Located in LumbertonTexas.Should your dates not be available for this cabinplease check out our two additional cabins..Naturalist Boudoir Too and Naturalist Boudoir on Point.The spaceThe space.Ready to unplug and get back to naturecome check out Naturalist Boudoir.Guest access.Naturalist Boudoir is an unusual space where one can get back to nature in a peacefulprivate setting."Other things to note.As you are actually in natureyou may encounter Gods creatures of the woods."

Title: Forest Garden Yurts
Description: Glamping at its finest! Forest Garden Yurts are wooden yurts designed and built by Bill Coperthwaite in the 1970s for Tom Hess and Lory Brown as home and pottery studio. Tucked away in 4 acres of Ozark forestthe yurts are simple in nature yet abound with artistic details. The home yurt has a kitchenbedroomand a nook living room. The bathroom yurt is separate but has a covered walk. Unconventional and uniquewith hobbit hole doors and low clearances in places.Guest access.There are 4-acres of woods to roamthat are either along the road or fencedso there is no chance of wandering off of the property. There are also fire pitscamp chairs and roasting sticks available.

Title: Luxury Dome Villa Eclipse
Description: Floating above an ocean of green palmsMakalele Dome Villas has one of the most spectacular settings in the world. Perched atop a verdant bukit peninsula cliff overlooking a sea of azure blues with volcano views.Custom 3 leaf clover shaped infinity edge pool looks directly out to the ocean and volcano views with one of a kind sunset vista experience.The spaceThe space.Inspired by the surrealist artist Wolfgang Widmoser a prodigy of Salvador Daliunique dome architecture provides floating ocean and volcano views right from the bed. Each dome villa has a custom king size tear drop on the ground level and a single Day Bed in the second level loft.Guest access.Our friendly staff on site is available to help and assist you with whatever you need from 8am till 9pm.Other things to note.PLEASE NOTETHIS PROPERTY IS SURROUNDED BY NATURE. THE PROPERTY IS THOROUGHLY CLEANED DAILY (INCLUDING THE BEDS STRIPPED AND SWEPT)BUT THE ODD ANTFROGGEKOBUTTERFLY OR ANY OTHER LOCAL CREATURE MAY ENCROACH ON OCCASION. IF YOU ARE SQUEAMISHSENSITIVE OR HAVE ANY KIND OF AVERSION TO SUCH A POSSIBILITYTHEN WE HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU CHOOSE ANOTHER OF THE LOMBOK LOCATIONS THAT IS NOT SO MUCH A PART OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT.

Title: The Silo House At Laughing Llama Farm
Description: Enjoy The Silo House At Laughing Llama farmsecluded and privateconveniently located within minutes to everything WacoTemple & Belton have to offer. You can also follow along on Insta at @silohouselaughingllamafarmPlease see the detailed info about "The Space" in this listing.**Extras**.Silo House S‚ÄômoresMimosasSpecial Occasion Flower Arrangements & Laughing Llama Farm Experience packages are available.Message us for details to arrange at least 3 days prior to your arrival.The spaceThe space"Guest access.There is a pond on the property with gate access right outside the front door of the Silo House. Stocked with bass and perch for catch and release! Bring your gear and if you dont have anywe will be more than happy to loan you lures and rods if needed.""Other things to note.This is a working farm with llamassheepgoats and cows occasionally. No matter what they sayplease do not let them out of their designated areas into the fenced yard of the silo house. Theyd love to sit on the silo house porch and have a beer with you if they could. :).Our animals are fed a special diet and the sheep can not eat the llama feed. We will provide you with some llama feed and when you arrivethere will be instructions to how they are trained and fed so that you can feed the llamas if you like. Please do not take any feed past the gate at the Silo House. They are trained to know if you are in the pasturethere is no food involved.Lil Dthe brown goatloves to hang out with you when you fish. He also loves fishing tackleso please close all tackle boxes and watch your poleslures and hooks.We feed and put the animals up at night (depending on the weather and the season) at the barn and they know the routine about sundown and the routine at sun up.Every day is a new adventure at Laughing Llama Farm."

Title: Crystal Peak Lookout üå≤
Description: "The lookout is open year round with a wood fired stove to keep warm at night or heat your morning coffee. A wood fired sauna sits below to relax and rejuvenate your body after a big hike or snowshoeing adventure. Whats that other little wooden building? No fire lookout is complete without an outhouse!"The space"The space.Crystal Peak Lookout was built in 1959 and was originally located in ChewelahWA on top of Stranger Peak. In 1983 it was moved to Northern Idaho to the cedar and tamarack lined slopes of Crystal Peak. Completely remodeled in 2018Crystal Peak Lookout is now an immersive deep-forest getaway for adventurous couples. Surrounded by 13 wooded acresyoull find yourself sharing the sunset view with mountain bluebirds in the tree topsgazing at the starlit skies while an owl calls from its neighboring perchand if youre luckywaking up to the occasional passing moose."Guest access.There‚Äôs 13 acres to wander around to your hearts content! Depending on the time of year you\ll find huckleberries ripe for the pickingtamarack needles beginning yellowblue bird boxes full of nestlingsor fresh moose tracks in the snow. You‚Äôll have full access to the lookoutan outhouse & sauna during your stay. Winter is accessed by snowmobile or by a ride in our vintage Snowcat. (see "getting around")"Other things to note.You must have a 4WD vehicle to access the lookout. In the winter which can start in late October you‚Äôll need snowmobiles or the equivalent to get to the property.Now Available: Winter Wonderland Experience! Its a rare & absolutely stunning to stay in a lookout in the snow. Our caretaker David will greet you in town with gourmet hot cocoa (Baileys optional) & a Vintage 1960s Thiokol Snowcat. Snuggle up with your partner in the fully enclosedheatedtrack vehicle that maneuvers over the snow. Youll enjoy breath-taking 360 degree views of the snow covered forest on your way to the lookout. Well transport all your gear and food to the bottom of the driveway and pick you up at the end of your stay. We supply you with a sled and snowshoes to make the trek up the driveway fun and easy!Its a beautiful addition to staying at the lookout. Its a $100 for the snowcat and we will add that to your booking if youd like to reserve it. Also your welcome to tip your driver in person if you feel so inclined."

Title: Semi Open Bamboo Bungalow + Instagram Hammock Net
Description: A unique 2 storey bungalow located in the South of Bali. The bungalow is part of a small resort and has a restaurant onside and a massive infinity pool. This will be a unique experience sleeping in this bungalow.We have 4 of these types of bungalows and you will be placed randomly in onedepending on availability.Wifi speed 50 mbps.The space.The bed has 2 double beds. The bedrooms downstairs are closed and have a fan. There is no door between the upper floor and lower floor and does not stop any noise.The room upstairs is open as per the pictures.The rooms are not suitable for young kids.ATTENTION:.We would like to inform you that construction has started next to Le Bamboo. As there can be construction noise during your staywe will be flexible with cancellations. If you decide not to staywe will refund the night that you did not stay at Le Bamboo. Some guests are not bothered by the noise and some daysthere is no noisebut we cannot predict what is happening during your stay. We are sorry for this inconvenience.

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M2
Description: Leafy Greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends. It is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind. We work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature. That is why the cob houses are the right choice for us. Not only the buildings are eco-friendly but also the garden is organic. Visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment. It is a perfect place to getaway!!The space"The space.This clay house was built for meditation course and It was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple. The house is 35 square meter with essential facilities. It might be considered as a tiny houseyet it‚Äôs comfortable for 2 people living together. It is a single floor house with bunk bed. The entire of the house was made by clay (earth)it is not only eco-friendly building but also good for our health. We believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earththis means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out. It is very special house for ustoo special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone. Hope you would love it like we do.DO NOT CLICK ON THE AIRBNB LINK FOR DIRECTIONS.Please only use our provided location to get hereotherwiseyou might end up to other places.PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR PLACE SURROUNDED BY NATURE.Our place is full of flowers and treesyou might see part of nature like birdscricketsfrogslizardsbutterfliesbugs and insects in our gardendont worrythey are harmless. Howeverif you are afraid of these creaturesour place might not suit you. We do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect netplease keep it close every time during stay.Please note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet receptionso the internet might get slow sometime.Please note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr. Howeveryou would do our best to help you out. To check-init is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrive.We have cat in our property. If you are allergic to cat or do not like themour place might not a good fit for you.If more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the roomadditional fee and penalty will be charged.(Children over 3 years old is also count as 1 person).No commercial photography shoots allowed"

Title: Kettle House Galveston - As Seen On TV DIY
Description: Welcome to the "Galveston" famous Kettle House. Enjoy this newly renovated 1960\s home originally built as a steel storage tank. This home has foam insulation and central AC for ultimate comfort. We have high speed Wi-Fi4k Smart TVand includes all the comforts of home. Large deck great for catching rays and relaxing in the breeze. Seen on HGTV/DIY show "Big Texas Fix"!8 minute walk to the beach - have to cross FM 3005.12 miles to the historic StrandThe spaceThe space.IMPORTANT to Note:There is an interior metal spiral staircase that is steeptightand can be difficult to navigate. There are NO HANDRAILS.Downstairs bedroom with 2 queen beds requires going downstairs and bathroom is upstairs. These beds are also elevated. We do provide stairs with 3 steps for easy access. There are NO rails on bed! So if your worried about yourself or children falling off these beds won‚Äôt be for you! Got to work with the space we have :-)Since this is a beach house there are 14 exterior stairs that take you to the main living space.This is a West End beach house and like all Galveston there are mosquitoes. We supply big spray at the house and also a bug zapper but during certain times of the year they can be bad. If you leave the outside lights on at night they will attract June bugs and other insects.Also to note this house is on the ‚Äúwest‚Äù end of Galveston by all the beach homes. This house is not in town by restaurants and downtown. It‚Äôs approx a 10 min drive back to Walmart and fast food.

Title: Guard Tower Suite #1 with Pool
Description: Units designed to make the everyday extraordinary.The ULTIMATE "GLAMPING" experience! Featured on HGTV: The Castle House Estate brings Tiny Home living to another levellocated in the heart of Joshua Tree and minutes from the National Park. This unique medieval piece of architecture blends indoor-outdoor living with an emphasis on entertaining. The Castle House Estate is situated on eight picturesque acressurrounded by many more private undeveloped acres.The space.Guard Tower 13 LEVELS ¬∑ 1 BED ¬∑ 120 SQF PER FLOORThe ULTIMATE "Tiny House" experience!The Castle House Guard Tower is a custom three level living space & loft. Each piece of furniture has been custom made to fit this unique round space which includes a queen sized bed in the loft. Did we mention 1500 thread count sheets and Pure Care Plush memory foam pillows?The full glass door and windows have been placed strategically to catch the desert light.For outside adventurers step up to the rooftop hatch to enjoy your views or bring your sleeping bags and sleep under the stars. ***WEATHER PERMITTING***Each tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning fire-pitgrill top and two chairsperfect for enjoying the outside elements of Joshua Tree & where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast s\mores. Included in each tower is a mini-refrigerator and Nespresso coffee maker. The restroom facility is just 20 steps away and has two private toiletstwo hand sinks and urinal. Two outside showers and one outdoor sink. Nothing can be compared to showering outside with 365 degree views of The National Park.Instagram: @TheCastleHouseEstate

Title: Honey's Silo Retreat
Description: Please go to the Glacier National park website updated 2021 visitation policyHoney\s Silo is in the very NW corner of my 20 acre property in the country surrounded by Alfalfa & Wheat fieldsThe property borders Blaine creek- a natural wet land & an abundance of wild life."Bring a license Plate to be placed in the rafters & receive a free Montana made goody"The space"The space.Unique 1950s Grain Silo converted over a year into this very cool vacation rental. Owned by a farmer in St. Ignatius & transported here. Its Quiet location next to Blaine creeka wild life haven. My Grain Bin lies in the beautiful valley east of Kalispell at the base of the Swan Mountain Range. You will be impressed by the uniqueness of the interior styleand never feel like you are staying in a grain bin. I had a vision of how it would turn out and the vision came true. Breath taking sunrises and sunsets can be seen from this location. Your home away from home is conveniently located between all the major attractions that the area has to offer. Minutes to Bigforka small eclectic town at the north end of Flathead Lake and Glacier National Park with its outstanding vistas. The towns of Whitefish and Kalispellwith their many shops and restaurantsare also nearby.""Guest access.Well all of it of course. Youre in Montana"Other things to note.I rent bear spray $5 per can per can-Refund if it saves your life from a bear!.Inflatable Paddle boards x 2 $25 per board per stay.Bring a license plate sign it & date it & I will place it in the rafters-You will receive a home made local goody!

Description: "Iglu hut Milzkalne is likely to satisfy any urban people needs seeking a little recreation in nature‚Äîwithout foregoing any of life luxuries.Iglu Hut is unique and fantastic glamping at its best surrounded by spruce and pine trees and is perfect place to escape from city rush for totally revitalising rest."The space"The space.Its equipped with all needed for contemporary pepole and will provide with full comfort in the middle of forest.It has high quaility aspen siding inside and covered with spruce tree wooden chips outside. Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Snail Dome (SND)
Description: Leafy Greens was built as a retreat centre for our family and friends. It is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind. We work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature. That is why the cob houses are the right choice for us. Not only the buildings are eco-friendly but also the garden is organic. Visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment. It is a perfect place to getaway!!The space"The space.This clay house was built for meditation course and It was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple. The house is 100 square meter with essential facilities. The house is designed to fit for up to 5 peoplewith 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The entire of the house was made by clay (earth)it is not only eco-friendly building but also good for our health. We believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earththis means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out. It is very special house for ustoo special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone. Hope you would love it like we do.DO NOT CLICK ON THE AIRBNB LINK FOR DIRECTIONS.Please only use our provided location to get hereotherwiseyou might end up to other places.PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR PLACE SURROUNDED BY NATURE.Our place is full of flowers and treesyou might see part of nature like birdscricketsfrogslizardsbutterfliesbugs and insects in our gardendont worrythey are harmless. Howeverif you are afraid of these creaturesour place might not suit you. We do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect netplease keep it close every time during stay.Please note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet receptionso the internet might get slow sometime.Please note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr. Howeveryou would do our best to help you out. To check-init is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrive.We have cat in our property. If you are allergic to cat or do not like themour place might not a good fit for you.If more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the roomadditional fee and penalty will be charged.(Children over 3 years old is also count as 1 person).No commercial photography shoots allowed"Other things to note.Host might not be able to reply guests message or help after 21:00 PMso that guests must read and study our house manual with care. All information about our house that guests need to know are in there.

Title: Tree-house Experience on a river
Description: "Treat yourselves to an unforgettable experience! This is not some kids tree-housebut rather a truly unique and one of a kind in Panama. The tree-house is located next to a river that will sooth you throughout your stay with its majestic sound."The spaceThe space.You can soon tick off the Number One on your bucket list: the absolutely amazing experience of spending a couple of days in your own tree-house in tropical nature!.This large tree-house is situated in a private corner of our nature resort Rio Encantado . Let the soothing sound of the riverand the rushing of the leaves lull you to sleep in the comfortable double bed. The next morning you will be awoken by the beautiful song of the birds around you. From your half-open room in the tree-house you can control a light switch to illuminate the river at night. There is a comfortable bed for youas well as a wet barand bathroom facilities.Downstairsa few meters from the tree-house is a ranchowhere there is a full bathroom/hot water and a kitchen for your use. But for bathing you may probably prefer to use the natural pool in the river bend that your tree-house bedroom looks down to.Many of our guests who came to try out the tree-house for a night - for the unique experience - ended up extending their stayclaiming they had never slept so soundly in all their lives! IT IS A TOTALLY NO SMOKING AREA.

Title: HIDEOUT BALI - Eco Bamboo Home
Description: Your perfect little staycation in Bali is right here. We take relaxation seriously.Now more than everwe can be your safe hide-away from the world epidemic. Special discounts running now!Hideout is a unique eco stay hidden in the mountains of Gunung Agung volcano - far from the city life it acts as the perfect hideaway for all adventurous travellers. We are honoured to be number 4. most wished accommodation at Airbnb in the world. ‚ô°Follow our social media @hideoutbali for special promo!The space"The space.This experience is not like any otherHideout is not some fancy hotelit is truly an adventurous experiencerustic and authentic right in the middle of Balinese village life. Hideout is a perfect place for long-time travellerslovers of naturespiritual-minded peopletrekking-loversbackpackersartistsmusiciansand eco-enthusiast to have their own unique Bali experience. We are most happy with environmentally thinking guestswho treat this little bamboo home with love and care.If you read furtheryou can find much important and interesting informationbut for those in a hurrythese are some key points to know! :).1. Breakfast is included in the priceserved in the house (Lunch and Dinner can be ordered from Hideout Bistro for an extra chargevegan options as well.).2. Scooter for free during your stay!.3. There is an equipped kitchenunlimited drinking waterfridge filled with cold Bintang.4. Large cosy bed with mosquito netwifimusic stereo system in the houseand a hot shower!.5. We can help to arrange your transportfind you the right guidesgive you the best Balinese massage in-house or organise a great cooking class at Hideout Bistro.6. Check-in from 3 pmplease no late-night arrivals. Check-out at 11 am.7. We are in the middle of the jungleplease expect some wildlife. :).IMPORTANT INFORMATION.Due to the ongoing pandemic of COVID19:.- All guests will be measured by a professional no-contact thermometer for their body temperature. If their body temperature is repeatedly measured as above 37,5 Celsiusthey will not be allowed to check-in as this can be a sign of ongoing illness such as COVID19.- All guests will sign a declaration of their current health status.- All guests need to wear a face mask during check-in/check-out or when in contact with our team.- Houses are cleaned and sanitized after each guest.- We provide hand sanitisers in the house.THE SPACE.The building has two floorson the first flooryou can find a neatfully equipped kitchencosy living/relaxing area (with extra hanging hammock)wardrobe with safety boxbathroomand entrance to the outdoor shower. On the second floorthere is a spacious bedroomproviding king size bed with a mosquito net. Right in front of the unique triangular windowthere are multiple bean bags for readingcuddling and relaxingthe perfect place for meditation or playing a musical instrumentall with a direct view of the shimmering river.Bamboo is well-known for its temperature stabilitythanks to natural ventilationthere is no need for AC or a fan. It can be very cold up here. :)In the kitchenyou will always find Balinese coffeeteasugarsaltand some spices. If you dont feel like cookingdont worrywe have a delicious Hideout Bistro - a kitchen concept! We provide breakfast (included in the price)lunch and dinnerand all can be brought to your house. We do not yet have restaurant seatingbut you can enjoy the meals in the privacy of your Hideout.Scooter for free! During your stayyou will have available one simplebasic and olderscooter with two helmets. If you are a motorbike racer you might be disappointed :). Always new towels and beddings are also provided.GOOD TO KNOW.What is amazing about stay in Hideout? ‚ô°.Solitude. All Hideouts have their own private gardenand we do the best we can to provide you with full privacy and solitude. The closest family warungs are 5-15min awayeasy to reach by scooter or by foot.We love music. That is why we provide you with a nice stereo system and traditional Balinese music equipment.Hideout is also a shelter for a Kikky catwhich is super cute and cuddly. You can also meet our friendly Hoki dog. They are the best security for night-time. Dont book Hideoutsif you have an allergy or if you dont want to be close to the animals.You can experience authentic Balinese lifestylecultural habits and observe many wonderful things in nature. Especially in the riverwhich is sometimes used for cleansing ceremonies and baths. Its a wonderful thing to experience.You can‚Äôt lock the bamboo houseyou can close the garden gate from the inside.FIRST TIME IN THE JUNGLE?.Hideout is part of local natureour cleaning standards are at the highestbut that doesnt stop occasional insectfurry caterpillar (that should have a sign - do not touch)frogsnake or mouse from visiting the house. Please consider this before booking and do not book this house if you are not prepared for an occasional encounter. We are immersed in nature. :) Animals are friendsnot enemies.We urge you to always turn your lights on in the night when moving around the house or visiting the bathroom.Did you know that a spider can make a new web in under 1 hour? With our biggest efforts to keep the houses perfect and insect freeyou have to expect that there will be some spiderssome bugs and some mosquitos. That is just nature and we cant do anything more for it. If you dont feel comfortable with thatit is better to book a different type of accommodation than a bamboo house.The Internet is very poor and sometimes not working at all. We recommend being prepared for the off-the-grid experience.ABOUT US.We are not a hotelwe dont offer hotel services or 24/7 reception. We are a true Airbnb experience. :) We are here for you daily from 8am - 8pm. If you want a daily clean-upplease let us know when you check-in.Beware that the nearest ATM is from a local bankit only accepts Mastercard. International ATM is about 35 minutes by car away - do come prepared!.Check-in is 3pm - 7pmplease avoid check-in later than 8pm since it is very problematic and in some cases not possible! Check-out by 11am.LOCATION.Please take a careful look at the mapwe are over 90 minutes away from the Ubud and 2 hours from the city of Denpasar and the international airport. :).The closest city is Amlapura30min away. There is no night-life here. No barsclubscoffee houses or shops with imported products. We are this far from the city by choice. In the middle of rice fields with a calm setting next to the running river.Hideout is within walking distance from a resort where you can have a lovely dinner in the restaurant with an unforgettable view of Gunung Agung. You can easily reach many traditional small shops/warung. There are so many things to explore around - by foot or by bike. Just to mention. you can go trekking through the rice fieldsexplore local waterfall Jagasatruvisit Tirta GanggaUjung Templego snorkelling or divingvisit the night marketvisit shaman or local templesgo to experience Pura Besakihhave a wild day of rafting and many more.""Other things to note.River surrounding the land is very clean. You can take a refreshing dip in a natural swimming pool which the river provides. You can observe here many of amazing animal specieslizards of all sizesenormous butterfliesall you can count dragonflies and fireflieschameleonsbirds of all colours and not to forget our kitten Kikka and dogs Hoki and Tracy. Its a unique experience to fall asleep looking at the fireflies just behind your window. :)The view from the house is focused directly on one of the most sacred places aroundcalled Campuhan. Campuhan is Balinese term for a place where two rivers meet. This place is regarded by locals as a holy place for centuries. Its a source of holy water for ceremonies and cleansing the body and spirit. During your stayyou will have the opportunity to observe Balinese during their ceremonies and baths. Campuhan is a very magical placeattracting good vibes and positive energy.By our experience in the Hideoutyou can find an enormously inspiring environmentfor your writingmusican art of for work."

Title: Veluvana Bali - Owl Bamboo House
Description: Veluvana is a unique bamboo house with a wonderful view of Sidemen Valleya genuine tropical landscape with Mount Agung peak on its back. This getaway spot is a great place to bring into reality the dream adventure of the true wanderer. We invite you to feel the magnificent vibes of the entire house to escape the life that is full of drama into a journey with ultimate joy.The spaceThe space.The bamboo house is located at the main tourist district of Sidemena small town with a magnificent landscape in the southern flank of Mount Agung. Sidemen is not a touristy areait is about a 90-minute drive from Bali Airport and a 45-minute drive from Ubud. Besides the beautiful scenery and the indigenous culture Sidemen also surrounded by a lot of famous tourist destinations in Bali. Some of them include; Lempuyang Temple (The Gateway to Heaven)Besakih (The Mother Temple of Bali)Tirta Gangga Royal Water PalaceTelaga Waja River for RaftingAmed Diving Spotand Bias Putih the Virgin Beach.Upon arrival at Veluvana bamboo houseyou will find the upper ground parking area with a small gazebo on the west side of the entrance and a small front office building in the north-east edge. Take your time in the upper ground to enjoy the welcome drink served by our doorman while resting from a long journey through the wavy road of East Bali.Once you finish your drinkthe declining stairs down to the north edge of the upper ground will lead you to the bamboo house. You will not see the building until you reach the lower ground as it is secluded behind the bamboo wall and vegetation. At the lower groundyou will notice a small fish pond to be your silent neighbor during your stay. Spin the leaf door and follow the stone path to head into the ground level of the bamboo house.All part of the building is fully designed for guest enjoyment. Sit back the bamboo couch to watch the painting-like scenery right from the ground level porch. On the left side of the house is a small pool to chill with your partner. While at the right end are the semi-open toilet and the lush rain-forest shower. There is also a kitchenette at the back of the couch that features a sinka coolera coffee makera water heaterand seasonal fruit will also be served subject to availability.Climb up to the upper level of the house through the bamboo stairsyou will enter the all bamboo bedroom that facing north to the Sidemen Valley with the green hills and Mount Agung on its back. Half of the room wall is windows with transparent glass that allows sunrise to light up your mind and sunset to color up your soul. The room features a comfort double-sized beda single reclining sofa bedand a cozy bedroom chair where you can kick back and relax with a book or hustling on a laptop before rolling into bed.The upper level of the house also features a balcony on the east side and the dreamy hanging net right in front of your bed. Carefully spin the east door to enjoy sightseeing from the east balcony especially when the sunlight softly appears to charm you up from your restful sleep. If you brave enough to try relaxing on the hanging net while enjoying the magnificent view of Mount Agungopen the north side window and go down slowly to the net. Layback and chill like you were floating on a soft cloud. It is okay to also bring pillows and blanket to the net because anyone can fall asleep by the soft wind of the Sidemen Valley.Other things to note.BEFORE YOU BOOKPLEASE READ A FEW DETAILS FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION:1. The Construction.The construction and furniture are mostly made of locally-sourced bamboo that covered with rice straw roofs. The building is designed and built by local bamboo artisans with serious consideration to the strength of the entire part of the construction and furniture. The lower level floor is a half meter from the ground with a higher edge on the north porch; please take care of your step while playing on this site. The upper level is 2.5 meters from the ground with stairs that are considered easy to climb; watch your head and hold the railing for your safety.2. WaterElectricityand Wi-Fi.The water you use in this house is supplied by the regional water company that distributes fresh water sourced from Mount Agung aquifer. Although the water is freshit is not ready to drink waterso please drink only water that is served in the bottle and ask the doormen to refill if it runs out. The electricity installed in the house is connected with the main east Bali grid system to assure you have reliable lighting in the night and optimum power supply to your device. Because we understand you may physically off-gridbut your digital presence can have no break. SoWi-Fi is free as always.3. The Location.The small town of Sidemen is less crowded compare to Ubud and any other tourist destination in Bali. This area is slowly growing as the indigenous culture and society remain preserved by its humility. You can explore the village in a short-range by foota scooter is also available to rent if you want to go a little bit further to the town center or the neighbor village.4. Public Facility.The small town of Sidemen has a village halltraditional marketsmall groceryschooland hospital with an emergency care unit. Ride a scooter around 5 ‚Äì 10 minutes from the bamboo house to reach one of these facilities. Bigger public facilities are available in the nearest town of Semarapura that requires a 20-minute drive or Denpasar that is around 60 minutes from Sidemen.5. The Climate.The climate is divided into two seasonsdry or wet. The dry season comes around May ‚Äì September while the wet season is from October ‚Äì April each year. Howeverclimate change has made the weather a bit unpredictable. Sometimes there is a rainy day within the dry seasonand not all day is rainy during the wet season. When you stay during the wet season please consider facing heavy rain with a wind that may blow water into the lower ground porchthe upper balconyand the hanging net. Howeverwe have installed curtains and roll-up blinds at the lower ground so you can protect yourself from rainwater or bugs in the night.6. The Bugs.The bamboo house is located within a rice terrace with rich biodiversity. Our commitment to reducing the carbon footprint has led us to design the house with minimum impact on the surrounding living organism. Stay in this bamboo house means that you are willing to share your living space with other creatures. Antsflymosquitoand other insects are commonly found outside of the building especially during fruit season. As long as you keep the space clean and not leave any left food openthey will not come to disturb you. If you notice mosquito entering the bedroom areawe highly recommend you to use the mosquito net on the bed during your sleep. If you have a specific insect allergy or afraid of these insectswe suggest this bamboo house is not good for you. Or you may go at your own risk.7. Room Services.You have a doormen stand-by at 7.00 am ‚Äì 9.00 pm at the upper groundyou can ask him almost anything you need to make your stay enjoyable. He will help you with breakfastfood for lunch and dinnerfind a masseurroom cleaninglaundrytransportationarea informationand tourist activities. You can also contact us online through Airbnb platform in case the onsite services do not meet your needs.8. BreakfastLunchand Dinner.Breakfast for two is included in your booking. You can ask the doormen to serve the breakfast in the spot you want. Whether it is floating on the poolon the couch or you feel too heavy to wake up from your bedthe breakfast will be served at your convenience. We plan to have a small restaurant in the upper ground so that you can order food for your lunch as well as dinner. For nowyou can walk around as there are several restaurants available near the house. Or you can ask the doormen to buy one.9. Air Conditioning.We do not install air conditioning in the house as it is against our spirit to maintain natural air remain fresh and healthy. Matter-fact we think we do not need that urban stuff around Sidemen Villageespecially when you let the soft natural wind flows into your space.10. Use of Hanging Net.The hanging net is made of strong string with iron steel pillars to sustain the weight of the user. Using the hanging net means you understand the risk that you may fell off to the side of the net if you are not careful. Only use the hanging net if you are confident that you have a good balance and always have your partner watching you in case you need help to get back to the room. Do not use the hanging net after hitting even a shoot of alcohol. Do not jump down from the hanging net and do not hang on it as it is your pull up bar.11. The Neighborhood.As the bamboo house is located in the main tourist district of Sidemenseveral accommodations and restaurants are situated near your space. You will see some buildings on the west side of the house. Right at the back of the house is also accommodation with several rooms. The neighbor is warm and friendlyespecially the owner of the surrounding properties. Howeverto make sure you have great privacy during your staywe have created a high bamboo fence at the back of the house and plant dense vegetation on each border with the neighbor property.12. Irresponsible Behavior.Irresponsible behavior and threatening and abusive conduct towards the hostdoormenneighbors of the houseand the villager will not be tolerated. The host will refuse to allow check-in to the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest (s) have related to any irresponsible behaviorthreateningand abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above. The host also has a full authority to end guest stay in the house if there is any case and or information that assume the guest (s) have related to any irresponsible behaviorthreateningand abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above. No refund will be given regarding the cancelation/canceled stay due to irresponsible behaviorthreateningand abusive conduct toward the mentioned person above.The host will not have a further responsibility to the guest once the booking is canceled and or the stay is ended.
