Title: Bamboo eco cottage in rice fields
Description: This bamboo cottage is a secluded eco retreat down a quiet foot path nestled in the rice fields and only a five minute walk to central Ubud. Open air basket weave bedroom with mini loftmodern elegant bathroom and outdoor living area make this a truly unique Bali experience.The spaceThe space.This is a woven house made almost entirely of bamboo. It is open air and as close to living in nature as you get. Our main lodge is down a private foot path only accessible to cottage guests. if you choose to join us for dinnera swim or for socializing with other guests you are welcome to enjoy this common space with a saltwater pool and a swing. :)Guest access.We have a complete menu and full service to the cottage is just a phone call away with the complimentary cell phone we provide . We offer a complete menu of asian fusion snacks as well as a traditional balinese village style dinner served with candlelight and all accessories for a formal dining experience under the stars. dinner is prepared fresh from wild harvested or organic ingredients. Breakfast is not included in your stay but we do provide upon request at an extra fees and can be delivered when you awake on the patio overlooking a lush greenery as far as the eye can see.he property is surrounded by rice fields with many opportunities for hiking."Other things to note.This is a unique place and is not for everyone. It is eco tropical living at its best but with that comes nature in all its glory. Things to note: There is no air-conditioning although because of the location there is a constant cool breeze and you may even enjoy the quilt we provide at night. This cottage is a woven basket with a living bamboo and traditional grass roof leaving it totally open and in nature. Some people have asked about security. It is very secluded and very safe. there is a cabinet you can lock up valuables in if you like. We have staff available to assist you and ensure you have what you need at all times. You will be very well cared for.Sleeping in nature is something most of us dont do as we sleep in sealed rooms. It can be transformative to sleep in a natural settingopen to the cool night airlistening to the crickets and chirping geckosthe sounds of the nearby rushing stream with the fireflies glittering in the night. Dont let the unusual openness of the space deter youthis is an experience you wont soon forget.Bali 101:.Welcome to Balino this is not like where you are coming from. To hopefully enhance your experience we want to provide you with a bit of cultural context. People often feel disappointed when they try to make Bali what they are familiar with. We hope by describing a few scenarios that this helps as Bali has things about it that may be very different than you are used to.1. ‚ÄúThere is a lizard staring at me from the ceiling who pooped on the floor and there are ants crawling along the wall in the bathroom‚Äù The outdoors will come inside. Cricketsspidersand certainly a resident gecko and wasps will all join you in your living space. No matter how fancy the villa there is no keeping them out. Given that all of our bathrooms are open air this is something to embrace as part of the experience and not be afraid as they are all harmless.2. ‚ÄúI can hear roosters and dogs and the temple and even the occasional pig being sacrificed at midnightoh and the crickets are too loud to sleep.‚Äù Yes indeedall true. When I think of Bali I think of roostersthey are very proud of their fighting cocks and spend a great deal of time with themoften keeping them quite close to living spaces so your neighbor may very well have one. our neighbor certainly has both and his dog barks a lot and has attempted to scare away many a guest but dont be afraid he is harmless. The temple is a charming sound that echo thru the night and adds the to atmosphere but it can be less charming when they begin to sacrifice pigs at midnight. Peaceful Bali? Well its all a matter of perspective bali is here to be itself not just to be a peaceful place for you to relaxenjoy these new and unique sounds as part of the atmosphere and dont expect it to be an instagram photoit is a real living place.3. ‚ÄúAn old lady with a machete and no shirt on just wandered into my living room‚Äù Balinese have a very different relationship to personal privacy than we do. It is not uncommon for neighbors or rice-field farms to wander into your space and personal property. because they are curious about you or simply because they want to borrow your sugar. They may not even ask as they would imagine you would do exactly the same. This can be very startling at first and takes some getting used to. You are welcome to ask them to leave but do keep in mind they are more than likely not there to harm you just used to sharing personal space.4. ‚ÄúThere are naked people in the stream by the house‚Äù it wasn‚Äôt very many years ago that all Balinese women were topless as their normal daily attire. Now only the traditional old women still maintain this style of dress but it is still very common to see people publicly bathing in ricefield streams naked. You may even see this from your front porch. Don‚Äôt be alarmed this normal here and they will not even feel embarrassed if you wave \uf04a.5. ‚ÄúThe guy tried to over charge me‚Äù there is a very different relationship to money here. Think of it as a tug of war with a rope in the middleit‚Äôs not that they are trying to steal from you or cheat you or have anything against you at all they are just pulling on the rope to get as much money as they canif you don‚Äôt tug back then they won. Don‚Äôt get angry or feel the need to have hurt feelings just negotiate calmly to lower the price to something fairer. Negotiate everything in every situationyou will use these skills later when you need to ask for a raise with your boss. ;).6. ‚Äúeverything is damp‚Äù yes this is the tropics and especially during the rainy season everything can feel a bit damp and can mildew quickly even within a day. If your clothes need fresh laundering after being in a suitcase or if the sheets need to be changed for this reason just let us know and we will assist you.We hope these scenarios help you to be prepared if you face them and feel free to let us know should you need additional help navigating in this new environment. Also please be aware that this is a house with two cats who live therewe very much want to host people who are cat friendly as the cats are very much running the resort and we want you to be able to include them in your stay."

Title: "Air Castle" by Highpoint Treehouses
Description: Most unique treehouse destination you will find. For ages 12+. 1600 SF living space2 bedroom / 1 bath treehouse uses 4 shipping containers. The interior has a modern farmhouse style. After waking up with an incredible viewmove outside to 1 of 5 balconiesincluding the 3rd floor screened porch with hot tub or to the 6th floor crows-nest 50‚Äô in the air. Are looking for a couples get-awayadult tripor a romantic celebration..the unique ‚Äúnature‚Äù will make for a memorable experience.The spaceThe space.You will be immersed and be one with nature and the environment. Local animals that you may see include: deerwild hogsraccoonsarmadillosopossumsrabbitsbobcatssquirrelsowlsred-tailed hawk and many other varieties of birds. There are a number of trails to take by foot or bike.Guest access.The treehouse has all the amenities of home and many that only exist in your dreams. You can be comfortable in all seasons with a 20‚Äô wall of windows where you can watch birds and squirrels feed 20‚Äô off the ground from the comfort of power recliners. Each of the 5 balconies provide unique perspectives of nature and shade. Relax with a morning coffee on balcony adjacent to kitchen or take steps to the shaded crows nest to swing in a hammock 40‚Äô off the ground fully surrounded by extra tall railings. In the eveningstart a fire in the covered fire pit and let nature and the crackle of the fire relax you."Other things to note.This treehouse is meant for ages 12+ and older ONLY.** All registered guests must reviewsignand return a Waiver / Term of Conditions before checkin. **PLEASENo Pets! For safety reasons pets are not allowed; an exception is made for any registered service animal. We do this to protect you and your pet from any injury.Closures: We retain the right to close or limit your access to the treehouse during your stay if we deem it unsafe due to heavy storms or other considerations. These facilities and activities can be inherently risky due to the unique nature of the experienceso safety must stay top priority for you during your stay.Safety: Each unit has multiple smoke detectors and carbon monoxide sensors. Please do not tamper with these units. Alsokeep in mind thatwhen staying in a treehouseyoure between 10‚Äô and 50‚Äô above the ground and should act in a responsible manner. Accommodations have been constructed in as safe as possible mannerbut we need your help keeping you and your loved ones safe during the stay. Fire extinguishers are scattered around the treehouseincluding one in each bedroom for your use in an emergency. Designated operational windows in each room are available for quick escape using a ladder in case of fire. Do not use these items unless there is an emergency. If there is an emergencydial 9-1-1. EACH VISITOR AND GUEST SHALL CONDUCT THEMSELVES IN A RESPONSIBLE MANNER SO AS NOT TO ENDANGER THE LIVES OF OTHER GUESTS OR VISITORSCAUSE DAMAGE TO THE PROPERTYTHEMSELVES OR OTHERSOR CONSUME ALCOHOL TO EXCESS OR USE ILLEGAL DRUGS.Disclaimer: We cannot control nor are we responsible for any acts of nature. This includes but is not limited to; weatherinsectsrodents or the presence of wildlife (bugsdeersquirrelsraccoonsbatsskunkswild hogsarmadillossnakesetc.).Liability / Risk Management: Inherently we do as much as possible to make our treehouses and the outside activities as safe as possible. All activities involve a certain inherent risk or injury up to and including death. It is expressly understood and agreed that neither the owner nor HPT Air CastleLLC shall be liable for any damages or injury to guestguest‚Äôs guestor their families or to any of their property from whatever cause arising from the occupancy or use of the premises by guest and his/her family and guests. If an unregistered guest damages propertyis injured or causes liability then the person making the reservation is personally liable and responsible for the acts of the unregistered guest.Property Do‚Äôs / Don‚Äôts:¬∑ No house parties¬∑ All visitors must be registered and have a signed Assumption of Risk and Release from Liability Agreement on file prior to the commencement of their stay; a visitor may be replaced or added with at least seven (7) day notice to HPT Air CastlesLLC and having the new or replacement visitor sign and return to HPT Air CastlesLLC the Assumption of Risk and Release from Liability Agreement¬∑ Exceeding maximum occupancy of any unit results in a $100 /person/per day charge¬∑ There is a $20.00 service fee + postage for any items left behind that we mail to you¬∑ No pets allowed. If non-compliant $150 charge will be applied to credit card on file¬∑ No smoking inside. If non-compliant $150 charge will be applied to credit card on file¬∑ Treehouses are to be left tidy. Your rate includes a basic cleaning feeany excessive cleaning that is required will result in a minimum cleaning fee of $25 to $100plus you agree to be financial responsible for any economic loss to HPT Air CastlesLLC due to any reservation cancellation or delay in reservation move-ins that are a result of excess cleaning needing to be done after your stay¬∑ Any- type of foreign materialoilor soap used in outdoor hot-tubs will result in a $50 to $100 fee¬∑ Any items removed or damaged will result in extra fee charges including bedding and linens¬∑ HPT Air CastleLLC reserves the right to refuse service & cancel any reservations at any time¬∑ No ATV‚Äôs or firearms are to be used on property¬∑ Fires are to be burned in designated locations only¬∑ Holdovers: Don‚Äôt holdover; we need to make sure our place is tidy for the next visitors and guests. Thereforeplease check out by 11:00 am. Check in is at 4:00 pm. If you do not check out by 11:00 amyou will be subject to a stay-over penaltywhich is the market cost for the next nightplus an additional cleaning fee and a 10% penalty on top of the market cost for the night.**Your satisfactory stay is very important to us and we want to correct anything that is not in working order. Please report any issues or concerns to us prior to your first night stay. We will make every effort to get it immediately fixed. We cannot honor any requests for refund or compensation for any existing concerns or issues reported after the first night‚Äôs stay."

Title: Underground Hobbit Hole @MMV Ecovillage
Description: Approximately 260 sq ftearth sheltered structure within our permaculture-basedsustainableoff-grid village. It is one of a kind in architecture and theme with colored bottles built into the wallstained glass windowscenter tree pillar with atrium windows aboveand medieval Celtic Cross above the Hobbit Hole (outside and atop) give it a Hobbit Church feel.The spaceThe space.Heads up -- one of our Hobbit front door hinges just broke. darn it. Just a heads up. It usually takes a couple weeks to get a welder out here for such fixits.This is a primitive cabinit DOES have running waterbut NO electricity (you bring your own candles BYOC). Common facilities (kitchen and bath) being shared with the larger communityabout 200 yds away.*Just so everyone knowsduring heavy rains in our RainForest winter monthssometimes the floor can get a little wet and the underground cave can be damp --Utilizing the wood stove is ideal (please bring some firewood) keeps it drier and warmer.Breakfast nook has a Hobbit mushroom table and there is a comfy sky chair suspended for luxuriating.Built into the side of a mountain with a seasonal spring (there are springs everywhere here in the mountainous rain forest) that runs through the house -- on purpose -- so there is often the sound of a babbling brook in the HH November thru May.If you are looking for a unique experience in a beautiful natural area and would like to experience life in an off-gridsustainablepermaculture-focused ecovillage - and all the rough roadsdirtmudinsectsmessesbarking dogsmosquitosbeesmiceearly morning roosterscommunal livingcomposting toiletsongoing construction projects in remote wilderness - then we invite you join us in our mountain village!Our property encompasses 160 acres of pristine natural wilderness in Northern California\s beautiful Smith River canyon - home of the only un-dammed river in the state. Lush fern-encrusted hillsides slope down to countless spring-fed streamsteeming with wildlifefrom cute caterpillars to (also cutesometimes!) black bears. Accessible only by forestry road from scenic Redwoon Hwy (CA-199,) this is an opportunity to experience our responsible natural relationship with Mother Earth.This location is very beautiful and quite remoteso please be sure you\ve read through the full description and are prepared for certain elements of "roughing it" and adventure travel. The Village is also a work-in-progress so we are likely to be working and there may be constructiondirtand messes around!Amenities:BEDDING. It seems weird and unnecessary to mehonestlybut (bending to some COVID requests) we are asking you to bring your own sheets/sleeping bagsetc. There will be a mattress padblanket and some sheets in a drawer if you really need/want them. We\ll call it a rustic cabin theme instead of a paranoid germophobe motif.‚Ä¢Lighting / Electricity: Your cabin does not have electricity; we try to keep a flashlightlanternand/or candle available for your use -- but we recommend that you bring your own lights.‚Ä¢Kitchen: The outdoor kitchenabout 200yds away from the Hobbit Holehas a small propane camping stoveand plenty of potspansand utensils for your use. We do not have refrigeration but we do have a freezer (with ice packs) and coolers for storing food.‚Ä¢Bathrooms: We use composting toilets (buckets with seats); there is an indoor toilet in the bathhouse. Hot shower in the sauna/bathhouse. It is about 200 yds on average away from most of our cabins.‚Ä¢(Lack of) Phone / Internet: Some Verizon and US Cellular service is availablebut AT&T and T-Mobile do not service our area. We do not have wifi.The Great Outdoors:.‚Ä¢Domestic animals: Between the three dogs who run around at night chasing forest creaturesspringtime frog concertsand the early-rising chickensit is likely that there will be some animal noises occurring at unpredictable moments during the night and day.‚Ä¢Wild animals: There are various of these that live in the forestincluding skunkschipmunksfoxesblack bearsand many birds and insects. Since we have dogs and people aroundthe wild animals tend to keep their distance from the areas that we use. If you are luckyyou might spot a black bear on a hike; they are basically like big raccoons and prefer to run away from humans.If you are looking for a unique experience and up for rustic accommodations with a few off-grid perkswe welcome you to join us in our mountain paradise!Guest access.There is no key (or lock) to the Hobbit Hole. Just head up (the road) to the Lower Village common area. The Hobbit Hole is the first structure -- before the treehouse -- and just past the parking area on the right. Someone will probably be there to show you about the common areas -- otherwisejust make yourself at home. It\s casualnot formal.The Hobbit House is quite private and the furthest away from amenities in our Village. We provide a portable composting toilet. Our dining hallbath house (with showerbidetand fancier indoor toilet) is about 200 yds away.There are plenty trails to hikea swimming holeand garden benches and porch swings to enjoy the view.The host (Dan) is sometimes aroundsometimes notoften busy doing stuffso it\s all pretty straight forward check in yourself (no key or lock) make yourself at homecommunity areas are obvious. But there\s almost always someone around (other residentsintern woofers) to answer questions if you have them.There is a wood-fired sauna (usable November thru May)large organic garden and edible landscapingchicken and goat pensother animal residents include dogscatschickensfish and frogs.From your cabinyou are welcome to wander at will amongst our 160 acres of mostly steepforested landand enjoy the streams and waterfalls leading into Little Jones Creek. A stroll down the" driveway" and back along the forestry road is a beautiful hike in itselfwhere you could easily spend all day in the company of only quiet woodland creatures.We also offer custom bodywork sessions - holistic chiropractic and massage - more info available on request.Other things to note.Driving here: You do NOT need 4WD or any special vehicle to reach our property. We drive in and out regularly in our small Honda hatchback and have had hundreds of visitors drive up in their "regular" cars. Indeed the forestry road has a few potholes worth slowing to 5mphbut otherwise can be driven at 20mph. The rainy winter season creates puddles but actually better traction than in summercounter intuitively. The bridge ramps narrow and all you need to do is drive it slowlyconsciously. Pretty easy.Note: Plenty of people have very relaxingenjoyable satisfying experiences here in our sustainable culture experimentbut this happens only when reality exceeds expectations. This is where I try to talk everyone out of coming to stay with us -- MMV is NOTHING like a resort or the Marriott hotel. Think some crazy combination of camping/glamping at a ruggedmountainousoff-gridremote farm and sustainable community. There may be a compost pile outside your cabin after we weed the the beds around it. Our goatschickens or dogs may wake you in the morning. There are all kinds of critters here including but not limited to spiders and bears and all in between. We live here and make messesundertake all kinds of projects including big building projects sometimes. It is NOT polishednot always tidy (although we really try) convenient or even (sometimes) comfortable. You may have to split your own firewood. There is plenty of raw beauty and these forementioned functionalities are how it is here as we continue working towards Shangri La!.We love our visitors and appreciate them -- if you want to understand more about our project -- visitjoin and/or support us -- search Maitreya Mountain Village

Title: Unique glamping experience near Ely & Cambridge
Description: A beautifully converted 1945 boat nestled within a private forest overlooking the beautiful open fenland countryside. Perfect retreat for couples looking to relaxexplore and visit the local towns. Located 15 minutes drive from Ely and 30 minutes from Cambridge.The boat forms part of the overall space incorporating the bedroom with a king size double or two singlesaccompanied by a adjoining boat shack with an eclectic industrial style kitchen and bathroom with walk-in shower.The spaceThe space.The historic 1945 boat originally called the Anthony Stevenson sailed out of Penzance Cornwallshe has been converted in to a unique holiday retreat for couples. The modern boat interior has been designed to complement the beautiful oak beams and larch plankingit includes a double kingsize bed or two singlesrunning waterteacoffee and WiFi.The boat is positioned on a large deck made of reclaimed sleepers within a tranquil forest overlooking the beautiful fenland countryside. The perfect retreat for couples to relaxexplore and enjoy the amazing sunsets.Accompanied by an adjoining boat shack style building made from many reclaimed materials which contains your private eclectic industrial kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen contains a large vintage carpenters workbenchwith butler sinkcooking hobs and fridge. The spacious bathroom includes a private walk-in showertoilet and basin. If you would prefer to relax and bathe in nature on a fresh summers evening there is a secluded roll-top bath outside on the deck.The boat is positioned on its own privately fenced three acre foreston our small holding where we live in a 1760 Georgian property with our pet goatshorsesdogs and chickens.We try to live a eco friendly sustainable lifestyle and as such the boat runs entirely off-grid with renewable energy produced by our solar panels.If you have any questions about the BoatShack or local area please send us a message via Airbnb messenger.

Title: Wee Nook- a Hobbit Hole
Description: "Wee Nook is a 360 square foot living space with a full kitchen and bathroom. It is tucked underground in the middle of the woods. Please come enjoy the woodsfarm animalstrailspond and wide open space while youre here!As JRR Tolkien said: ‚ÄúIn a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit. Not a nastydirtywet holefilled with the ends of worms and an oozy smellnor yet a drybaresandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat: it was a hobbit-holdand that means comfort.‚Äù"The spaceThe space.Wee Nook is a 360 sq foot house with a full kitchenbathqueen bed and sofa. It boasts the most quiet spot on our propertywith a lovely pavilion for outdoor sitting in the middle of the woods. The hobbit hole has a live roofand several eatable plantings around this space for enjoying in spring and summer months. The fire pit in back allows guests to sit back and listen to nature while enjoying "nature\s tv" (a fire).Guests can enjoy walking the trails around and through the property. As well as visiting the pond for fishing and swimmingthe horsesgoats and highland cows.We have a cream and white dogLeeLoothat has free range of the property. She will most likely greet you upon your arrival or join you on your walk. She\s very sweet and socialshe just wants to meet everyone! She will bark.**There is no internet or tv in this space. There is also very little phone service! We recommend bringing booksgamesjournals or small hobbies. If weather is supposed to be rainy you might consider bringing a computer with movies DOWNLOADED on it. (Or one with dvd capabilities.)We are 15 miles from Loretta Lynn‚Äôs Ranch/ Waverly (west of us)30 miles from DicksonTn (east of us) and an hour from Nashville (east).Other listings on the property:.https://abnb.me/QLxQi0mYsRhttps://abnb.me/LPjARfoYsRhttps://abnb.me/BcGwuYjUpRhttps://abnb.me/Ky70EhHYsR"We do allow pets at our hobbit house. We require that all pets are up to date on all flea and tick medication and a $40 pet fee that can be left upon your departure. Please bring a blanket or sheet to cover the furniture if your pup is accustomed to being on the sofa and bed.Please keep animals on a leash if they are not responsive to their commands! We do have farm animals that can hurt your animal if they feel threatened and vice versa. (also our dog LeeLoo and the neighborhood dog Red have free range of the property. Both are very kind and love the opportunity to play if you are willing.)Check in is not strictly at 2pmas it is key code entry. So whenever you arrive you can unlock the door and make yourself at home.Check out is at 10am.Please feel free to share any photos of your experience to our Social Media pageRock N Refuge@rocknrefuge or #rocknrefuge."

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M5
Description: Leafy Greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends. It is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind. We work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature. That is why the cob houses are the right choice for us. Not only the buildings are eco-friendly but also the garden is organic. Visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment. It is a perfect place to getaway!!The space"The space.This clay house was built for meditation course and It was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple. The house is 35 square meter with essential facilities. It might be considered as a tiny houseyet it‚Äôs comfortable for 3 people living together. It got 2 stories:-2 futons on upper area and 1 bed on the ground floor. The entire of the house was made by clay (earth)it is not only eco-friendly building but also good for our health. We believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earththis means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out. It is very special house for ustoo special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone. Hope you would love it like we do.DO NOT CLICK ON THE AIRBNB LINK FOR DIRECTIONS.Please only use our provided location to get hereotherwiseyou might end up to other places.PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR PLACE SURROUNDED BY NATURE.Our place is full of flowers and treesyou might see part of nature like birdscricketsfrogslizardsbutterfliesbugs and insects in our gardendont worrythey are harmless. Howeverif you are afraid of these creaturesour place might not suit you. We do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect netplease keep it close every time during stay.Please note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet receptionso the internet might get slow sometime.Please note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr. Howeveryou would do our best to help you out. To check-init is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrive.We have cat in our property. If you are allergic to cat or do not like themour place might not a good fit for you.If more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the roomadditional fee and penalty will be charged.(Children over 3 years old is also count as 1 person).No commercial photography shoots allowed"Other things to note.- Check in after 15:00 PMCheck out before 11:00 AM.- No smoking in the houseif guests break this rulewe have to ask for cleaning 2,000 THB.- No durian in the house.We can provide a pickup service to our placeplease book it in advance.We have 5 bicyclesyou can use them for free.

Title:
The best in tiny living!
TreehouseTopia
Description: The Barkhouse is the only fully tree supported structure in the Gatlinburg/Pigeon Forge area. Located just minutes from all the major attractions in the area and only 5 miles from the Greenbriar entrance to the GSMNP. Enjoy the seclusion of 25 acres of trees with amazing views of the river and the mountains plus all the comforts of home.The Barkhouse is engineered with a beautiful live White Pine growing through the center of the treehouse. Enjoy stargazing through the skylight.The spaceThe space.The Barkhouse has a kitchen area with a microwaverefrigerator/freezer combotoaster ovensingle electric burnerand coffee maker. Enjoy charcoal grilling outdoors on your private deck or using the fire pit shared with the other treehouse located on the property. Spend time inside resting on yoga mats in the suspended cargo net area.Guest access.A door code will be given prior to arrival to enter the premise. Once inside the treehouse the entire (black circle) locking mechanism will need to be turned clockwise or counterclockwise to unlock or lock the door.Other things to note.No pets!

Title: Alianz Loft
Description: Insta @ alianzloft. 20 minutes from San Jose airport. First loft built by Alianz.cr. It contains a decked terracejacuzzifirepitrabbits gardentwo roomstwo balconiesentrance gateprivate gardenprivate parkingBBQ areaAC in each bedroombasketball courtluxury bedsand mountain views. Ideal for architecture loversromantic datesor having a good time. It is a unique space of his kind. Only pets that do not harm rabbits are allowed.The space"The space.Entrance with keyboarddont worry about arrival time. Only rented by the complete loft my relatives houses and our architectural office are 800ft (75mts) awaythe property has big green areasHall for group activitiesBBQchildren playgroundnice gazebo and a small farm. (Aprox 70 meters) Occasionally will be events of weddings with 4 consecutive hours of music. All group activities must end at 9pm. No loud noise is allowed after 9pm please.

Title: The Cabin at Fernwood Hills
Description: Looking for time away to disconnect from the city and reconnect. The Tiny Cabin (107 square feet) at Fernwood Hills might be the perfect spotnestled in the heart of South Western Ontarioin a beautiful forest. Quietcozyromantic- in the lush sanctuary of nature.Note: No washroom in the cabin but one a short distance up the lane.*NEW* Check out our Airbnb profile to book our other Cabin (Bracken) listing or The Studio LoftCheck out more about Fernwood Hills fernwoodhills.comThe space"The space.We started off offering this tiny space for day use so people just like youcould come away from their office or their workand clear their mind. Just a couple years agothere were several couplesthat asked us if they could stay overnight and have the experience of quieting their minds. Their heads were spinning because they just needed to disconnect from all the chaos and for a day or overnightlisten to their breathing and look out the windows to nature and wildlife. Hereyou are in the forestbut not the dense part and it overlooks green space and trails. Retreatre-windand re-fuel by yourself or with your significant other. Maximum of TWO people and both must be adults.Important to NOTE: NO Washroom in the Cabin. There is a nice washroomwith a showerbut it is NOT inside the cabin. It is a TWO MINUTE drive up the lane or if you decide to walk it will take longer.You have the option if you want to add on food delivered to your door. There might be restrictions on availability due to Covid or allergies or other situations. Just keep on reading and see further below.Fernwood Hills offers retreats for the individual and small groupswedding ceremoniesproposalsand elopementsand certainly anniversaries as well. We can help you with any of these or other ideas you have for your stay. Why notlet us help you make a total experience!! We would love to hear from you! Ideas? Birthdaysanniversariesproposalsgetawayssurprise outings. Let us help you create the experience...Add on Options:.Romantic Night? Date Night? Celebration? Make this a part of your experience!!.Add on Option: $175 paid when you are here via cash or etrans.Pretty tiny lights and flowers in season in your space and a lovely food grazing board consisting of several cheesescrackersfruitveg in seasonnachos/dipapples/caramelstuffed mushroomspulled pork or beef on a buna few other hot appsHot home made soup in season and a home made dessert.Delivered to your space upon arrival. Some allergies cannot be accommodated. Must be ordered and confirmed before your arrival.PLEASE CHECK WITH US BEFORE ORDERING AS SOME THINGS MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE AT CERTAIN TIMES.The Tiny Cabin is in fact tiny at only a little bit over 100 square feet. It is intended for quiet relaxation and not for camping or parties or events. We are happy to let you have a small campfire in the provided fire pot and there is a lot of firewood around you can collect. (weather permitting- if the weather is windy or has been drythis is not possible).*NOTE* to photographerscreatives and other business owners:.Our space has become popular with photographers and other business owners for its natural light with large windowsand we love working with them. Howeverthis space is not to be booked through airbnb for business usesincluding use as a photography studio or a work studio if you are having others or clients come in to have business with you. Those inquiries are welcome and we do thatbut it must be an inquiry through our fernwoodhills.com website and details will be given and pricing and availability.You might also want to have our photographer take photos of you for a short time example: engagement or proposalthen that is allowed to be requested here through airbnb. If you need clarification on this or any other questions please let us know.This listing is ONLY for 1-2 people to book this space. No guest or person under 18 and one of them has to be over 25. All other inquiries will be directed to go to our website.We are an agriculture property as well as a private park focused on regenerative agriculture and sustainable agriculture practices focused on healthwellnesseducation and events related to these activities.  Helping to expose and immerse individuals and groups in nature and allowing others to better connect with and understand the natural world around them. We are passionate about what we do here and the opportunities we have to help others each day through our property.Romancequietand cozy are keywords that describe our spot.Even if you are single the importance may not be on romance but certainly on the quietmindfulness and disconnecting. One of our passions is personal growth and understanding yourself better as well as others. We want you to be able to ignite your dream againbelieve in yourself againand believe you make a difference in this world. You were made for a special purpose and we hope our quiet spaces help you to discover this in a deeper way. No live flame candles in any of our spaces.Cant wait to meet you!!"Guest access.You have access with a key to the cabin. It is a tiny spacejust 100 square feet but has large windows and is very up-to-date and kept well. The setting is incredibly relaxing in the woods but overlooking greenspace. Not in the "dense" woodsnot totally remoteyet privatebut rather just in a very relaxing green space area. It is right off close-by trails so access to the forest is just steps away. In the winter months when the "public washrooms are closed," the main lovely washroom is just a two minute drive on the property up the lane. Up until recently we rented the cabin out for 6-8 hours "day-use" for relaxationwritingreadingpaintingre-balancing or whatever quiet you need. It is still available to be rented for day usehowever many people have asked to have the "overnight cabin" experience.We heat it all winter with an electric heaterhoweverwe want to encourage you when it is very cold to bring a sleeping bag or extra blankets and extra warm clothes so you will be "warm" all the time.If you would like to upgrade your booking you have a couple options.Is this a surprise for a special someone? Or for each other? Or are you coming by yourself and you would just like to relax and enjoy some foodwithout having to go out and get it all?Romantic Night? Date Night? Celebration? Make this a part of your experience!!Otherwise you still have the option of "just the airbnb" booking of the space. ...Either wayjust want to tell you about our add on option if someone wants it. We do have to know about allergies at bookingwe do accommodate vegetariansand but are not doing gluten free or vegan at the moment.Just let us know if you\re ok with doing just the space or if you\d like anything added on.Please check with usduring Covid as to the format for the food offerings. All food will be brought to your space.Otherwise you still have the option of "just the airbnb" booking of the space. Either wayjust want to tell you about our add on option if you would like it. We do have to know about allergies at booking to make sure it can be accommodated.Just let us know if you\re ok with doing just the space or if you\d like anything added on.Just write and let us know by messaging us when you are booking.Other things to note.Washrooms are not in this building but are nearby a short distance. This space is designed for day use or overnight. We have a double bed in the Cabinand it sleeps two (cozy). Againplease noteit is not for partiescampingor events. It is only for one person or max 2but as noted already it is a "disconnect" spot to enjoy quiet.It is also important to note that we are a total SMOKE FREE/Vape free locationand sorryno pets because of allergies to other guests.

Title: Magical Hobbit Treehouse Nestled in the Jungle
Description: Experience your childhood dreams of staying in a treehouseeven better since this one is inspired by the Hobbit movieswith round doors to enter and to access the deck. Imagine the adventure of arriving to your Hobbit treehouse by crossing a suspension bridge 15 meters up.Wake up to a symphony of bird songs and the occasional view of monkeys. Order room service from our restaurant and enjoy it on the deck or roof-top terrace. Latergo for a guided trek to a nearby secluded waterfall.The spaceThe space.My husband and I own one of Bali‚Äôs most unique boutique eco-resortsSebatu Sanctuarywhich includes the Hobbit treehouseand eight other distinctive accommodations.We‚Äôve designed the Hobbit Treehouse for adventurers with one-of-kind features that includes a suspension bridge that leads to the rooftop terracea loft for kids (at least 7 years old)a queen-sized swing sofa on the ground floora balcony to enjoy breakfast with a viewa semi-outdoor bathroomand a bedroom with arched windows on three sides providing views of the surrounding forest and terraced rice paddies.Begin your day with a sumptuous breakfast choosing from an array of Balinese and western dishes prepared by our in-house chef. Room service is available and you can dine either on your balcony or go even higher up to the roof-top terrace and enjoy sublime views of the terraced rice paddies across the valley. At the end of the daytuck yourself into a top-of-line queen-size bed400 thread count cotton sheets. Our boutique eco-resort is compliant with the Green Globe and Earth Check sustainability standards. To reduce our environmental footprintthe treehouse doesn‚Äôt have air conditioningbut does have a high quality ceiling fan. We‚Äôre 600 meters above sea level and nights are typically quite cool.

Title: UNIQUE SUMATRAN KARO HOUSE
Description: SPECIAL MONTHLY RATESOur Bali based jungle creation. Space and home for all-around creatives and life explorers. Welcome to be a guest in a tropical vibe. Staycreaterestenjoy and meet each other.This 60-year old traditional Sumatran Karo house made of ‚Äúeternal" teak wood is a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couple.The spaceThe space.This 60-year old traditional Sumatran house made of ‚Äúeternal" teak wood is painstakingly renewed by hand without missing a bit of its authenticity.The declined walls were originally meant to keep the wild tigers awaythe floor lifted off the ground was supposed to save food kept indoors and the little path around the house was made especially for guarding spirits of the household.This unique house is beautifully decorated with rugsbatik cushions and furniture made of recycled wood ‚Äî a very special holiday accommodation for an adventurous couple.All the facilities are situated in a next building but are used privately by the tenants of the house.

Title: Hobbiehouse - tiny house on Fjone

Title: Architectural wonder in the woods
Description: Unique experience ! Clean/Sanitize and secluded.Enjoy a weekend or a few days eco-friendly retreat in an architecturalgeometric masterpiece on 30 preserved acres just minutes from all that Rhinebeck and the Hudson Valley have to offer.The house is an open planand though it has zero bedroomsit can sleep 3!The spaceThe space.At the entry porchan orb of wood carved out of the house will welcome you into a play of geometry. Situated around one main volume and open to the second levelthe kitchen is placed in the center.There is a futon queen bed1 sleeper futon sofaone single futon bed.Instead of fossil fuelthe house is heated geothermally. Instead of grid powerthe house has electricity from the sun. We are sensitive to the environment and respect its ecological balance.There is A HYBRID HEAT/COLD unit on the2nd floor.The wood stove is highly efficient and keep the space warm in the Hudson Valley winter. Guest have access to a large supply of wood stacked outside the house. (Tip about the stove : Build the fire like a tipi and add wood in a vertical position to make sure the fire will be strong and well maintain).The design allows the air to flow when all the doors and windows are openin addition the floor heat is connected to be cooling in the summer.Outside of the kitchen there is a dinning table with 4 chairs and a Charcoal BBQ (we do not provide charcoal or starter ).We do not accept Pets of any kindguest bringing pets will be charge an extra 200$ cleaning fee.

Title: One of only three Silos in Tennessee on AirBnB!!!
Description: Turner‚Äôs Grain Silo!!! 25 minutes from downtown Nashville: This converted grain silo is absolutely one of a kind!!! In factwe are only 1 of only a few silos in the United States offered by AirBnB!..pretty cool!! Tucked away among the treesyou‚Äôll be able to relax in our unique home. We are just far enough away from the hustle & bustle of the city to rest your mind & bodybut close enough to be able to enjoy all that our great community has to offer!The spaceThe space.SECLUDED! WE ARE NOT IN A NEIGHBORHOOD!!! The inside of the silo is not at all like the exterior! We offer modern conveniences with contemporary style! This labor of love took 5 months & we have put our hearts into every aspect of this silo! Spray foam insulated with central heat & air conditioning! The kitchen is stocked with potspanscooking utensilsdishesa 2-burner stove-topmicrowavefull-sized fridge & an assortment of spices. Lots of snacks including breakfast items are provided. All the toiletries one could imagine are available as well as full-sized shampooconditioner & body wash-high quality toonot the off-brand stuff!! We hope our guests enjoy the serenity of the location & ask that respect is given to other guests on the property. Because of the uniqueness of the structureno children under the age of 13 are allowed to stay.

Title: Pine Needle Treehouse at Tudor in the Pines
Description: TUDOR IN THE PINESHidden amidst the dense foliage of Baguio City‚Äôs pinewood forestTudor in the Pines is a remarkable estate in the Philippines compromising of seven (7) unique residences within a gated propertyaccommodating a maximum of 30 guests. With the convenience of multiple road accesses to and from the cityand to different highland provinces of the Cordilleras. Tudor in the Pines is perfectly located as your home base to travel the Northern wonders of the Philippines.The spaceThe space.The space.Tudor in the Pines features a variety of amenities exclusive to our guest. During your stay in our calm and peaceful estatestroll through our private gardenenjoy a picnic with a fully equipped barbecue pitshare stories around our roaring fire pithave a tea in our Glasshouse Loungeand make memories with our lush pine forest sceneriesmajestic mountain viewsand breathtaking sky views from our Black Tower.PINE NEEDLE TREEHOUSE.Dwell amongst the pine trees across a hanging bridge and timber deck 30 feet above the ground is quite an experience for the adventurous.The Pine Needle treehouse features full view of expansive pine tree forests.Immerse yourselves among the fresh pine trees across the hanging bridge or dine in the timber deck30 feet above the grounda truly unique experience for the adventurous. Within the gated estate of Tudor in the Pinesthe Pine Needle Treehouse can accommodate a MAXIMUM of 2 guests.Guest Reminder: Expect some movement to the treehouse because it is attached to the Hanging bridge.

Title: Cozy Hobbit House on charming Bainbridge Island
Description: ‚ÄúIn a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit. Not a nastydirtywet holefilled with the ends of worms and an oozy smellnor yet a drybaresandy hole with nothing in it to sit down on or to eat: it was a hobbit-holeand that means comfort.‚Äù -J.R.R. Tolkien.Hand-built by our familythis warm and cozy in-hill cabin located in the lower area of our property is something right out of a Tolkien novel. Beautiful territorial views. Very LGBTQ+ and BIPOC friendly. Hope you enjoy our Shire!The spaceThe space.This one room Hobbit Hole has everything in it\s 7.5x15.5\ (cozy): Comfy convertible bed/couch complete with linensa small table with 2 chairs for playing games and eatingpuzzlesgamessnackshot water kettlecoffee makerbluetooth speakerelectric fireplace (warm and cozy) bookssketchpad with colored pencilsand more! A rustic wooden floor (with some paint splatters) and a braided rug give you a feeling of comfort and home. On site we have a private portable bathroom complete with hand-washing stationand an outside combination fire pit and charcoal barbecue with a grill top and s‚Äômores sticks provided so you can cook over a wood fire or coals! And an outdoor table and chairs that are super comfortable!The house itself is heatedinsulatedand has working electricity/outlets for computer or phone charger. Clean bedding and pillows providedwashed in fragrance-free detergent between each guest. We provide a full water jug with spigothot water kettleteapotassorted teasan empty growler to use2 pint glasses and 2 mugs. Private area of the yard with plenty of room to relax. We have a disc golf goal and discs to use as well.Firewood is available for purchase onsite for $7/milk crate full. This comes with a kindling kit.Territorial views of the tree line and sunset views to die for! We are located near Meigs Park as well as a 10-minute walk from Manitou beach and an easy bike ride to the ferry that goes to Seattle! 2 miles from the Grand Forest and 3 miles from Battle Point park. We are exactly 3 miles from the ferry terminal in a convenient mid-island location.NEED TO KNOW (managing expectations):.A note on the bathroom: the hobbit hole is small and will not fit a bathroom or plumbing. Your nearby private portable restroom (about 150 feet away) is cleaned thoroughly between each guest and serviced (pumped out) weekly. We consider our listing to be ‚Äúglamping‚Äù.Also our property borders a local 2 lane highway and you can expect road noise mostly during the day and evening. While it is a private setting you can expect to hear the road. Weekends and evenings it is quieterand when the door is closed it is quiet.There is no cooking inside the Hobbit House however we have a combination fire pit and charcoal BBQ that you can use to cook on. Bring your own dishes.We are on Insta hobbithouse98110 and there are videos of the space to give you a solid look at what is in the space.On you tube we have a nice video giving a tour of the property and the hobbit hole. Look for "Hobbit House Bainbridge Island".The Hobbit House is strictly limited to 2 guests or 2 adults and a small child that can share the bed. The bed is a queen sizeand we can\t allow sleeping on the floor as the door opens inwards and is a safety concern. However,.additional guests are welcome to bring a tent and camp outsidefor $20/tentup to 6 additional guests or 2 tentswhichever is smaller. Let me know when you are booking that you\d like to bring additional guests and we will adjust the costs accordingly.We look forward to hosting you!Guest access.Your own private parking space is about 50 yards from the hobbit house. We have wheelbarrows available to use to for your belongings. Portable potty with hand washing station about 50 yards from the hobbit house."Other things to note.-This is an unusual listingplease read the description thoroughly!.-Additional tent camping available for guests.-Cooler providedarrange for Ice if desired.-We have wheelbarrows for bringing down your belongings.-We do not have WIFI as the Hobbit House is built into the ground. Weve found cell phones work just fine here."

Title: 'Ndida (The True Bushveld Experience)
Description: "Uniquesecluded and very close to the Crocodile RiverNdida is the ideal nature-escape for those who enjoy privacyquality and style. This is the true bushveld experience.The river is just a 1-min walkso listen-out for Hippo and Elephant by dayand Lion and Hyena by night.Two traditional bedrooms (1 queen & 2 single beds) with another queen on the mezzanine ‚Äì house sleeps 6. Two toilets1 bath and 3 showers (2 outdoor).The resident BushbuckWarthog and Bushbaby await your arrival."The space"The space.Architectural gem set deep amongst the treesand only a 1-min walk from the Crocodile Riverand the World-reknown Kruger National Park.Spanning two 2000m2 plotsand bordered on all sides by large areas of pristine bush/parklandthe house offers a level of privacy that is difficult to match anywhere in Marloth Park.The house also sits on the confluence of two dry riverbed systemsso is completely surrounded by densejungle-likeriparian woodland ‚Äì providing much-needed shade in Summerand exceptional privacy all-year-round.But these tangled vines hoisted between mature LeadwoodKnobthorn and Marulas dont only benefit humanstheyre also fantastic cover for birdsand for all the other animals that call Ndida home ‚Äì e.g. Eastern (Yellowspotted) NicatorGiant Plated Lizard andthe nights most enthusiastic guest (and the cutest)the Lesser Bushbaby (who love banana btw).The heated outdoor showers are a must ‚Äì even during the mild Lowveld Winterits a true privilege being out there whilst a troop of Banded Mongoose scurry past on their daily raid (searching for insectsreptiles and rodents).One of the best locations within Marloth Park ‚Äì very close to the Crocodile Riverbut without compromising on privacy. AgainNdida is the true bushveld experience.Ndida launched on 29th October 2018so almost everything inside the house is pretty much still brand newand also top-quality. Please let us know (in your review) if theres anything weve missed from our inventory ‚Äì we want it to be perfect.""Other things to note.IMPORTANT: Marloth Park has a very strict NO NOISE policy ‚Äì this means NO loud musicNO partiesNO shoutingetc. Law-Enforcement and the Community Policing Forum respond to noise complaints immediately with a fine of R3,500.PLEASE NOTE: Power outages / load-shedding is a very serious problem in South Africaand Marloth Park is also being badly affected. Please make sure you bring your own torches and that you locate the candles provided as soon as you arrive at Ndida.Although the bush poses its own dangers and threats to adults (snakesscorpionsetc.)it is obviously even riskier for little ones. In addition (see photos)the property has a partially exposed mezzanine levelstairs (without a banister)a raised swimming pool and raised decked patio (without handrails) ‚Äì so pleaseplease keep a close eye on littler children.Alsoproper wifi coverage hasnt reached the area yetso sadly wifi isnt an option. Alsofor nowwe have decided to keep the environment as natural as possibleso there is no TV or DVD either ‚Äì howeverif our valued guests are critical about this in their reviewswe will obviously do something about it."

Title: Phoenix Earthship - Experience off-grid luxury
Description: The Phoenix OFFICIAL Earthship cannot be compared to any other rental in this world. This home‚Äôs jungle greenhouse creates its own microclimate in the high mountain desert and is completely off-the-gridexquisitely detailed and outfitted with modern amenities. The outer greenhouse features towering banana treesgrape vinesbirdsturtles and even a fish pond. The inner living spaces are cozy and quiet. The Phoenix Earthship was featured in 2014 as one of Lonely Planet‚Äôs Top Ten Eco-Stays.The spaceThe space.The Phoenix is a work of sustainable art that has been featured in countless television shows and print articles. Besides the two bedroomsbathroomskitchen and common area it features:A teeming greenhouse.Fish pond.Birds.Food garden.Earthship-inspired chicken coop and run.Outdoor fire pit with seating.BBQ grill and outdoor eating and sitting areaAll of which exist within the Phoenix complexregardless of the time of year.A cozy fireplace with water fountainfree WiFi and TV with Netflix are also available and like everything in the Phoenixcompletely solar-powered!

Title: ‚ÄúWhimsical Stone Abode‚Äù - Boston Magazine
Description: ‚ÄúThe best possible combination between the postcard-perfect cliffside suites of Santorini (Greece) and a hobbit house..The white stone cottage flows around 900 sfwhich contains a nice bathroomfull kitchenand plenty of nature-inspired furnishings.‚Äù Boston Magazine - Travel.You are the only guests in the domes which are attached to our homea stone cottage with eye brow architecture. Enjoy gardensmeadowwoods and mountain views.We are 25 minutes from Manchester and Bennington VT.The spaceThe space.‚ÄúThe best possible combination between the postcard-perfect cliffside suites of Santorini and a hobbit house.‚Äù Boston Magazine.You will be the only guests! The entire place is yours! The domes feature free WiFia kitchen with microwavestove/ovenrefrigeratordrip and single serve coffee makerteasnacks and a bathroom with heated tile floor. The bedroom has a queen size bed and the full bathroom includes a shower/tubheated tile floorhairdryersoap and shampoo. You will enjoy sitting by the thermostatically controlled propane-fueled ‚Äòwood‚Äô stove when there is a seasonal chill in the air.Guest access.The domes are completely private. You alone have use of the interconnected domes. We live in a completely separate living space. Outside you have access to an outdoor gas grillpatio and our 10 acres of woodland and meadows. Take a walk on the road that leads to the town hall just over a mile away.Other things to note.Check out our Guidebook!.Getting around - 10 minutes to ArlingtonVT25 minutes to ManchesterVT25 minutes to BenningtonVTand less than an hour to Saratoga SpringsNY4.5 hours to NYC and under 4 hours to Boston. The Battenkill River is 3 minutes away for swimmingfishingkayaking and canoeing. Hiking the base or up to the summit of the highest peak in southern VermontMount Equinoxis a popular activity. Afterward head into Manchester at the base of the mountaina great place for brewsdiningart galleries and shopping. The Appalachian Trail is within a 5 minute drive from Manchester. In the winter seasondownhill and X-Country skiing are within an hour. The two closest downhill mountains are Bromley (35 minutes) and Stratton (50 minutes).

Title: 360 degree Himalayas view
Description: Heavot Caves ( Not all those who wander are lost ) will let you enjoy and live a true fairy tale experience it is part of a retreat located at a distance of only 10 km from Shimla . This place is personification of Tranquility surrounded by lush green mountains located perfectly to give you a 360 degree view of the Himalayan mountain ranges . Rarely do you find a retreat that is embodied by the essence of naturetaking your mind off everything that is apparent . Enjoy Peace and serenity .The spaceThe space.Comfy Dome Shaped Room with a lawn in front and surrounded by Himalayan mountain range Our place is surrounded by the whistling pines and the Room are situated in the middle of a green Valley . We are far away from the city hustle- bustle. You will enjoy an exceptional beauty of landscapeincluding birds and a great variety of flora. The scenic viewthe refreshing air and the dazzling sight of the sun descending behind the mountains adds to the solace. It is a perfect getaway and if you are looking for rejuvenation and a surreal experiencethis should be your holiday destination. Space consists of a bedroom with an attached Bathroom the bathrooms are well tiled and fitted with modern Sanitary Ware . everyday toiletries and bath linens are provided . the room has a wall mounted flat screen LED TV and a big lawn in front .Guest access.One Bedroom in a beautiful resort Lawn restaurant Small nature trails around the property Parking Area .

Description: In all seasons it feels good : sweet refuge in wintersunny in summer.Located near the restaurant "Le Chalet suisse" in Balmoral on the heights of Spa (3km)the Lair de l'\Ours will be the ideal starting pointmagnificent walksrelaxation at the Thermes (2km)a part of Golf (500m) or a visit to the famous spa circuit -Francorchamps.The spaceThe space.The den includes a living area with a bed for 2 people (140cm)a fridgean induction hob and a private bathroom with sinkshower and toilet. heating is electric: 1 convector in the bedroom and one in the bathroom. Title: Iconic Union SKYHOUSE with Hood Canal views
Description: "Iconic 1970s PNW home on Alderbrook Creek with Skyroom views of the Hood Canal and Olympic Mountains. Surround yourself in nature with two levels of wrap-around decksor walk amongst the treetops on the Skyroom balcony. This one-of-a-kind home sleeps 11with three bedrooms and 3.5 baths. Perfect for a group retreatfamily getawayor reunion!** Please read all listing descirptions & photo captions before booking instantlyto make sure the space suits your needs. **"The spaceThe space.Recently renovated with modern comforts and decorthis house retained many of the original 1970s fixtures and designs that have been preserved to keep this home as unique as when it was built! At over 2,400 square feetthe Skyhouse features several options for gathering indoors or out. All sleeping spaces have doorsand no bedrooms share wallsallowing for privacy even for large groups. The primary bedroom has a king bed and full sized sofa bed. There are two sleeping spaces on the lower level: a pull out sofa & cot in the "rec room" (which has a door for privacy); and a cozy bedroom with a king bed. There is also a guest suite with a queen bedprivate entrance3/4 bathroomand wet bar. The guest suitemaster bedroom/bathroomkitchenand dining room are all on the main level (for guests who avoid stairs). The climb to the top of the tower is about 98 stepsdepending on where you start your climb. At the topthe Skyroom features 8 foot sliders with views to the northeastand west. Enjoy views from the Skyroom\s wrap-around balcony. There is a half bath just below the Skyroomso you can enjoy the views as long as you\d like!

Title: Heavenly Highlands Mountain Property
Description: A house surrounded by spectacular viewsvegetation and hiking trails in the middle of the mountains of the Central Valley Wind Farm. It is more than a houseit is a unique experience in Costa Rica. You can relax in front of a firepit with breathtaking views of the Pacific Ocean.For breakfast you can enjoy collecting fresh eggs from our chicken cooptotally a unique experience!.Heavenly Highlands is your choice!The spaceThe space.A house surrounded by expectacular views,Guest access.*Private Hike.*Fire Pit.*Chicken coopOther things to note.Key informationAlthough it was very difficult to have internet on the propertywe did it! But on some occasions when there is very heavy rain and dense fogthe signal weakens. Howeverit is momentary and they are the perfect times to disconnect and enjoy nature.The access road to the house is 100% safehoweverthe street is narrow and very steepso it is advisable to drive slowly and with caution. The last kilometer is not paved and it is necessary to come in an SUV (4x4 is not necessary) to facilitate driving. In shortit is the price of being in the middle of nature!

Title: Peacock Tiny House near Las Vegas
Description: We have a unique tiny home located in Sandy Valley NV. One hour outside south Las Vegas off US 15. This is one of two tiny home on a dude ranch with horseback ridingcattle drives and rodeo events ( When available ) Search Sandy Valley Ranch. Come stay at our beautiful desert hideaway. Enjoy the tranquility of the Mojave Desert and gaze at the sea of stars. We are near Death ValleyTecopa hotsprings and GoodSprings home of the famous Pioneer Saloon.The spaceThe space.Our tiny house / the Peacock has a flushing toiletshower with hot watera stovea fridge and a comfortable queen size bed. The couch also pulls out to become a bedit is a little larger then a twin but smaller then a queen. You can enjoy watching the sunset and sitting under a sea of stars from our roof top patio.We do allow pets but charge a $10 pet fee. per night. We ask that you do not leave your pet un attended if you travel off property. We proudly donate a portion of our pet fees to the SPCA.Guest access.Please let us know if you are going to be arriving after check-in so we can give you instructions.Other things to note.Breakfastlunch or dinner can be served in the ranch house next to the tiny house. If you are interested in any meals please let Terry the ranch host know. You can also book a horse back back ride through the desert. Rob and Sandi built own the tiny house and on most days are there for your assistance. It is the most beautiful peace of property with happy helpful staff if needed. Other wisesit backenjoy and come and go as you please. There is $10.00 pet fee per nightm

Title: The Bunkhouse at Love's Hideaway
Description: "Unique stay in the bunkhouse grain bin this bunkhouse is a 15 foot round grain silo that has been transformed into a loft one bedroom tiny homethis tiny home does have natural well water the property is shared with the property owner although you will not see very much of them they will drive in and out of the driveway on the 27 acresyou have your own seating outside with a fire pit area if youre traveling for business or just a nice getaway Come and stay at Loves Hideaway."The space"The space.This one bedroom is a tiny homethough this is uniquethe height upstairs is 5. 7 when you get to the top of the stairs so you do have to lean overso you do not hit your head on the ceiling lightthere is a TV upstairs and one downstairs there is A washer dryer combothe home has everything you need sheetstowelsdishescoffee pota Keurig K-cup silverware pot and pans Due to events that have happened with our farm animals pets are not allowed anymore that includes Service animals we are very sorry for this inconvenience. Also Due to some recent events with some of our guestswe do now have Ring cameras that look on the parking near the tiny housethis is just to see when people come and go there are some trail cams on the walking trails back in the woods to take pictures of the dears."

Title: Enchanted Tree House Concept off of Main st. Tub!
Description: Imagine being immersed in a small enchanted forest only 100‚Äôs of feet off of Main street. Nestled into live oak trees that gently sway in the breezeunder dark skies with bright starsand curated to both inspire joy and create presence.Welcome to our little magical treehouse and landscape resort in Fredericksburg. The amazing stays in our secluded forest are only minutes to all of the beautiful shopscafesrestaurantsbarsand Vineyards.A magical stay that we hope you will love.The spaceThe space.Awe inspiring designed modern Tree house concept surrounded by a magical forest. Imagine laying in the soaker tub perched into the forest as wild turkeys and deer stroll past youa fire pit looking at the starsor relaxing on your private deckThe unit demonstrates immaculate views and a nature immersive experience that will be both exciting and calming. Thousands of Live oak trees across the propertymanicured pathswhimsical evening lights and friendly wildlife bring a sense of wonder and serenity to the space.Our whimsical property offers a community of eight unique structures from treehouses to safari tents to geodesic domes. Scattered about through a 13 acre enchanted forest in town!Privacy inside of the units and after nightfall you should feel very secluded as each unit is 50-200 feet apart.During the day you may see people walking aroundgeneral maintenance happening etcbut if you refer to our reviews the experience is AMAZING.

Title: Round house

Title: Area 51 Futuro house
Description: Free pickup in new TESLA! Starting from late March.This amazing 1974 Futuro house (1 of only 50 in the world) has just been fully restored and is ready to offer you an amazing experience now! : ) the spaceship is massive and offers genuine rare furniture from designers such as verner panton and Luigi colani. The property has a poolspa saunaoutdoor shower-and a 1968 concord caravan for extra sleeping if required! We are also in the process of building a gamesroom/gym. You will be AMAZED.The spaceThe space.25 minutes from Christchurch cbd and Christchurch airport. Amazing 1974 Futuro house which has been restored Meticulously to its original condition with no expense spared. Beautiful large landscaped grounds with swimming poolspa pooloutdoor sauna and outdoor shower plus many other amazing retro/vintage items scattered around the property including the 1970s/80s McDonald‚Äôs playground! You will feel like you have been transported back in time yet into the future !Guest access.Electric entrance gates into the property (very private and secure)Other things to note.Free pickup and drop off from Christchurch airport in a brand new black TESLA if you book for two nights or more! This service will be available beginning at the end of March.

Title: slube am Stadthafen Neustrelitz // slube Home
Description: Excellent location at Neustrelitz harbouryet an exceptional adventure ambience: the slubes not only offer functional comfortbut also a new experience with an original atmosphere.The space"The space.More comfortable than thought and at the same time an intelligent space miracle - thats what the slube Home could be called. After allwho would have thought that there would be a double bedseating areasa table and a separate bathroom with shower and toilet in the two-storey slubes?The minihotel has sealed windowsis sound- and heat-insulated and can also be heated comfortably on cooler days.In the lower area there is a seating area and a small but fully equipped bathroom. A staircase leads to the upper floor of the sludgeon which the double bed is located.Free Wi-Fi is available everywhere. In additionyou can control light and heating in the slube via your own mobile phone with the slube app.If you are looking for modern accommodation in a unique atmosphereslubes am Stadthafen Neustrelitz is the place to be."

Title: Naust by the lake on Sokn,  Stavanger
Description: "Naustet is brand new and part of the marine environment towards Soknasundet. Its a jetty with fishing opportunities. There is also an RV rental (300.- /day) in addition to the necessity.Guest access.Lodging rooms downstairs are available from the outdoor area. Exclusive use can be agreed.

Title: Guard Tower #2 with Pool
Description: The ULTIMATE "Tiny House" experience! Featured on HGTV: The Castle House Estate Guard Tower brings Tiny Home living to another levellocated in the heart of Joshua Tree and minutes from the National Park. This unique medieval piece of architecture blends indoor-outdoor living with an emphasis on entertaining. The Castle House Estate is situated on eight picturesque acressurrounded by many more private undeveloped acres.The space"The space.Guard Tower 23 LEVELS ¬∑ 1 BED ¬∑ 120 SQFThe Castle House Guard Tower is a custom three level living space & loft. Each piece of furniture has been custom made to fit this unique round space which includes a queen sized bed in the loft. Did we mention 1500 thread count sheets and Pure Care Plush memory foam pillows?The full glass door and windows have been placed strategically to catch the desert light.For outside adventurers step up to the rooftop hatch to enjoy your views or bring your sleeping bags and sleep under the stars. ***WEATHER PERMITTING***Each tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning fire-pit and two chairs perfect for enjoying the outside elements of Joshua Tree & where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast smores. Each tiny home includes it own outdoor wood burning fire-pitgrill top and two chairsperfect for enjoying the outside elements of Joshua Tree & where you can enjoy a few cold ones and roast smores. Included in each tower is a mini-refrigerator and Nespresso coffee maker. The restroom facility is just 20 steps away and has two private toiletstwo hand sinks and urinal. Two outside showers and one outdoor sink. Nothing can be compared to showering outside with 365 degree views of The National Park.Instagram: @TheCastleHouseEstate"

Title: Beautiful, Secluded Private Mountain-Top Modern Retreat, Dog-Friendly with Hot Tub and AMAZING Views
Description: "Retreat to your own privatemodern oasis with the best views in all of Tennessee. Perched on top a private 36-acre hilltop (the highest outside the Park!)Belltop offers unparalleled views of Wears Valley and the Smoky Mountains. With 360-degree views from floor-to-ceiling windows and a rooftop walkwayyou wont miss a single sunset! Unplug and unwind as you sit in your private hot tub or curl up in front of the stunningopen-hearthwood-burning fireplace. Perfect for families or friends."The space"The space.This custom-builtmodern 4 bedroom/2.5 bath house sleeps up to 6 guests. A secludednatural retreat -- perfect for couplesfamiliesreunionsor small groups of friends. Perched atop a private 36-acre hillthe house offers spectacular views of the Smoky Mountains and the valleyboth indoors and outdoors.Guests will take the private driveway to the top of the hill. Please notethe driveway is gravelwindyand reasonably steep -- so anxious or new drivers may not be comfortable -- andin the winterguests should plan to arrive in 4-wheel or all-wheel drive automobiles. As you pull up to the houseyoull catch a glimpse of the beautiful views the house offers.Step inside the front door into the modernopen-concept living room. Anchored by a beautifulopen-hearth fireplace and framed by panoramic floor-to-ceiling windowsthe living room offers plenty of room to relaxunwindand catch up with friends. It is complete with a pianorecord playerlibraryand a selection of games for guests to enjoy. The living room opens up to the dining area and the kitchen. Youll find stunning views from all three areas. The exterior walls of the room are all glassand there are several doors to the patio and yard for easy indoor-outdoor living. An outdoor grill and dining table are perfect when the weather is nice. Behind the kitchen is a small laundry roomwhich guests are welcome to useand there is also a half bath off the living room.Want to see the best views? Take the spiral stairwell next to the front door to the observation deck. Step outside at the topand take in the best views in Tennessee! With unblocked360-degree viewsyou can see the whole area. Because the stairs are long and there are open areas on the observation deck (see photos)guests with mobility issues and young children should skip the observation deck. Dont worry -- the views at main level are incredible too!Step off the living room or walk down the hall to access the master suite. Featuring floor-to-ceiling windowsa custom king-sized bedexpansive closet spaceand a spacious bathroomthe master suite is a perfect retreat. The master suite offers the best access to the hot tubwhich is neatly tucked away on the private patio.Beyond the master suiteguests enter the second half of the housewhich is home to three additional bedroomsa full bathroomand a play/lounge loft. A small bedroom at the frontwith a twin-sized daybedis a great option for a younger guest. At the backthere are two additional king-sized bedroomseach with a private patio. They share a full bathwhich has a separate bathing roomso multiple guests can use the facilities at the same time. In the hallway between the bedroomsthere is a metal staircase (see photos -- not ideal for bad knees or toddlers)which leads to a secluded loft space -- perfect for teensit offers a variety of gamesa televisionand a sleeper sofa.We aim to deliver the most comfortable stay possible. All of our beds are equipped with new memory foam mattresseswhich promise wonderful nights sleep."Guest access.24/7 no-contact self check-in.House access is via electronic lockso guests will be allowed to come and go at their convenience.Because of the drivewaywe do recommend guests try to plan their arrival during the daylight hours. While certainly not impossibleit can be a bit uncomfortable climbing the driveway for the first time at night.Other things to note.Internet: The house is on intended to be a retreatoffering guests an option to unwind and unplug. The house is remote and does NOT have unlimited internet. While there is wifiwe generally ask guests to keep its use to a minimum. If you are planning to do a lot of online work or streaming during your staythis may not be the best option for you.Pets: Well-behavedhouse-trained dogs are welcome. Howeverbecause dogs create a bit more mess and require more cleaning timethere is an additional pet fee of $20 per dog per night. You can include your pets as adults in your guest countor if your pets push your total guest count over our maximum (6)please let us knowand we will send a separate request after booking for the pet fee. We do ask that guests: (1) clean and pick up after their pets while on the property and (2) do not leave their pets unattended for extended periods of time. If you bring your petyou are also assuming full responsibility for them and any damage they may cause. Additional cleaning or repair fees may apply if your pet is destructive.Guest Count: Please make sure your guest count is accurate and includes all guests (including children) who will be joining you during your stayas your guest count will affect the price of your stay. We welcome groups of up to 6 people. The nightly rate reflects the price for our standard occupancy1. For each additional guest beyond the first (up to 6total)we charge an additional guest fee of $20 to cover additional cleaningutilitiesand wear and tear.Parties: We do not allow parties at the house. No guestsoutside of those included in the reservationare permitted on the property during your stay. Please make sure that your guest count accurately reflects the number of people you have invited to the property with you. If you plan to have additional guests for only a portion of your stayplease let us know so that we can adjust the guest fee accordingly.

Title: Panoramic Views & Dog Heaven at The Silo!
Description: Welcome to The Silo. Once grain storage bins on a working dairy farmthese twin silos have been re-purposed into a brand new 2-story living space in the heart of the Bitterroot Valley. Three out of four original generations still make their home on this location which is transitioning from a full-time dairy farm to a host property. Acres on which to roam with your dog leash free (pet fee)a pond stocked with fishincredible sceneryand delightful small towns strung along the HWY 93 awaits!The space"The space.As much privacyor interaction as you choose. Optional activities for booking: English Afternoon Tea in The Parlor Tearoom on premises.TO NOTE: The Silo is situated on an 80+acre lot that is home to the hosts family and one rental tenant. While your time here can be as private or interactive as you chooseplease be aware that there will be other peopledogs and automobiles coming in and out of the property."Guest access.Guest are free to roam the 80 acre property with dogs. Please note that you many encounter other wildlifepeople and pets.Other things to note.There is a nominal fee per pet per visit which will be requested once your booking is confirmed. More details under ‚ÄúHouse Rules‚Äù.
