Title: WORLDS GREATEST BEACH HOUSE
Description: WORLDS GREATEST BEACH HOUSEThe space"The space.Southern California is more than just a lifestyleit is a vibea connectiona mood and most of all a glorious undertaking in enjoying all life has to offer in a great climate bounded by sunsurf and sand. We humbly submit that if you rent this homeyou will agree that from the desert to the sea throughout the entire state there isquite simplyno finer home to experience the dream of southern California. Buckle up folksyou are about to enter the Water Tower Experience.(For a video of the homeplease click on the video box in the photo montage)The name says it all ‚Äì THE WATER TOWER - for the those unfamiliar with perhaps the most famous beach-front landmark in all of Californialet‚Äôs start with a little history. Located in one of Americas tallest ground to ceiling residential structures and serviced by a commercial elevator that whisks you upwards of close to one hundred feet in the sky; this almost 3,000 square foot home wasin factsouthern Californias first man-made tourist attraction. Long before Knotts and Disneylandindeedbefore the first automobile was registered in Orange Countythe Water Tower stood marveled at by visitors and locals alike as a wonder of engineering and architectural bravado.As for the structureit stands over 85 feet tall and has three stories with windows on all sides. This amazing home is beyond well-appointedit has been professionally renovated and decorated with first class amenitiesappliancesthousand-thread count linens and top-shelf accoutrementsso that your experience in southern California beach living is not only first-class in every conceivable waybut a memory you treasure forever. No detail has gone unnoticed as the owners endeavored to create a home that will reward every person who enters an indelible lifetime memory. The interior designers charge was simple; pay tribute to the history of the Water Tower and when finished we wanted every guest who stays in the home to leave and tell everyone they know about the magic of the Water Tower Experience. As you can see from the photoswe believe the decorators and designers hit this one out of the park. The home has two garagesan elevatorfour bedroomsthree and one-half bathroomsa fully stocked kitchenbarlaundry room and the most amazing living room you will likely ever encounter with 360 degree views of southern California and beyond.Now that we have the structure out of the waylet‚Äôs get to the fun stuff ‚Äì the Water Tower Experience ‚Äì as natives knowthe debate has raged for years over what is more ‚ÄúSo Cal‚ÄùOrange County and its miles of pristine beaches or LA with a bit more trafficbut mountains and beaches and a whole lot of glitz. As you enter the Water Tower Experience this won‚Äôt be an issue ‚Äì you are part of both. Tower localshowevermight argue as to whether or not she resides in Sunset Beach or Seal Beach as they both claim her. It really doesn‚Äôt matter asmake no mistake about itwhilelike the beachesthe Water Tower belongs to all Californians. It is the love child of Sunset Beachbut Seal Beach is very much the proud Father. As you stand on the sidewalkplease take a moment to look up and take in the grandeur of this magnificent 19th century landmark which was once the tallest structure in Orange County and today stands as the second tallest residential home in the United States.As you enter you will see the fine artwork on the doors and plaque detailing some of the history of this home which was built to service the railroads in the last half of the 1800‚Äôs as the steam engines required a tremendous amount of water to power the locomotives. The Tower could hold up to 75,000 gallons of water which weighed over 37 tons so don‚Äôt worry about whether or not the she is strong enough to support your family. The entry way is a tribute to the Tower and the workers who built her. From vintage tools and a water fall to the Burlaps and Barrels bathroom you will feel the history of the Water Tower as soon as you cross the threshold into a home experience like non-other. You will also be introduced to the tower mascot ‚Äì Mr. Wally Tower. As your stay unfoldsenjoy finding the hidden ‚ÄúWally‚Äôs‚Äù around the home. There are several intriguing finds on this floor including a bedroom with a ‚Äúsecret‚Äù room located behind a bookshelf (where some folks believe the ghost of Wally resides). After taking in the entry levelget in the elevator and start your stay.On the second floor you will be thrilled to find a wonderful loungedining area and fully stocked kitchen with all new state of the art appliances and cookware. The view is nothing short of stunning as walls are in fact mostly windows revealing the entire Pacific Ocean. Slide open the doors and walk around the entire tower or simply sit on the deck and enjoy the view of the beach and Catalina. This is the lowest indoor floor of the Water Toweryet you are still 60 feet in the air with a majestic view. Throughout the Tower you will find a number of treats and architectural gems including magnificent stained glass windows and custom wood-work. This floor is no exception. Look up at the ceiling or simply give a listen for the whistle of the trains circling around the ceiling. These trains are replicas of those serviced by the Water Tower over a century ago. The lounge has not only amazing scenerybut we believe some of the most comfortable chairs you will ever have the pleasure of sitting in as you enjoy the view and your stay. This floor also hosts a bedroom with bunk beds dedicated and decorated in recognition of a little know part of California history ‚Äì Pirates. That‚Äôs rightPirates. SpecificallyHippolyte Bouchard who after raiding Montereyplundered Mission San Juan Capistrano while cruising up and down the coastline.A short trip up the beautiful winding staircase leads to the two master suites. Facing towards Los Angeles you will find the Whale Lovers Bedroom with a view of Huntington HarborBay of Los Angeles and White‚Äôs Point which is the land jetting-out from the end of San Pedro to form the outline of our Los Angeles coastline. This room not only has all new fine linenbut a world class shower sunken with an equally impressive view to enjoy while you experience this wonderful rain shower. On the other side of the floor you will find the Dolphin Bedroom with a view towards Huntington and Newport Beaches. We think you will find this suite equally impressive with unapparelled views and a bathroom shower with a view of the San Gabriel Mountains. All bedrooms are equipped with brand new HD televisions with Direct TV.Now it is time to journey to the top floor or Rotunda Room of the Water Tower. This room which stands over 80 feet above sea level offers a 360-degree view of all of southern California. From the Hollywood sign to San Clemente Island for as far as the eyes can see you will have an unobstructed view. If for some reason that is not enough for youwe have numerous magnifying devices including a custom-made viewfinder so if you are curious about what the crew of a passing sailboat looks likejust zoom in and take a gander. The room itself is designed to entertain and be enjoyed by up to 20 people. There are four large screen curved HD televisions so you can watch all the games. Or if you simply want to sit on the custom leather chairs or new couch and enjoy the view then don‚Äôt forget to take in the 100 gallon fish tank or be certain to look up at the stain glass ceiling. As you look up you will see propellers. Those too are part of the history of the tower and its unique role as a coastal landmark during World War II. This floor includes a custom barvideo station with over 600 different games and a lifetime of breathtaking views.Now that you have seen a glimpse of the inside of the Water Tower Experiencewe invite you to think about spending a little time on the exterior. Just a few short steps and you will find yourself on an elevated outdoor deck 50 feet above the ground with everything you need to enjoy the views and the beach without stepping off the lot. The deck boasts not only a jacuzzi and BBQbut also the amazing Breakfast Bar perfect to take in the sunrise orour favoritethe Sunset Bar which provides perhaps the best view of the sunset over Catalina in all the land. Indeedwe would put a view of the sunset from the Water Towerup against any other on the planet ‚Äì it is that spectacular.Of coursewe do not expect you to spend all of your beach vacation indoors so we have provided beach cruisersstand up paddleboardsbody boards and an array of beach toys. While you are less than 50 yards from the beachwe also provide a wagon so you can pack your toys for an easy jaunt to one of the best beaches on could ever hope to enjoy."

Title: Leafy Greens Chiangmai : Mushroom M4
Description: Leafy Greens was built as a retreat center for our family and friends. It is where people would visit to refreshing their souls and mind. We work so hard to make this place to be one of the place that we can live in harmony with nature. That is why the cob houses are the right choice for us. Not only the buildings are eco-friendly but also the garden is organic. Visit here you will be able to take a deep breath and enjoy the fresh air with organic environment. It is a perfect place to getaway!!The space"The space.This clay house was built for meditation course and It was designed for people to learn being with themselves that is why the function of the house is simple. The house is 35 square meter with essential facilities. It might be considered as a tiny houseyet it‚Äôs comfortable for 3 people living together. It got 2 stories:-2 futons on upper area and 1 bed on the ground floor. The entire of the house was made by clay (earth)it is not only eco-friendly building but also good for our health. We believe that our body will absorb good energy from the earththis means earthy house brings you close to nature and eliminate bad energy out. It is very special house for ustoo special actually to keep it only for family and friends so we decided to share our paradise to everyone. Hope you would love it like we do.DO NOT CLICK ON THE AIRBNB LINK FOR DIRECTIONS.Please only use our provided location to get hereotherwiseyou might end up to other places.PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR PLACE SURROUNDED BY NATURE.Our place is full of flowers and treesyou might see part of nature like birdscricketsfrogslizardsbutterfliesbugs and insects in our gardendont worrythey are harmless. Howeverif you are afraid of these creaturesour place might not suit you. We do not offer refunds if those creatures comes into the house but we will check the house before guests check in to make sure there is no any bugs and we have insect netplease keep it close every time during stay.Please note that clay house has a thick wall and the clay is blocked the internet receptionso the internet might get slow sometime.Please note that we are not hotel so we do not have reception to help you 24hr. Howeveryou would do our best to help you out. To check-init is very important to read out message thoroughly in order to have a smooth arrive.We have cat in our property. If you are allergic to cat or do not like themour place might not a good fit for you.If more people than the number declared at the time of booking stayed the roomadditional fee and penalty will be charged.(Children over 3 years old is also count as 1 person).No commercial photography shoots allowed"

Title: Ocotillos Village A-Frame | Stargazer Lyra
Description: "Ocotillos Village is a truly unique camping experience located right in the heart of Terlingua. Our A-frame wooden tents are equipped with a door and ceiling made of plexiglass that allows you to stargaze at night and see incredible views of the Chisos mountains in the day! Best sunrise youll see!"The spaceThe space.This is a great stay to enjoy a comfortable night under the stars. The view is absolutely incredible! This is a wooden A-frame structurewith a roof made of plexiglass to stargaze in comfort at night. The wall facing the mountains (which includes the door)is all made of plexiglass as wellfor an amazing view of the mountains.Please note: Make sure you bring what you need. We do not provide linens or bedding for your stay - please bring your own.IMPORTANT: This Stargazer is further from the bathhouse than some of our other Stargazers. The distance from the Stargazer to the bathhouse is about 300 feet. You are more than welcome to drive down to the bathhouse and use the parking lot near there if needed. This Stargazer is closer to the street than our other Stargazers so there could be more road noise.There is wifi on the propertybut it can be spotty in the Stargazer.The space includes:.Queen mattress with mattress protector (no linens/bedding)electricitymini split AC/heat unitmini-fridgesingle k-cup coffee makerk-cups (no mugs or water)rugLED lightsfire pitshared bath house with hot showers (2 indoor and 1 outdoor) and 4 flushing toilets.The space does NOT include:.Pillowsbed linenstowelscoffee mugschairsflashlightsfoodsoapscooking suppliescleaning supplies.There is no lock on the inside of the Stargazerbut has a rope latch from the outside and inside to close it.

Title: The Silos at Prairie Vale- lil Silo on the Prairie
Description: Come experience TINY HOME living SILO STYLE on a family owned Missouri farm.. complete with Nigerian Dwarf goatsminiature donkeychickensand more.The Silos at Prairie Vale are between SedaliaMissouri and the little town of Green RidgeMissouri. The farm is only about 12 miles from the Missouri State Fairgrounds in Sedalia and 2 1/2 miles on paved road from the Katy Trail.The spaceThe space.The silo apartment has a full kitchen with a refrigeratormicrowavestoveand some utensils/ pans. There is a kuerig coffee maker along with a selection of coffeeteaor other beverage pods for you to enjoy. The silo has its own onsite bathroom with a showerlinensand hairdryer for guests to use. There is a double bed in the loft and a futon that expands into a second double bed on the lower level. The silo will comfortably sleep four people. Please use caution as you ascend and descend the staircase. It was made to fit the space available and the steps have varying widths."Guest access.Guest check-in is flexible. The silo will be open and ready for registered guests on their arrival. We live on the farm and are only a few yards away. Please do not hesitate to call on us for anything that you might need. We would love to visit with you. You are welcome to come to the farm house. Wendy LOVES teaso we have a coffee and tea bar in the kitchen. Wendy has every flavor of tea imaginable and she is always brewing a pot (coffee is available too) for anybody who wants to share one with her. We have a large library of movies for guests to borrow. Guests are welcome to sit on the patio or on the big wrap around porch and play with our outdoor farm cats (they are VERY FRIENDLY!).We have several bikes that Katy Trail riders can rent for the day. We also have fishing poles that can be borrowed if fishing in the pond sounds fun. There is a fire pit by the pond that guests can use. We have roasting forks that can be borrowed..and probably the makings for smores..if our youngest daughter hasnt eaten all the Graham crackers."

Title: StarsBOX in the Alpi Marittime Natural Park
Description: The StarsBOX¬Æ is located on the shores of Lago delle Portette at an altitude of 2388 metersin the heart of the Maritime Alps Natural Park. The access path starts at Terme di Valdieriand it takes about 3 hours to reach the StarsBOX¬Æ. Once you reach the E. Questa mountain refugeyou will be welcomed by the Host Marco who will show you the way to reach your StarsBOX¬Æjust a few minutes away. The shelter near the StarsBOX¬Æ offers a kitchen and access to services.The spaceThe space.StarsBOX¬Æ strives to embody a lighter and more conscious way of experiencing naturethanks to its immersive design. StarsBOX¬Æ is more than just a shelter: it combines the concept of home with travel and represents a box of dreamswhere you can admire the stars and experience a fresh new dawn. Part tent and part hutit offers shelter but can open to the sky to reveal all the beauty nature has to offer.Guest access.From the parking lot of Terme di Valdieri an hour-long hike along a dirt road leads to the Rifugio Valascoonce a hunting fort of the kings of Italy. From here the road continues as a mule track up to an altitude of about 2000 meters whereat a larch treea path branches off to the left and leads to the E. Questa mountain refuge. The walk from the parking lot of Terme di Valdieri takes about 3 hours in total.From the larch tree it is also possible to continue on the mule track and reach the refuge with a less steep but longer path passing by the lower lake of Valscura; the walking time is about one hour longer.Other things to note.Mountain trails can be difficult for inexperienced hikers. Be sure to take a look at the trail before you begin your adventure and bring a printed mapas cell phones may not work.

Title: Seaside getaway in √ñ√∂d mirror house
Description: √ñ√∂d house is an ideal getaway for couples. Very isolated location with sea view creates a special kind of vibe. Great hiking trails or option to go horseback riding nearby offer plenty of opportunities for enjoying the scenic outdoors.We are located an hour car drive away from Tallinnin a tiny seaside village called Alliklepa on the North coast of Estonia. Here you will find an ideal mix of lush forests with plenty of hiking trails or seaside with sandy beaches ideal for swimming.The spaceThe space.√ñ√∂d mirror house is one of the most unique experiences you can imagine for being one with nature while at the same time enjoying all the comforts of a tiny cabin. The 18 m2 house has full glass windows on three sidesgiving you a panoramic view to the surrounding nature straight from bed. The house has a comfy bed for twoa fireplaceremotely controlled floor and air heating systemswater toileta shower. Fully equipped tiny kitchen with refrigerator and a stove for cooking gives you the perfect opportunity to spend undisturbed time here without leaving to the city for days.Other things to note.Make sure you have enough food and drinks to fully enjoy your stay as the closest shop is 20min drive away. Tap water is perfectly drinkable.

Title: Spend Ski Season at Sypes Canyon Adventures Silo 2
Description: Welcome to the Sypes Canyon Silos! This listing is for silo #2 on the right side. Located just 5 miles from downtown Bozeman8 miles from Bozeman/Yellowstone Airportand 2 miles to the conveniences of TargetCostcoand other big box storesthe Silos exude the quiet of the country life. Nestled at the base of a ridge in the Bridger foothillsyou have easy access to both Bozeman and the great outdoors.Bridger Bowl-18mi.Big Sky-48mi.Yellowstone-90miThe space"The space.Whats more unique than sleeping in a former grain silo? Cozy and eclecticthis unit has all the comforts and conveniences you need to enjoy your time in Bozeman. WifiSmart TVfull kitchenwasher/dryer. Please note that there is a short ladder to access the bedroom/loft space (imagine a 5 rung stair/ladder hybrid).The silo on the left can be combined with this one."Guest access.Full unit and patiohiking trails on 42 acre propertyfire pitvisit with the animals!Other things to note.Please keep in mind that all beds are in the same space: 1 queen1 full size sofa sleeperand 1 floor mattress that is actually a foam floor chair that flips into a single bed. Alsothe ceiling height in the bedroom is much lower near the walls. Please mind your head!

Title: Quirky land boat close to the beach with donkeys!
Description: Nesbitt is a land boat set in its own private gardenoverlooked by 3 donkeys. She has electricityfull cookingtoilet and showering facilities on boardalbeit all quite compact!.Ideally suited for a couple or small family.A peaceful and quite getaway surrounded by animalstrees & farmland just 10 mins drive from Kinsale and 5 mins from some fantastic beaches. An ideal base for exploring the south of Ireland. Somewhere quirky and different. Great for little ( & big) imaginations.The spaceThe space.Nesbit is a 37ft land based boat. She was destined for the scrap heap but we completely transformed her over an 18 month period. Almost everything in her has been recycled. She is brightcosy and a funky little place to stay to enjoy the beautiful local countryside. She has full self-catering facilities. There is a bedroom with a triangular shaped double beda galley kitchen with sinkhobgrillmicrowavekettletoasterand small fridge. The living space has a comfortable seating area with a table that converts to a single bed suitable for an adult. Also on board is a bijou bathroom/wetroom with toiletwash hand basin and electric shower.The living space is all on one level. There is electric heating in the boat so it is suitable for winter living. There is a big private garden area with the boat with a picnic bench and sand pit.Guest access.The boat with its own private garden overlooked by donkeys.and the occasional cow. There is an electric fence between the boat garden and donkey field and we would ask guests not to enter the field with the donkeys.Other things to note.Nesbitt is available on a self catering basis only.The table in the seating area converts to make a single bed.The ceilings in parts of the boat are a little low.A travel cot is also available if you need one.We are happy to accept a small to medium sized dog in the boat but we would be grateful if they did not sleep on the furniture and are kept on a lead at all times as we have donkeyscattle and free roaming hens in close proximity.

Title: Beachfront retreat with a private hot tub, WiFi, AC, shared pool & lagoon views!
Description: The space"The space.*Gold Standard CertifiedMake your Belize getaway truly unforgettable when you stay at this unique Placencia vacation rental. Situated right on the lagoon and 50 yards from the beachand boasting upscale amenitiesincluding a shared poolthis vacation rental is perfect for a couplesmall familyor a solo traveller.The newly constructed Swan Villas complex sits within a mile of fantastic restaurants like Maya Beach Bistro and a supermarket for home cooking. Its about seven miles from Placencia Villagewhere youll find more restaurantsbarsand grocery stores. Spend an afternoon lounging by the pool before putting on your snorkel gear and getting into the ocean.This villas intriguing organic architectural style is sure to delight you and your loved one. Its designed to mimic the harmony between nature and humanity. The open-concept kitchen is well equipped for cookingso you can easily put together a romantic dinner for two. This home also has a private washer/dryer and hot tub. Theres a half bathroom on this floor; head upstairs to find the bedroom and the breathtaking naturalistic shower. If youre travelling with another group of travellersplease be aware that you can rent several suites within the Swan Villas together.The romantic Belize getaway of your dreams starts with this exquisite one-bedroom vacation rental. Make your reservation today!*The twin bed is not a mattress but a foldable cushion meant for children.*Please note that the property has a security guard at night and security cameras at the common areas in the property.Parking Notes: There is free parking for 1 vehicles. There is a parking lot in the propertyabout 30 yards from this unit.Dock Details: Shared floating dock at the propertyNo dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval."

Title: Striking contemporary by Andrew Geller
Description: The Antler HouseStriking contemporary by Andrew Geller3BR/2BA w/ large outdoor entertaining deckgreat roomone-of-a-kind vacation experienceDesigned and built by famed architectAndrew Gellerin 1968the Antler House was fully restored and updated in 2019 and has been featured in Dwell Magazine (Nov/Dec 2019)DesignBoomArchinectCurbedetc. The home also won an AIA Honor Award for restoration in 2020. The house has never been offered for rent and is a true gem for lovers of midcentury modern architecture and design. You can expect a \one of a kind\ vacation experience in this internationally recognized architectural masterpiece with impeccable interior design including designer finishesperiod correct detailsand . The way the Hamptons was supposed to be with a focus on escapismback to nature and total privacy. The home is like living in your own Wes Anderson movie with it\s whimsicaladventurouseven wild spirit. It is one of a handful of Andrew Geller houses that still exist in the Hamptons and one of a few that have been restored to better than new condition. The Antler House is a 3-story3-bedand 2-bath with a large outdoor entertaining deck. An \upside down\ house with two bedrooms on the first floora great room and entertaining deck up on the second story and surrounded by a forest canopyand a private 3rd story loft bedroom up above the tree tops. Just a few blocks from the beachbut nestled in a woodsy forestthe home is the best of both worlds - a modernist beach house and a cozy cabin. Title: TAMANCO TUBISMO
Description: Sleep in the roundwake up with songbirds and sunshine in our Tubismo Tube. We transformed eight reclaimedconcrete tubes into cosy rooms with a view. Plunge into our saltwater poolescape to our garden-like campground and embrace the fresh air and a great night‚Äôs sleep under a starry night sky. Wether you are seeking refugelooking to meet other travelers or hang out with friends: we have the right vibe for you!The spaceThe space.Tamanco is a campground hostel in the green heart of the Costa da Pratabetween Porto and Lisbon. A unique base to explore the center of Portugal. Visit the many special monuments and places in the regionbrowse local marketsdiscover Portuguese cuisine and drink ‚Äòum caf√©zinho‚Äô in one of the many pastelarias. Go hiking in pristine green or along the secluded beaches or endless sand dunes that stretch from Figueira de Foz to Nazar√©which with the highest waves in the worldcan rightfully be called the mecca for surf enthusiasts."Guest access.A Cantina Caf√© & Eatery: a meeting point for everyone!.We serve home made comfort food at ‚ÄòA Cantina‚Äôour onsite caf√© and eatery. You can also check out our ‚Äòmake your own pizza nights‚Äôor join in for our ‚Äòfree soup for everyone‚Äô evenings. Fancy just a drink at the fireplace? You are more than welcome.Tamanco Tubismo comforts :.- Pick up service for travelers by train.- Communal outdoor kitchen with BBQ.- Saltwater pool.- Wi-Fi.- Laundry service.- Bread delivery.- Books and boardgames.- Farm grown fruits and vegetables for sale.- Fridges for rent"

Title: A Unique Spring Retreat near the Beach
Description: Spring is a magical time to visit the Outer Banks!Relaxenjoy the beach and the quiet at the unique Retro Round House. An all inclusive beach experience.A perfect place to escape for a romantic getaway or to spend fun time with friends and family. Located only 100 yards from the beach path!Your stay includes use of 2 beach bikes2 kayaksa surf board4 skim boardsbeach cart and coolerand beach chairs. Everything you need to enjoy your vacation. Almost Home!The space"The space.During Peak Season: CHECK-IN ON FRIDAY and avoid the typical change-over traffic in the Outer Banks! The Retro Round House is just a 2.5 hour drive from the D.C. area.This is the perfect space for a family or 3 couples to enjoy time together. The 3 bedroom 2 bathroom beach house is cozyabout 850 square feetbut very well laid out for maximum family fun and interaction. Howeverthis little Round House is limited to 6 people!The Round House is a place to relax! Yetif you need to workwe have reliable/highspeed WIFI for your use. Yesyou can get away from it all and stay connected at the same time.You will find the open floor plan funinviting and incredibly comfortable.THE KITCHENThe fully stocked kitchen features a large family dinning area with banquet seating.~Propane Stove/Oven.~Dishwasher.~SMEG Drip Coffee Maker.~Tea Kettle.~Coffeeteasugarcream.~Coffee Bean Grinder.~Microwave.~Toaster.~All Clad Pans.~Crock Pot.~Mixing Bowls.~Roasting Pans.~Cutting Boards.~Charcuterie Board.~Wooden SpoonsTongs etc.~Blender.~SaltPepperCommon SpicesOlive Oil.~Dishtowels.~Pot Holders.~Paper Towels.~Dish Soap.~Dishwasher Soap.~Washing Machine and Dryer.~Washing Machine Soap.~Sponges.~Garbage BagsThe comfy living space features an electric fireplaceturntable and a large screen Art TV. We also supply gamesbooks and video arcade table!OUTDOOR SCENEOutsidewe created wonderful seating areas so you can enjoy time listening the wavesgazing at the stars and enjoying the sun and the fresh air!~Large screened in porch featuring hanging chairs a dining table and bar area.~A deck featuring 2 Hatteras Hammock Rocking chairsa high top table with 2 chairs.~Lower deck with unique built in Hammock for star gazing!.~Large yard for outdoor games. Corn Hole Supplied!.~Big Green Egg Grill charcoal supplied.~Gas Grill.~Gas Fire Tower to keep you warm on cool nights.~Out Door Shower for 2.~Outdoor sinkfridge and fish cleaning station.TOY CLOSET.~2 Beach Bikes.~2 Kayaks.~910 Soft Top Surf Board.~2 Boogie Boards.~4 Skim Boards.~6 Beach Chairs.~Cooler.~Big Tire Beach Wagon.~2 Shade Tents.~Kites.~Corn Hole.~Sand ToysLOCATIONWe are located in the town of SalvoNC in the Outer Banks. This is a quiet beach community where you will find some of the most beautiful beaches and scenery in the world. The Round House is located only 100 yards from the beach access path. A short easy walk.PETSWe love dogs and can host one dog. There will be a $100 pet fee. Unfortunatelywe cannot allow cats because of a severe family allergy."Guest access.The Round House is located in an ideal neighborhood setting. Kids can safely ride their bikesskateboards or scooters and you can take a nice jog around our sleepy two mile loop.AlsoSalvo has a wonderful walking/bike path so your can ride bikes to the day use area or to one of several wonderful local restaurants.As for the BEACH..We are only 100 yards from the beach path on the ocean side of the street. No roads to cross. You can hear the waves from our deck!Other things to note.1. Hurricanes are a possibility. Please understand this when you book your vacation rental. We do not provide refunds due to Hurricane evacuation. Howeverwe will work with you by providing mid-season complimentary days to match days missed if an evacuation occurs.2. We suggest paying for your reservation with an American Express Card. Several American Express Cards will cover the cost of your trip should a Hurricane evacuation become necessary.3. We do allow dogs with a 100 dollar pet fee. Unfortunatelywe cannot allow cats because of a family allergy.4. The Round House does require climbing steps. As is true of most beach homes in the areathe house sits on pilings.5. The Wifi in the Round House is suitable for remote work to include Zoom calls.

Title: Yome Away from Home
Description: Come experience glamping at its finest in our beautiful yome! (FYIglamping is still campingjust a little more comfy!) Locally madea yome is a yurt/geodesic dome hybrid. You‚Äôll love the ultra comfortable queen mattressmini kitchendining area and the warmth of the propane heater*! Enjoy all the comforts of home plus the adventure of camping. Nestled in the woodsyet only 10 minutes from downtown Weaverville10 minutes from the Blue Ridge Parkway and 20 minutes from Asheville.The spaceThe space.Embrace glamping to the fullest! Our yome is off-grid: no WiFino electricityno running water and spotty cell service. Insteadwe have battery-powered LED lightssolar lights and candlesproviding mood lighting - if you need bright lightsI suggest bringing a lantern - a solar shower with privacy enclosure and a very clean porta-John for your use.There is a small grill that is BYOB - bring your own briquets :) (and lighter fluid). I do provide tongs.The mini-kitchen consists of a 2-burner propane stove (with propane)frying pantea kettleFrench presscooking utensilsdishes/silverwaregraterpeelerwine keyorganic coffeeorganic olive oilsugarcreamersalt & pepper.The driveway is not very longbut it is gravelsteep in places and can be very bumpy! Careful if your car is low to the ground! Any car will be able to make it - we have a Jetta and a Camry in our family - but those with AWD/4WD will certainly have an easier time.We have two dogs that have free reign of our propertyincluding at night. While they fancy themselves watchdogs - and are sure to cause a ruckus when they first meet you - they are the biggest sweethearts and nothing to be afraid of! Nellie is the small one and Maisie is the larger.Our house is visible from the yomehoweverthere is much more distance - about 150 feet - than you would find between sites in a campground. Or a neighborhood!Please keep in mind that because this is a tentyou will be more subject to the elements/nature that you would be in a conditioned space. Socheck the weather before you come and dress/pack accordingly! Expect bugsspidersetc.. Despite the fact that I remove all of them each time I prepare the yome for a guestsome will inevitably find their way back in.*The propane heater is provided October-March. Includes (1) 1lb canister of propane per night of stay.

Title: Otter Landing on Santa Fe River, 13 private acres
Description: Spend all the time you want at home in Nature relaxing or recreating. This unique treehouse home is set high up in the trees and on 13 acres of natural habitat on the banks of the Santa Fe River. The Santa Fe has so much wildlifeand we are near the famous crystalline Ichetucknee River and miles of public trails. We share our kayaksa canoeand many amenities for your stay. So go for a solo paddlejoin local guide trips to various springsor hike on the property and at nearby parks.The space"The space.The property is an amazing 13 acres located on 1000 of waterfront on the wildlife-rich Santa Fe River. The forest includes many big old trees on both floodplain and bluff habitatsoffering great opportunities for serious or casual bird-watchers and botanists. We are only about 2 miles upstream of the mouth of the Ichetucknee River and we are less than a mile from 1600 acres of Wilderness Public Land for Wildlife. There are about 4.5 miles of hiking trails just a short walk from property. Much of the river frontage is located on an island that you are free to wander. At times our island‚Äôs bridge can be under water during high water floodsso do ask about conditions. Though some guests love to canoe through the trees at high water! Otter Landings Round House is always dry. You have access to free kayaks and a canoe from property. Free Coffee K-Cups for all guests. Don‚Äôt forget to bring your firewood for the awesome fire pit.""Guest access.Very safe neighborhood of family homes. We will send instructions for entry via lockbox after reservation is confirmed. Plenty of parking for your own car and boat should you choose to bring. No RVs or campingpleasewith due respect to the neighbors."

Title: Boatel
Description: Be under no illusion this is like camping under a wooden roof! Not glamping or an hotel.Boatel guests share the boat roofed shed with other guests and residents and no one has exclusivity on this structure.The boat is old and dusty with the occasional spideran unusual and quirky experience!!.The views are stunning. Sorry no dogs but there are two friendly dogs that live here. And cats and ex caged chickens.The space.Set in an acre of wild flowers and up a mountain in the beautiful Dyfi Valley Biosphere the Boatel is literally a bed in a boat! Not to mention a beautiful open plan cooking and living space ‚Äì all in a shed AKA the Boat Roofed Shed. Recognised for its amazing and unique qualitiesit even won the infamous Cuprinol‚Äôs Shed of the Year in 2013. It‚Äôs our absolute pride and joy and we love sharing it with our guests!.We‚Äôve hosted comedy festivalsexclusive concerts and curious tourists in our little mountain hideaway and Alex (aka DJ Badly) uses it to prepare his sets for festivals such as Glastonbury.We built the shed in 2012 using recycled materials and it was our first major project. Alex is normally a rubbish DIY personso designing and building the whole thing ourselves was a great achievement and we couldn‚Äôt have been happier to win both the ‚ÄòShed of the Year‚Äô Unique Category and the Overall category in 2013.From the shed you can see across Cader Idris (part of the Cambrian Mountains of Snowdonia). It‚Äôs so beautiful even in the maddest of weathersyou can close the doorlight the candlespop some kindling in the wood burner and be snug and warm in moments.Our guests all love staying in the Boatel - they love the peacethe locationthe structurethe ambienceand the curios (Alex is a big collector and has been on Antiques Roadshow with his Poole Pottery collection!). As well as the relentless throwing of Frisbees for the dogs!.We supply all bedding but do not supply towels or breakfast.

Title: Eco-Lush Mayan Dome in Family  Jungle Place
Description: Nested in between the Mayan Jungle and the crystalline waters of Soliman Bay beach and 10 mins driving north from the Bohemian Town of Tulum stands NahKusurrounded by sparkly Cenotes and impressive Caves in what is known as the lower Mayan Jungle. Here we offer you your own private space in deep connection with the natural forces that surround usplus the opportunity to embark on new adventures with private cenote visits just steps away!The spaceThe space.Bienvenido!OVERVIEW- We welcome you to our sacred spaceour brand new D\OM is waiting for your presence .. Located 10 min before ariving to Tulum stands NahKuclose by to the ocean bay of Soliman Beachover 70 cenotes and more 4 archelogical sites near byAkumal Bayand many more places and sacred sited to visit without the harsh noise pollutiontraffic and construction of the downtown corethis gives an enormous advantage to our place as strategically you can plan your trip around the most attractive places without losing comfort and commuting time.Our D\Om Maya is the first of its kindmade out of an innovative and sustainable material called Aircrete you can rest assure that the energy in this dome will deliver a power and harmonious vibration for your rest and comfort. Staying in this dome goes beyond expectations as its finished with an ancient stucco finished called Chukum to insulate and keep it fresh. Our Dome has 1 Luxury Queen size bed with high quality linens and pillowselectrical outletsrunning watersink and wi-fi.-Towels are includedTulum is a town with great biking infrastructureyou can always move from NahKu by walking 10min to the highway and taking the "collectivo" or van and for $20 pesos you\ll be in downtown in 5min.KITCHEN- Inside your Dome you\ll find a counter top with a sinkBATHROOM- Eco Outdoor toilets and showers ensure the natural efficiency and legacy of our jungle by avoiding water contamination and clearing of land for water infrastructure. Enjoy comfortable Eco-Lushy private showers.THE DOME- The D\OM Maya is the first one of its kind in the Mayan Rivieragiving you a wonderful brand new feeling of knowing that the impact of your visit in this Natural Paradise is reduced by the type of Sustainable construction method we use .Inspired in the Mayan culture and its legacy the D\Om was born. from its Hand-Crafted stone work mixed with the wood of its furniture and the fine textiles from the Mayan Lands. You will feel inspired to keep exploring this Ancient Lands."Guest access.Once you have turned from the highway to the dirt road continue till you find the fish rockonce there youll have arrive. Park your car next to the other and follow the path to your dome. We will be here to help you."Other things to note.-There is limited amount of power and we encourage all our guest to me mindful of turning lights off when not in useand unplug electrical devices when not in use.-There is no hot water in the premisesbe ready to enjoy a fresh water jungle shower.

Title: La Casa Naranja

Three comfortable bedroomseach with its private bathroom and roomy closets are sure to make the sojourn of the travelers a pleasant one. Title: Spaceship Destination!
Description: "726 square feet of one of a kind 1960s futuristic lodgingset down on 5 acres in the rural Hockinson hills."The spaceThe space.Next to a year around creekamong treeswith hills and meadows to explore.Spaceship amenities include a wet bar(Lunar Lounge) with fridgegamma ray microwaveand Mr. Fusion coffee maker.Two futon sofa/full size beds with up to four cots availablebathroom with showerTVbluray"Laser" disc/CD playerstereoand WiFiPLUS a pair of freezing tubes(for 5+ year stays)."Guest access.The Spaceship landed only about 30 feet from the hosts living quartersand can be driven right up to its front door entry hatch after traveling down a 1/3 of a mile private driveway.After unloadingparking is provided via the lower deck hangar doors on the north side of the ship.""Other things to note.Friendly natives abound!.The nearest sign of civilization is only about 1 & 1/2 miles away due westand over the hill. The Hockinson Market provides fresh made pizzaand has its own Tap room. The Chevron Market provides fossil fuel.Hocinson Meadowsand Alderbrook Parks are 3 & 1/2 and 2 miles away respectively.Further afield and to the northeastis the city of Battleground featuring restaurantsa libraryantique shopsand several breweries."

Title: Spacious Dome Architecture
Description: Main dwelling - 34 ft diameterrustic wooden floors & 5 1/2 ft round windows over looking great views! Large kitchenopen plan space; king bed in main living areaqueen bed in open loft. Retreat-writingmeditationyogadancingplayingfun! Location-location!! 4 miles to townThe space"The space.Architecturally elegant and unique design situated with beautiful views. This was a big home that has been duplex-ed and is about 1100 square feet. It was designed for privacyso the entry door for the other home is on the opposite side of the house from where you enter. Very peaceful and quiet - the only house on the street. I call the area country suburbia with houses peppered in the neighborhood about 1/4 mile away. This is a monolithic dome which means a huge balloon was blown up and sprayed with concrete before the balloon was popped. That part of the house is 34 ft diameter with rustic wooden floors & two 5 1/2 ft round windows over looking great views & yard. (The yard is not totally secure for pet safety.) Large kitchenvery roomy open plan space; king bed/queen bed in the lofta smart TV and selection of DVDs for your entertainment. The picture shows a ladder going to the loft but it is now a stair case. The loft has an artsy 2 1/2 foot picket fence as a wall. There is sight privacybut due to it being a half wallthere is no sound privacy. Parents note: Please look at the pictures to decide if this room is child-safe for your needs. About 2 % of folks decide its not right for them.I imagine it should be no problem unless they are climbers when youre not looking! Please ask for details if youre unsure. This is a wonderful space for retreatswritingmeditationyogadancingplayingfun! The sister dome is about 1000 square feet - and renting both sides is excellent for smallish events/retreats. There have been a few weddings held here. Location-location!! 4 miles to town."

Title: Loch Lomond Oval
Description: We don‚Äôt fit easily into the categories that Airbnb hasso for a clear pictureread on..Loch Lomond Hideaways is an exclusive collection of individual getaway properties consisting of four luxury indoor/outdoor cabin rooms with sheltered decking and outdoor cooking and eating facilities. The Hideaways are dog-friendly.The space"The space.Three of the Hideaways are wooden cabins which also have a secluded private outdoor bathwhile the fourth has a double sized indoor bath. All four surround a fairytale lit garden with private outdoor areas outside each oneand you‚Äôll find individual listings on Airbnb for each one for booking- click on my pic top right and select profile.The Hideaways are a short distance from Loch Lomondand even shorter distance from the West Highland Waythe John Muir Way and the Devil‚Äôs Pulpitso plenty of opportunity to get out and aboutor to walk your dog. There is a restaurant in the village (Croftamiea couple of hundred metres walk) and shopsrestaurants and pubs in nearby Drymen (2 miles). If you‚Äôre arriving from Glasgow Airportit‚Äôs about a 40-minute taxi ride.Each property overlooks the gardenwith its own entrancecosy indoors and even outdoors with their own individual outdoor wood burning stoves.The rooms have a kingsize bed (the Garden Room has a kingsize four-posterand the others have the option of kingsize or two singles) an ensuite shower and w/c. The Garden Room has a fabulous double bath in the en-suite and the Tree HouseOval and Arch have fantasy outdoor baths.The Tree House* Kingsize bed or two singles.* Ensuite W/C and shower.* Private You‚Äôll also find information about the surrounding area here."Guest access.Your parking is beside the main house (The Witches Hat) and signed Loch Lomond Hideaways Car Park. The house is on the outskirts of the village of Croftamiejust a short walk awayand a couple of minutes drive from the larger village of Drymenwith shopstraditional pubsrestaurantsetc. Loch Lomond is a further short drive to Balmaha on the east shore or Balloch on the south west. And we are only 45 minutes by car from Glasgow city centre or Glasgow International Airport.

Title: Glamping-Sky Dome Yurt-Tiny House-2 by Lavenders
Description: This is our second tiny house concept- Yurt! Glamping!We\re in a gated community close to everything! Guests have been enjoying the view! The sunsets! The stars! The Ocean breeze! The off-grid feeling!If you are thinking about buying a Yurttry ours out. You will enjoy the entire yurt by our baby lavender fields with a covered patio"outdoor shower" (it\s really insides)and a modern compost toilet in the attached restroom right by the door.The Yurt is built in wonderful 2020~ New&Fun"The space.Our Yurt is a 294 sqft comfortable room with a queen-size memory foam beda sofa beda kitchenetteportable AC/heater unit and etc. Its linked to the 200+ sqft patio and the attached restroom right by the door.Its about a 100 ft walk from the parking spot to the yurt on the boardwalk.If you need an extra bed for the 4th guestwe can provide a folding camping bed."

Title: Rondavous Land Yacht - Tin Valley Retro Rentals
Description: Tin Valley‚Äôs first ‚ÄúClothing Optional‚Äù campsite! No need to worry about tan lines. PET FRIENDLY!.Tin Valley Retro Rentals was featured on Nat Geo‚Äôs documentary show ‚ÄúBadlandsTexasand has caught the attention of travelers all over the world. 90 private acres nestled in the foothills of surrounding mountains. Perfect for stargazing! Located near Big Bend National & State Park and the Rio Grande. Familiessolo travelerscouplesphotographersweddingsare all welcomed!The spaceThe space.This beautiful land yacht is the newest addition to Tin Valley and the first ‚Äúclothing optional‚Äù campsite. She is now docked on her own desert island. I have the cost of the rental at a lower price due to the "work in progress"; howeverI think you will be pleased. Great for families. Lots of privacy! Large fire pitcharcoal smoker/grilland sand pit area large enough for an additional tent or two. One bedroomwith kitchen. Until we get the toilet issues worked out a composting toilet is provided outsideand a shower house/flushing toilet nearby. (approx 1000 feet away.) Solar lights all around. Propane provided for the heatercookerand light. Running water for sink & shower. Incredible look-out upper deckand ramp that gives you the feel of walking onto a docked boat.There is a $30.00 non-refundable pet fee due upon check inGuest access.Property is:.*35 miles to TerlinguaTerlingua Ghost TownStudy Butteand to the front entrance of Big Bend National Park.*5 miles to the back entrance of Big Bend National Parkbut high clearance and/or 4-wheel drive is needed for this route.*4 miles to Terlingua Ranch Lodge(available to you) which has a swimming poolfull service restaurantshower houseand laundry facility.*20 miles to the closest grocery store.*35 miles to the closest gas station.

Title: Skylight Cabin
Description: It is a cozy room with some comforts here at our Laitila home. We have built a comfy skylight dome houseperfect for camping. Visitors can also enjoy the wood burning saunaterrace for grillingand the firepit if you enjoy the campfire experience. There are numerous walking paths you can take if you are looking for an adventureour property is surrounded by open fields and woodswith a swamp nearby. Only 50km from Turku downtown.The spaceThe space.We are a Finnish-American couple and love our home so much. We are happy to have people from all over come visit us to experience the life here and to also learn from others.Laitila is a quiet place about 50km from the heart of Turku. Our skylight cabin is small but at the same time spacious and very comfy. The room includes a mini fridge and microwave for quick and easy meals and a small heater in case it is cold. You will also have access to a firepit nearby the cabin where you can camp out and grill too. There is a terrace if you prefer for grilling and sitting as well on the other side of the lot by the main house. There is a wood burning sauna and shower in a seperate buildingand there is a warm and clean outhouse.Our property is set up as growing farmNiiralan Tila. The farm was established in the summer of 2019 and we are always looking for ways to improve and expand.Enjoy beautiful walks through the villagewoodsfields and even the swamp nearby. If you do not wish to go alonewe are more than happy to join you and show you around. Depending on time of the year there are chances to gather fresh berries and mushrooms to enjoy. Much wildlife can have a chance to be seen like deermoosefox and perhaps even wolves. There is also lake with small beach and a pier 7 km away for swimming.

Title: The Island House of the Marais de Larchant
Description: "The Marais de Larchanta labyrinth of canals with a view on the medieval Saint Mathurin basilicalies just West of the Fontainebleau forestclose to the famous bouldering spot of la Dame Jouanne. The house rented is fully independentwith 5 bedrooms4 bathrooms1 kitchen1 dining room and a large drawing room. It has its own linenkitchenware and cutlery. It also has its own internet connection. Wed be happy to host you (English spoken) !"The space"The space.Based on an architects designthe houses main feature is its vaulted hall. At the heart of the marais canalsit is perfectly quiet.The island on which it is located will be at your disposal but the rest of the natural reserve is closed to the public.""Guest access.The entire house and the island on which it is located (surrounded by canals) is at the guests disposal. Walks in the marsh and canals can be organised depending on availabilities."Other things to note.The house is already booked on the dates of your stay ? Try the other house on the propertythe Courtyard House of the Maraisalso on Airbnb.Bookings of 5 days and more will be given priority during holiday season.

Title: Exposed Rock From Hillside In House, 5200SF, Views
Description: One of a kind 4BR 3BA 5,200 sqft home. Stunning views of the CO Ntl Mnt and entire Grand Valley. Our grandpaa home builderdesigned this rustic house as a masterpiece for his family. He wanted it to be part of natureso he fit it between trees and inside left exposed the massive sandstone slab on which it‚Äôs built. This large house has entertained our family and friends for generationsand we‚Äôre thrilled that now you can share it with yourstoo. Be in nature but minutes from downtown!The spaceThe space.Our grandpa designed and built this unique home in a way that captures the rugged terrain on which it sits and compliments the stunning natural beauty of the Colorado National Monument that serves as the backdrop. He made it so every room has its own stunning view. Look closely at the photos to see the rock and wood detail throughout. The sandstone slab of the hill on which it‚Äôs built actually makes up the entire wall of the downstairs family room and the floor of the room above. Grandpa had artistic visioncreativityand the craftsmanship to put it all together and he built this house from his heart. (He was still building furniture for us well into his 90s!). It has served as a cherished place for family gatheringsand we invite you to enjoy your vacation the way we have enjoyed this home throughout the generations. Have breakfast in the kitchen or on the giant deckwhile enjoying unobstructed views of the Colorado National Monument and the way the morning sun hits the red rocks. Spend evenings by the massive fireplace watching the sun set over the Bookcliffs and the Grand Valley. During the summers you might catch a lightning storm over the grand valley as the thunder echoes off the massive canyon walls behind the house. We also have a charcoal grill so you can BBQ outside and take in the views from the deck. Take leisurely walks through the neighborhood or drive/bike to get to everything that Grand Junction has to offer. (See list below!)See our video tour: search "House on the Rock" and "Grand Junction" on that big video platform that everyone uses (stated in a way that gets around a ban on mentioning websites here). :)While most of the home furnishings are rustic and cozy in a way that preserves the years of fond memorieswe made sure you had enough upgraded guest amenities to make your stay as comfy as can be: we just remodeled our showershave hotel-quality linensplush towelsand plenty of toiletries. You get to enjoy a vacation with maybe the most gorgeous views in the Grand Valleyin a house full of charmingly-old stuff spanning generationsbut you still get to sleep as if you were staying in a great hotel.Please note- we try our absolute best to keep the house clean for you and all of our future guests. For this reasonwe ask that you note our rules for no pets and no groups or gatherings of over 10 people. Thanks!Layout of the house:Main Floor:.Kitchen (new fridge and stove).Breakfast nook.Formal Dining Room.Living Room and Fireplace.Laundry room (washer/dryeriron).Bedroom 2 (queen bed).Bedroom 3 (two twin bedstravel crib).Bathroom with bathtub and showerUpstairs- Entire floor is Master Suite (up a small staircase from the living room).Master Bedroom (king bed).Attached full bathroom with clawfoot bathtubshower.Sewing room attached to master bedroom (full bed)Downstairs:.Family room with built-in wet bar.Playroom/Office (full bed).Bedroom 4 (queen bed).Bathroom with showerNearby Attractions:.Colorado National Monument East Entrance (5 min drive) - close to Serpent‚Äôs TrailDevil‚Äôs Kitchen hikesetc.Mountain Biking on Tabeguache trail systems which includes the "Lunch loop""Andy\s trail" and many more (5 min drive).Redlands Mesa Golf Course (5 min drive).Two Rivers Winery (10 min drive).Historic Main Street with restaurantsshoppingart galleriesand summertime Farmer‚Äôs Market (15 min drive).Powderhorn Ski Resort (50 min drive).Take a day trip in your car to Moabthe Grand MesaGlenwood SpringsAspenOuray..Guest access.Entire house"Other things to note.Please make yourselves at home while being respectful of this family treasure and peaceful neighborhood. No rowdy parties. If you need anything at all during your stayplease don‚Äôt hesitate to contact the property managerwho lives just down the street. Alsowe are listed as five bedrooms because AirBnb doesnt quite have the listing options needed for a full picture of our house. There is one bedroom off of the master bedroom that has a bedbut used to be a sewing room. Its a little smallerand has a little less privacy than a normal bedroom. Alsothe office has a bedbut we didnt list that as a bedroom. Thanks for understanding. :)"

Title: Buff and Fellow Eco Coconut 7 (6 sleeper)
Description: The Eco Coconut is nestled on the banks of the dam overlooking the Mountains. It offers a fully equipped kitchenliving room with fireplacedinning area with braai and a patio with wood-fired jacuzzi. 2x Ensuite rooms2x Outdoor showers & bath. Extra sleeper coach with separate bathroom and shower. Sleeps 6 guests.The spaceThe space.The one of a kind design of the Eco Coconut makes it truly unique experience in South Africa. It almost feels like you inside a coconut on a tropical island beside a lake and overlooking the Outeniqua Mountains. The interior is calming and neutral with a bohemian flavour. The fully equipped kitchen with gas stoveovenmicrowavefridge and Woki Ware cutlery is the perfect place to create a family meal. Cuddle up at the fireplace or relax in the wood fired hot tub.Guest access.The Eco Coconut is totally private and is exclusively yours for your stay. The farm is a paradise with wildlife like BuffalosRhinos and other animals.

Title: Fairytale Treehouse Turret at Santarella Gardens
Description: The newly renovated magical turret on the Santarella Estate in the BerkshiresWestern Massachusetts. This unique loft with turret bedchamber offers guests a fairytale experience. The open concept living space filled with plants brings the outdoors inside and offers ample room to relax. Guests can spend the day exploring the groundsnearby lakestrailsand many nearby Berkshire towns.The space"The space.Enter through a second story entrance into a large open space with a sitting area with a sofahanging chairtelevisionand windows that offer views out into the gardens. A bohemian bedroom with full-sized bed is hidden behind a sliding door. The Turret section has a suitable kitchenette with microwavefridgesmall ovenhot plate and coffee maker. There is also a cozy eating area with table and chairs. A large bath contains a double vanityhuge shower and private water closet. The third story bedchamber awaits up a winding staircase and sleeps two in a queen-sized canopy bed.The Fairytale TreehouseTurret is situated on 4 acres including lovely gardensbeautiful lily ponda running brook and wooded area. Absolutely uniquestorybook experience for up to 4 quests.Our lovely grounds are open to our guests. There are garden pathsbrook with stone bridgesloveliest of lily pondsstone bench seating area with chiminea and firewood for guests use.While we do not allow petswe will consider requests to allow 1 small pet with prior approval and acceptance of rules and policies."

Title: Self-Contained Pyramids in the Australian Bush
Description: "Find peace and quiet at our large family property. Hidden close to the township of Adaminabyin the Snowy Mountains of NSWis our surprising and unique accommodation - two pyramids set in our 40+ acres of pristine alpine Australian bushlands and flowering wildflower style gardensall here for you to discover on your retreat from the city. A peaceful retreathand built by our grandparents in the 90slocated close to Cooma and a short drive from Canberra Airport. Privacy and peace await you!"The space"The space.Built from scratch by our grandparentsthis property is truly unique and specialyou wont find pyramids set in the Australian bush land anywhere else! Two self-contained pyramids rest within established gardens overlooking undeveloped Australian bush. Surrounded by tranquilityuse the pyramids as a base to explore the surrounding ski fieldsor use your holiday to completely relax away from it all. From the hand-cut slate tilesto the pink granite surrounding the propertythere is so much to discover at Rocky Corner. Please note there is mobile phone reception predominantly on the Telstra networkbut there is no WIFI.""Guest access.The pyramids are fully self-contained buildings that sit within our larger propertywhich is called Rocky Corner. Our house is a little further up the hillso youll have privacy if you wish so. Youll have your own parking at the front of the pyramidand there is plenty of space to park further vehicles as required. The road to our property is unsealed and is suitable for normal vehicles (2WD) to travel on.Please note: The Snowy Mountains is a rural area. There is A LOT of wildlife around all the time..please be aware if you choose to drive in the dawn or dusk this increases your risk of hitting wildlifeso please do not speed or take unnecessary risks travelling to visit our property. If you hit an animalplease call the local council who can direct you what to do."

Description: This elegant and luxurious Chalet for two offers you an extraordinary home-away-from-home and makes your holiday vacation extra special.Nestled in the middle of the spectacular Dolomite Mountain range in the valley of Alta Badiathis Unesco World Heritage Landmark is a popular top skiing location in winterand a breath-taking hiking area in summertime.The spaceThe space.Skibus in winterski and bike roomswimming pool and garden in summer will make your stay absolutely special.Guest access.jacuzzibarbecueswimming poolgazebokids play areagerdenskiroom/bike depositlaundry area.

Title: Foxbriar Inn
Description: "A most unique home in the lovely pines of northern Arizona. Foxbriar is historicalcharmingand unlike any house youve ever seen. Nestled at the foot of Thumb Butte mountainFoxbriar has a million-dollar view and set in a beautiful rural neighborhood. It is only two miles from downtown Prescott . One-of-a-kind furnishings and all the conveniences of homeas well as outdoor gardens and dining areasand a gypsy wagontoo. Experience an original living adventure!"The space"The space.Staying at Foxbriar is better than a Disneyland adventure. It is unique and thoroughly charmingwith all the modern amenities. Guests may opt for a small chargea tour of a Pirate Ship treehouse off-sitetoowhich was featured on TVs Animal Planet: Ultimate Treehouses II. As wellthere is a Gypsy Wagon on-site at Foxbriar. It can be rented for sleepingtoo. It features a double bedbut no bathroom. The additional charge is $80 charge per night."Guest access.There is a large parking area in front of the housewhich is off the street and private.Other things to note.Foxbriar is close to downtownwhere there are many restaurants and other activities available year round.

Title: Upstate NY - Willow Glen House
Description: "Stay in a beautiful contemporary architect house in a case study house stylewith floor to ceiling windowsour catsand nature on your doorstep its an absolute experience of living indoors/outdoors with nature. Close to farmers market in nearby townsconcert halls and CCS at Bardmusic venues in Kingston and Basilica in Hudson its the perfect hideaway from the city. For true nature & cat lovers only!MAY & JUNE 2022 open for longterm rental - ideal for remote work or nature retreat!"The space"The space.Our home is an architectural concept house and a gemthough please note that it is a concept house and therefore not without imperfections so for the ones who appreciate architecture and designit is not a perfect airconditioned clinical space as its situated in nature and nature is very presentwhich in the summer means that you have animals and insects around (and yes some come into the housethe insects that is) and in winter there is snow and ice and in NY state that can be plenty. So not for the faint of heart or the squeamish as its a modern house but located as a cabin in the woodsat the house you will truly feel nature and nature is on your doorstep for both good and bad. Note to dog ownerswe are big fans of dogs but sadly the house cant accommodate any dogs during your stay.With our house come four companions - our cats will be delighted about every guest who loves and appreciates animals and is willing to take care of them. Nothing extraordinary but feeding twice a day and some of the usual care and attention""Other things to note.We have four lovely cats who live in the house. They go in and out and are fairly independent but look forward to your company and some care and attention.We have fresh herbs in our front garden for you to enjoyand if you come in the right seasonalso home-grown zucchinitomatoesarugula etc. Just water them in the evening and youll get all the great harvest as reward."

Title: Historic Ball-Paylore House
Description: The Ball-Paylore House is captivating - offering guests a true Tucson mid-century modern experience. A stay in the Ball-Paylore lets you step back in time. Widely publishedthe 1200 sq. fttwo bedroom architectural landmark has been named one of the most significant examples of Modern Architecture in Arizona. Centrally located within the Historic Catalina Vista neighborhoodthe property is close to the UofA and major attractionsentertainment and shopping.The space"The space.In 1952librarians Phyllis Ball and Patrica Paylore commissioned legendary Tucson architect Arthur T. Brown to design a bespokeone-of-a kind home. One that embraced the tenets of the modern movementresponded to the environmental conditions of the Sonoran Desert and offered both beauty and function.The result was an architectural masterpiece - considered one of the most important buildings of Browns design career. The avant-garde design of this noted and forward-thinking project embraced geometry and siting to create a pioneering and early passive solar home. The south facing floor-to-ceiling windows shed light on the authentic mid-century interior. Bold original colors are punctuated by pale wood finishes and earth toned polished concrete floors. The primary living areas radiate off the central fireplace - like the petals of a flower. The dark colors of the bedroomswith sloped low beam ceilingscreate intimate and comfortable spaces.This significant historic property was purchased at the end of 2019 and meticulously restored by Tucson Historic Preservation Foundation. The property retains its classic charm. The 1200 sq. ft. architectural plan is based on the geometry of the hex - featuring two bedrooms plus a shared bathroom. Much of the original modernist furniture by George Nelson for Herman Miller and custom Tucson furniture maker John Kelso are extant. Recent upgrades have introduced contemporary amenities - including air conditioning and wireless high speed internet. Each bedroom features a TVand Tuft and Needle mattresses.Step back in time. Spend easy afternoons reclined in a chaise lounge on the ‚Äúrevolving terrace,‚Äù or enjoy the Tucson weather as the sun sets over the Tucson Mountains. Take shelter from the mid-afternoon days while relaxing in the bright sitting areas. Experience 1950s Tucson."

Title: Brand-New, Seaside Luxury Suite with WiFi, AC, Shared Pool, and Beach Access
Description: The space"The space.*Gold Standard CertifiedSwimplay and relax when you stay at this uniqueGaudi-Esque villa in Belize. With two bedrooms and two bathroomsthis unique vacation rental features fantastic architectural touchesaccess to a shared infinity-edge poolbeach viewsand plenty of room for up to four guests. Please note that this suite is the bottom floor of a two-level villa.Even though it may be difficult to leave this tropical retreatthe Placencia Peninsula has lots to offer. If you have never experienced underwater wildlifenow is your chance to rent scuba gear in the nearby town and book a guide to view the beauty under the sea. In additionyou can take a boat trip to view some manateesvisit the ancient Mayan ruinstake a hike through lush junglesor simply lounge on the beach with your favourite straw hat!This rental suite has two bedroomseach with a round king-size bed and its own en-suite bathroom. You might especially enjoy the jetted tubalso round to compliment the overall decorso you can relax in some bubbling hot water before heading to bed. You will also have complimentary WiFi and a laundry room for your convenience. In the centre of the housethe spacious living room and full kitchen make for a fabulous gathering space. Cook nightly meals - perhaps your days catch - and enjoy fresh breakfasts each morning.Perfect for couples travelling togetheror a small family looking for a memorable vacationlook no further than the Lion Fish Retreat. Make Belize your destinationand this home will make it into a vacation!*Please note that the property has a security guard at night and security cameras at the common areas in the property.Belize Tourism Board license # 1930/2016Parking Notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. There is a parking lot in the property with space for two carsabout 30 yards from this unit.Dock Details: Shared floating dock at the propertyNo dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval."

Title: Boho Hideaway
Description: Welcome to the Boho Hideaway‚Äîa charming bungalow located in the sought after Montrose district! Minutes away from some of Houston‚Äôs best coffeedining & nightlife. What‚Äôs our favorite thing about this home? The location! There‚Äôs plenty to see and do within walking distance or bike ride! Quick access to I-59I-45 & 610. Within a 10 minute drive or lessyou can easily get to The GalleriaDowntown and Texas Medical Center.The spaceThe space.Hipcomfy and clean. Soak up the vintage flair of this 1920‚Äôs bungalow overflowing with arthouse plants and eclectic furnishings. Our home has a private entrance and keyless access for an easier check-in experience! Boasting 4 comfortable queen beds2 full bathrooms & Roku TV‚ÄôsHigh-Speed Wifi. We pride ourselves in stocking our homes with everything you may need for a comfortable stayincluding high-quality linensfull kitchencoffee bartowels & so much more. Should you need anything else during your stayplease contact us! We are more than happy to accommodate you & ensure you have the perfect #HideawayHouston experience!PARKING: Parking is only available on the street directly in front of the home.SLEEPING: There are 3 bedrooms total in the home. One of the bedrooms has two queen beds and the rest each have one bed.COOKING: Use our pans & utensils to chef up something yourselfor reheat leftovers in our microwave. We have K-cups and a coffee maker for those early morningstoo!CHECK-IN: Check in anytime after 4pm. We have keyless entry for a more convenient check-in process. Early check-ins are on a case by case basis depending on availability. If you need to drop off your luggage earlierplease contact us and we can accommodate you.CONCIERGE SERVICE:.Anything you need is at your fingertips with our concierge add-ons like stocking your fridgeluggage storage or decorating for your celebration! Let us make your trip to Houston the best trip ever!CLEANING FEE:.We pride ourselves on providing a clean home for our guests. We hire cleaners that not only work hardbut are family and friends of ours. They treat the property as their own and we pay them wellresulting in a slightly higher cleaning fee. It goes back to themnot some major company paying their workers minimum wage. If during your stayanything isn‚Äôt up to your standard please let us know and we will address it immediately!The home is located in a residential neighborhood‚Äîwe ask that you please be mindful of our neighbors. Please keep any noise down after 10pm. We do not allow parties or events! Max total guests is 8 people. Additional guests MUST BE APPROVED by the host. Failure to communicate with the host about extra guests will result in violating your booking terms. Please notewe have security cameras on the exterior of the home to ensure the safety of our guestsour home & your vehicles.Pictures are worth a thousand words so please feel fee to browse through our photo gallery and message us if you have any questions! We look forward to hosting you for your next Houston stay!Some of our favorite places nearby:.The Pitt Room - .3 mi away.UCHI - .9 mi away (The BEST sushi).BCN Taste & Tradition - 335 ft away (One of our favorite date night spots).Siphon Coffee - .4 mi away (Seriouslybest coffee ever!).The Menil- .7 mi away (One of our favorite museums)Guest access.Keyless entry & street parking available directly in front of home.Other things to note.We have worked very hard to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Please respectcare and be mindful of the surrounding neighbors so that guests can continue to enjoy the space for many years to come.- Quiet hours start at 10 PM. We do not allow loud noises/musicparties in the house.- There are security cameras at the perimeter of house. There are no cameras inside the house.- Please do not smokevapeuse marijuana or drugs in the house.- Street parking available directly in front of home. No parking in the driveway.

Title: A Grass-Roofed Earthen Hobbit Hut
Description: "This uniquely constructed cob hut was crafted by sculptor Miguel Elliott of Living Earth Structuresand is one of a kind. The thick walls provide natural insulationkeeping it cool in summer and warm in winter. It was constructed out of Adobe bricks from the property and features a living grass roofwhile the rustic decor transports you to Middle Earth.*Update : Sadly due to Covid-19 restrictions we arent able to host your beloved animal companions at this time."The space"The space.We invite you to partake in the spiritual life which is the heart and soul of Isis Oasis Sanctuary by joining us for daily noon rites in the Small TempleSunday Salons under the Great Treeor by simply meditating at any of the numerous shrines and altars at our beautiful sanctuary! Our temple and theater are always open if you seek a moment of peaceful reflection or a place to give offerings or prayers.Isis Oasis Sanctuary is an exceptional place to stay if you are visiting wine country and looking for a singular spiritual experience. Our cob huts offer a unique approach to lodging that you wont find anywhere else! Crafted by sculptor Miguel Elliott of Living Earth Structuresthese small standalone structures are built with natural self-insulating materials and inspired by magical fantasy stories that are well known and loved by many. They live tucked into an intimate corner of our wooded campgroundwith a small picnic area and bamboo privacy screens. Bathrooms and rustic outdoor showers are just a few meters down. Perfect for those who want a remote camping feelbut with some added creature comforts!Free Wi-Fi and a coffee and tea bar are available for all guests to use in our spacious dining pavilion. A small librarycollections of puzzles and gamesand a gas fireplace provide a cozy setting in which to relax and unwind.Visit our community gardenor request an animal tour to see our menagerie of exotic rescued catsbirdsand reptiles! We are a licensed 501(c) non-profit and any tax-deductible donations go towards the care and upkeep of our animals and grounds.Whether you are coming alone or with companyyou will find Isis Oasis a refreshing departure from the traditional hotel or motel.**NOTE: If youre coming as a groupmultiple spaces can be rented out simultaneously and some buildings can be rented in their entirety for larger parties. Ask about our catering options! Please note that if other huts or campground areas are rentedyou will be sharing the facilities/amenities with other guests. We do offer a number of other rental options on property if you prefer more privacy. See our full listing options by typing Isis Oasis Sanctuary in your AirBNB search bar.**"

Title: Unforgettable Pyramid home in sunny Florida 7046
Description: "Dont miss your chance to stay at this unique and exciting pyramid that features a natural spring water lake! ! This home is perfect for couplesfamiliesor close friends who are looking for a fun vacation.We are Located about 15 miles from most beaches and central to all local attractions in a quiet and safe community.Some highlights-.* 2 queen bedrooms/ 1 bathroom.* self check in.* Free WIFI.* Beach gearwasher/dryerfull kitchenprivate grillpatio"Guest access.This pyramid is situated with just enough privacy while still being only a short walk to the lake. Your main patio from this unit overlooks the lake.It is thoughtfully furnished with fun and cozy furniture that is sure to please everyone. For your comfortthe pyramid is supplied with a hairdryeriron and ironing boardbeach chairs/ beach towels/ coolercoffee/tea applianceswasher/dryermicrowaveand a gas grill. The unit is stocked with some mini "starter" supplies such as shampooconditionersoapcoffeeand toilet paper. Additional supplies can be purchased from one of the many drugstores or grocery stores within a short drive away. We have a pack n play and high chair available upon request. If you would like to request these itemsplease let me know upon booking and we will do our best to accommodate.Other things to note.This pyramid is in a wonderful location in Southwest Florida. It is just a short drive away to many beachesshoppingrestaurants. Some of the highlights in the area include Sanibel IslandNaplesFt Myers BeachBonita BeachCoconut Point shopping centerLakes parkand Miromar Outlet mallKoreshan State Parkand a few local kayak places.Please note- this is a quiet and relaxing community. We ask that guests respect the village and other guests on site. No excessive noise or parties will be allowed especially at night .*No pets allowed at this timeNo smoking/vapingsage inside.The village was built 20 years ago so please understand these pyramids have some slight wear and tear. Keep in mind it is a tropical and humid environment located on a natural spring lake. For those travelers who have sensitivities and allergies these pyramids might not be perfect for you. We are not representing these homes would compare to an elite hotel or resortbut an alternative to other vacation options.

Title: Countryside workshop with sauna
Description: "BeehiveEncounter.Holiday WorkshopOf Bees And PeopleIt looks like a huge beehive in which bees fly in and out: The fir house at the holiday workshop in Waldachtal-Tumlingen. But its not built for beesits built for humans. There they can spend their holidays with familyfriends and acquaintanceswork theretry out craftsgather for workshops and seminars or relax. See ‚¨áÔ∏è"The spaceThe space.All rooms of the house can be used.Guest access.The garden with fireplace seating and 2 sun loungers invite you to relax.The garage as well as the shower in the "outdoor.area‚Äú may of course also be used.Other things to note.In the bathroom there is also a small but very nice sauna.
