Title: Wonderful Casa de Playa in Huentelauquen, Nueva.
Description: Wonderful and cozy house with panoramic ocean view. Bright housewith large common areas just meters from the beach. It has a Protected Patioand terraces with spectacular views. Five bedroomstwo and a half bathrooms with solar energy system and backup generator if required. WoodsCharcoal grillTrampolineStove12 beds.The spaceThe space.A quiet place with incredible views of the sea in semi-desert vegetation meters from two quiet beaches. House of 250 m2 on a plot of 5000 meters. The house has 3 bedroom wingscreating independence between sectors. Ideal side entrance to get from the beach with shower to take off the sand and leave the beach things.Other things to note.We deliver an informative document with the necessary indications for the use of the energy system. Take care of the ecosystem of the area and use the water without abusing it. Do not use energy-intensive electrical appliancessuch as hair dryers or blendersas solar energy is not available.The house has 8,000 litres of non-potable water per week. In case the water runs outit should be purchased by contacting the tanker truck supplier.

Title: Mirror House South
Description: The Mirror Houses are a pair of vacation homesset in the marvellous surroundings of the South Tyrolean Dolomitesamidst a beautiful scenery of apple treesjust outside the city of Bolzano.The Mirror houses offer a unique chance to spend a beautiful vacation surrounded by contemporary architecture of the highest standards and the most astonishing Landscape and beauty nature has to offer.The spaceThe space.Mirror House South (45sqm) has 1 bedroom with 1 double bed1 bathroom with a spacious shower and 1 living room / kitchen (all one space) with 1 couch bed. The location is ideal for 2 personsbut can accommodate up to 4 people. If you are in 4 adults we suggest do book both Mirror Houses (North and South).In addition there is a large terrace + private garden and a shared garden in summer with a shared pool and self service pool bar.Also there is a storage room underneath the house e.g. for sports equipment.Guest access.In the summer months (beginning of June - end of September) our pool is accessible. Thereforethe slightly higher price.If needed a baby cot / high chair can be made available for an additional cost 20‚Ç¨ a day.For any specific request do not hesitate to askwe can organize almost anything for you.

Title: Ream Hills Helicopter
Description: "If you fancy something completely unusual why not arrange to stay in our specially converted Lynx helicopter for the night - every childs dream from six to sixty!We have 1 night stays starting from ¬£110.Please Note:We do not accept pets in our helicopter.All Accommodation is Non Smoking.All bunks are custom made beds - Please bring your own sleeping bags / quiltspillows and bed linen."The spaceThe space.Our 1982 Westland Lynx XZ676 has been professionally transformed into overnight accommodation. The snazzy interior includes sleeping for up to 4 people (2 adults & 2 children) a kitchen sinkmini fridge and microwaveplinth heaterLED TV and fancy LED lighting to compliment it. Use of the nearby on-site toilet and shower block is included."Guest access.Custom made low down double bunk sleeping up to two people in the tail of the helicopter.Twin pull out bunk in the living area sleeping up to 2.LED flat screen TV.Kitchen area with small sinkhot and cold watermini fridge and microwave.Wi-Fi.Plinth heater and roof ventilation.Garden table and chairs.Parking space."

Title: Luxury Unique Cloud Villa Ocean View
Description: Absolutely fantastic architecture of the villa consists of 5 huge shapescreating an internal space with living roomkitchen dining area and 3 bedrooms.This villa is like a great white floating cloud is reflected in the turquoise water of the infinity poolin the garden of the villa is a large area designed for weddingfashion and another eventsfor more than 50 guests come for party.The spaceThe space.This villa is like a great white floating cloud is reflected in the turquoise water of the infinity poolin the garden of the villa is a large area designed for weddingfashion and another eventsfor more than 50 guests come for party.The graceful staircasesoaring like a bird will lift you up to the master bedroomwhich offers a magnificent view of the Indian ocean.The spherical shape of the internal space creates an extraordinary feeling of harmony and peace.A huge double bedlounge zone with chairs from the old teak woodart objects made from onyxbedsides from petrified woodwhich is 15 mil years olda five-meter ceiling height with floating lights of hundreds of petalscreated by the authors of the projectmake the atmosphere bedroom is truly unique.The other two bedrooms are located on the ground floor of the villa and unusual large windows offer views of themed gardens and private terraces. In one of the bedrooms works of art created by nature itself and the authors of the project - dressing room and a bathroom from the root of a giant tree becoming in the form of sculpturesreminiscent of the fantastic flower.All interior parts are created from different varieties of natural marble and precious solid wood.Futuristic design and architecture completes the top class of service.Featuring Concierge Managerfull housekeepingButler and restaurant.Unique Spa menu created in a refined concept boutique hotel Sensation.

Title: Stunning  5-Bed  Getaway,  Xmas/Winter season
Description: Perfectly situated between Stratton (15mi)Okemo (15mi)Bromley (12mi) and Magic Mountain (2mi) resortsThe Octagon at Powder Mill is a perfect getaway for skiers and adventurers looking for winter outdoor activitiesantique shoppingsite-seeing and fine dining. Large open spaces & 5 bedrooms make it perfect for multiple groups/families. Cathedral high windows will make you feel immersed in the outdoors while inside.The spaceThe space.This contemporary retreat built on 2 hillside acres is a one-of-a kind homelocally known as The Octagon. Perfectly situated near ManchesterChesterPeruWeston and Grafton. The Octagon at Powder Mill is a perfect getaway for leaf peepers and adventurers looking for outdoor activitiesantique shoppingsite seeing and fine dining. Large open spaces & 5 bedrooms make it perfect for multiple groups/families. Cathedral high windows will make you feel immersed in the outdoors while inside.In the fallthe house serves as a convenient home base for hiking trails of various difficulties ‚Äì some within walking distance or close by in the Green Mountain National Forest. There\s a large pond visible from our front yard dam for tranquil afternoons,Next door we have golf (and disc golf)fly fishingmountain biking and kayaking at Lowell Lake State Park (5mi). Also nearby are lively scenes in LondonderryPeruWestonGrafton and Manchester Center with chef-run restaurantsfarmsmarketsVermont country storesantique storestheatreand festivals. Please let us know if you have any questions on activities. There is lots to do!The house itself is locally known as The Octagon because of its various window faces and architecturally unique elementsour two- acre hillside haven is one-of-a kind. As you enteryou will be enveloped by pinesbirch treesand moss covered boulder facadesbordered by a pond and seasonal stream. The hillside forest ecosystem can be seen from various heights and perspectives from within the two sprawling light-drenched levels of the house itself. The main floor of the top level of the house has one main bedroom with bathroom ensuitesecond bedroom with bunksa fully-equipped chef‚Äôs dream kitchen with generous slate countertopscustom cabinets multiple bar spacesand updated appliancesand adjoining open-floor dining room with fireplace and living room for entertaining off the kitchen. Also on the main floornext to the dining roomis a convenient deck for barbecuing featuring tree top and mountain views. On the upstairs balconyis a reading nook with desk and pull out futonnext to the enclosed master king sized bedroomperched alongside an old firgiving you the impression of sleeping in a tree house. The lower level of the house is nicely separated for large groups to enjoy. Off the balcony stairs is a pod suite and walk in shower. All bathrooms feature radiant heat with slate floors. On the ground floor is the Octagon\s Great Room with 30\ high ceilingsexposed wooden beamswet barfoosball tablemassive fireplacelarge sectional sofaand Xfinity connected TV. The Great Room allows easy access to an additional deck and the backyard with fire pit and seasonal brook. Off the Great Room are two other bedroomsincluding the master "guest suite" with its own fireplaceporch and private entrance.A stay at The Octagon is a truly magical experience. We look forward to hosting you and we hope you enjoy it as much as we do."Guest access.Youll have access to the whole houseexcept for the loft area not described in the space.""Other things to note.The house is family friendly but isnt fully kid/baby proof. Portable crib and high chair are available upon request.The house while secludedis easily accessible from Route 11 and is sited on well.a plowed road/driveway with shoveled entryway."Licence numberLicence number.MRT-10126712

Title: La Loma del chivo - Na Bolom
Description: "This structure was designed and built partially by the same artisan who did a good bit of the foundational work on Eves Gardenone of the best examples of papercrete building world wide and located in north Marathon.This buildingnamed Na Balom or Jaguar House in Mayan was constructed in the manner of the ubitious conical structures in Southern Italyall through desert communities in the Middle EastAfrica and is comfortable for two"The spaceThe space.There is a deck on the west side and access is encouraged to the other experimental building projects on La Loma Del Chivo. Come try this amazing edifice in the wilds of the far west Texastrans-pecos region just north of Big Bend National Park. Free dust and scorpions are constants as is the overwhelming brilliance of the great via lactea (milky way).Guest access.Space deck to see the stars and view of our little town. Beautiful sunsets..Other things to note.Please wash the disheshang the towels when you donethank you

Title: Heiwa Lodge 2Bdrm (winter`21-22 longstay rate ok)
Description: Heiwa Lodge is a great retreat for friendsfamilies or a superb retreat to bring your partner for a romantic getaway. Heiwa Lodge is 1km from the centre to Hirafu resort with the ski lift approximately 800m from the property. Enjoy the benefits of Hirafu without the crowds. Bdrm 1 and 2 can be set as 1 x double or 2 x singles. Each bedroom is en suite with toilethand basin and shower (no bath tubs). Please note that for this location we recommend you rent a car.The space"The space.Prior guests` arrival all touch surfaces in our properties (light switchesdoor handleskey boxesbench tops etc) are sprayed with alcohol for our guests` safety. We supply guests with complimentary face masks upon check in and each property has complimentary hand sanitizer.Complimentary breakfast starter pack upon arrival. Starter pack includes;.Eggs.Milk.Butter.Bread.Water.Tea/Coffee/Green tea.Sugar.Rice (instant).Miso Soup (instant)For guests` comfort we have available (delivered to your property pre-arrival) snap frozen pre-cooked meals from local restaurants. This service is made available to guests and charged separately giving guests the option to dine in at night to avoid restaurants and larger groups.Heiwa Lodge offers much more than a condominium style accommodation. Restaurantsbars and shopsare all within walking distance of the propertyhoweverwe do recommend renting a car with this location for your convenience. The house has a well equipped kitchena TV with an HDMI cable for screening Netflixs etc (no local or cable TV)free WIFI is standard. On a clear day in winter there are views of Mt Yotei. In summerthe property has air conditioning."

Title: SiloStay - one of it's kind in the world
Description: You‚Äôll love SiloStay because of the ambiencethe outdoors spacethe lightthe comfy bedand the neighbourhood. SiloStay is good for couplessolo adventurersand business travellers.As our Silos are isolated from each otherand the SiloCheck-In is contactlesswe are not requesting Vaccine Passes.The only areas where SiloNauts might encounter each other are at the Key Kiosk and Drop-Offin the car park or on the boardwalks providing access to the Silos.The space"The space.Our silos provide a haven of intimacy where you can close off the world outside. Each 2-storied silo is fully self-contained and perfect for a couple. An upstairs bedroom & ensuite contains a queen bed fitted with a multi-functional music headboard that utilizes a car stereo to play your tunescharge your devices and provide moody lighting. There is a TV and DVD playerand there is more quirky appeal when you lift the ceiling hatch to make way for a view to the sky from your bed- you could catch a glimpse of stars or even watch snow flakes fall on the glass in the winter. Step outside onto your upstairs balcony to admire views over the Banks Peninsula countryside.Downstairs youll find a kitchenette containing everything youll need for making a bite to eatmicrowavesmall fridge and 2 element cooktop. We provide a selection of teasplunger coffeehot chocolatesugar and a bottle of fresh milk to get you started and the Little River Cafe & Store next door will have enough supplies to see you right for anything else you may need.We are proud to be 100% Smoke-Free."

Title: The LOFT at Cozumel's Casa Darcy Bungalows
Description: The LOFT is a uniquely designed bungalow. The stairs to the loft bedroom are made from Cocobolo wood and beams overhead are exposed which add beauty to this space. Double bed/built in closet upstairs. The ground floor has a single bed (sofa)kitchenette with amenitiesand large walk in bathroom. Outside is a dive poolpondcovered Palapa and lush gardens. The Loft suits 1-2 people. Linenstowelspurified watercoffee included. Lock box. Please see our fb page for more reviews.The spaceThe space.There are two cruiser Bikes for guests to use now while they stay at Casa Darcy. Our property has 3 bungalows in totaland lots of space between each. Each is a private small home for guests varying in size from our Main bungalow which is two stories and has 3 terracesto our Loftand then our Pool suite for short term stays.Guest access.Guests are welcome to sit outside the Loft in our gardensor sit upstairs in the large Palapa covered area with overhead fans. The dive pool is for all guests as well.

Title: "At the rhythm of the tides" sea and modern design
Description: "Au rythme des mar√©es" is a beautifulmodern and luminous flat with a large 3m x 4m baydesigned by an architectlocated on the Pink Granite Coast! The house is south-west facing with a large garden with a swing and a loggiaspacious and functionalit also has two wooden terraces. Located 100m from a beautiful family sandy beach and the GR34 is next door. A cocooning accommodationwith all the comforts to restcome and enjoy the sea air!The spaceThe space.-The services:.The bed linen kit is included in your stay. It consists of a flat sheeta duvet cover and a pillowcase. The beds are also made up on arrival.Please note: We do not provide a towel and bath mat kit.If you forgot to bring itit is possible to rent the towel kit (a bath sheet and a small towel) for 10‚Ç¨ per person.-Baby equipment (high chairbedbathtubpotty) is free and available on request.-In the common rooma washing machine and a dryer are available.- baby-sitting available on request (for a fee).-The house offers impeccable comfortis bright thanks to its large windows with direct access to a 30 m¬≤ wooden terrace.- Fully equipped kitchenovenmicrowaverefrigeratorfreezerdishwasherinduction hobNespresso coffee machine.- Spacious living room with 43-inch HDTV.- 1 bedroom with 1 sleeping 2 pers: bed 160x200.- 1 bathroom with walk-in shower.Upstairs :.- 1 large bright room (sea view) with 1 sleeping 2 pers: bed 160x200 and 1 bed: bed 90x200.Outside :.- 2 terraces including a large terrace with garden table and private plancha.-parasol and 2 chairs "sunbathing".- Garden with swing and slide for children.- Private parking.* infos: electric sunshadeelectric shuttersblinds and curtains.* quality bedding.The property is large2500 m2. Travelers have space and appreciate the unique architecture of the place. Our construction project was thought from the beginningcarefully thought out with an architect to make our rental project a success. To allow vacationers to make the most of the beauty of the seascapethe lightto feel good in our accommodation and in Bellevues-Sur-Mer.House rules:.- non-smoking accommodation.- Pets are not allowed.- No parties or noisy evenings to keep the residence quiet.-No possibility to charge an electric car.-no possibility to wash your carGuest access.Common room: laundry equipment (washing machinedryer).-Parking space in the property.-garden with swing-slideOther things to note.Short stay possible.except in July and Augustminimum 7 nights.-Services :.The bed linen and towels kit is included in the rental price. Title: Pikul Hut3 Surrounded by scented trees.
Description: Little bamboo hut with outside bathroom. A very good place to relax as it is surrounded by nature. Pikul is a little bamboo hut which provides a nice area to sit and relax in a quiet environment. Make yourself at home. Staying at Baan Suanthip will make you feel as if you were visiting family.‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏â‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏ò‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏∞‡∏®‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏õ‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏í‡∏ô‡∏ò‡∏£‡∏£‡∏°‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ß‡∏™‡∏ß‡∏¢ ‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏â‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏∏‡πà‡∏ô‡∏ö‡∏£‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏ì‡πÉ‡∏Å‡∏•‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏á ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏û‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏â‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà‡∏£‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏ú‡∏à‡∏ç‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ß‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ ‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ò‡∏∏‡∏£‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏àThe space"The space.Unique to the areaBaan Suan Thip is an ideal place to relax and enjoy an unspoiled part of Thailand.Immerse yourself in the culture of Southern Thailand with amazing peoplefood and nature. Experience the hidden treasures of Ao Luek with local guides who enjoy sharing their experiences and culture. Whether its a swim in the Jungle Poolboat trip to some of the many stunning islands of Ao Luek Bay or Kayaking in the mangroves to caves with 3000 year old cave artthere is something for everybody.A 5 minute walk to Thanbok Koranee National Park20 minutes from the beach by car or motorbike (assistance with arranging transportation available if needed). Many local food shopsrestaurants and a 7-11 are within walking distanceor by bicycle.Local markets in Ao Luek provide an opportunity to enjoy the delicious local food and people. The owner and landscape designer Tanwho created the lush gardens at Baan Suan Thipalso offers Thai cooking lessons or meditation classes on site.Airport pick-ups from Krabi airportKrabi town or Ao Nang available.Ao Luek is also easy to reach by bus from PhuketKrabi or Surathanni.On-Site scooter and bicycle rental coming soon."Guest access.We got 4 bicycle. Petong ball. and many thing for free.Other things to note.Just make your self at home here. I hope you can feel this is your second home.

Title: Glamping in Friday Harbor
Description: The Ting House offers a tiny home away from home perfect for exploring Friday Harbor. This sweet one room cabin accommodates a small family of three. Featuring a sweet little kitchenwoodstoveone queen bed and a couch.The spaceThe space.The Ting House is a one room rustic cabin located in a tiny meadow in a Douglas fir forest. The cabin offers a wood burning stove for heatpropane three burner stove and hot and cold running water. We will provide a cooler for your food items. Your designated bath house is a short stroll away and is complete with a flushing toilet and hot shower for washing up. PPROV0-17-0021Guest access.Guests have a designated parking spotand access to a shared bath house complete with flushing toilets and hot shower.Other things to note.Please note that getting to the island requires a ferry reservation from Anacortes to Friday Harbor. You can see a schedule and pricing information at WSDOT- Ferries. The reservation holds your spot on the ferry. Make sure to arrive at least 45 minutes before the departing ferry. You can make your reservation 2 months before2 weeks before or 2 days before your departure. Some standby tickets will be available for drive up however these goes quickly and during the summer months may require a long wait at the ferry terminal. The Ting House is located 1 mile down an unpaved country road off of Bailer Hill on the North West side of the island. As such we highly recommend a vehicle in order to access the property and allow maximum flexibility for sightseeing and seeking out meals. Road bicycles will find our road difficult to navigate and possibly dangerous. Mountain bikes are able to negotiate the access road easily however.Cell service on the property is spotty at best and WIFI is nearly non existent.We advise bringing a head lamp or flashlight for treks to the restroomthough we have solar lights illuminating the path our property is located in a Douglas fir forest and the additional light is recommended.If bringing food items you may want to pick up an extra bag of ice for the cooler. Also please note that the grocery store is open until 9pm and most of the island resturants close between 9pm and 10pm.Finally this property does have a pet dog. She is bigfluffy and friendly but mostly sticks close to the hosts.

Title: King Bedroom in Eco Domes on Sustainable Farm
Description: "The domes are uniquely inspired by an architect based on sacred geometric anglescombined with sustainable building materialwithout use of any metal within its dome structuresin order to preserve its energy fields within. No outside microwave fields penetrate the dome structures. The structures also hold special acoustics for sound & music.I am also available to cook delicious local organic vegetarian breakfasts for an additional charge of $5-10/person/meal depending on your selection."Other things to note.The King Bed can comfortably fit 3 peoplethough typically we host 1-2 people in the King Bedroom. There is an additional semi-private space in a separate room of the house upstairs that has a chaise lounge with a small single mattress where a third person can sleep if you have 3 guests and 1 bed is not suitable for all 3 folks. Please message your host in advance if this option is requested so we can be sure to have it appropriately setup for you. Thank you!

Title: Enjoying the Wangeliner Garten - Eco-tip (Room 4)
Description: The double room with its separate access gives you a special feeling of living through the vault-like interior design.In the room (approx. 17m¬≤) you will experience a special room climate which is achieved by the clay in the wallstones and floor.The bathroom is plastered with blame actwhich gives it a noble ambience.In the integrated small kitchen you can prepare your very own breakfast. You can use a fridgekettletoasterdishesetc.The space"The space.Here on the edge of the Mecklenburg Lake Districtnot far from Plau am Seelies Wangelin. Welcome.The description of the holiday room:.The double room in our guest house built of straw bales gives the visitor a special feeling of living through the vaulted interior design. It has a separate access from the outside and is equipped with a private bathroom (shower and toilet).The 40 cm thick straw bales plastered with clay provide a very high insulation standardso that the heating energy expenditure is very low.In the room (approx. 17m¬≤)you will experience a special room climatewhich is achieved by combining the clay-plastered wallsthe use of clay stones and a tamped clay floor.The room is uniquely designed in its colour scheme ‚Äì warm harmonious natural tones give the room an almost Mediterranean atmosphere.The shower room is plastered with a traditional Moroccan marble limetadelaktwhich gives it a noble ambience that you can literally feel. Tadelakt cleaning surfaces fascinate with their color and surface structure - the shimmeringslightly wavy and lively surfaces exert a great attraction.The double bed (140 x 200 cm) was created by a wood designer from parts of ancient loomsin combination with metal and stoneto an experience place of all senses.In the small kitchen integrated in the room you can prepare your very own breakfast. Howevera fridgekettletoasterdishes etc. is not available for this purpose. From May to autumn we open the simply equipped summer kitchen on the premises for our guests who do not have any cooking facilities in your accommodation.Wi-Fi access is available in the Wangeliner Garten caf√© and is accessible during the day.Unfortunatelythe airbnb booking system cannot be combined with our Wangeliner Garten systemso you must first make an inquiry here. Howeveryou usually get an answer within an hour.If you havent discovered it yetweve got other places to stay for you:.----G√§rtnerinnenhaus----: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/14053630?preview_for_ml=true ----Wohnwagen----:.https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/10164312?preview_for_ml=true ----Lehmkloster----:.https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/14117664?preview_for_ml=true First.of allplease make a booking request so that there are no double occupanciesas our Wangeliner-Garten booking system cannot be integrated here."Other things to note.The village of Wangelin is located on the edge of the Mecklenburg Lake Districtoff the main roadsso very quiet. The nearest larger towns are Plau am SeeL√ºbz and Meyenburgall about 15 km away.

(Temperature 28¬∞/35¬∞)The amenities of the bathroom cabin:.‚Äì Radian heating.‚Äì hair dryer.‚Äì welcoming products.

Title: Sleeping under a grass roof
Description: On the quiet shore of the river Reitdiep you find our comfortable unique cottage. The house has a grass roof and offers you a breathtaking view in all seasons. The spacious house is 100 m2 and is fully equipped for six people.The spaceThe space.On the shore of the river Reitdiep you find our comfortable holiday home.It is a particular cottage because the roof is made of grass. The detached house has a sunny gardena large south-facing terrace and a private landing-stage in the beautiful river Reitdiep. In summer you can swim or fish herewhatever you want.The cottage offers you peace and a breathtaking view in all seasons and all weather types.Our grass roof house is 100 m 2 and is fully equipped for six people. The house is nice and comfy. There is underfloor heatingfree Interneta wood-burning stovedouble ovendishwashermicrowavewashing machine and dryer. There are three bedrooms: two have a double bed (one with box spring)the third bedroom has a bunk bed. There are a spacious living roomkitchen en bathroom.There is an excellent fiber optic internet connection throughout the house with a 100 Mbps download and a 100 Mbps upload.The minimum rental period is three nights. In high seasonthe minimum rental period is seven nights.

Title: Houseboat by the sea Alkyona Beach - your oasis of peace
Description: Right on the beach is our boat. An old wooden fishing boat became a wonderful place to live by the sea. The views are magnificent. Many animals such as turtleskingfishersherons and even flamingos can be observed on the premises in winter.Just 30 minutes from the Olympus Mountains you have all the possibilities that mountains and sea and culture offer!The spaceThe space.We converted the old fishing boat into a holiday home and it is only 15 meters from the sea. With large panoramic windows and a particularly comfortable lower deckit is a real experience ideal for familiescouples or young groups of up to 6 people. There is also a bathroom and a small kitchen.Guest access.The entire site may be used ( 36000m¬≤). We also have changing rooms on the beacha shower and toilet block. On requestwe can also prepare a Greek breakfast on the beachprovide towels and help you find the best hidden destinations for excursions.Other things to note.On the beachwe offer snacks/breakfast and dinner together in our bistro. We have guests of Villa Sevasti who use our disabled beach during the day. Dear dogscats and donkeys live on our premises. It is not fenced by the direct beach location.Licence numberLicence number.AFM 800728979

Title: Bell Rock Vista - Unit G
Description: Two bedroom2.5 bath townhouse in the Village of Oak Creek facing the beautiful Sedona Red Rocks. Minutes from 3 great golf coursestennisshoppinghiking and many great restaurants.The spaceThe space.Spacious Townhome with 1240 SF of living space. Private bathrooms and balconies off each bedroom. Nice patio with optional hot tub usage. DirecTV with HDDVR. There is a a queen sofa sleeper in the living room.Guest access.We have an electronic lock on the front door. Code is sent upon confirmation of reservation"Other things to note.We include a 10% discount to Cucina Rusticaa great Italian restaurant near our townhouse. We also include a Red Rock Parking Pass that you can use. It will save you $5/day at parking places when hiking and sightseeing.We include discounts for golf at Sedona Golf Resort and Oak Creek Country Club. Pets are not allowed. Theres a hot tub maintenance fee of $25/stay if you would like to use it. The hot tub is dedicated to only our renters of unit G."

Title: Coastguards Beach House
Description: Stay at Coastguard‚Äôs Beach House and discover a landscape full of myth‚Äôs and legendssurrounded by the haunting loneliness of Romney MashThe spaceThe space.Coastguards Beach House SummarySleeps 4 + 1 people (single fold out bed in 2nd bedroom).Sea views.Beach just 80 meters away.Pet friendly.High chair & travel cot supplied.Woodburning stove.6 miles to RSPB Dungeness Nature Reserve.6 miles to medieval town of Rye.Quiet and secluded location.South facing fully enclosed garden.Parking for 2 cars.Superfast broadband.Flat screen 32‚Äù TV.DVD Player.Selection of DVD‚Äôsboard games and books.Ipod docking stations in living room and both bedroomsCoastguards Beach House is so close to the beachyou can see it from the upstairs windows. Yet you‚Äôre also not far from Camber Village anda little further onthe pretty Cinque Port town of Rye.Here at Coastguards Beach Houseviews extend in every directionwith marshland designated an SSSI (Site of Special Scientific Interest) to one side and the sea to the other.A painstaking amount of care and attention was paid to renovating this traditional 1875 Coastguards property-turned-cosy-holiday-cottage. Find comforts like a log burnera comfortable lounge and a modern kitchen. We consider the Coastguards Beach House the perfect place for some well-earned R&R far away from the monotony of everyday life!Dining & LoungingCoastguards Beach House has a contemporary and sociable open plan layout downstairsideal for enjoying the company of your holiday group. A log burning stove warms the space and sets the scene for relaxing with a good book and a glass of wine.The newly equipped kitchen is fully stockedbreakfast bar and farmhouse dining table for planning the day ahead. For ingredients that are fresh as it getstake a quick drive to Rye for seafood fresh from the boat and Romney marsh lamb from the local butchers. Talk to Beside the Sea for our recommendations!Bed & BathUpstairs you‚Äôll find a beautifulmodernfamily bathroom and two bedrooms.The largecomfortable master bedroom has a double bed with views of the seacoastal garden and adjoining coastguard cottages.A family bathroom includes wash hand basinw.c and a raised shower bath with screenproviding you a coveted choice between a relaxing bubble bath whilst stargazingor a refreshing shower with a view of waves lapping the shore.The second bedroom has two 3ft beds and a single fold away bed with un-spoilt views over the marsh. This room also benefits from an en-suite shower room with marsh views.OutdoorsThe cottage has a fully enclosed south-facing and quiet gardenthe site of many relaxing holiday evenings after exploring historical siteswalking the marshand playing in the waves. The beach is just steps away over the seawallwith a paved boardwalk spanning its length for easy walks and jogs.Guest access.Keysafe details are in the digital guide"Other things to note.Our bookings are protected by SUPERHOGyou will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself. Once your booking is confirmedyou can also go via their websitesuperhog.comto start the verificationor wait to be contacted.Coastguards is located near to the Lydd Rangesa military firing range (its also a nature reserve).It has been used for military training for over 150 years and is part of the DungenessRomney Marsh and Rye Bay Site of Special Scientific Interest (it is home to incredibly rare plants and animals)Because the range is used for live firing access is sometimes restricted - red flags are flown during these timesaccess is prohibited along the foreshore.When firing is not carried outit may be possible to walk along a designated path along the shore.Throughout 2021 the Environment Agency (EA) will be working on improving the existing coastal defences between Jurys Gap and Dungeness and so will be utilising the compound to the right of the cottages (the area with the green containers on the photo) this will mean that the construction vehicles will be using the promenade to access the ranges on the MOD land.Coastguards are old properties in a very exposed location and in the winter months the wind can really howl off the sea ‚Äì some guests love watching the weather go wild or the sea mist rolling creating an eerie atmospherewhile some have found it a little unsettling.So if you are not a fan of older houses that have history and character then this would not be for you ‚Äì we do have modern properties down the road that are in a more sheltered environment."

Title: Rooms By The Sea on The Sunshine Coast.
Description: Beautifulspaciousnewly refurbishedfirst floor one bedroom flat with floor to ceiling windows overlooking the beach on the border of Hastings and St Leonards. Walking distance to the bars restaurants and shops of Hastings old towntown centre and St Leonards. Sleeps 2 in king size four poster bed; with a roll top bathshower and fully fitted kitchenTV and fast wifi. Nearby free parking.The spaceThe space.We have a huge living/dining room with a 3 metre high bay window overlooking the sea. There are double doors opening into the bedroom so you can lie in bed and look out to sea. We have a roll-top bath in the bedroom and a separate toilet/basin. The kitchen is a separate room also with a sea view.

Title: The Beach Hut Gurnard-stunning beachside location
Description: "The Beach Hut Gurnardlocated in an enviable positionis the perfect home from home for solo-travellerscouplesfriends and small families. This beachfront property features fantastic Solent views; the perfect place to watch the stunning sunsets Gurnard is famous for. Well-equipped and with fast WIFI makes this the ideal choice for a chilled break enjoying the seabeach and all that goes with itall on your doorstep ."The space"The space.The two bedrooms can accommodate four people comfortably with one room being a double and the other a twin (2 single beds).Benefitting from an open-plan living areathe property has a well equipped kitchen including washing machinedishwasher and coffee machine .A large island incorporates the induction hob and plenty of seating space for a breakfast bar with 4 upholstered stools.A childrens chair and table set is available if the stools are unsuitable- please enquire.Two large sofas make up the lounge area with coffee and side tables and a wall mounted TV (with SmartTV box). On opening the double doors you have a decked outdoor space with picnic bench for alfresco diningplenty of seating and magnificent viewing platform for watching the nearby sailing club set sail and also the many windsurfers and paddle boarders that are drawn to the area . If you fancy joining in - there are local hire companies who will supply any equipment required.Relax and watch the world go by and enjoy a pizza delivery from one of our local businesses who deliver to the area.We are happy to accommodate one small dog to join you on your holidays but we please ask to refrain from allowing them on the furniture or beds. Please bring their own bed and bowls.There are some points to advise before booking the accommodation- there are steps to the bedrooms and bathroom and care should be taken - one bedroom has a reduced head height in the doorway . The upper roof terrace is unavailable to guests. Finallythere are some building works been carried out at present in the vicinity and may be some noise during the week days. The neighbouring property was demolished over a year ago and is waiting rebuilding. No work has started on this site - should this situation change I will notify any guests affected.Ferry discount codes are available please enquire when booking.We operate a self check in system for your convenience using a key safe. All codes will be sent before travel."

Title: BEACH DREAM STAYCATION! UNIQUE & TRANQUIL
Description: Soak up the British sea air in our newly refurbished two double bedroom beach house. Enjoy an open plan down stairs living areawith views of the sea. Enter in from the busy road to an unexpected magicalhigh spec seafront property. Enjoy a large outdoor garden areawith decking and balcony. This really is a hidden gemwith unavoidable beautiful views of the sea. If you can bare to leave then WorthingChichesterShoreham and Brighton are easily accessible by walkingbus or even Swimming!!The spaceThe space.We have worked hard to make this place as lovely as can be. Downstairs you have a carefully planned living spaceperfect for friends and family get together\s.Upstairs there are 2 bedroomsboth doubleswith a Jack and Jill bathroom which is accessed via each bedroomso don\t forget to lock both doors !! The master bedroom has a King size double bed and is luxuriously decorated. Large patio doors out to a large balcony. The view is mind blowing. You can see to Worthing and Brighton from here and look over the beach. Your own little private suntrap. At night the wind farm is even more spectacularand the lights from Brighton twinkle away.The 2nd Bedroom with a Double bed is equally luxurious. Smart TV for viewinghoweverno viewslightly smaller and on the main road side of the house. Noise is minor but not silent all of the time.The kitchen is designed that even whilst the chef is hard at work they wont miss out on any conversation or interaction. They even have the best view in the house whilst chopping their onions.The lounge area is comfortable and has a large open fire where you can enjoy cosy evenings.42" large screen smart TV gives you plenty of choice for viewing.Dining room to the rear with dining table for 4 and a nice chesterfield arm chair if you would rather just read a book and watch the sea. Dining room leads out to the garden. Partially decked and partially pavedcompletely enclosed so if you wanted to bring your pooch then you can be sure of their safety. There is a gate in the garden side wall that you can get straight onto the beach with.The beach in Lancing is just amazingyou will be sure to take endless photos and go on endless walks. 2 minutes to the left (east) of the house is an amazing restaurant/cafe calledThe Perch. They serve everything you would need. The food is excellent here. They also do one of the best breakfast bacon sandwiches i have ever tasted. Takeaways available also.We are always at hand to helphowever you are on your own herewe dont interfere or even come and say hiunless you want us to.This place is perfect for a summers get awaywater sports weekendwinter hibernation. A real break from reality.

Title: House on the beach
Description: Awesome weather boarded beach house on the stunning sandy beach at CamberEast Sussexunder 2 hours from London. Enjoy barefoot beach living in a gorgeous house where the beach is your front garden. Up to two well behaved dogs welcome at ¬£35 per dog per stay. Dogs have free run of the entire beach from October to May. Between May and September you will need to walk 50 metres along from the house to reach the dog friendly section of beach.The spaceThe space.Barefoot brings you closer to nature and offers an idyllic escape from the stresses of everyday life. Cosy up by the old wood burner or toast marshmallows on the decksurrounded by your own private dune. The house has plenty of character with stripped wooden floors and doors but combines this with modern luxuries for a once in a lifetime experience of true beach living.Guest access.The sandy dune fringed beach stretches for miles. The gorgeous cinque port town of Rye is less than 10 minutes away and DungenessThe UK‚Äôs only desertis just 15 minutes away. Hastings and Dover are easily within an hourOther things to note.In high season bookings are for a minimum of 7 nights (commencing fri). In mid and low season there are options to book a 3 night weekend (fri/sat/sun) or a 4 night midweek (mon/tue/wed/thu) as well as week stays or longer. Check ins are on either Friday or Monday depending on length of stay.

Title: The Beach House
Description: The Beach HouseWest Wittering Beach.An airybright homeshares a garden with the main housesitting directly on the beach. A perfect getawayan hour and a half from London.It is self-contained and is close to GoodwoodChichester Theatregreat bike routeslocal pubs andof coursethe sea is on your doorstep.Open-plan fully-equipped new kitchenbig comfortable sofaTV/Wifiseparate shower room.Super king double bedplus 2 single beds on large mezzanine floor with a sea view.The space"The space.Ample parking by the house.Local surfing club has all you need to learn/rent,.paddle-boardingkite-surfingwind-surfingwith friendly staff to help. (www.2xs.co.uk.Shore Water Sports (22 Shore RoadEast Wittering) sells clothes and equipment.For newspapers and daily fresh bread/croissants we have Sayasour brilliant local mini-mart in West Witteringopen early til late most days.For all your day-to-day needsEast Witteringa five minute drive(but nicer bike ride) has two supermarkets(Tesco and The Co-op)also numerous independent shops and great local produce. (Try Something Fishy for the daily catch or Horrocks for fresh fruit and veg).Anything you may need for a day on the beach is sold in quite a few places in East Wittering. (Eg. Crocsbeach ballsboogie boards etc).There are also many local pubs and places to eat and/or get great take-out. From a traditional fish-and-chip supperto delicious Indian mealto tapaspizzaa pub luncha big fry-up at The Boulevard or we even have a pancake breakfast place(check out Drift-In). Just ask me for detailsI can let you know. We also have a new beach cafejust up the beach about a 5 minute walk (to your right) as you access the path outside. It serves hot foodcoffees and ice cream in the main restaurant or from the take-out section."

Title: Family home on seafront. Private pool, balcony.
Description: A truly spectacular beachfront home with direct access to Bracklesham Beach is ready to delight up to 9 guests. Ideal for families or groups of friendshere‚Äôs a stunning property with amazing views that‚Äôs bright and welcoming. Among its many highlights are the private indoor heated swimming poolthe extensive balcony with sea viewsand the patio and garden with direct access to the beach. This is the kind of place dreams are made of.The spaceThe space.Shell Seekers is an amazing house with a unique history. It‚Äôs actually built around a classic railway carriage which dates back to the 1920s. Extensively modernised and extended over the yearsthe house is now an eye-catching home-from-home that‚Äôs ready to make groups of friendsfamilies with childreneven work colleagueswarmly welcome for short or long-term stylish stays by the sea.And when we say this is a beachfront homewe mean it. Check out the amazing sea views from many of the home‚Äôs roomsand the fact that you will enjoy direct access to the beach from the beautiful garden. With so much to see and enjoylet‚Äôs start a quick tour of this Bracklesham Bay beauty by the beach:OPEN PLAN LIVING ROOM / DINING ROOM.There are actually two spaces designed for you all to gather to relax or socialiseone on each floor. Both have comfortable seating on which you can all kickback and live like you do at home - maybe watch the wall-mounted flat screen TVsreador just take in those amazing views. The upstairs sitting room gives you direct access to a balcony that will afford you yet more sea views. The downstairs lounge also has a dining table with space for everyone to gather and experience the delights you‚Äôve created in the home‚Äôs exceptional‚Ä¶MODERN KITCHEN.You‚Äôd expect such a stunning home to have a smart kitchen with high specification appliancesand that‚Äôs precisely what you‚Äôve got here. Everything you need to prepare snacks and mealsand to wash clothes and dishes is here for you.4 BEDROOMS.Three of the bedrooms are situated on the ground floor of this magnificent beachfront homeincluding the master bedroom. Here‚Äôs a sleeping space that has it allan ultra comfortable kingsize bedits own dressing room and ensuite bathroomplus simply spectacular views. There are two other bedrooms on the other side of the house on the ground floor. The fourth and final bedroom is upstairs with a stunning dual aspect that includes a sea view plus access to the balcony. We‚Äôll leave you to decide between yourselves who gets what room. Rest assuredthey‚Äôre all gloriously comfortable with plenty of storage space for your belongings.BATHROOMS.Take your pick from a stylish bath tub in which you can relax in bubblesor standalone showers that will invigorate you at the start or end of the day. There are various bathrooms and dressing facilities that are available on both floors of this stunning home by the sea.INDOOR POOL.Fancy a dip before breakfast or a refreshing swim in the afternoon? Undoubtedly one of the highlights of this home is its 25ft heated indoor swimming pool. Enjoy the chance to relax in private around and in a beautiful poolalways a popular feature for guests of all ages. And it‚Äôs all yours.OUTSIDE SPACE.The inside is certainly impressiveand so are the outside spaces you get with this home. As well as the extensive balcony on the upper floor and the parking spaces at the frontat the back of the house there‚Äôs a large decked area with plenty of seating space for everyone to gather and enjoy the views. There‚Äôs also a garden which gives you direct access to Bracklesham beach. But you‚Äôd expect no less from a beachfront property as stunning as this!CHILDREN‚ÄôS PLAY AREAS.This beautiful house is perfect for kids. There‚Äôs even a kids‚Äô playroom and an outdoor shed area for them to exploreplus plenty of child-friendly facilities laid on by your hosts.HIGHLIGHTS.* Direct access to the glorious pebble beach.* Private indoor pool.* Amazing sea views.* Recently refurbished.* Child friendly with kids play room.* Free parking on premisesGuest access.Guests have access to the entire property.Other things to note.‚òÖ COVID-19 SANITIZATION ‚òÖ.Heathsafetyand wellbeing of our guests are of utmost importance to us. For this reasonwe use a thorough process of cleaning after each check-out.‚òÖ NOISEAWARE ‚òÖ.Please be mindful of our neighbours during your stay. Our property‚Äôs quiet hours are in place to ensure that everyone can enjoy a peaceful night‚Äôs sleep. We care a lot about maintaining good relationships with our communityso we appreciate you following our ‚Äúhouse rules‚Äù during your stay.We are committed to Rent Responsibly standards. This means we follow best-in-class guidelines to ensure you have a peacefulsafe and memorable stay with us. We use smart home technology to improve your experience. NoiseAware is a smart home device that measures volume levels throughout the property and allows us to respond to noise nuisances without disrupting your stay. NoiseAware is 100% privacy compliant and is required on this property. If you have any questionsplease ask. We are committed to your comfort so please let us know if we can do anything during your stay to make it more enjoyable.

The large open plan kitchen-dining-living area invites socialising as well as relaxing. Title: Panoramic Sea View, Prime Location, Free Parking
Description: Prime central seafront location by Brighton Pier with arguably the best sea views in Brighton!.Free off street private parking space for 1 car.Luxury second floor 2 bedroom apartment in a Central Residential Regency building with uninterrupted panoramic sea & pier views from lounge bay window & 2nd bedroom. Master bedroom & en-suite with views over New Stein Gardens to the sea. Close to all major attractions & Inside the Pride village zone.Midday check out available for a small fee.No parties!The spaceThe space.Please state your reason for staying in your booking message. We do not allow any kinds of parties or groups of guests that may disturb or upset our neighbours. It is a residential building and any noise must be kept to a minimum.This is a prestigious and well equipped Luxury 2nd floor apartment right on Brighton seafront and we want you to enjoy the very best that Brighton has to offer you in both style and comfort!We hope that staying in our apartment will help you to fulfil that to the utmost.Check in time is from 4pmbut you will be messaged if it is available beforehand. Parking will be available to you from whichever time you check in. We will be parked in the space whilst we prepare the apartment for you. The space is privately owned and marked \FLAT 4\.If you will be arriving early to Brightonthere is free parking for up to 4 hours at Brighton Marina car park if that might be helpful.Check out is by 11amhowever if agreed to and paid for in advance this can be extended to Midday for an extra fee. Please enquire for this.Parking:.The apartment comes with its own single private parking space on the forecourt at the front. It is the left side space by the path to the entrance door marked \FLAT 4\. The space must be vacated at check out to make room for me to park my car whilst i service the apartment for new guests arriving.Communal Entrance:.Access to the apartment is through the main communal entrance at the front of the building and up the stairs to the 2nd floor. The key to the main communal door is located in a Masterlock key safe padlocked to the black railings to the right of the door. The code to access this will be sent shortly before arrival. Please close this and scramble the code after taking the key. The door to the apartment has an electronic keypad entry code system that is randomly generated specifically for each guests stay. This will be 4 digits and sent together with the key access code.Apartment Entrance Hall:.Cupboard with hooks on back of door for coats etc. In this cupboard we store the sofa beddinga spare dining chairiron & ironing board.Shelf with Internet hub and above is the heating thermostat.CCTV camera monitoring the entrance hall.Lounge: Size 14\ 9" in to bay x 14\ 1".This is open plan with the kitchen(kitchen measurements separate).The room is laid with varnished solid oak flooring.There is a leather 4 seater sofa with King size bed pull out with real sprung mattress. There is a leather strap under the middle headrest to use to pull the sofa bed open.A large 65" Samsung UHD smart Tv with Freeview hangs on the wall opposite the sofa. A solid oak coffee table sits nicely in front of the sofa. A solid oak extending dining table sits in the double glazed bay window space with a professional telescope on top for those that would like to star gazelook out to the sea etc(not for use by young kids!). The bay window has beautiful white shutters and overlooks the beach and sea to the SouthEast and West. To the East you can see the Marina and clifftops and on the right you can see Brighton PierWest Piersealife centreVolks railway and Zip line just outside. There is a double socket with 2 USB charging points next to the sofa for charging/power for your electrical items.The main lounge lights and pendant light are dimmable and remote controlled. The remotes are kept in the coffee table drawer.Kitchen: Size 11\ 3" x 5\ 3".The kitchen area has luxury silver/grey real stone floor tiles. The main kitchen lights are also remote controlled and dimmable. The remote controls are kept in the coffee table drawer.The kitchen has been fitted with the highest quality fully integrated appliances by brands such as NeffSiemens & Elica etc. and finished off with a sublime Tiger walnut worktop for a truly luxurious feel and is equipped with everything that anyone would require including a Kettlematching 4 slice toaster and Nespresso coffee machine. The appliance user manuals for everything are kept on the shelf above the fridge.Various kitchen utensilscutleryglassescupspotspans etc are all provided in the drawers and cupboards.For laundry there is an integrated washer/dryer and the Siemens Oven is also a microwave that can be controlled via WIFI. All instructions on how to use the appliances will be found in the kitchen cupboard above the fridge freezer.The bin is located in the cupboard next to the washer/dryer.Teacoffee and sugar are provided as are some basics like washing up liquidsome cleaning materials and capsules for the washing machine and dishwasher.The newly fitted and insured Vaillant combi boiler is located in the cupboard at the end of the kitchen. A small fire extinguisher is also next to it.Master bedroom: (15\ 1" x 9\ 4" max to 7\ 1" min)& Ensuite toilet: 5\ 1" x 3\ 6".This room has been fitted with a luxurious silver carpet and has been furnished with exquisite matching white French style furniture and solid King size bed. The bed has an award winning Sealy Nostromo Posturepedic mattress with a large silky soft velvet headboard and topped off with quality bed linenso a great nights sleep should be guaranteed!.The bedside table has 3 small drawers with a lamp and DAB clock radio on top.The large wardrobe with its mirrored doors has hanging spacea shelf and 2 large drawers under for storage.The dressing table has a large folding mirror2 drawers and chair. Under the dressing table is a double socket with 2 USB sockets for charging/power for your electrical items.The lighting is remote controlled and dimmable to suit your mood. The remote is kept in the bedside table drawer.The view through the white window shutters is over New Stein Gardens and towards the sea and Marina.(The balcony outside the window does not belong to this apartment and cannot be used).A hair dryer is provided in the room.The Ensuite toilet has fully tiled walls in luxury travertine and a black and silver grey Slate floor. Again the sash window looks over New Stein Gardens and to the sea and Marina. The mirror has LED lighting that can be turned on/off by waving your hand underneath.Second Bedroom: Size 11\ 8" x 6\ 7".This room has been fitted with a luxurious light brown carpet and has been furnished with top quality painted solid oak furniture. The bed is a double size with headboard and sits snuggly between the side and end walls under the windowso please take this in to consideration if you are tall as there is no space to hang your feet out of the end of the bed. The bed has a highly rated Casper memory foam mattress. At the foot of the bed is a 40" Samsung UHD Smart Tv with Freeview TV. To the side of the bed is a double glazed window with its wonderful white shutters and large window ledge that looks out directly to the beachBrighton pier and sea.The double wardrobe has hanging space with a drawer under.The dressing table has 2 small drawersfreestanding mirrorlamp and DAB clock radio on top and matching leather upholstered solid oak chair.Under the dressing table is a double socket with 2 USB sockets for charging/power for your electrical items.A large mirror hangs on the wall above the radiator cover.A hair dryer is provided in the room.The lighting is remote controlled and dimmable. The remote is kept in the dressing table drawer.Main Bathroom: Size 5\ 9" x 5\ 6".The bathroom has been fully tiled with Luxury largeTravertine wall tiles and silver/grey slate flooring.This room features a double length shower enclosure with a Luxurious Rain or Waterfall shower option from the shower head above. There is also a hand held shower hose.The mirror is LED lit.Top quality soapshower gel and shampoo/conditioner are providedas are Quality towels.Some cleaning materials and a first aid kit are kept under the sink.Hall:.The hallway has solid oak floors and is where the entry phoneinternet router and Hive heating thermostat are located just by the lounge door.To the left of the entrance door is a large cupboard that houses a spare oak dining chairhooverironing boardironbroomdustpan & brushspare towels and the bedding for the sofa bed etc. as well as the water stop cock(bottom far right corner) and consumer unit(main electric switchesinside left wall).The apartment features exclusive stunning CommissionedOriginal & limited edition artwork throughout by up and coming local artist Richard Berner. His ‚ÄòBeasts of Brighton‚Äô work/collection is particularly interesting as it is of local famous Brighton landmarks/subjects. His intricate and alternative style is unique to his vision and as far as we can tell there is nothing else in this style around.Next door property:.We also own a Luxury 1 bedroom apartment that sleeps 4 at the next door property(39B) which has permit parking for 1 car. If you are a group of up to 10 peopleit is possible to book both together providing it is also available. You should be able to find this in our other listings from our page."Guest access.Guests have full use of the apartment. If less than 3 guests are stayingthe 2nd bedroom will only be made up on request.There is an apartment information sheet provided containing useful info. regarding the apartment and surroundings. This is found on the kitchen worktop at check in along with the parking permit. Please return the parking permit at your check out.WIFI is unlimited. The password is on the router in the hall.Both Tvs have Freeview and internet so guests can log in to their own Netflix or similar accounts.At the very front of the building is a private off street parking space for 1 car. Only the left side space belongs to our apartment(Flat 4). The space is available from check in until check out and you will need to use the parking permit provided to display during your stay. We will need to park in this space and use the permit in our car after your check out. Please return the permit back to the kitchen worktop in the apartment at check out. A ¬£35 fee is chargeable from your deposit if the permit is lost or taken/not returned.The key for the main entrance is kept in a key safe box next to the front door. You will be given the code to access it shortly before your arrival. Please close it and scramble the code after taking the key. At the end of your stay you may leave the key on the kitchen worktop and just close the door behind you.The apartment door has a special code lock. The code is changed between each guest remotely and will be given to you shortly before your arrival. The lock has a safety feature whereby it will not accept any codes for 1 minute if a code is entered too slowly or incorrectly 3 consecutive times. If it flashes redplease leave it for 1 minute before trying to enter your code again. If you pause between a key press for too long the lock will reset and you will have to wait a minute before entering your code againso please have your code to hand and ready to enter.Unfortunately this apartment has no disabled access and is not suitable for those with mobility impairments.This apartment is self check in and out.24 hour check in is available.A Midday check out may be available upon request for an extra fee. Please check."Other things to note.After both residents and Airbnb complaints due to guests abusing thier stays at the apartmenta security camera has been professionally installed monitoring the entrance hall inside of the apartment.The camera is maintained and looked after by the company that installed it(Brighton CCTV). The camera records 24/7 on a looprecording over old footage with new and is alarmed. It is not to be obscured or tampered with in any way.The camera is not monitoredhowevershould we receive any complaint from a residentauthority or suspect that any guest is not using the apartment in an appropriate manner we may use any footage as evidence in any case or claim.Please remember that the apartment is for the sole use of the guests on a booking only. People that are not a part of a booked group may not stay at the apartment. The apartment is in a residential buildingand as such the residents must be respected. No parties of any kind or any noise that may disturb a resident is allowed during a guests stay. Thank you.This is strictly a no smoking apartment.11am Check out means the apartment must be vacated on or before this time. We will be in a few minutes past this to park and service the apartment for our next guests.If you have a car parkedthis must be removed at your check out and return the parking permit. We need to use this space for our car whilst we service the apartment for our next guests.If you need to empty the rubbish bins during/at the end of your staythe communal bins for general rubbish & recycling are on the street just outside the building to the left and the right.We charge ¬£10 for a lost/missing front door key.The fire alarm panel is located inside the main entrance lobby. If a false alarm sounds there are clear instructions written next to it on how to silence them.The safety and wellbeing of our guests is paramount to us and therefore we are taking some extra measures to keep both ourselves and our guests safe during this difficult time.Due to this we have taken the following measures to help avoid transferring/catching the virus.We are wearing disposable gloves and using disinfectant for the cleaning of the apartment. We have also provided a large bottle of disinfectant in the hall cupboard for guests use if required. All beddingtowels and dishcloths are washed at 60 degrees.Thank youLee & Sue.

Title: The Curious Crab-Flat with Uninterrupted Sea Views
Description: Dog friendly beachfront 2 bed Apartment with Amazing Sea Views!Modernrelaxingrecently refurbished 2 bedroom flat on the St Leonards/Hastings coast. Doors in the living room open directly onto the sea with stunning uninterrupted panoramic beach views.Potential to sleep 6 with 1 king size bed and 2 small singles (or king on request) and a sofa bed in the living room.Located a 10 min walk in either direction to St Leonards and Hastings.Check out our other listing The Curious Lobster!The space.The space is decorated in relaxing neutral tones with carefully edited pieces bringing the outdoors in.The little touches to make your stay more comfortable:.- some traditional games for those cold and winter days.- a sound bar for when you just want to chill out and listen to some music.- a multi adapter phone/tablet charger.- a beach bag with beach towelscool box and beach blanket.- Nespresso machine for that shot of caffeine in the morning with compostable pods.- Luxurious organic shampoo and conditioner from eco brand Davines.- Welcome Pack.- Books on the local area and interesting walks.- Bespoke selection of beach-themed works of art by independent artists.- a fully kitted kitchen for those days you feel like cooking at home.- brand new boiler and hive system.- Iron and ironing board.- Hairdryer.- Kettle and toaster.- Washing machinefridge freezer and microwave.- Dog blankets and dog bowl for your furry friend

Title: Garden Flat, Sea Views & Wonderful "Hobbit House"
Description: Within site of Hastings pier and the ever changing coast line this ground floor garden apartment has everything you need for a wonderful seaside break. This flat has the benefit of outside space whilst still being on the seafront.The spaceThe space.There is a wonderful "Hobbit House" in the garden for children to explore and play in with a little kitchenette,chairs,table,toy crockery and cupboardssure to entertain them for hours. There is also an outside seating area for children and a hammock for the grownups! The garden is well lit at night so can be enjoyed in the evenings.Situated between St Leonards and Hastings this apartment is well placed to easily reach the heart of both communities and is only a 15 minute walk from St Leonards Warrior Square station.New shopsbars restaurants and galleries are opening up at a fast pace and the two towns are fast becoming a mecca for artists and creatives alike but still retains its charm and appeal for family holidays.Guest access.Full access to everything in the flat & private garden

Title: Stylish Modern Flat near the Station & Laines
Description: Located 1 minute walk from Brighton train stationthis sophisticated and trendy house is the perfect place to rest and relax during your stay in Brighton.When you‚Äôre not relaxing with your feet uptake a very short walk into town to dine at central local restaurants pubs and barsfollowed by a short stroll down to the infamous Brighton Lanes for some shoppingthen hit the beach.The spaceThe space.The suite is fully equipped with a kitchena stylish wet roomluxurious double bedas well as a dining tableWiFia Smart TV and a sea view from the living room window. Whether you‚Äôre a single traveller / business person / couple or group of friends visitingyou‚Äôll be comfortable in this little apartment and find everything you need.Other things to note.There are two flights of stairs.

Title: Seascape, house on the beach at Hayling Island
Description: "Offering stunning sea viewsthis beach house is perfect for a holiday or work space (super fast fibre) on the south coast. Step onto the beach from the garden and enjoy miles of shingle and sanddepending upon the tide.Designed to maximise the incredible sea viewsthe bedrooms are on the ground floor with living areas above. It has an enclosed patio garden and off street parking. BBQsea kayakskids bikestoysgamesbuckets & spades provided! For rainy daysx boxSky & BT sport"The space"The space.Seascape is perfect for familiesgroup getawayswater sports enthusiasts or those working remotely with super fast broadband. The island is a great place to try out a new water sport or take a course. Kite surfingwindsurfingstand up paddle boardingkayaking and sailing can be arranged for groups or individuals (see contact details below).The house offers a great base for walkers who can enjoy the beautiful walks around the island and in Chichester harbour.For those who just want to get away from it allthe viewswhatever the weatherare incredible and ever changing. You dont need to go anywherejust relax on the sofas on the balcony; have a bbq in the garden or snuggle up round the fire pit at night.Seascape is kid friendlywith its enclosed patio gardenstair gateshigh chairs and travel cots. Baby sitting is available on request. There is no road to cross to get to the beach. The promenadewhich is on the other side of the gategoes from one end of the island to the othermaking it particularly suitable for buggiesscooters and bikes as well as walkers. A ten minute walk along the promenade takes you to the ice cream parlour and the best fish and chip shop. From here you can catch the light railway along the coast to the funfair at Beachlands.Ground Floor:.2 super king/twin bedroomsone with en suite.1 double bedroom.1 bunk room with 2 sets of bunk beds.Family shower room.Utility room.Garage for storage.Enclosed patio gardenFirst Floor:.Open plan living/dining/sitting area with patio doors onto roof terrace and panoramic sea views.Kitchen with electric ovengas hobmicrowavefridge/freezerdishwasher & coffee machine.WHAT TO DO:At the house‚Ä¶Sit and watch the world go by. The seascape is ever changing with the wind and weather. You will see sailing boatssea kayakscruisers and tankers pass by. You may see light aircraft playing in the sky above or a lifeboat and coastguard helicopter practising a rescue out at sea.Readrelaxwatch a filmlisten to musicdo a puzzleplay a board game (find them in the tv cupboard)Have a BBQ in the garden (briquettes in the garage)On the beach‚Ä¶Eat fish and chips (from The Coastguard10 mins walk away)Sit in a deck chair at the water‚Äôs edge (deckchairs in the garage)Take a dip (towels in utility room)Paddle in a sea kayak (stored in garageplease wear a buoyancy aid!)Build your masterpiece in the sand at low tide (buckets and spades in garage)Go Fishing (tackle and bait can be bought from tackle shop on Creek Rd5 mins walk away)Fly a kite (one in garage)Stretch your legs‚Ä¶Go for a strollcycle or scooter along the promenade on the other side of the garden gate.10 minutes walk west takes you to Eastoke corner with its fabulous Coastguard fish and chip shop and Pepperelli‚Äôs Ice cream parlour. From here you can‚Ä¶Follow the seafront exercise trail or take a ride on the little steam train which takes you along the sea front to‚Ä¶The traditional seaside fun fair at Beachlands or take your skate board to the hayling skate park. From here you can‚Ä¶Walk further along the beach to Inn on the Beach which has fabulous food and spectacular views and you can watch the windsurfers and kite surfers at play.If you take a stroll east from the houseyou‚Äôll pass the nature reserve (take your binocularsit‚Äôs a haven for birds and birdwathers!)the life boat centre and the sailing clubto Sandy Point at the mouth of Chichester Harbour. Views of the south downsthe Witterings and East Head are stunning and at low tideyou can walk onto the sand bar ‚Äòisland‚Äô.Go crabbing (nets in the garage). If you walk all the way round sandy pointpast the sailing club you reach an inlet. There is a little bridge back to the mainland and if you cast your nets into the muddy water belowwith a little baconthe crabs will be unable to resist‚Ä¶.Away from the house‚Ä¶Cycle or walk the Hayling Billy Trail. You can cycle or drive to the end of the old rail track which ran from Havant to West Town. It is an easy coastal trail and The Ship Inn in Langstone Harbour makes the perfect place to stop for refreshments before you head back to West Town.At Ferry Pointon the western point of the islandboard the Rosie K for a fabulous harbour boat tour of Langstone Harbour. It‚Äôs best to book at low tide to increase your chances of seeing the harbour seals.Swing a golf club at the pay and play Hayling Island golf club on the coast or Tournebury.Swing a racket at the pay and play tennis courts at Hayling Community CentreHire or book a lesson on a paddle boardwindsurf or kite surf (contact andy biggs watersportswest town)Dine out! There are many great places to eat on the island‚Ä¶Explore further afield‚Ä¶Drive east to Chichester with its CathedralRoman Villa and the beach at The Witterings and East Head Nature Reserve. Take a boat cruise with Chichester Harbour Water Tours.Go to an event at Goodwood or the races at FontwellDrive west to Portsmouth. Visit the Historic Dockyards to see the HMS Victory & Warrior and the Mary Rose and a Harbour Tour around the active naval base. Check out the views from Spinnaker Tower at Gunwharf Quaysshop at the outlet storesbowl or watch a movie. Drive further west to visit the Maritime History at Southampton.Take the kids to the Inflatables water park at ChichesterMarwell Zoothe Blue Reef Aquarium in Southsea or Peppa Pig World at Paultons ParkTake a day trip to the Isle of Wight by car ferry from Portsmouth or on foot by hovercraft from SouthseaTake a walk on The South Downs Way or visit Queen Elizabeth Country Park or Stansted ParkTake a steam train ride on the Bluebell Railway in Sussex or the Watercress Line between Alton and Alresford"Other things to note.If you are planning to stay for the weekendplease enquire about a later checkout on a Sunday. Whenever possiblewe will delay the changeover until Monday so that you can check out as late as you like on Sunday. Howeverthis is only possible out of peak season.

Title: Modern 2 bed with sea views & beach access ‚òº
Description: PLEASE NOTE THAT OUR NEIGHBOURS ABOVE HAVE SCOFFOLDING UP AT THE MOMENT SO THE VIEW IS DISRUPTED.The spaceThe space.With stunning views across the Solent and access to the beachthis large modern two-bedroom apartment is everything you could want in a beach get away. The large patio doors open out to uninterrupted views of the sea and the private garden is only a few meters from the water. Located on the first floor and in a quiet roadthis apartment is only a stone throw away from nearby shopscafes and pubs.This first floor apartment has one double bed2 single beds and 1 additional single bed means this property sleeps 5 comfortably. Large sofa and living area and newly fitted kitchen means you will feel at home during your beach get away.Guest access.Nearby there is a wine/gin bar and ice cream parlour not to mention a few minutes‚Äô drive from Hayling Fun Fair. There is plenty to do from visiting the nature reserve to water sports hirethere is something for everyone.There is free parking is onsite for 2 carsPlease note that access to the beach is back out the front door and round the building to the garden.Other things to note.This property is professionally managed by Pass the Key which means guests have access to a 24 hour dedicated support lineprofessional and thorough cleans between stayshotel quality linenbath and hand towels and hotel style toiletries.Check in from 4pm and check out at 11am.We can offer travel cots and high chairs for a small fee - please advise when booking.
