Title: The Boathouse on the beach in Seagrove Bay
Description: "Rare opportunity to enjoy a truly special holiday in an outstanding converted Victorian boathouse. The Boathouse sits in a totally unique settingin one of the most sought-after premium locations on the Isle of Wight. The house itself commands central position in the bay and fronts onto a magical beach with far reaching views across to The Solent.Seagrove Bay embodies the notion of a far-off sandy cove and is simply magical and alive with sailing boats of all shapes and sizes. The surrounding area ouzos blissful tranquillitywith buttery soft sands and glistening clear water punctuating the landscape.The Boathouse is an upside-down house that is set over three floorssleeping 6 guests on the ground floormaximising the picturesque views of the beach and Bay to the other two floors. The sitting room is simply a gorgeous spacecontemporarylightextremely comfortable and those VIEWS! The dining room can sit up to 8 guest and has direct access via stairs to the front balcony area on the ground floor. The Boathouse also has the added benefit of having an enclosed rear lawned gardenplus the luxury of garage parking for one car.Accommodation:.Ground Floor:.Three bedrooms: 1 King Double with a large wardrobe1 Double1 Twin. Family bathroomwith roll top bath and a separate showerWC and basin.First Floor:.A central staircase takes you up to the living areawhere the sea and beach views are simply stunning.The living area consists of a thoughtfully fitted kitchen with bar stool seating for three,.A gorgeous sitting room with log burnerplenty of comfortable seating looking towards those panoramic Solent views.A separate dining room seating up to 8 guests.Off the kitchen there is a utility room with WCbasin and laundry facilities.Second Floor:.Sitting area with a freeview TVa perfect retreat for the teenagers.Outside:.Outside to the rear there is an enclosed lawned garden with an outdoor shower. To the front there is a balcony area overlooking the beach and Solent. Garage parking for 1 car.Amenities:.Gas heating and hot waterlog burner with a starter pack of logs.Cooker - electric double oven with a gas hobmicrowave.Dishwasherfridge freezertoasterkettlecafeti√®re.Wifi2 x Freeview TV‚ÄôsDVDbluetooth DAB radio.Travel cothighchairattached stairgates on all the stairs (top and bottom).Hairdryerironironing board.Linen and towels inc in rent (not beach towels)heating inc in rent.Charcoal BBQ.Note:1 Dog is welcome on request ONLY.Note: Sorry no parties.Note: The property is set over three levelswith the bedroom being on the ground floor.Note: Children must be supervised at all times while on the front balcony area. Note: The front balcony area is used at your own riskplease always take care. Garden furniture will be outside from the Spring to the early AutumnThe seaside resort of Seaview was built by the Edwardians due to the stunning panoramic sea views and great sandy beachesand these assets are still very much true today. The Boathouse sits in the middle of Seagrove Bay which is a much sought-after holiday destination to be desired as you can quite simply gently melt into the sands for a long day of sun basking. The property itself faces a shallow bay with a host of water sports and inviting turquoise blue water to explore. A short walk along the beach and you find yourself on Priory Bay. ‚ÄòTreasure Island ‚Äò always comes to mind as you turn the corner from Seagrove Bay into Priory Baya view you simply cannot get board ofand just as wonderful in the winter monthsespecially on those crisp winters morning - simply breath taking. Look for the many oysters and scallops that regularly get washed up from these sparkling waters. Explore along the beachlineand let the children‚Äôs imagination go wildplay cricket or boule at low tideor just relax and enjoy a delicious picnic. The Boathouse looks straight across the Solent to Portsmouth and the Spinnaker Towerand the famous Solent forts. It is only a short walk into Seaview where you will find The Old Fort a newly refurbished gastro pubAA award winning Seaview HotelSeaview Yacht Clubthe wonderful Lilys Cafethe new Lime & Chilli Indian restaurant (bring your own bottle)chemistpost officecommunity store stocked with delicious local produceand a couple of boutique shops.ShopPub and Restaurant 1.6 miles by car or just a short walk along the beachor costal path which is directly outside of your rear gate. Nearest beach 0.0 milesRyde 3.6 miles by car.Outside of Seaview discover English Heritage‚Äôs Carisbrooke Castle and Osbourne House. Take the family to Dinosaur Isle and the activity parks at Blackgang Chine and Robin Hill Country Park.Alternatelya host of activities tempt the more adventurous visitorssuch as hikinghorse riding or mountain biking across the famous Tennyson Downs all the way to the far West point of the islanddiscover the island‚Äôs greeneryexploring the breath-taking landscapes on route. Why not take the family and explore our caves by kayakor challenge yourself with some paragliding from our chalk cliffs? For the water enthusiasts the island offers something for the whole familyfrom sailingpaddle boardingkitesurfingwindsurfingkayaking. Or simply just enjoy a picnic or bbq and enjoy some spectacular sun sets on one of the many beaches from Bembridge to Brook. Oh the possibilities"The spaceThe space.Three bedrooms all on the ground floor: 1 King Double1 Double1 Twin. Ground Floor family bathroomwith roll top bath and a separate shower. Stairs take you up to the living areaso you can benefit from the most stunning sea views. With a fitted kitchensitting room with log burnerand a separate dining roomboth with those breath-taking seaside views. Off the kitchen there is a utility room with cloakroom facilities. Up the second set of stairs takes you to another sitting areaa perfect retreat for the teenagers. Outside to the rear there is a lawned enclosed garden with an outdoor shower. To the front there is a balcony area overlooking the beach and Solent."Other things to note.1. Please do not leave children unattended at the front of the propertythere is quite a drop down to the beach.2. No Smoking.3. No Pets allowed in the bedroomsor on the furniture. Pets must not be unattended in the property or garden area. All No 2s to be picked up before you leave. We would appreciate if you could hoover up any excess dog hair before you leave as well.4. No Parties.5. No parking in-front of the garage - Access is required at all times.6. Please remember you have neighboursso please be courteous and respectful - Thank You.7. 2. There are storm doors in-front of the beach fronted windowsplease close when windyor if a storm is expected. The doors can be used as blackouts as well.8. Please use the front balcony at your own riskthere is a big drop down to the beach.9. Small children must be supervised at all times while out on the front balcony area.10. Please advise on booking if bringing dogsthen we can get the property dog ready."

Title: Beachfront Penthouse with Parking üñ§ Estuary Views
Description: A Coastal Retreat situated on the Beachfront. Boasting unspoilt Panoramic Sea Views for miles. Hear the birds sing & the Estuary Glisten!.Central to Four Blue Flag BeachesRestaurantsCafesWater Sports & Local Attractions.Renovated & Re-Designed with Bi-Folding Glass doors to bring the OutsideInsidesit back & relax enjoy the views.The property has been Intricately Designed embracing tiny details that define our property with Luxuries for a Cosy Stay with Continental Breakfast.The spaceThe space.Looking for a coastal retreat for a dose of sea breeze? We are situated in the sort after area of Thorpe Bayopposite the award-winning beach.We are a hopskip and a jump away from the waves (quite literally)& yet close enough to some fabulous barsfine diningcoastal walks & the longest pier in the world!We boast panoramic views overlooking boats in the estuary & across the blue flag beach. The bi-folding glass doors & the numerous glass skylights is just a few of the things that set us apart.The only views you will enjoy from the sofa are the boats sailing pasttide coming in & out& the sun setting at dusk & rising at dawn. The views are truly breathtaking.The entire flat oozes style & boasts high-end fixtures and finishes. Designed with your modern comforts like high-speed Wi-FiSmart TVdown lighting throughout & fully equipped kitchen.We offer a cosy stay with all your home comfortsproviding less stress when you are packing for your stay.This stylish Penthouse Apartment is the perfect escape for a luxury stay. It lends itself to romantic getawayscelebrations & a place to re wind down & re-energiseBreakfast Included: -.Fresh bakery productFruitTiptree PreservesTiptree Saucesselection of packet cerealbutter & your choice of milk.Speciality teascoffeesugar & an assortment of fine biscuits.If you require any Hospitality Services during your Stayplease scroll down for more information.The flat is equipped with: -.Wifi.50 inch Smart TV & Netflix.Cooling Bladeless Fan.Hob & Oven.Washer/Dryer (no additional charge).Kettle.Toaster.Microwave.All your daily cooking utensils.Potspansbaking trays etc.Champagne Bucket.Iron & Ironing board.HooverPicnic essentialscooler bag with plates & glasses etcice packsbeach chairs & umbrella.Games cupboard with a few board games & playing cards.Bathroom.Bluetooth bathroom speaker.Complimentary ‚ÄòWellness Exclusive‚Äô Shampooconditionershower gelsoapshower capcotton padstoothbrushes & paste.Towels & face flannels.Bedroom.Comfy King Size bed.Hairdryer.Full length mirror & illuminated top mirror.Mini Jukebox Bluetooth speaker.Extra pillows.Snuggle blankets.HangersKitchen cupboard essentials: -.Disposable takeout cups.Olive oilcoconut oilvinegarsalt & pepper.Selection of spices & sauces.Cling filmtin foilbaking sheetsfood bags & ice bags.Washing tabs.Home cleaning products.User manual of all appliances.We are within a 5 min walking distance of the most popular restaurants.Check out my guidebook for sightseeingactivities & great restaurants. Thorpe BaySouthend offers something for everyone.Hospitality Services:.With over 20 years of experience within the hospitality industryit is my pleasure to source & execute services for you. Here is a list of some of the services that I can offer: -~ Room D√©cor for a BirthdayAnniversaryor any special celebration.~ Afternoon Tea.~ Private Chef.~ Mini Bar.~ Food Packages from your morning fry up to Picnik on the Beach.~ Birthday CakeBalloonsbubbles on ice & ReservationsIf you have any other requestsplease do not hesitate in contacting me.Useful InformationPlease note that during the joyful summer monthsthe weather may attract the pesky bugs!We have two train stations,.C2C service into London Fenchurch StreetApprox 1 mile.National Rail into London Liverpool StreetApprox 2 miles.Southend Airport is Approx 6 miles.Lots of Local Taxis companiesGuest access.You have the entire place to yourselves.Other things to note.Lots of restaurants along the beachbarscafes & water sports.Beach hut rental locally.Casinos.Cafes.Plenty of shopping centres.Local shops.Sight seeing.Great walks.Historical sights.Golf.Paddle boarding.Bike hire.Seal watching.Plenty to see & do within easy reach!

Title: Stylish Seafront Flat
Description: Beautiful seafrontfirst floorsouth facing apartment recently re decorated to a high standard. Direct sea views.The spaceThe space.First floor sea front flat centrally located by Hasting Pier and walking distance to all the amenities of St Leonards On Sea and Hastings. Warm comfortable and welcoming.LIVING ROOM.South facing with direct sea view. High ceilings with large sash windows and a door leading to private balcony. While the flat is no smoking am happy for you to smoke on the balcony. Large sofa which can also act as additional bed. (Extra duvet bedding available) TV with normal Freeview and also Amazon Fire Stick that includes NetflixAmazon Prime and Disney+. The room also has 2 high quality Blue Tooth Sound Systems available. Raft wooden dining room table with 4 chairs.Please note the fire is not operational and can not be lit.International Plug adaptors and extension cables available.Flat is fully gas central heated.BEDROOM.Double bed with new mattress and lovely view from the bed through large window to hillside at the rear of the flat. Cupboard and chest of draws are empty and available to you. Bedside tablesbedside lamps. There are USB double plugs next to each bed.KITCHEN.Tassimo Coffee machine with some welcome pods available. Fridge FreezerWashing MachineMicrowaveGas Hob and Electric Convention OvenKettleToaster and all utensils including pots and pans. Outside the kitchen is a lovely seating area.BATHROOM.Bathshower and toilet with soaptoilet paper provided.

Title: Salty Lodge (UKC3456)
Description: Set in an idyllic location just steps from the beachthis bungalow is perfect for familiescouples and friends alike. 3 steps to entrance. All on the ground floor.Living/dining room: With Freeview TV and patio doors leading to decked area.Kitchen: With electric oveninduction hobmicrowavefridge/freezerdishwasher and washing machine.Bedroom 1: With kingsize bed and patio doors leading to decked area.Bedroom 2: With twin beds.Shower room: With shower cubicle and toilet. Gas central heatingelectricitybed linentowels and Wi-Fi included. Travel cot. Enclosed decked area with garden furniture and charcoal barbecue. Outside hot shower. Private parking for 6 cars. No smoking. Please note: There are 4 steps down to the beach. . Enjoying a wonderful coastal locationSalty Lodge is a light and airy single-storeydetached propertywith fantastic sea views across to the Isle of Wight. It has a largedecked sitting-out area to the rear ‚Äì ideal for alfresco dining or enjoying a drink on a warm eveningand where beautiful sunsets can also be viewed. At the end of the back garden there are steps over the low wall directly onto the pebble/sandy beachand fishing is available nearby. When the tide goes out it makes a great crabbing areawith many pools along the sand. Salty Lodge has been refurbished in 2018 and offers modern and tastefully presented accommodation for couples or families.Hayling Island is well known for its sailing activitiesit is sheltered by the Isle of Wightmaking it ideal for watersports activities. It is renowned for its windsurfingkayakingpower boatingjet ski-ingkitesurfing and wake boarding. Local paddle boating and windsurfing lessons are available close by. Every year there is a national windsurfing eventand a hive of sailing and nautical activity can be seen along the coastline. Walk the Hayling Billy Trailwhich starts at the former railway line where the theatre now isor take a pleasant amble overlooking Langstone Harbour.Many activities can be enjoyed locally for all agesincluding a seaside railway and a small amusement park for the children. For the sports enthusiastSeacourt is also worth a visitwith 5 racket sports including real tennis. Alsonearby activities including golfhorse ridingboat trips and scenic walks along the water‚Äôs edge or scenic walks along the South Downs National Park which are within easy reach. Chichester with its beautiful cathedralfestival theatrepedestrianised shoppingleisure centreRoman Villa and Goodwood or Fontwell racesit‚Äôs definitely worthy of a visit. Visit Portsmouth with waterside diningferry trips to the Isle of Wightdesigner outletsNatural Museumleisure facilitiesSpinnaker TowerHMS Victoryor the maritime history at Southampton. Winchester with its cathedralabbey and The New Forest are within easy driving distance. Plenty of National Trust homes and gardens can also be discovered nearby. Beach 4 yards. Shop 220 yardspub and restaurant 330 yards.Free WiFi

Hastings Pier and St Leonards train station are 5 mins walk and there are plenty of restaurants & bars within easy walking distance.Contemporary kitchenwith central island where you can have a cup of coffee or glass of wine and watch the sunset..In the bedroomopen the huge double doors and you can lie in bed and still see the sea!Modernen-suite bathroom.Other things to note.For the first time I‚Äôve had to add a cleaning charge due to COVID safety requirements.Please note heating is via guest- controlled radiatorswhich switch off automatically between midnight and 6am.

Title: Sea-view Retreat in Old Town
Description: A stunning 2 bedroom seaside apartment in the Grade II Listed building of Pelham Crescent.Perfectly located in the Old Town with direct sea views and great local amenities.The space"The space.We are very happy to host our recently renovated apartment in the Grade II Listed building of Pelham Crescent in the Old Townwith amazing direct sea views through beautiful Georgian Windows on to the main strip of the beach.The property is located within the oldest part of Hastingsa beautiful and exciting part of town full unique and stunning architecture and history. The apartment is also located next to the gothic St Mary Church. The property is a historical buildingwith all its charmand is nestled amongst the apartments is Gothic St Marys Church. Pelham Crescent and the Church was built in the late 19th century and still remains a beautiful and iconic buildingperfectly located facing the sea.The apartment is the perfect option for short lets or longer stays in Hastings. For singlescouplesfriends or small families.The flat is located on the second floor of a four storey building. There is a large open lounge which faces directly onto the seawith a brand newly fitted kitchenfully equipped at the back of the room.The apartment is full of character and rustic charm and provides all the basic home comforts.The kitchen is well stocked of cooking utensilscutlerycrockery and spices.The lounge has a seating and dining area (with an extra dining table in the kitchen if needed)as well as a record playerbooks and TV for entertainment. There is ample space for 4 or more people to share the room at any given time.The lounge runs through into the hallwaywhich leads on to the two double bedrooms and bathroom. Both bedrooms face directly on to the ancient cliffs of Hastings and are very private with nothing but the cliffs and seagulls onlooking.The small bathroom has also been fitted with a brand new toilet and bathroom setand was newly decorated with a new high pressure shower. Please notethis is not a luxurious bathroom as it has taken pressure from leaky roofs from above is decorated when needed and is functional and clean.The larger bedroom can accommodate a travel cot. Please request this via the enquiry option and specify you have a child so we can arrange accordingly.The following is also available and provided during your stay.Free wi-fi - very strong speed - password can be found on the router box on the shelf in the lounge.Full use of all utensilscondimentsspices etc in flat including bathroomkitchenlounge.Full kitchen utensils etc.Fresh sheets.Towels.Hair dryerThe vintage record player is unfortunately not working anymore but we have a vintage radio which you can enjoy.Please can you remember to always use cup holders and place mats for the surfaces on the dining table and the nest of small tables as they stain pretty much immediately with heat or wine : )Feel free to use anything you can see in the flat and feel comfortable in the flat as your own home. There will be a variety of condiments for you to cook up a nice mealand there will be towels etc.Parking should be easyas its just opposite the flat on the beach front at Pelham Place car park.Please do not invite any unannounced guests to the flat. We may consider docking from your deposit if guests are found to have done so.Please also remember to keep the noise down after 11pm sharpout of respect for the neighbours. The building is also an old building so please noteas expectedthat sound does travel through the floors. Please also be mindful not to let the front door bang or to make noise in the hallway as noise travels easily through the building.If you have a pet your would like to accompany youplease enquire in advance as there is an extra charge of ¬£15 for cleaning. I will also require that your pet comes with bedding and is not allowed on the fabrics and sheets in the flat.Many thanks.There is parking in the Pelham Car Parkdirectly opposite the building (but across the road so there is no road noise or traffic). Parking in the other Old Town is difficult but we have never had any problems with this car park. All day parking costs ¬£8. Evening parking is ¬£1 from 6pm until 8am.There are an array of great quirky shopscafes and restaurants at a stones throw away from the flat. The High Street in the Old Town and St Leonards have the most and best options for independent food and drink venuesshops and galleries.Opposite the flat on the beach frontthere is family entertainment such as crazy golfvolley ball and a cycle hire shack.All of Hastings eventssuch as food festivalsbonfire nightcarnival and Pirates day and much moreall happens in this part of the townand the parades take place just outside the window facing this stretch of the seafrontso you can also have the best view and can enjoy the atmosphere from the comfort of the apartment if preferred.George Street and the High Streetas well as Jerwoods Gallery are minutes walk from the flatwhere you can take the lift to the Cliff Tops or start your adventures around the Old Town from.The new town is also a stones throw away. St Leonards (Norman and London Road) is approx 15 minutes walking along the beach fronttowards the opposite the opposite direction from the Old Town. Its definite worth a visit!"Guest access.Please noteall bookings for 2 people will be assumed as using one bedroom. Please let me know if you need both bedrooms as the bedding will need to be made up for the extra room.Free wi-fi - very strong speed - password can be found on the router box on the shelf in the lounge.Full use of all utensilscondimentsspices etc in flat including bathroomkitchenlounge.Full kitchen utensils etc.Fresh sheets.Towels.Good quality travel cotplus mattress but you will be required to bring your own bedding. Please inform us that the cot is required on check in so we can organise."Other things to note.(Important - please read)*please be mindful of noise on the communal stairs as some neighbours do night shifts and may be sleeping.*please notify me if you wish to bring a pet. One pet is allowed with an extra cleaning fee of ¬£15. The pet is required to sleep on their own bedding and should not use be allowed on the beds and fabrics.*For two people bookings who require the use of the additional bedroomplease let me know on enquiry so we can ensure the 2nd bedroom is made up on arrival.Do let us know if you have any questionshow big or small.Further information to follow on Hastings and St Leonards and check in details to follow on booking."

Title: Flat with Breathtaking Sea Views
Description: Our vintage shabby-chic one bedroom Victorian flatwith breathtakingpanoramic sea views across the English Channelis only minutes from the beach and picturesque Old Townwith its boutiquesart galleriesrestaurantsbric-a-brac shopscafes and bars.Follow us on Instagram on: @flatwithbreathtakingseaviewsThe spaceThe space.The Flat:.An elegant 1 bedroom flat with unobstructedpanoramic sea views across the West Hill Commonthe East Hill Nature Reserve and the English Channel.Boasting dark wooden floors throughoutan open marble fire placehigh ceilingstastefully decorated in vintage seaside charmmaking it a very attractive and convenient one-bedroom holiday apartment to suit 2 (or 4) people.Bedroom:.Has a relaxing and extremely comfortable double bed with plenty of light during the day and black-out curtains at night.The bedroom has two windowsfacing the back of the housewhich are double glazedallowing you to have a quiet nights sleep.There are a selection of books and magazines to read on the vast shelves of the bedroom (please leave the books and magazines in the flator have a chat with me about borrowing anyif you are too engrossed in a story to leave it behind ;-).A cot bed can be provided for babies/ toddlerswith prior warning.Just outside the bedroomyou will find an iron and ironing board as well as a useful umbrella for those rainy English daysand a sun tent to protect the little ones when it\s too hot on the beach.In this same cupboard you can find a laundry hangera wooden baby\s high chaira Henry Hoovermopbroom and a wicker mat for the beach.Living Room:.With a gorgeous grey marble fireplace as its centrepiece and TRULY unobstructed breathtaking sea views across the West HillEast Hill and English Channel. The living room also benefits from a double sofa bedto cater an additional two people.I have also provided a wicker basket of children\s toysto entertain little onesshould they also be our guests and a backgammon/chess setplus Trivial Pursuit for "bigger kids".A retro DAB radio - with iPod/iPhone dock - can be found on the "gramophone"to add a bit of ambience to your stay (and charge up your iPhones).There is also a selection of magazinesfor your browsing pleasurein the magazine rack.(Please leave the books and magazines in the flat)*Please note there is NO TELEVISION in the flat.. although there is an active TV license so you can enjoy all licensed channels on laptopsiPads and other mobile devices.Kitchen:.A tidy and intimate kitchenwith gorgeous reclaimed teak work surfaceswhich benefits from a washer/dryerfridgedouble oven4 hob gas cooker and all the conveniences of a modern home.You can find a kettletoasterhand blendera wide selection of glassesmugsplates and vases as well as a few cook books to inspire you (if you are thinking of eating in).A selection of "Take Away" menus can be found on the rack in the hallway - If you are a fan of Indian food Jali is a favourite of ours.Under the sink you will be able to find any cleaning products you may need during your stay.A fire extinguisher (in case of fire) is located to the left of the kitchenon the counter.Next to the kettle you will find an "HONESTY JAR"for you to add a contribution if you break or misuse anything. Please be as generous as you feel is right toso that guests after you can also enjoy these added perks.In the kitchen I have added a folder (grey/blue) with all my favourite places to eatdrinksee and do in Hastings.Bathroom:.A light and modern bathroomwith toiletsinkbathtub and hand held shower. Body soapshampoo/conditioner can be found here too.In the bathroom you will also find a small first aid kitin case of bumps and grazes (and in case of Hair Emergenciesa Vidal Sassoon full power hair dryera curling wand and BabyBliss travel hair straighteners can be found in the bedroom on top of the red cupboard).RecentlyI have ensured that all beauty products (ShampooConditionerBody WashHand SoapWashing Up Liquid etc..) provided in my property are VeganOrganicChemical & Sulphate Free. FAITH IN NATURE is the company that ticks all the boxesand I purchase their products in bulk (which I then use to refill the glass jars in the bathroom and kitchen).I have done this to play my part in reducing my (our) plasticwastechemical consumption & impact on the environment - as well as the more obvious animal welfare issueswhich I feel passionate about. www.faithinnature.co.ukThe flat also uses 100% renewable energyfrom a company called Bulb (who provides 100% of its electricity generated from WindSolar and Hydroelectrics). Click this link to join up in your UK property: www.bulb.co.uk/refer/bindud7875Guest access.Guests will have the flat to themselves at all times.It is situated on the first floor and of coursethere are neighbourson the floors above and belowwho need to be respected. Many thanks for understanding this..Guests have access to the flat via the main front door and up the stairs to the first floor.An entryphone is situated inside the flatto the right of the front doorfor your convenience.The Middle Bell outside the building pertains to the First Floor Flat."Other things to note.We can provide a travel Cot Bed and a Highchair should you need one.Please let us know of your requirements when you make your booking.If you are 2 peoplewho wont be sharing the double bed and you require the sofa bed as wellplease make your booking by stating you are 3 people (as this required more linenpreparation etc).All beauty products in the flat are OrganicVeganSulphate and Chemical free from FAITH IN NATURE. www.faithinnature.co.ukThe flat uses only 100% renewable energy from a British provider called Bulb.By switching to Bulb youre making the world a greener place to live in. Join the movement now with this link/code: www.bulb.co.uk/refer/bindud7875Children under 2 years of age can stay for free. Please state the total number of people staying in the flatwhen you make your booking.Certain weekends (during high season or when special festivals are taking place in Hastings) we may require you to book a minimum of two nights.Here are just a few of the many Festivals and local Events to note down for 2018:February ‚Äì Fat Tuesday - from 9-13.March ‚Äì Hastings Half Marathon ‚Äì 18 March.April ‚Äì Beatles Day 19 ‚Äì on 8th at White Rock Theatre.May - Hastings‚Äô Jack in the Green.June ‚Äì Stade Saturdays - cultural events every Saturday on Stade Open Space; and free!.July ‚Äì Hastings Beer and Music FestivalThe Oval.August ‚Äì Old Town Carnival Week.September ‚Äì Seafood & Wine Festival.October ‚Äì Hastings Bonfire ‚Äì 13 October.November ‚Äì Hastings Storytelling Festival.December ‚Äì It‚Äôs Christmas!Please follow us on Instagram - @flatwithbreathtakingseaviews"

Title: 2 Bed Seafront Regency Apartment with Sea Views***
Description: Welcome to our hideaway by the sea. Our cosy home is within a beautiful coastal Grade II Listed building near the shores of Brighton beachwith direct and uninterrupted panoramic sea views. Well located on a prestigious main street in Kemptown villagethe sea is literally across the road while the PierThe LanesBrighton Marina and all the other amazing places are just a stroll away. The interior has been crafted for comfortrelaxing and snoozeswith a sprinkle of style on top.The space"The space.Our coastal retreat is on the 3rd floor of a grand Regency Grade II Listed building on Brighton‚Äôs seafront. So as you step into the apartment you‚Äôll be welcomed by the stunning direct sea viewsneatly framed by the sash bay windows. We‚Äôve kept other original features (inc. the slight wonkiness of the floors and ceilings)but have combined that period character with a modernity to create a home that is relaxeddelightful and practical. Our apartment has two good sized double bedroomsan open lounge/dining/kitchen main areaand a bathroom.-THE LOUNGE is airy and bright with wooden flooring and casual furniture. There‚Äôs also a writing desk/chair with USB charging. The dining area is placed by the windowso meals can be enjoyed with a sun lit sea view.-THE KITCHENETTE is compact but serves most short holiday needs inc. electric induction hobovenfridge freezer and ample storage space. There‚Äôs also a microwavetoaster and cutlerycrockery and basic cooking utensils.-THE LARGER BEDROOM is very generously sized with a king size bedside tablesdressing tablebuilt-in wardrobes with plenty of hanging space and other furnishings to ensure a restful experience. The quirkier second bedroom hides behind a sliding door and has bedside tablesfurnishingsand a double bed facing out at the ocean.-THE BATHROOM is cleanfunctional and includes storagevanity unitwashing machine and a bath tub offering the option of a good long soak or a quick shower.The apartment has gas central heating. It also has a hair dryerironironing boardand fresh towels and bed linen are provided. The building doesn‚Äôt have a lift though but the elevated views will hopefully make the short ascent to the apartment worthwhile.-PARKING.Finallywhilst we don‚Äôt have a dedicated parking space but our guests normally dont have a problem on getting a good spot. It is basically on street metered parking (between ¬£12-16/day)closest space is right opposite to our building.Using the ‚ÄòPaybyphone parking app is a great way to monitor the parking time remotely. Highly recommend."Other things to note.Our apartment is within a friendly Regency building shared with a few other householdssome with young childrenso it‚Äôs not suited to any guests thinking of parties or other noisy activities. It is also on the 3rd floorso do bear that in mind when booking as there is no lift.

Title: Gorgeous seafront flat: views, parking, balcony

Title: Beautiful sea view Victorian apartment
Description: This raised ground floor apartment has direct sea views in an architect refurbished 1838 Decimus Burton house. The apartment is exceptionally spaciouswith light and airy decor and a selection of original artwork. It is a wonderful space to relaxadmire the sea views and watch the world go by.The apartment and entire building have been restored it has a modern spacious kitchen and living room with underfloor heating. There is a South facing balcony with sea views and a garden terrace.The spaceThe space.The apartment has been lovingly restoredretaining the beautiful Victorian featuresincluding a huge elaborate fireplaceoriginal coving and ceiling roses.The front room and kitchen are connected in a very large airy space with amazing views of the seawhich can be enjoyed from the balcony. Guests love watching the world go by from the windowand enjoy the seawhatever the weather.The furnishings include mid century modern piecesHeals sofas and eclectic lighting. The original wooden floors have been restored and benefit from underfloor heating in the front room.There are modern fittings in the smart kitchen areawhich is fully fitted with washer/dryerdishwasherfridgefreezerinduction hob and gas cooker.The bathroom/wet room has modern fittings with heated towel rail and underfloor heating.

Title: Amazing Beach Apartment
Description: Stunning modern apartment right on the beach with unlimited views of the sea and beach. 20 minutes outside of Brighton.The apartment has a 15 meters run of floor-to-ceiling windowsfacing south directly out to sea. Huge open plan livingdinningkitchen and entertaining space. We have installed an apple home pod and a large TV with Netflix.This apartment is not suitable for loud partiesstag or hen dos. It has steps up to the entrance. We ask guests to be respectful of everyone.The spaceThe space.Open plan kitchen and living area and three separate bedrooms to the back. The flat is an eco building with triple glazing - its is quiet inside.The apartment has access to the balcony that wraps around the South aspect of the apartment.Three bedroomsone with an ensuite bathroom and two with additional sofa beds. The apartment can sleep up to ten people."Guest access.The apartment is self contained and the guests have access to all parts. The balcony isnt segregated from the other apartments. But 20m is for exclusive access of this apartment."Other things to note.On Friday Nights in the summer we put on an outdoor cinema on the beach for a local charity. The balcony has the best view. For the films being shown please look at the facebook page of the perch cafe.

Title: Beautiful Beachside Chalet, Gurnard, Cowes
Description: Our seafront chaletBeachcombersis situated in the pretty village of Gurnard.Beachcombers is part of an eclectic mix of chalets and bungalows - come the evening you can take in some of the finest sunsets across the Solent.The spaceThe space.Beachcombers includes three bedroomstwo with king size double beds and one with a standard doublebunk bed and pull out mattress.We have a spacious kitchen with a cookerfridge and washing machine.Also included: Corner sofacentral heatingtwo bathroomswi-fi and tv.The beach is pebble and shingle and the front is lined with pretty beach huts and the beach currently holds a Seaside Award.We are a stones throw away from Gurnard Sailing Club - water sports and sailing are a popular past time in this area.There are a few small shops in Gurnard as well as two pubsboth of which serve food and offer a selection of drinks including Island ale. The Woodvale is located right at the seafront and serves food all day. Also located on the front is a sloping green and kids play area located near a small cafe serving snacks and ice cream.There are some great walks and cycle routes to be explored in the area and for those wanting a little more life in the eveningCowes town is a short walk away.By walking:Beach< a minute.Woodvale < 5 minutes.Shops < 10 minutes.Cowes < 30 minutesOur chalet has been handed down the generations and was recently renovated. We love the Isle of Wight and hope you will too.

Title: Sea to Sky Cottage: On BEACH fantastic SEA views
Description: Sea to Sky- great sea views & Isle of Wight from upstairs lounge & balcony.Sleep 6 max (including children)in 5 beds.Two level townhouse has stairs.Courtyard onto beach over flood defence stairs.Shower rain & hand over bath.Bath towels provided per guest numbers booked and 4 hand towels.2 wifi TV‚Äôs.Travel cot & highchairif requested.Garage bike storage.3 Car off-street parking.Key safe check-in after 4pm.No 3rd party bookings.NOT wheelchair or walker accessible.No animals on property.The spaceGuest access.Sea to Sky Cottage is a two storey townhouse style residence in a quiet neighbourhood on the bus route;.- free off street parking for 3 cars;.- enclosed back courtyard with direct access stairs over wall onto the beach;.- garage to store bicycleswind & kite surfers and kayakswhich is for guest use for the duration of their booking.Closest local pub is 1/2 mile.Childrens park 1/2 mile west opposite The Nab parking area.Walk/Cycle beach promenda west from Sea to Sky courtyard gate to outdoor fitness equipment areaice cream parlorpizzafish & chipsbeach railwayFunfair and amusment hall.Other things to note.No additional guests in addition to the number of people listed for the bookingare to be invited to Sea to Sky.No family and/or friends gatherings and no parties inviting people who are not booked gueststo join you at the property.This is a residential neighbourhood so please respect the quiet hours between 10pm to 9am and no loud music at anytime.A travel cot and/or highchair is available if requested at the time of bookingas these items are only made available in Sea to Sky when requested.The heating/hot water is adjusted on the Hive thermostat next to the front door. Press buttons on top left and right for boost of hot water or heating.If the temperature is warm due to weather please open windows and sliding door for a through breeze. A high volume fan is located in the dining room.For heating check that radiators are turned up to 6 in each room and a large free standing oil heater is located in the conservatory for additional local heating.Hot water is by a Solar Water Panel on the roof which is supplemented by a gas boiler when dark.

The comfortable living/dining area has a large southwest facing window and there‚Äôs a compact well-equipped kitchen. The spacious modern bathroom has a bath/shower and the cosy bedroom has a double bed and fitted wardrobes.Guest access.Guests have sole use of the entire flat.Other things to note.There is visitor parking which you can use for unloading. Public parking is 5 mins walk from the flat with charges capped at ¬£5.40/day.

Title: Coast View
Description: Stylish detached seaside homesituated right on the beach at Pevensey Baythe quiet shingle beach is the back gardenA set of wide steps with handrail lead you to the front of the property where you enter into a welcoming open lounge/kitchen/diner.There is now a virtual guidebook link belowthat can be downloaded prior to arrival that gives all the information you could need to help you enjoy your stay even more.https://hostful.ly/gvlcwsqThe spaceThe space.The kitchen area is well-equipped for family entertaining with an electric oven and hobfridge with ice compartmentwine cooler fridgedishwashermicrowaveTassimo coffee machine and washing machine. Relax at the breakfast bar or move to the lounge area which offers the perfect place to watch tv or look at the amazing sea-view from the comfy corner sofa. Catch up on your favourite TV programmes or Netflix on the Smart tvlisten to the DAB radio or play one of the board games that are kept in the footstool. The dining table with seating for six overlooks the rear beach sea-view garden and the wonderful horizon beyond. There are two bedroomsa double with a large Freeview tvan en-suite walk-in shower and WC. The second bedroom has a super-king-size zip-and-link bed (which can be made into twin beds on request). The property is completed with a second bathroom that has a rainfall type shower over bath and WC. In the garden that leads directly onto the beach is a dining table with 6 chairs and sun umbrellabar b qfire pitswinging chair and reclining chairs. There is also a storage shed with buckets and spades and ball games for use on the beach.

Title: 'Spindles', 2 bed house, near West Wittering beach
Description: This property has luxurious private accommodation. It sleeps up to 4 people - perfect for either 2 people2 couples or a family and an option of an additional single bed if 5 people wish to stay.It is close to West Wittering beachhas many coastal walksnumerous family activities and restaurants.Please note that there is another listingSpindles Annexwhich sleeps a further 2 people. Thereforeif availableit combines to make an ideal stay for a family and parents too.The spaceThe space.Everything within the property (‚ÄòSpindles‚Äô) has been finished to a high standard. Upon entering through into the gated property there are secure allocated parking bays off the beautiful original driveway - one for each bedroom. A path leads you alongside the decked seating area to the private oak front door. Insidethere is a large entrance hall with doors leading to the bedrooms (both with luxury en-suite facilities) and the kitchen/diner/living room."Guest access.The rented part of Spindles is a very private 2 bedroom house with its own front garden. Within the garden there is a shed which residents may use to store their bicycles and other beach equipment. Behind the shed there are 2 kayaks (single and double) which you may use (obviously at your own risk!!). Inside the entranceI have provided a selection of games (for all ages) for people to relax and enjoy. A selection of brochures will be available for those wishing to venture a little further from the beach."

Title: Dunes View, waterside home with stunning views.
Description: A contemporary waterside home overlooking the sand dunes and Bembridge Harbour.Whether it‚Äôs sundowners on the sunny terracewatersports or watching the world go bythis is the perfect spot.The idyllic village of Bembridge is within 5 minutes walking distance as are the many beautiful beaches. The living areaterrace and double bedrooms all have great Harbour views.Off road parking for two cars and a large garage to safely store bikes or watersports toys.The spaceThe space.All areas are available exclusively to guests.Guest access.Entire housedrivewaylarge garagepatio and grassed are to the front of the property.

Title: Beach house on a idyllic private beach
Description: "This is our family holiday home. We absolutely love to go down there for a chilled out weekend with the kids.We have three young children who Iove to play on the beach when the tide is low.The beach is almost privateeven in the high season there is barely anyone there. And the beach is the back garden! Im sure your family will love this place as much as we do!.Please note that school holiday and summer it‚Äôs a minimum of seven nights stay."The spaceThe space.The house has three bedroomsone king sizeone double and the kids room has four single beds. The beds are very comfortable ( mattress bought for our personal use)New log burner and central heating system installed for the winter months. Please bring logs if you wish to lit up the fire.There is a large living/ dinning roomand a sun lounge downstairskitchen and a toilet.Please note the house is a bit outdated( cosmetically) but it has everything a family need to have a great and comfortable holiday in a the perfect location! It‚Äôs all about The Location!!!.It‚Äôs fully equipped with dishwasherwashing machinea large fridgefreezermicrowaveNespresso coffee machineTVDVD playerwifibed linen are provided but not towels( please bring your own) lazy chairstoysbookstrampolineswing.Travel cot and high chair available.The beach is the back garden with amazing sunrise and sunset. And the full moon is my favourite!

Title: Seascape, panoramic views of the west hill and sea
Description: Sea Scape luxury apartment above Hastings Old Town with sea views over the green all the way to France. The seascape apartment has just been completely refurbished to a high standard with everything you might need for you stay. It is bright and airy with amazing views from all windows. A large section of DVDs Parking is street parking with no permits. If coming by train arrive at Hastings station there is a Sainsbury‚Äôs next to the station for any provisions. A taxi is about ¬£5 to the West HillThe spaceThe space.An outstanding one bed apartment with orthopaedic mattress and an added deluxe sofa bed in the open plan living,.Fully equipped kitchen area. Dining area 4 chairs breakfast bar with 2 Stools.Work Station to include a desk.If you enjoy films there is a large collection of DVD‚Äôs for your stay.Guest access.Communal front doorone flight of stairs to the apartment door situated is on the first floor.Other things to note.Please request travel cot if you need one for your stay as not stored at the apartment. Pub 2 minutes walk away. West Hill ideal for outdoor activitiesor just sit back and sun bathe. Overlooking the Old town and sea.

Title: Bright sea view 2 bedroom apartment by the pier
Description: "Welcome to our home-from-home opposite the English Channel and two minutes from Hastings pier. Enjoy big skies and stunning uninterrupted sea views from the living room & kitchen and serene cliff greenery from the bedrooms. Close to all local attractions its under 20 minutes stroll to Hastings Old Townsituated between the heart of St Leonards & Hastings town centre."The space"The space.The apartment is on the second floor and is simply furnished with modernmid-century and vintage stuff from and featuring the local area. It has recently been fully renovated and has new bedsbed linen and towels.The kitchen includes a microwavefridge with freezer sectiongas hob & electric ovendigital/bluetooth/FM radioblendera washer-dryer plus all essentials.Each bedroom has a fitted wardrobe and roller black out blinds behind the curtains. All bed linen is 100% cotton.The bathroom has a heated towel raila bath with rainfall & handheld showers and a steam-free mirror with light. All towels are 100% Egyptian cotton.In the living room there are two armchairsa three-seater sofa and a dining table to seat four. The TV includes a DVD player and there are a selection of DVDsbooks and board games.Sorrythe apartment is not suitable for children under the age of 12 years.The apartment is served by a liftaccessed via eight steps from the pavement to the ground floor lobby area. Please note the lift is quite old and isnt guaranteed to be operational during your stay."

Title: Spectacular Beach House
Description: Westbeach is pleased to present this stunning beach house retreat comprising of 3 bedroomsfor up to 6 guests. This immaculate 3-storey beach housewith unrivalled sea views from every roomelegant decor and high quality bedding & linenis perfect for a coastal getaway. You are spoilt with a lovelysplit-level garden with direct access to the beach. There is a Chesney wood burning BBQ stove which is lovely to cook on and to sit around for cosy outdoor evenings.The spaceThe space.The property compriseson the ground floora beautiful living room with panoramic sea views and full length opening windowsa small study off the living room and a charming twin bedroom with sea views and en-suite shower room. Then on the first floor are two good sized double bedrooms one with Kingsize bed and en-suite shower room and the other with a double plus there is a single blow up bed for a small child. Both bedrooms offer spectacular sea views of the Sussex coastline. Also on this level is a separate family bathroom with WCbath and shower over. On the lower ground floor is a spaciousfully fittedwell equipped kitchenwith open plan dining & living areautility room and separate WC in hallway. There is a breakfast bargood sized dining table and comfy sofa to one end with bi-fold doors opening out to the decked garden and beach beyond. Beachwear is also provided which includes beach towelssome wet suitsbuoyancy aid jackets and some body boards. The house also provides some garden games and board games. In the decked garden there are loungersa swing chair and dining table and chairs. This uniquestylish property is a special place to unwind and enjoy the beach life.Other things to note.In respect of Covid-19our cleaners are taking a more specific protocol on cleaning upon Check-In/Check-Out of propertiesensuring thorough and stricter cleaning activities are adhered too.In line with these high cleaning standards we request a 4 pm check in to ensure our cleaners have plenty of time in-between guests.In additionthe owner of this property leaves anti-bacterial wipes and spray for those that feel they want to use this where necessary for their own reassurance.House RulesNo smoking.Not suitable for pets.No parties or events.Check-in time is 4PM - 9PM.Check-out time is 10 am.Shoes are removed within the house to avoid sand damaging the flooring.

Title: Lovely Annexe near the Beach, in Central Worthing.
Description: A lovely seaside ground floor Annexea stones throw from the BeachSplash Point and Restaurants in Central Sunny Worthing. The Annexe has a bright open plan kitchen/lounge/diner with a lovely sofa bed and flat screen television. The bedroom has a comfortable double bed and flat screen TV. The family sized Bathroom has everything you need and huge fluffy towels. For parking your carthere is one dedicated space on our driveway allocated for guests. Also a Nespresso machine.The spaceThe space.The Annexe is a good sizedbrightone bedroom ground floor flat. Freshly decorated in January 2021. The living area has a table that can comfortably seat four people and a wide sofa that easily turns into a comfortable double sofa bed. There is a flat screen Television and wi-fi. The living area also contains a good sized kitchen with an oven and hoba family sized fridge/freezer and washing machine/dryer. There is also a sink with drainer. The kitchen comes equipped with toasterkettlenespresso machine and utensils and crockery.The bedroom has a comfortable double bedwith clean fresh linen and huge fluffy towels. There are two bedside tables and lamps and a wardrobe with drawers. There is a flat screen television on the wall.The Bathroom is also a good size with a bathshowersink and wc.Guest access.The Annexe is all yours.Other things to note.Pets and children welcome.

Title: Beach front home with cosy, coastal interiors.
Description: Featured in The Times "50 Great British Beach Escapes"- 25th April 2015‚ÄúDriftwood‚Äù is a charmingend of terracetwo-bedroom house in the pretty town of Seaford on the Sussex coast.The spaceThe space.Located directly on the esplanade with unspoilt views overlooking Seaford bayit is decorated in freshneutral shades and furnished with simpleyet comfortable New England style furniture. It features a courtyard-style beach garden which links to a large decked terraceperfect for enjoying a cocktail at sunset or for al-fresco dining. Large garage at the back of the house allows for safe storage of bikes or surfing equipment.The interior of the house is comfortable and cosywith bare-wood floors and white walls which frame the stunning view. The open-plan reception room includes an area for relaxing or watching a movie on the 40inch flatscreen Smart TV equipped with complimentary Netflix and BT Sport. The house has free WiFI for those who like to stay in touch.There is a round-farmhouse style dining table for four and a fully-equipped kitchen with washing machinefridge/freezermicro-wave and breakfast bar. Upstairs on the second floor are two bright and airy double bedrooms. The ‚Äú shabby chic style‚Äù master bedroom boasts a spectacular ocean view and is furnished with a king-size bed and double wardrobe. The second bedroom overlooks the town and features two twin beds and ample storage. Crisp white linen and nautical stripes create a chiccontemporary look.There is a family bathroom with WCbasin and bath which is fitted with a shower mixer and overhead shower. Linen and towels are provided and gas central heating is fitted throughout. Sleeps up to 4 ( a collapsible guest bed is available for a 5th guest)Pets welcome with prior arrangement.Guest access.Driftwood‚Äù is in an excellent locationbeing only a 10 minute walk to the centre of Seaford town with its diverse range of shops and restaurantsincluding the excellent ‚ÄúTrawlers‚Äù for fantastic fish and chips. ‚Äú Olivers‚Äù a small family run restaurant offers a more discerning choice of menu and there is also a good selection of tea shops for cream tea lovers.Seaford is surrounded by stunning sceneryvillages and countryside and is very popular with hikers. Nearby is the famous Seven Sisterswhose seven cliffs form part of the Seven Sisters County Park at Cuckmere Haven and which starts at the end of the beachjust a few hundred metres from the property.

Title: Pagham Beach House, sea views,
Description: "Here is your opportunity to stay in an architects own home. This exquisite single storey house was built in 2001 in a modernist styledesigned by James Wells for his family as a weekend getawaythe house is now available to rent all year round.Pagham Beach House is the perfect retreat for Goodwood Events: Festival of SpeedGlorious Goodwood and Goodwood Revival"The spaceThe space.www.paghambeachhouse.co.ukBuilt on a shingle beachthe house is 40 meters from the sea. With one large livingdining and kitchen roomguests can enjoy panoramic views with all the comforts of modern living.Located in a magicalpeaceful hideawaythe beach house is tucked away from traffic but conveniently close to Chichester with its culturerestaurantscaf√©s and shopping.Guest access.Pagham Beach House is available for full use by guestswe no longer live there but we live 30 minutes away.Other things to note.There is off road parking for two carsit is not possible to park on the road. The house is situated directly on Pagham Beach and the approach road is a track.

Title: ‚ÄòEbb & Flow‚Äô stylish seaside flat
Description: Boutique style! Ideal for exploring St Leonards on Sea & surrounds & working from home. 2 mins from the sea5 from the stationeasily accessible by car & free on street parking. Private entryspacious open plan livingprivate gardens.We respectfully ask for guests who are happy to observe a quiet time after midnight & do not mind hearing the odd voice or footstep above.The spaceThe space.The living area is large and open plan for cooking in the kitchen spacesociable diningand relaxing and watching TV in the lounge area.Guest access.Guests can access all spaces described within the flat including the back and front basement gardens.Other things to note.Currently we are following a self check in procedure.Ebb and Flow is a flat in a converted house so please bear in mind people do live above and you may hear the sound of footsteps and voices sometimes. Title: Beautiful Beach House Winchelsea Beach East Sussex
Description: Beautiful 3-bedroom beach house (doubletwinbunk). 100m to Winchelsea Beach. Sea views from lounge and master bedroom balconies. Garden with deck area and outdoor table and chairs. Walkingcyclingwater-sportsbird-watching (Rye Harbour Nature Reserve). The Ship deli (great butchers and bread!) and the Red Pig food truck. Good pubsrestaurants and cafes in Rye and Icklesham.The spaceThe space.Fabulous \New England\ style beach house with stunning sea views!.The house is set on The Ridge just yards from Winchelsea Beachnear Rye in East Sussex. The house was featured in Coast Magazine in 2008 and Real Homes magazine Aug 2010. Located in the small village of Winchelsea Beach - where marshland meets the seathe shingle beach gives way to flat wet sand at low tide. A wonderful four-mile walk is to follow the sea wall eastwards- stopping at the Bird Reservethen following the River Rother towards Rye and returning across the field tracks past Camber Castle. Whether you want to go surfingcyclingwalking or beach-combingBramble Tye is the perfect place to sit back and decide - either in the summer house or gazing across the sea from your balcony. Shop: 0.1 mile Pub: 0.1 mile Coast: 100m.Ground Floor:.Entrance porch.Kitchen/Dining Room - an extremely light and attractive space with wonderful oak flooring. There is a family room which can be closed off from the main living area furnished with a three seater sofaoccasional tablea variety of chairsa gas "woodburning" stove and a flat screen TV. In the main room there is a dining table and six chairs plus sideboards and cabinets and the superbly stocked bespoke Kitchen provides an electric oven and gas hobdishwasherfridgefreezermicrowave.Rear porch/ Utility Room houses a washing machine and tumble dryer.Bedroom 1 with bunk bedsbedside table and clothes hanging rail.Bedroom 2 with twin bedsbedside tablechest of drawers and double wardrobe.Bathroom with oak flooringa bathover-bath showerheated towel railwashbasin and w.cStairs with stairgates top and bottom to.First Floor:.Sitting Room with oak flooring. This glorious room has a spectacular galleried roof with open rafters and fabulous sea views from the balcony and the dual aspect windows. There is a three seater sofaantique leather and cane armchairsoccasional tableTV with DVD and gas "woodburning" stove.Bedroom 3 with double bedbedside tableswardrobe and private balcony with stunning sea views. En-Suite Bathroom with a bathheated towel railwashbasin and w.c.Garden: Fully enclosed pebbleddecked and lawned areaswith summer house and wooden garden furniture.Parking: Parking for one car in the drive plus parking for two cars outside on The Ridge.Heating: Oil central heating and gas "woodburning" gas stoves for boost.Wifi available. Mobile \phone reception poor.Highchair available (attaches to adult chair).Removable bed-side barrier available for toddlers.All linen and towels provided.All heating and electricity costs included.Facilities for Babies and Small Children:.Mamas and Papas travel cot (please bring own linenblankets and pillow etc. The cot mattress is thin so you may wish to bring your own thicker cot mattress).Safety-rail for bed (secured under the mattress).High chair (secured on to dining chair with straps)Guest access.Guests have access to the whole house and one off-road parking space. Additional parking on road by pedestrian gate.Other things to note.Short breaks are available. 4 nights minimum.The house sleeps a maximum of 6 and no additional people can be accommodated.

Title: Caribbean Corner
Description: A secluded beach hideaway in the woodsat the top of the coastal slope on Priory Bay. It has been described by guests as "a little piece of paradise".The north end of Priory Bay is locally known as Caribbean Corner. The mature woodland slope running all the way down to the sand makes it a uniquely romantic location.Caribbean Corner along with its sister property The Hideaway gives a desert island experienceonly 2.5 hours from London and 15 minutes from Portsmouth by RIB.The spaceThe space.Beautifully constructed by local craftsmanPaulthis glamorous structureinspired by Mongolian yurts provides the ultimate in glamping.The "yurt" has a king size double bed built from our own oakallows you to look both out to sea and up through the tree tops to the stars. The adjoining bathroom has all the essentialschampagne bucketa roll-top Victorian batha flushing toilet and views to the stars.The handcrafted kitchen with oak work-top and cupboards made from recycled pallets has a Belfast sinkfridgetwin induction hob.Moving through the French doors to your barbecueyou step on to a viewing platform over the idyllic sandy beach and are surrounded by majestic native woodland - if you can find a shower with a better view we will fill the champagne bucket!This yurt is really designed for twobut there is plenty of room for two little ones.The main feature is the sheltered gently shelving sandy beach. It is completely protected from the prevailing winds and the morning sun warms the sea on a rising tide. On a spring tide you can take a morning walk all the way to St Helens Fortgetting wet only up to your knees. There is no better experience than coming back to barbecue a couple of locally caught mackerel for breakfast.It is very important that this is only done when the tide times are safe.If you\re lucky enough to come in spring the woods are carpeted with wild garlicbluebellsdaffodilsprimroseswild violets and later in the year wild orchids cover the orchard.As well as everything you might expect to find in rock poolsyou can expect to see red squirrelsperegrinesstoatsbuzzardsowlssparrow hawksswifts & swallowsbatswoodpeckers and if you\re lucky a badger.Other things to note.The property is adjacent to the historic Priory Bay Hotelwhich is currently closed awaiting refurbishment.There are many other hostelries and restaurants in the local towns of St HelensSeaview and Bembridge.

Title: Worthing Prom direct sea views! Free parking.
Description: Check our reviews! Self check-infree parking. A big bright and sunny 1 bed flat located directly on Marine parade. Panoramic sea views from the huge open-plan living kitchen room. Big windows and high ceilings. Recently refurbed. Double bedroom with a king-size bedample storageand double sofabed in the lounge. Perfect holiday padand offering easy access to the Sth Downs Nat ParkArundelGoodwoodChichesterShoreham and Brighton. 80mbps WiFi. 43inTV NetflixM&S foodhall 200M.The space"The space.The flat will be fully sanitised by our professional team before check-in. IF YOU ARE USING AIRBNB FOR THE FIRST TIMEPLEASE MESSAGE US WITH YOUR REQUEST GIVING THE NAMESAGES AND OCCUPATIONS OF YOUR GROUPA LITTLE BIT OF INFORMATION ABOUT YOURSELVES AND THE NATURE OF YOUR TRIP. Please have your verification process complete. We will provide free parking vouchers for your full daysbut not checkout day. Just let us know when you book. The flat is situated directly on the seafrontand is only yards away from the beach. The flat is on the ground floor and gives easy access with two small steps from the pavement. The front door and common parts have motion sensor lighting to assist while you enter the property. Worthing pier and the town centre is a couple of minutes walk (400m). Go and see Russell at the pier cafe for a freshly brewed coffee and an ice cream! Worthing mainline station is approximately 1km away. The fabulous Worthing Splashpoint leisure centre is also just 1km away along the promenade. The flat has a lovely big sunny South facing living room measuring 21 feet long by 15 feet wideand has a newly fitted corner kitchen area. The kitchen has a slick black ceramic hoba Bosch fan oven grilland a Leibherr fridge-freezer - all new in 2020a washing machine and microwave. The flat has been recently refurbishedand has a bay window four seater dining table areaa large double sofabedtwo coffee tablesa new 43 inch LED flat screen SmartTV with Netflix and YouTubeand fibre optic 80mbps WiFi when hard wired. The flat benefits from gas central heating and double-glazing throughout. The flat has lovely high ceilings and large windows to let all that lovely seafront sunshine pour in! The rectangular 11 x 9 foot double bedroom comes with a pocket sprung luxury ¬£900 king-size double bed with two bedside storage drawersa chest of drawersand a wardrobe. Weve put a superking-size duvet on the bedand four pillows. Pure cotton bedding completes the opulent finish. The separate WC bathroom with shower finishes the private accommodation. There is access to the communal front and rear garden areas. The beautiful South Downs park is accessible only 3 km out of town. Superbly located for access to all the main attractions of the town. Bicycle hire is now available on the promenade via the Donkey Republic app. Theres an M&S food hall a couple of hundred metres along the seafront heading into townand theres a Co-Op at the top of the road 2 mins away. Montague Street and Rowlands road which are one block behind the flatare the hub of the town. Theres a superb selection of shopscoffee shopsrestaurantstakeawaysand pubs"

Title: Isle of Wight home next to the sea
Description: Lovely modern maisonette that is part of a seafront complex neutrally decorated throughout 3 good sized bedrooms2 new bathroomsnewly decked spacious garden with wonderful views. Fabulous situation with direct access to the beaches at Seagrove Bay and Seaview with wonderful walks at Low tide round to Priory Bay. You can fish off the sea wall at high tide.We are 5 minutes walk to the centre of the village which has a local shopcafes and a popular pub.The spaceThe space.A secure home in a stunning position within a beachside complex. The apartment is on 2 floors and is spacious and comfortable with direct proximity to the sea. A much loved holiday home.Guest access.Guests have full access to the property and garden. The complex has direct access to the beach.Other things to note.The property is secure and there is a full time maintenance person on site.PETS ARE NOT ALLOWED.

Title: LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION! Desk WiFi Bed and Lock
Description: Central yet oasis- like residential area to return to after making the most of all the fun and festivities found virtually on the doorstep.My home was rest rooms for the actors on location during the 1940s/50s when connected to the erstwhile film studio‚Äôs next door.Delightful small double bedded lockable ground floor room with wash basin - desk - unlimited WiFilarge tv.Decorative and quirky JPG wall coverings. Give the room a lovely nostalgic feel with pleasant view to the patio garden.The spaceThe space.Female led household. You can be confident that thorough cleansing takes place between stays using premium products such as Method soaps and surface cleansers. Fairy soap and conditioner is used on laundering your 100% cotton bedding.Great little bolt hole with handy desk.Convenient,convenientconvenient in central Brighton yet a quiet residential oasis.PavilionDomeNorth LainesThe Lanes,Theatre RoyalBrighton Stationlocal buses serving Seven Sisters and beyond are 5 minutes away.i360 The Brighton Centre and the beach is 10 minutes walk.This charming small double room (4x3.5 m) is ideal for Le Weekend or an ample cave/large screen tv for one.Essentially Victorian in style juxtaposed with some modern objects such as the large screen television. Alsoconveniently this room contains your very own hand basin and an Arts and Crafts writing bureau for penning your memoirs. There are books for your enjoyment in the antique bamboo shelving. Hanging space and drawers for your clothing. The Victorian style iron bed is situated - leaving approximately 2x2.5 of clear floor space and a view to my delightful patio garden.The room has a lockable door.

Title: Spacious seafront apartment
Description: Come and enjoy all Brighton has to offer. Right on the seafront in vibrant central Kemptown with its cafesshopsdelisbars and restaurants. Newly refurbished spacious lower ground floor apartment offering flexible accommodation. Welcome families (KIDS FREE)The spaceThe space.Perfect for couplesbusiness people or families (KIDS FREE). Works well for two to four people. The main superking bed is a hotel zip-lock and can be divided into two 3\ singles. There are two top quality full depth mattress 2\ 6" fold away beds which adults are happy with and also makes it perfect for families. There is also a high chair and travel cot with mattress and bottom sheets (please bring your preferred top covers) and a cupboard with children\s gamesbookscutlery and crockery in the sitting room.The fitted kitchen is fully equipped with electric ovengas hobfridgemicrowave and washing machinecutlerycrockery and basic cooking utensils. Gas central heating and hot water.No charge for under 18yrs with responsible adult (FAMILIES please book only for adults on the system so that you are not charged for under 18\s - just let us know they are coming by email).Guest access.Private access down narrow external stairs to front door means this flat is unsuitable for people with restricted mobility.Parking is generally straightforward and available but all on road. If resident spaces are available we can provide visitor permits for ¬£7 per dayusual charge opposite the apartment is ¬£15 per daywith some cheaper places a short distance awayOther things to note.We can usually be very flexible with check in and check out times - please just ask

Title:
Luxury seafront flat with balcony 
(New!)
Description: My seafront flat is set back from road and enjoys fabulous sea views in a very convenient location.There is an underground carpark directly in front (cost about ¬£8 per day).The flat is in the newly trendy America Ground area of Hastingsclose to the pierten minutes walk to either the Old Town or St Leonard‚Äôs.The spaceThe space.You will have the principal rooms of the flat to yourself. The rest of the flat is locked off.There is a bedroom with super-king (6 foot) beda small cupboard for hanging your clothes and a small sofa.The main room of the flat (7m x 5m) has a large dining table with benchesa very well equipped kitchen and a sitting area with sofaarmchair and a 43‚Äù Samsung TV with Netflix and other internet stations.There is a shower room.There is a balcony running the entire width of the flat at the front with a small table and chairs. The balcony gets sun in the morning through to.mid afternoon.Guest access.There is a lockbox by the front door where the keys will be ready for your arrival.The flat is on the first floor up the spiral staircase.Other things to note.This flat is my own homewhich I enjoy letting through Airbnb when I am travelling (which I LOVE to doand am away often). You will have the flat to yourselfbut some of the rooms (with my personal stuff in them) are locked off.I have another dedicated Airbnb in the same building which is let all through the year.

Title: The Beach Side - 100 Yards Beach - Sleeps 4.
Description: "The Beach Side is a well maintainedcomfortable two bedroom chalet just 50 yards from the beach which gets regular good reviews..Fresh linen and towels are included.With one double bedroom and a twin The Beach Side sleeps up to four people and has a showerwcwash basin etc.Theres a sitting room that leads to a fully equipped kitchen."The space"The space.The Beach Side has many return visitors who enjoy the location and peaceful aspectan easy flat walk to the villageand as well as the beach fifty yards away just three hundred yards away is the free to use Hersey Nature Reserve..Latest Reviews:The Beach Side is an absolutely delightful little holiday home. The location is perfect - steps away from a gorgeous beach and lovely walks in both directions. The bungalow itself is small but very cosy and was perfect for our family of four plus dog for a weeks stay. The communication and welcome we received from Roger was exceptional and most definitely set the tone for a special week on the island. Thank you Roger! Sally & Family 30th October 2021Thank you for renting us your holiday homewe had a lovely two weeks. The location is superb and fell in love with Seaview. Karen & Adrian10th October 2021My parents had a wonderful weeks stay here on their first holiday in 8 years! Roger was really helpful and easy to communicate with and we were grateful for the discount booking ferry tickets. Very nice bedlinen and towels and fully equipped accommodation. Had everything needed. The place was clean and quiet and location is faultless. My parents enjoyed long evenings sat on the decking enjoying sea views. Would not hesitate to recommend to others or stay here ourselves again. Viktoria23rd September 2021What a great place! Would highly recommend. The deck area in front of the house has a beautiful view over the beach towards Portsmouth. We had a great time with our 2 year old sonpopping over to the beach and back all throughout our stay. Roger was the perfect hosthelped with ferry bookings and told me everything I needed. Gary and family 19th July 2021A nicely decoratedtasteful cosy cottage just by a wide spanning beach. There are a number of relatively close shops if you dont mind a short walk through the nice seaside town of Seaview. The place itself was well fitted with a full kitchen and all the bits and bobs you need on holiday. There are a multitude of sites to visit around the propertywith a beautiful nature reserve just a hundred metres from the front door. The shore changes from sandy beaches to shingle beacheswith a welcoming setting no matter your preference. Inside The Beach Side youll find all you need with a TV and stable WiFi . The two bedrooms were comfortable and quiet at night and the living space has a modern sliding window out onto the communal gardens and the path out to the sea (only 30m or so away). Overalla great place to stay while you explore what the Isle has to offer. Monica 12th July 2021We had a lovely stay on the Isle of Wight. The accommodation was perfect for our needs. The location was fantasticin a very quiet peaceful area with lovely coastal walks nearby. Roger‚Äôs communication was fantastiche rang before our trip and arranged discounted ferry tickets. Helen 30th June 2021.Seaview is pretty with local eateries that are very good. Not too far a walk to Ryde where there is the bus station and hovercraft giving access to the whole island and a 10 minute trip to Portsmouth.Beach in Ryde was glorious in the sunshine.We had a lovely weekate outhad take away and cooked at The Beach Side too.Would recommend and hope to return Margaret & Friends 22nd June 2021Hi Roger Many thanks for everything.  We had a great stay and really enjoyed staying at The Beach Side. Lovely place to stay 2 minutes from the beach in a quiet complex. Best Ian. 12th June 2021Great stay at Seaview. Lovely accommodation.Very clean. Would definitely book again. Marilyn 29th May 2021The Beach Side has everything you need - Fantastic stay. Very good location for a getaway. Beach is very close. Martha30th April 2021We (family of four) had a great stay at The Beach Side. Its very well appointed and the extra folding chairs and fluffy blankets for cool evenings were a nice touch. The location is absolutely perfectand although you cant see the sea from the deck unless you are standing upits only 50yds to take your morning or evening coffee over the road to the sea wall. Lucy & Family 17th April 2021"Guest access.The whole bungalow

Title: Beach Garden - 4 bedroom seaview apartment
Description: A beachfront dream on the coast of Pevensey Bay. This property offers a truly tranquil getaway with amazing views over the English Channel.Pevensey Bay is a small town located just outside of Eastbourneit has its own delicious restaurants and cafes that are just minutes from your front door.The property has four bedrooms sleeping up to eight in total and dogs are considered.Parking and free WiFi is also included.The space"The space.Enter by your own private door and up a flight of stairs to the first floor. On this level youll find a glorious open-plan living space with incredible sea views - plus a balcony where you can really soak up the sea air.The modern kitchen is fully equipped and includes a dishwasherfridge-freezerovenhob and microwave. A separate utility room houses a washing machine and tumble dryer.This floor also boasts two bedrooms and a bathroom. One bedroom is a kingsizewhile the other can be set up as a super king or with twin beds. The bathroom on this level has both a bath and a separatewalk-in shower.Up on the top level youll find a huge master suite. This has a super kingsize bed (which can be split into twin beds if preferred). There is an ensuite shower roomand also an adjoining twin bedroom with gorgeous sea views that is ideal for children wanting to be close to their parents (as guests to this room have to walk through the master bedroom to reach it).The property also has its own private garden which directly extends onto the glorious stretch of beachesfor outdoor lovers this property is a must. There is bench seating up to eight people plus a parasol to enjoy - you will want to take in those views as often as you can! A well-behaved small dog may be considered - please discuss in advance (supplement applies).There is private parking for one car off roadand more on street parking available nearby. This stunning Exclusively Eastbourne property is booked from Saturday to Saturday in peak seasonbut flexible arrival days and/or short stays may be possible last minute or out of season."Guest access.Both floors of this privatesplit-level maisonette are yours to enjoy. The owners live in a separate flat below this maisonetteso are on hand should you need help.
