Title: BRIGHTON BEACH APARTMENT FREE PARKING
Description: Prime Seafront Location The Apartment situated in Royal Crescent offers a luxury stay with complimentary Parking on site with EV charger if required. Master Bedroom with Heals Four Poster SuperKing Bed & Rainfall Shower Spacious Open Plan Lounge Netflix Cable Television & WiFi Well Equipped Kitchen with Range Cooker FridgeFreezer Dishwasher Coffee Machine etc The Apartment has its own sole entrance with key box for contactless entry Private Residential GardenThe spaceThe space.Free Parking & self check in with sole access along with the open plan lounge and dining space which features a Panasonic flatscreen television where guests can enjoy cable television and Netflix free of charge. WiFi free also included. For coffee lovers we have a Dolce Gusto Coffee Machine. With a generous sized table in the lounge ideal to use as a work/laptop area. The Super king sized Heals bed is heavenly comfortable. A super efficient Fired Earth Rain Shower with plenty of towels. The Apartment is spacious with plenty of seating We do have a residents private garden for guests to use which faces onto the seafront. It is laid to lawn and has seating. We offer sun loungers to use during your stay ! There are a number of Independent cafes a road away for everything from breakfast lunch through to dinner! We have a well equipped kitchen with SMEG range cooker and a dishwasher along with washer/dryer.Guest access.Parking - The Apartment comes with a parking space allocated for our guests sole use during their stay if required. Being located ideally for the beach and Brighton City Centre as well as Brighton Mariner. There are independent shops Restaurants & Bars two minutes from The Apartment in Kemp Town a group of wonderful traders offering unique products and dining experiences including an antique centre!Other things to note.Royal Crescent has a great historical past with the Late Sir Lawrence Olivier the famous actor having lived at No 4 Royal Crescent with his wife owning No 5 - Joan Plowright an actress of the time. The Crescent is uniform to the front but each house is very original in there own right and The Apartment is part of the main house which has remained very close to its original floor plan.Deliveroo and Uber Eats offer take away from breakfast lunch & dinner to everything in between!

Title: Sea Dreams - seafront apartment with fab sea views
Description: Sea Dreams has wonderful views over the English Channel and is literally moment from the promenade and beach.It is ideal for friends and families who want to escape to the sea for fresh aira dip in waves and a break from hectic lives.The apartment is located in a prime spot close to the beachtheatres and town centre and also the sought-after Meads areawith independent shopscafes and restaurants.WiFi providedplus towels and linen.The space"The space.The open-plan living area has the windows facing the sea and there are doors out onto a balcony overlooking the sea.The lounge includes a large Smart TV with FreeSat (so comes with access to channels such as YouTube and iPlayer as well as traditional TV) and the kitchenwith a huge windowprovides arguably the finest views whilst washing up you are ever likely to encounter!The kitchen is fully equipped with oven and hobmicrowave and washing machineand there is even a Nespresso machine for coffee lovers (bring your own capsules).It has a master bedroom with a double bedwhile the second bedroom has a single bedplus an extra pull-out single that can be set up for families of four (or combined into a second double). Both bedrooms have picturesque inland views over Lower Meads and the distant South Downs.There are two bathrooms. WiFi is providedalong with all towels and linen. Parking is unrestricted on street. Bookings run from Sunday-to-Sunday in peak seasonalthough flexible arrival days may be possible out of season.Talk to the Exclusively Eastbourne team if youve any questions that can help you reach a decision or check out our own website for more photos and alternative places to stay in the area."

Title: Beautiful sea front two bedroom apartment
Description: Welcome to my beautiful seafront escape. A light and spacious two bedroom apartment situated directly on the seafront. During your stay marvel at the sea viewsrelax on the beachor enjoy the cafesrestaurantsgalleries and shops that St Leonards has to offer less than 10 minutes walk away.The spaceThe space.-Two double bedrooms at the back of the apartment which both overlook the beautiful green cliffside.-A modern kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook for yourself and a dining table that seats four.-The living room is spaciouslight and airy with spectacular sea views from both windows and includes a smart TV and board game cupboard for days when you wish to stay at home.-Stylish Bathroom with shower and bath.-There are beach chairs provided for you to relax on the beach in comfortGuest access.-Free on street parking directly outside and a paid car park across the road.-Guests will be welcomed on arrival and I am always available if there are any issues - otherwise I will leave you to enjoy your stay!.-Local amenities all within walking distance.-Accessible by car or train with 2 local train stations within 15minutes walk (St Leonards Warrior Square and West St Leonards).Other things to note.Please note the apartment is on the 4th floor and there is no lift so may be not suitable for people with mobility issues or really young children.Unfortunately at the moment there is scaffolding on the front of the building and therefore the view is partially obscured.

Title: Coastguard cottage in a coastal nature reserve
Description: Solent Cottage is a historical Victorian-era coastal property which has been substantially renovated to modern standards. As well as fantastic sea views from one sideand gorgeous views of the neighbouring nature reserve from the otherguests will enjoy the lovely period feature such as original Victorian flooringand the wood burning stoveas well as the modern fully-equipped kitchen.The space"The space.In such a fabulous locationits all about the outside. There are three outside spaces to enjoy: the rear (woodland facing) garden is perfect for morning and early afternoon suna great space for al-fresco breakfast and for lunch. In the evening the sun appears at the other (sea-facing) gardenwhich is ideal for BBQsor just enjoying a glass of wine as the yachts sail by and the sun goes down. And that second garden opens out to a very large green or third gardenwhere wild rabbits roam in the morning and kids play in the afternoon.Both the living room and the master bedroom have amazing and direct views over the Solentand its especially lovely to wake up to the fresh airopen the curtains and imbibe the stillness and tranquility of the morning sea. The two smaller bedrooms overlook the gardens and woodland nature reserve to the rear. The area feels safesecludedbut also friendly."Guest access.There is a dedicated off-road parking spot for Solent Cottage in the cottage car park next doorand if you are bringing more than one carfree parking at Fort Victoria a couple of minutes away. There is plenty of walking or cycling around the area - there are cafes and restaurants on the doorstepshopping and pubs a short 15 minute walk along the coast to Yarmouthand a bus stop which connects you to the island bus network at the end of the road (Westhill Lane).

Title: Casa Blanca Beach House, Sleeps 10+2, Camber Sands
Description: Get your Nantucket vibes in Casa Blancaan exquisitely styled New England beach front homebought and refurbished during lockdown. This stunning property is deceptively large and sits discreetly on the Camber Foreshore. It has been sympathetically and cleverly styled to create the most wonderful space for guests to enjoy the best of both the house and the landscape.The spaceThe space.Sleeping 10 guests in four bedroomsand the possibility of another two in the reading room on a sofa bedit is the perfect home to celebrate or gather with friends and family for a truly memorable escape.Arriving at property you enter into a roomy hallwaysit down kick off your shoeshang up your coat and let the stress of life melt away.If you want to cook up a stormyou won‚Äôt be disappointed ‚Äì the large open plan kitchen boasts a Range Master oven with 2 ovensseparate grill with an 6 ring induction hob including induction griddle plate; a microwave; two Bosch dishwashers; a large double Samsung fridge freezer with ice machine and a separate wine fridge. A nutribulletbakewarebut more importantly for those coffee lovers a Sage Oracle touch coffee machinebean to cup (full on arrival) with an integrated milk frother ‚Äì you won‚Äôt be needing to go anywhere for coffee (you won‚Äôt be wanting to go anywhere).A bespoke 3 metre oak tablethat seats 12 invites long lazy lunches or decadent dinners. If the cocktail hour takes holdthere is a plethora of options from the Honesty Bar ‚Äì cocktail shakers and martini glasses glint in the sunlight waiting to be shaken and stirredall we ask is you top it up when you leave! The bifold doors allow the outside in.Moving into the sitting roomthe soft muted tones with large corner sofa and natural planters is the perfect place to while away the hours staring out to sea. There is a 75‚Ä≥ smart TVtogether with all the appsNetflixAmazon Prime etc if you feel the need for some downtimeif you can drag yourself away from the view. Sonos provides the sound throughout the ground floor.Casa Blanca is an all year round property ‚Äì with its large conservatory with hot tub overlooking the beach (it is serviced and water changed every week if ordered). To the rear of the room is a pool table and darts board for extra entertainment. There is access into the garage which has been converted into a small gym (at your own risk) and has a table tennis table permanently set up. Two paddle boards are available for your enjoyment.Taking yourself upstairs you will find four bedrooms and a reading roomtwo ensuite walk-in shower rooms and a large family bathroom. The master bedrooms and reading room all enjoy access onto the upper terrace ‚Äì an amazing place to sit and watch the kitesurfers fly by.The rear doublewith a four poster King bed with built in cupboards and dressing tableis next to the sizeable family bathroom with walk in showera large oval bath with hand showerand double basin vanity unit. A haven for kidswith its four cabin beds (all 3ft wide) is the fourth massive bedroomeach bed comes with their own lights and USB plugs. You will also find a Playstation 5 (a number of games) and 42‚Ä≥ smart TV to keep the little (& big ones) entertained and a three seater sofa to chill. For the little onesthe house is equipped with a baby monitorstair gatehigh chairbottle steriliser & travel cot.The reading room is a small beach front roomwhere you can sit for hours and indulge in a chapter or two ‚Äì the sofa turns into a sofa bed and whilst the most amazing spot to wake up is not promoted as a bedroom but as an add on if you want a guest for an odd night or two.Outdoor living is just as stylish as the inside; with a dining area (with the same table as the dining room)a built-in BBQ and Pizza oven you can enjoy eating alfresco whilst enjoying the breath taking and ever changing scenery or collapse in the comfy sofashammock or loungers. Every inch of Casa Blanca has been thoughtfully styled. Given the wealth of activities both on and off the water you may never want to leave!We also welcome up to two dogs to the property - it is ¬£35 for the stay. You can add these at the time of booking.

Title: The Little Lookout
Description: This memorable place is anything but ordinary. Formally the old coastguard tower on Littlehampton seafrontthis small and unique stay is a little gem. Newly renovated the space is modernlight and airy. Situated directly on the seafront next to the harbour entrancewith incredible views from the 3rd and 4th floor balconies.In the heart of West Sussexonly a 90 minute train ride from London & 15 mins from near by attractions BrightonThe south downsGoodwoodChichester & Arundel.The spaceThe space.Originally built in 1931 the tower was left derelict for over 10 years or so before being fully renovated and refurbishedwith the works only recently completed by ourselves in June 2021. The space has been cleverly split over 4 floorseach floor accessed by the new addition of a spiral staircase extension. As you enter the ground floor level you will find a small entrance hall that leads into the kitchen which is a bespoke handmade plywood kitchen finished off with a super cool gold Lusso Stone sink and tap and stunning stone worktops. On the first floor is the luxurious bathroomin herringbone marble stone with a walk in shower and a full sized bath tub looking out to the sea & the river mouth. On the third floor you will find the bedroom with double doors leading out onto a cosy balconylay in bed at night and listen to the calming sound of the oceanand finally on the top floor you will find the beautiful vaulted ceiling living spacewith widows either side and double doors leading out onto a larger balcony again over looking the sea and the river mouth. There is a super comfortable double futon sofa bed on the top floor that can accommodate extra guests.Each floor is carefully thought out and styled to a high standard with gorgeous throws and soft furnishings so even on a dark and stormy day you will still enjoy curling up and soaking in the incredible sea views.

Title: King's View - Emsworth
Description: "Kings View is a stunning town house with water front views in the centre of the charming and popular village of Emsworth. On your doorstep you can enjoy the fantastic restaurants including Fat Olives36 on the Quay or treat yourself to a night at JJs restaurant and bar. All of the village pubs offer wonderful food and there are many independent cafes to enjoy too. The village has many independent shops with PO10 being a must visit featuring beautiful pieces made by the many local artists inspired by this scenic area.Entering the property there is a utility area with washer/drier and shower and WC to the rear. Going up to the first floor into the sitting room you are greeted by the direct views of the waterthis room is filled with comfortable furnishings to relax in while you enjoy your surroundings. Of an evening you can sit out on the balcony in the sunshine with a glass of wine or in the winter monthssnuggled under a blanket taking in the stunning views across the marina and over Chichester Harbour. To the rear there is a kitchen dining area overlooking Slipper Pond. The kitchen has been thoughtfully equipped with everything you will need to self cater including Krups coffee machinedishwasherlarge 6 ring rangefridge and freezer and a kettle and toaster.Taking the stairs up to the second floor there is a beautiful double bedroom with ensuite shower. The second bedroom has twin beds and the third has a single. There is a family bathroom with shower over the bath on the second floor.Outside to the rear there is an open paved garden looking our over slipper pondThere is parking to the front of the property on the driveway for one car."

Title: ‚òÖ Chic apartment right by the beach ‚òÖ Sea views ‚õ±
Description: Come and stay By Brighton Beach in our cute and comfortable apartmentcomplete with seafront views of the pier and Kemptownjust ten minutes walk from the centre of Brighton.The space"The space.The apartment has two spacious roomsa bedroom and living room as well as a full kitchen and gorgeous bathroom with shower. Both of the main rooms have stunning views of the beach and across Brighton. Theres also exclusive guest-only access to the magnificent gardens in Marine Square.""Guest access.Theres lots of street parking available in the square and of course on the main beach road. Parking is limited to 4 hour slotsbut there are a number of long-term car parks you can use too. Orif youd like to arrive by trainits about a 15-20 minute amble through North Laine and Old Steinedown to the pier and along the seafront.Our apartment is within a stunning Regency-style blockbuilt around 1826. Everyone who visits really enjoys the ride in the original lift.. think all those classic novels youve read about the Victorian days!"Other things to note.Please note we are 100% kid friendly and can provide a travel cotkids platesbowls and cutlery and even games for our younger guests!

Title: Idyllic beachside cottage next to nature reserve.
Description: Fabulously located between the beach on one side and a woodland nature reserve on the otherthis cottage is perfect for families who like the outdoorsor couples and friends looking for an idyllic getaway retreat. The cottage has fantastic sea views from both master bedroom and living room; gardens to both front and rearwhere there is a small gate that open directly onto a woodland nature reserve and the Isle of Wight coastal path; and in the winter monthsa lovely cosy log burning fire.The spaceThe space.The cottage was built to house married officers stationed at the Victorian-era coastal fortress next doorand many original features remain. It has been recently renovated to a very high standardwith a new custom-built kitchennew bathroommodern electric heating systemdouble-glazed timer sash windows and full redecoration throughout.The rear (woodland-facing) garden receives sun in the morning until mid-afternoonso is the perfect spot to enjoy al-fresco breakfast or lunch. In the late afternoon/early eveningthe sun is out at the sea facing gardenwhere you can enjoy a glass of wine (or cup of tea) watching the yachts sailing by. Sunsets over the fort are fabulous.

Title: Beachfront home, perfect for families and friends
Description: A brightwelcoming and family-friendly four bedroom house right on the East Beach of Selsey. Enjoy sea views from the lounge balcony and two of the second floor bedrooms and a gorgeous sunset in the garden at the end of the day.Guests can enjoy use of the whole housewith wifismart tv and a fully equipped kitchen.Follow us on Facebook @No4Kingsway for more infopictures and updates.The spaceThe space.No. 4 Kingsway is the perfect place for family and friends to relax and enjoy time together. The owners have catered for families and groups of friends alike.An amazing local photographer and an incredibly talented artist feature throughout to brighten the walls of the house.Three bedrooms on the second floor offer a Super king bedKing sized bed and Bunk Beds. The ground floor bedroom has a Double bed and double doors onto the patio. There is a family bathroomwith separate shower on the second floor and a separate toilet and wash basin on the ground floor.The kitchen is fully equipped with plenty of dining spacewith plastic platescutlery and cups for the kids.The lounge is spacious and brightthe perfect place to relax with breathtaking views from the balcony.The garden is simple and provides a relaxed area to spend time with a large dining tableour fabulous mud kitchen for the kids will keep them busy for hours!.There is also a large shed that guests may use during their stay which is perfect for your water sports equipment or bikes - you will need to provide your own padlock.

Title: BEAUTIFUL DOUBLE ROOM AVAILABLE IN BEACH HOUSE
Description: This beautiful double bedroom with en-suitewith amazing seaviews for you to relax and have the beach life. This benefits from having direct sea views with on-suite shower room. The host Richard who lives there will be providing you with a delicious breakfast each morning. You also can use the downstairs living areas too and chill out on his lovely deckinguse his outside bath and take in the sea views. Please note the decking area is till 11 pm as we have to respect the nearby residents.The spaceThe space.You will have your own double bedroom overlooking the sea with en-suite shower room. The sitting area downstairs can be used and use of the sun terrace but the rest of the house is where the owner lives.Guest access.With a small car this can be parked on the drivewayOther things to note.Please note Richard does have two small well trained dogs on the property. Also regarding the decking area is till 11 pm as we have to respect the nearby residents.

Title: Oceans 37 ....Stunning panoramic views.
Description: Oceans 37.A stunning Victorian apartment with panoramic views overlooking the English Channel located in St Leonards on seaHastings.The spaceThe space.Our apartment is newly decorated with a modern feel while still keeping the beautiful Victorian features. The views are spectacularespecially sun rises & sunsets.Other things to note.Please note the two beds in the living room are good size single futons. We also have a travel cot & mattress available.Please be aware that there are two flights of stairs to the apartment.The 32 inch TV in the living room has free view and is also a smart.TV + HD DVD PlayerBeach towelscool bag + freezer blocks with picnic set provided + 2 beach chairsall set for a day at the beach.Free use of the safe.

Title: A relaxing haven with superb views
Description: The space.Locationlocationlocation.. this stunning studio apartment situated in historic Rottingdean certainly gets three ticks for that.You are literally seconds from the seafront and ideally situated to explore your beautiful surroundings.The apartment boasts a fully fitted kitchen with modern appliancesa bath with a shower and a spacious uncluttered living area that provides a feeling of space and tranquility. There is a double pull down bed which folds away easily.Sitting at the table in front of the window you are treated to unspoilt panoramic views.Rudyard Kipling made Rottingdean his home and the old house adjacent to Kipling Gardens is still standing. Rottingdean is also notable for the black wooden windmill on the hill.It boasts many pubs including the Ye Old Black Horse which dates back to 1513 making it the oldest pub in Rottingdean.For your convenience there is a Tesco Expressa pharmacycafesbakersfishmongerbutcher and much more all in Rottingdean High Street. Car parking is less than than three minutes walk away in a council run car park.Just 4.2 miles from the vibrant city of Brightonaccess is easy with an efficient and regular bus service.This gem of an apartment offers you the best of both worlds.

Title: "Seaview" Beach house"stones throws from the sea"
Description: Sea view is a stunning two bedroom housewithin a stones throw from the sea.Breathtaking direct sea views and a balcony from the master is perfect for watching the sunset with a glass of bubbly.Seaford is the perfect locationwith BrightonEastbourne and Lewes all nearby.With the seven sisters trail nearby and a stunning 3 mile beach in front of you this house is for a staycation.The spaceThe space.Cosy and modern

Title: Beachfront self-contained one bedroom annexe
Description: Come and stay at this tranquil beachfront hideaway. This is a self-contained one bedroom annexe with its own en suite bathroomkitchen and patio. You will have direct access to the beach and a sea view. Famous for its crab and seafoodsold at beachside hutsSelsey is also a short drive from the sandy dunes of The WitteringsGoodwood Estate and Racecourseand historic Chichester. The 350-year-oldrenowned Crab & Lobster pub is our local.The spaceThe space.The annexe has one bedroom with a king size bedan en suite bathroom with a wet room showera sitting room/kitchen (with a TV on the wall) and a seafront patio.Guest access.There is freeon-street parking outside the house. The nearest train station is Chichesterwith bus services to Selsey. We are a five minute walk from the bus station. Taxis are also readily available at Chichester train station.

Title: Marine Court,  Bognor Regis
Description: Over looking Bognor Regis sea front Marine Court is the perfect holiday destination throughout the year. Enjoy the bright sunshine on the balcony in summer or cosy down and watch the waves crash in the winter. No matter the time of year; with these spectacular views of the sea you will never be bored of sitting in this living room.Turn left out of the apartment and you can walk the coastline and be at Bognor Regis pier in only 5 minutes. A fantastic fish and chip shop can be found here also! Turn right out of the coastline and you can continue along the coast to Aldwick and even onto Pagham .The large living space is light and airy with a window spanning the entire width of the room. The kitchen is partially open plan giving your a window to the sea views also. Carefully refurbished this apartment makes the most of the stunning views on offer.The living room includes dining space and large television for cosying down with a movie after a busy day of exploring. Bognor Regis has many local eateries (Mustards is a favourite) to dine out or order in and enjoy in the comfort of your holiday home. With plenty of takeaway deliveries on offer you will be spoilt for choice. If you prefer to have a shop delivered this well equipped kitchen has everything you need to cook up a feast while away.Marine Court has two bedrooms and bathroom with shower between. Free wifi included. Parking space is available at rear but the drive is narrow and may not suit wide vehicles. Free parking is available locally if you would prefer.

Title: Stylish apartment with amazing sea views
Description: The Lookout is situated directly on the sea front between Southend on sea and Thorpe bay. We have stunning sea views and our balcony is the perfect place to watch the sunset over Southend pier. The beach is right outside our front door and a 15 min walk along it will take you to Southend sea frontwith its many arcades and Adventure island.The 1 bedroom luxury apartment has a king size bedsouth facing balconyfull kitchenstylish wet room50" curved tvfree wifi and a log burner.The spaceThe space.Recently refurbishedbeautifully decorated and modern one bedroom apartment. Perfect for couples looking for a romantic break. Located directly on the seafront where you are able to take a nice stroll to one of the many restaurants or towns nearby such as Southend on sea and Thorpe bay.

Title: Amazing views! 2 bed central apartment ‚òºsleeps 4‚òº
Description: "Watch the ships and the sea from the comfort of your own living room all whilst only minutes from the main bars/restaurants of Southsea. This spacious two bed apartment that sleeps up to four is perfect for a weekend away. With a modern kitchennewly fitted bathroom with walk in showertwo spacious double bedrooms and uninterrupted views of the seaall set within a beautiful period property. Fantastic access to the best of Southseas attractionsGunwharf Quays and Old Portsmouth."The space.Upon entering this imposing period property you will climb the stairs to the third floor. There is a communal hallway which leads to the apartment which has a large open plan kitchenliving dining room perfect for time with the family. There is a large smart TV and even a Nintendo Wii! There are two large double bedrooms with storage facilities and the master bedroom has an amazing view across the the common and out to the sea. There is a high spec family bathroom with plenty of room."Guest access.The apartment is a stone throw away from all the best barsrestaurants and cafes of Southsea. You are within minutes from Gunwharf QuaysIOW ferryThe Historic Dockyard and also you can see victorious festival from your window!Southsea Common Car Park is located 50m from the property and is pay and display. Due to its central location there is not any onsite parking for this property and the street parking is limited.**Note that there is not any lift access and this apartment is on the 3rd floor of the building so guests must climb stairs****There are traditional sash windows which open from the bottom so please ensure children are not left unsupervised if open**"

Title: Salty Lodge,  (No.50)
Description: Cool chic and newly refurbished bungalow on the beach.All you need for a perfect holiday at homequiet road with magnificent views of the Solent and plenty of places to eat and drink nearby.We are located down a quiet private roadbut within 100m of a convenience storepubsand takeaways.The spaceThe space.An enviously unique beach front position with all new fixtures and fittings.Fabulous outdoor facilities for that perfect staycation!! Relax in the comfy New England Chairs or sunbathe on the padded sunbedsbook in hand and G&T in the other.A charcoal barbeque at your disposal with outdoor table and chairs.Inside the space is tastefully furnished with brand new comfortable chairs and sofas where you will be able to look out at the boats on the Solent.The kingsize bedroom has its own patio door leading onto the deck with fabulous views again of the Solentwhich can be enjoyed with your early morning cuppa!The well equipped kitchen has a fridge freezerovenmicrowavedishwasher and washing machine to make your stay easy and relaxing.We have an outside 13amp plug for easy EV charging. This is by prior arrangement only and a fee of ¬£10 per charge needs to be paid directly to us.

Title: 5 Bedroom Beach Front Property
Description: A wonderful 5 bedroom house - Offering uninterrupted views of the Thames Estuary. The beach and seafront are a stones throw away with some amazing restaurantscafes and ice cream. Southend Seafront includes its own 1.3mile long pier with arcades,seafront casinoplus Adventure Island and Sealife Centre. Old Leigh is just a 15 min walk along the seafront where you can enjoy my favourite dog friendly pubsfresh seafoodbeautiful tea gardens and often live music and art.The spaceThe space.Huge 5 bedroom beach front property with kids playhouseping pong table and parking for 5 cars. The property is full of character with high wooden paneling and handmade bespoke tables and stylish vintage furniture .The beach and seafront are a stones throw away with some amazing restaurantscafes and ice cream. Southend Seafront includes its own 1.3mile long pier with arcadesseafront casinoplus Adventure Island and Sealife Centre. Old Leigh is just a 15 min walk along the seafront where you can enjoy my favourite dog friendly pubsfresh seafoodbeautiful tea gardens and often live music and art.

Title: Stunning East Sussex 4 Bed House, Private Beach
Description: "White Water House- a stunning 3 storey Edwardian propertyboasting 4 dble bedrooms plus 3 bathrooms. (Theres also a childs bed and travel cot available.).This exquisite hideaway is ideal for familiescouples or groups of friends seeking sanctuary from busybustling cities.A peaceful location set in historical 1066 countrythe property overlooks Pevensey Beach & features a decked front garden with alfresco dining area plus Beach Hut leading onto a private beach."The spaceThe space."a sleepy haven in which to take in the sea views as you wander along the shingle beaches and enjoy the invigorating air"Recently refurbished & set directly on to Pevensey BeachWhite Water House is ideal for beach side getaways & provides a cosy base all year round. Getting there couldn‚Äôt be easierwith it being an hour and half from London by car plus Eastbourne or Pevensey rail links being just 15 minutes and 5 minutes away respectively.The main Living Space is a large through reception room with two large sofas plus a love seat set around a fireplace. The dining area includes a 10 seater table complete with banquette seating. French doors lead on to the beach side garden.The well equipped kitchen includes double ovencoffee machine plus all other mod cons,.and there are several farm shops nearbyso you can cook some delicious local produce after a day spent at the beach.Rear door leads on to a decked rear garden complete with Jacuzzi.Stairs lead up to :Master Bedroom: Stunning views directly on to the beachthis beautiful light and airy bedroom has a central Kingsize bed and ensuite bathroom. Dressing table & wardrobe.Family Bedroom: Again with views on to the beachthis large bedroom includes a kingsize bed plus toddler bed. Dressing table & wardrobe.Bedroom 3: Two single wooden sleigh bedswith wardrobeoverlooking rear garden.Bedroom 4: Kingsize bed with wardrobeoverlooking rear garden.Two further bathrooms.All bedlinen and towels are Hotel quality.

Title: Sea, surf & views
Description: At the end of a small cul de sac is a hidden gem. You will feel like you are holidaying on the beach itselfwith nearly every room having stunning sea views. This beautiful three story house has a very large open plan kitchendinning and sitting room looking directly South opening out onto the sun terrace. It also has two additional balconies decadently furnished to watch the world go by.The spaceThe space.The house has three floors.It has a stunning top floor with top balcony. It‚Äôs bedrooms are all good sizes and furnished to facilitate two families very comfortably. The middle floor balcony accessed though the snug is such a comfortable spot for both dining and lounging. The ground floor has a large corner sofa and TV unit as well as dining and open plan kitchen with all the commodities.This house is perfect for two families to holiday together as it is less than a stones through to the stunning Hayling beach with safe swimming and lots going on to see and do.Guest access.The house has space for off road 4 space parking.Access to the beach at the bottom of the garden.Other things to note.You are allowed one well behaved dog but please do keep it off furnitureand be responsible owners on the beach.

Title: Luxurious Beach House With Direct Beach Access
Description: Beach fronted large detached family house commanding spectacular sea views from the rear and superb far reaching rural views from the front. A truly luxurious getaway by the sea.The spaceThe space.Key Feature.# Direct Beach Access.# Fenced Decked Area.# Outside Table & Chairs.# Charcoal BBQ.# Sun-Loungers.# One Dog welcome.# Travel CotStair Gate & High Chair.On entering the property there is a ground floor entrance hallseparate utility room housing a washing machine and clothes airera double bedroom with a king-sized bed and large wardrobewith views to the countryside. Adjacent to this bedroom there is a ground floor shower room with a walk-in shower cubiclepedestal wash hand basin and lower level wc.The rest of the accommodation is situated on the first floor including a 19‚Äô1 x 10‚Äô8 lounge looking out to seaan impressive 23‚Äô8 x 8‚Äô3 second reception room with a dining table and chairs to seat 8 guestsalso enjoying sea views. The property boasts a good sized and well fitted modern grey kitchen housing a full range of utensilsplatespots and pans along with a toastermicrowavekettleAmerican fridge freezer and microwave. The open plan kitchen and dining area leads into the spacious lounge which has a 70 inch flat screen tva large leather corner sofa and additional lounge chair and a bar area with two raised bar stoolswith French doors opening onto a superb two-tiered sundeck with spectacular sea views and leading down directly on to a private beach. The sun deck has a modern rattan table and chairs along with four sun loungers.There are three additional bedrooms on this levelone has a king-sized bedone has a double bed and the other has two single bedsa travel cot and all with plentiful storage facilities for clothes.There is an additional family shower room with a shower areapedestal wash hand basin and a low level wc adjacent to one of the bedrooms.At the front of the property there is off-road parking for several carsalong with a mature garden with shrubs and plants and a raised sun patio enjoying a rural outlook.Pevensey Bay has a dog friendly shingle beachit is a seaside resort in miniaturea good place to take a holiday and really unwind. We allow one small dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the beds.When booking with us your stay will be protected by a deposit guarantee and public liability provided by our risk management partnerSUPERHOG. To benefit from this protectionyou will be contacted by SUPERHOG directly to verify yourself or you can also go via their websitesuperhog.com to start the verification. To view the SUPERHOG privacy policy use this link: https://superhog.com/privacy-policydata-protection-policy/Other things to note.A damage deposit of ¬£200.00 is payable . For direct bookings with beachside holiday rentalsthis amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departure.We allow one house trained dog to stay in the property but please note the stair gate must be put across and the bedroom doors need to remain closed to prevent the dog from going on the beds. For guests who may struggle with the internal 12 stairs there is a flat way into the property just a few houses down and along the beach which brings you into the back entrance. The majority of the house is then on one level. Please ask if you require any clarification on access or layout.The cleaning fee covers all cleaninglaundry/towels and bed linens which we provide for your stay.

Title: Climping Beach House - a perfect beach getaway
Description: The Beach House is a tranquil space overlooking Climping Beachperfect both as a chance to spend some time on this lovely part of the coast at an unspoilt beach and as a great base for exploring. The light is stunningthe air is clear and guests who arrive all feel the relaxing benefits of being so close to the sea.With two large bedroomspeaceful living area and a light & airy bathroomthe Beach House has views over the sea and South Downs.The spaceThe space.Self contained and sleeps two or fourthe Beach House has views over the sea and South Downs.Upstairs there is a large bedroom with king sized beda bathroom with loobasin and bath (no shower)a second bedroom that can be made up as either twin beds or a double (this bedroom is open to the staircase)and a large dining area with a kitchenette with fridgekettlemicrowavetoaster and crockery etc.Our wifi is not the always the fastest because of the location down a country lane right at the beach but we are hoping you will come here for some time away from life online.To be clearyou will have a separateself contained unit whilst not the entire building. There is another roomaccessed separatelybut within the same building.We are sorry but this space is not suitable for young children under 7.Other things to note.The Beach House is not suitable for small children. We suggest a lower age of 7 years oldbut are happy to chat about whether it would be suitable for your child before you book.The bedrooms and bathroom are up a flight of stairs so this not suitable for people who cannot manage stairs - sorry.

Title: Serenity  "your calm seafront retreat"
Description: "Serenity is a luxurious two bedroom house with breathtaking views of the sea. The property is located right on the seafront which means you can go from the lounge to water within a minute.This completely self contained property has access to one private parking space. The private decking area at the front of the property has views of the breathtaking sunsets and sunrises daily- perfect for alfresco dining or a peaceful morning coffee.This property is managed by Air Premier"The spaceThe space.This property can comfortably host four adults as both the bedrooms contain double beds. This property has an open plan modern kitchen which leads onto the outside decking area. The lounge is bright and has stunning views of the sea- as does the master bedroom.The master bedroom has a large private balcony and an electric fan.Coffee machine Bosch tassimo

Title: Seascape
Description: Step straight on to the beach and enjoy spectacular views out to sea in this spacious property - perfect for a couplefamily or small group of friends to get away from it all.The property comprises a large bright kitchen/living room overlooking Seaford beacha spacious double bedrooma second bedroom with bunk bedsand a newly fitted bathroom.Seaford is surrounded by stunning countryside. The train station is 5 mins walkand the property enjoys free parking outside the flat.The space"The space.The flat has easy access on the ground floor. Its perfectly located for people-watching on the Esplanadeor spotting the ferry to Dieppe.It has been refurbished with a new bathroom and a well-equipped kitchen. Everything you will need for a comfortable break at the seaside is provided.There is free parking on the road outside the flat. Seaford town centre is only 3 minutes walk away and many walks across East Sussex can be started from the door."

Title: Family holiday home with amazing panoramic views
Description: Waters Edge is a nordic style water front house with its own private sea shore and panoramic views of the Solent. The house is suited for family holidays or groups with 5 bedrooms4 bathroomsa large open plan sitting / dining room extending to a deck over looking the Solent.It is ideally positioned on the edge of Yarmouth where beacheswalks and various activities can be enjoyed. West Wight is fast becoming a foodie haven with a plethora of options from cafes through to fine dining.The spaceThe space.This is our much loved ‚Äòhome from home‚Äô that is set up for our young family and guests to enjoy.Guest access.All areas except for the garage.Other things to note.The coastal defence gabions are dangerous not for walking or climbing over.The tide in the Solent is extremely strongtherefore swimming off the jetty is at your own risk and children must be kept away from the seafront.The gardens at the seafront are open. Guests should not venture in front of our neighbours houses and should respect their privacy.

Title: Home By The Sea | Free Parking & Prosecco!
Description: "Tucked away at the tipping point of Kemp Townthis cosy apartment provides a great launch pad for a break-away to explore Brightons bohemian vibes.The kitchen/living space filled with sunshine in the morningyou can enjoy a coffee with a glimpse of the sea. A big cozy Casper bed in the bedroom which is a quiet sun trap in the afternoons. However you choose to take your break - this apartment allows you to exploreretreat and nest all at the same time."The space"The space.While the apartment is cosyit has everything you need. In the kitchenthere is a fridge/ freezerwasher/dryerand a dishwasher for those lazy evenings. The hob while its smallcan take 3 pans at onceenough to cook a small banquet!The apartment is set up and ready to go. There are USB charging points throughout the flat to charge your phone. Theres a Bluetooth speaker in the bathroomfor a shower singalong. Theres an Amazon Fire Stick in the living room for accessing Netflix and Amazon Prime.The bedroom has lots of storage so that you can unpack and make yourself at home. Theres a side lamp for late-night reading and goose-feather duvet and pillow to keep you sufficiently snuggled. Extra blanketspillows and central heating are prerequisite. Youll also find some bonus paddle boards and roller skates in the wardrobe youre very welcome to try out if the sea is calm for the weekend :)"

Title: Premium Lake Lodge
Description: Our variety of Standard and Premium Lake Lodges offer the perfect accommodation for those seeking lets in the historic town of Chichester. Lodges sleep up to 4 guestswith a living kitchen areadouble bedroomen suitebunk bed roomand a shared bathroom. Fresh linen and towels provided. Guests can relax on their private terrace overlooking a stunning 50 acre lake. You can also enjoy 15% off all water sport activities in the summer season. Located just a 5 minutes drive from GoodwoodThe spaceThe space.On-site secure parking next to each of the lodges is available for guests.Located just a 5 minutes drive from Goodwood!Other things to note.Guests should be awarethat the Water Sports Centre/Caf√© is closed during the winter season.During the summer seasonwater sports activities must be pre-booked in advance - please enquire for more information!There is strictly no swimming in the lake and there is no access to walk around it.

Title: Stylish house on Winchelsea beach, near Camber
Description: Sitting on the shores of Winchelsea Beach is Cloudbreak ‚Äì a new contemporary buildwith stunning views of the sea and easy access to the beach that is directly on the doorstep of this modern propertybuilt beside the bike path and walkway along the beach. It is a short drive from the medieval town of Rye with all its history ‚Äì Cloudbreak is perfectly situated to explore the surrounding area.The spaceThe space.Turning the house upside downit benefits from the spectacular views of the beach ‚Äì the open plan living allows its guests to fully relax in sumptuous luxury. Attention to detailtop notch kitchen facilities and stylish furniture encourages our guests to fully enjoy seaside living. The sitting room boasts a 65‚Ä≥ smart TV with a Sonos soundbar to maximise alternate viewingif required! Off the kitchensits a tiny snugan escape from the daywith a 55‚Ä≥ smart TV with PlayStation4and a vast library of DVDs.For the chefthe kitchen is beyond well equipped to knock out a perfect meal; with a Neff double ovenNeff induction hobmicrowaveNespresso Coffee Machine ‚Äì top of the range saucepans and baking equipment it is a delight to cook in ‚Äì nearly as good as the view! The balcony stretches the length of the propertyfloor to ceiling sliding doors allow the outside in and you can watch the world go by!The sound of the sea always encourages a peaceful nights rest ‚Äì the master bedroom on the middle floor overlooks the seawith a superking beddressed with 600 thread count linenstyled in muted coloursa dressing room leads onto the ensuite shower room. With curtains and sheers for privacythe bedroom is an oasis of calm.There are two further bedroomsboth with king bedsone has and ensuite shower room and the family bathroom with bath/shower sits between the bedrooms. All beautifully furnished for your complete comfort.Entering Cloudbreak on the ground floorthere is a garage that is fully insulated and houses the games room ‚Äì with full size table tennis tableand perfect place to store bikessurfboards etc. Another fridge freezer is housed in the garage so that you can keep a well stocked supply! The hallway has a large cupboard to hang your coats. Beyond the stair case is another snug room - an escape for teenagers (with sofa bed)next a utility room with shower and loo together with Bosch Washing machine and dryer. The snug also leads out onto the enclosed sunken courtyard ‚Äì with BBQ and outdoor seating via a glass french door. The large sofa bed that can accommodate two extra guests ‚Äì once the bed is downaccess to the bathroom is compromised.We allow up to two dogs - please add them to your booking.

Title: Little Beacon Beach House ,  Selsey
Description: Set on Selsey sea front overlooking our beautiful south coast‚Äôs blue seasLittle Beacon is a wonderful retreat quite literally a stone‚Äôs throw from the water‚Äôs edge with direct access to the sea via a private gate only available to two of properties in the quiet cul se sac. With an abundance of independent restaurantscafes and shops Selsey has everything you will want while on your holidays and with a regular bus service running from Chichester a car is not necessary.Little Beacon Beach House has a large open plan living room with flat screen televisionfree Wi-Fi and amazon fire stick so you can login and cosy down in the evening after a busy day of exploring. Overlooking the beach and with sea views this is the perfect spot to unwind.The dining room leads on from the lounge and has room to seat your party comfortably. The dining room is open plan to the beautifully light conservatory which leads out to the courtyard garden. The garden has four sun loungers and an outdoors dining table with seating.Little Beacon Beach House has a well-equipped kitchen with everything you will need to effectively self-cater during your stay. This includes dishwasherfridgefreezermicrowavetoastercafeti√®re and washing machine.Little Beacon Beach House has two bedroomsone double bedroom over looking the sea and one double bedroom over looking the garden with a shower room en-suite. The first floor has a family bathroom with shower cubicle and bathtub. There is a further WC on the ground floor.Off road parking for two cars.

Title: Stunning sea views at a charming character cottage
Description: Coastguard cottage in a idyllic location between the beach and a woodland conservation area on stunning coastline. Beautiful walksfantastic viewsgorgeous sunsets over a historical Fort next door. Perfect for family holidays and groups of friends.The spaceThe space.The best things about Wight Cottage are waking up in the master bedroom to a fabulous and uninterrupted view of the seaand sipping a glass of wine or a cup of tea in the sea facing garden at sunset while watching the boats sail by. There are also great views over the sea from the living room downstairs.The cottage itself was built in 1855 and is packed with original featuresincluding an open log burning fire and original doors. It has been renovated for 2017including a new heating system with modern electrical heaters for maximum comfort.Other things to note.Sorry but Wight Cottage does not accept dogs at the momentbut we do have other cottages which are dog friendly.

Title: Spacious Modern Beach House
Description: Sleeps 8. Sleeps 8. A large Beach House situated right on the waters edge.3D Tour copy this link into your browser: https://vt.ehouse.co.uk/7Ft3Ekkm3MH.(Please note the 3D video shows our listing with an additional bedroom with en-suite attached but on this listing for Driftwood 8 the reservation does not include access to this bedroomyou would need to book through Driftwood 10 to have access to this facility).Newly renovated Jan 2021 to a modern and contemporary style throughoutwith its own gated beach garden to the rear and an additional secluded courtyard garden to the front of the house offering some privacy and a place to enjoy the evening sunset.The space"The space.Key Features.# Beach-Fronted.# Enclosed Decked Area.# Four Bathrooms.# Travel CotStair Gate & High Chair.# Safe.# Pool Table.Arranged over three floors and offering well laid out and generous living accommodationthis is the perfect holiday home for a large family or group. This property really does make the most of the breath-taking views on offer.The house has a garage for one car at the front with additional space for two parked cars in the forecourt. Beyond the double garage there is a secluded large courtyard garden that has a wooden table and chairsa wooden bench and nice area to enjoy some privacy and of course the sunset in the eveningsthis than leads us to the main house. Inside the front door which is accessed via the courtyard gardenthere is a lobby and a utility room on the left containing a washing machinedryerironironing boardwashing line etc..a shower room and WCand on the right is a bedroom with a triple sleeper bed.From the lobby there are stairs leading up to the main floorwhich is on the same level as the beachthere is a large open plan sitting room that inter-connects with the dining area through to a newly fitted kitchen with everything you need to comfortable prepare and cook your owns mealsa second sitting area which looks out to sea which contains two double sofasa triple corner sofatwo arm chairsside tables with lamps and a TV with DVD player. Having been completely refurbished in Jan 2021 to a modern and contemporary styletruly a room you will not want to leave. The floors are wooden giving you a real seaside feelthere are two double bedrooms on the same floorone of which has an En-suit bathroom. There is also a fully fitted family bathroom just of the lounge area with bathroom with a bath/showerhand wash basin and WC.The beach is accessed directly from the lounge area with concertina doors opening onto a large decking area with an outside dining table and benchestwo armchairs with a coffee tablea 3-seater hammock swing2-seater bench with beach accessories stored underneathall over the beach garden with uninterrupted views towards the coast.A wooden staircase leads to the top floor which has a double bedroom with a super king-size bed and En-suite bathroom with the benefit of heated flooringa WCshower and heated towel railon the same floor there is also another lounge sitting area with an additional TV & DVD Playera Bluetooth Stereo systemloads of DVDs and books for all ages to keep the family entertained indoors tooan HP printer if you want to connect your laptop and some USB cables to charge up your Phonethe lounge then leads on to a balcony that has two three seater benches to sit and enjoy the far reaching and uninterrupted views towards The English Channel.There is a hotel style wall mounted safe in the master bedroom for safekeeping valuables.Bed linen and Towels provided. On each bed you will find a set of towels per person. Travel cothighchair and child safety stairgate is available upon request. Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Free use of Kayak (at users‚Äô risk)please only use in safe waters and under adult supervision. life jackets provided."Guest access.Entry instructions will be provided 4 days prior to your arrival date.Covid-19 Guidelines.All guests are responsible for meeting any U.K current Covid-19 guidelines in place whilst staying in one of our.properties.Other things to note.A damage deposit of ¬£200.00 is payable . For direct bookings with beachside holiday rentalsthis amount will be held on your payment card on the day that you check out and returned to your card after a full inspection has been completed and within 14 days of departure.Lost keys will be charged at ¬£25.00 per set.The owner supplies a welcome starter of teacoffeesugardishwasher tabletswashing up liquidkitchen rollsaltpepperoildishclothand pad. One bath towel per guest and an additional hand towel in each bathroom along with the first toilette roll & kitchen roll.

Title: A proper beach house with great views
Description: My place is close to RyeHastingsthe seagreat walks. You‚Äôll love my place because of its location right on the beachthe light and its open feel. My place is good for couples and families (with kids).The spaceThe space.The house is a two-storey 1980s house re-clad in Siberian larch. It is situated in the small hamlet of Pett Level and is one of only twenty houses on the beach; all the houses are different styles and sizes.The house has been comfortably furnished as a home for the owners. It is an upside down house - there is a large living room upstairs ‚Äì which includes kitchen and dining room with a terrace overlooking the sea. It easily sleeps eight people; it has two double roomstwo twin-bedded rooms and one bathroom and one shower room. It is centrally heated.The house is situated in the most fantastic position ‚Äì stunning sea views in one directionthe end of the South Downs the other ‚Äì over which you get some amazing sunsets. The garden leads straight onto the beach."Guest access.Theres one parking space outside the house and ample parking on the other side of the road. The beach is accessible from a gate at the end of the garden"

Title: The Smugglers Retreat
Description: Beautifully presented south facing sea front apartment with exceptional panoramic views out over the English Channel and the beach on its doorstep. Located at the heart of Hastingsseconds from the town centre and only minutes‚Äô walk from Hastings stationthis perfect seaside retreat is ideal for a short break to Hastings.To the front of the apartment is a largebright living-dining room with sofa beddouble height ceilingsfloor to ceiling windows and French doors leading to a full width south facing balconyideal for evening drinks or al fresco dining. Adjacent is the fully equipped modern fitted kitchen complete with Nespresso machinedishwashermicrowave and full range of cutlery and crockery.To the rear are two spacious double bedroomsthe master featuring a king-sized bedand both fitted with wardrobes for storage. The apartment is complete with a stylish contemporary bathroom with part tiled wallspedestal hand basin and shower.This fantastic seaside home has recently undergone extensive restoration and the attention to detail is evident in every room with high quality finishes and luxury furnishings throughout. Ideal for anyone looking for a stylish seaside retreat.This apartment can be booked in conjunction with our other stunning seafront holiday let apartmentsideal for larger groups or families or events as all of our short break apartments are situated in the same building.Our holiday homes come complete with an on call service should you need us during your stay.Hastings is home to the largest beach-launched fishing fleet in Europethe remains of the first castle in England to be built by William the Conqueror A Stunningly beautiful and preserved old town and a strong local arts community.Hastings is really three towns in one joined by a level promenade; the Old Town to the eastthe bustling contemporary shopping town centre in the middle and St Leonards to the west featuring the classical elegance of James Burton‚Äôs architecture and the fashionable Norman Road ‚Äì recently named as the new ‚ÄòPortobello Road-on sea‚Äô by The Times` and offering a great collection of antique shops and vintage galleries.Hastings has grown in popularity as a seaside destination attracting many visitors and holidaymakers over the summer season. With multiple festivals and attractions taking place not to mention the huge music and arts scene there is always plenty to do. sign up to our news letter or check out our blog to keep up to date with what is going on.

Title: Compact studio minutes from the seafront
Description: Centrally located around the corner from the sea frontthe West pierand just off of Western roadthis compact and stylish studio flat is the perfect place for a quick getaway in Brighton. Easily accessible by foot to all the attractions. 10 minutes from train station.The space itself is very small but includes kitchen facilities(fridgestovemicrowavegrill). You have lots of storage space for your belongings.The spaceThe space.A lovely little studio moments from the seafront. Lightbright and really cosy. It is a very small space so not really suitable for a couple for more than a few days. Ideal for a short break where you just need somewhere to rest your head. Shopsbars & restaurants nearbythe location is hard to beat.Guest access.The "little room" is a small bedsit located in between the ground and first floor flat in the building. The building is a quiet residential building so not suitable for loud parties. If that is what you are looking forplease find another booking.

Title: * Sea View * Stylish * Love * St. Leonards *
Description: "This stylishbright and airy flat sits at the end of the Marina seafront in West St Leonards on the first floor of a Seafront Victorian propertywith a balcony. Facing the sea is the large living area with open plan kitchenbrand new gas range stovefridgefreezer and dishwasher. The bathroom is spacious with Pampus 1970s vintage suite (modern plumbing!). The bedroom is peaceful containing a Kingsize bedfacing the cliffs. We have good working WIFI."The spaceThe space.Beautiful modern living space with uninterupted views of the sea.Walking distance to happening St LeonardsMarina and Hastings.Historical town with fantastic art scene.Guest access.Fully contained apartment to enjoy.

Title: Stunning beach front location with roof terrace
Description: "A period townhouse set on the seafront in St Leonards-On-Sea. This stunning Grade II listed home has been lovingly restored and refurbished throughout to a high standard.Situated in the popular Marina area of the seafront at St Leonards-On-Seathe property is in a prime position with access the cycle path and the promenade giving you walking access to to the arts quarter of Norman Roadthe PierHastings Old Town and the Jerwood Gallery."Guest access.Access to the whole property including roof terrace and rear yard. Under arches storage for bikes is available on request.

Title: Bennett‚Äôs End guesthouse
Description: A private guesthouse at the bottom of our garden for you to enjoy a break from home. It has a lounge and kitchen area with a separate bedroom and ensuite bathroom. The kitchen has a mini fridge,microwavetoaster and kettle. We provide teacoffeesugar and milk. Entrance via lockboxI will email details prior to arrival.There is street parking or you can park in the garden (depending on size of vehicle). Our guest house is only one bedroom and is not suitable for children or pets.The spaceThe space.We live on a quiet street yet minutes away from plenty of things to do and see. To see how close we are to the sea go to you tube and type in Bennett‚Äôs End guest house and see a video taken by one of our guests Stephen Bells drone.Guest access.You have your own private patio at the side of the garage with chairstableparasol and barbecue to sit outside to enjoy the sun.

Title: Hove Prom large sunny 2 bed 2 bath sleeps 4.
Description: A very spacious and sunny 2 double bedroomed South-facing seafront garden flat. Huge open plan living/dining/study room 25x21 feet max. 9 foot by 7 foot L shaped leather sofaand new dining suite. Bespoke luxury fitted kitchen. Both rectangular bedrooms have en-suiteswalk-in wardrobesand brand new pure cotton bed linen. Over 900sq.ft in total floorspace. If you are using airbnb for the first timeplease message us with the namesagesoccupations etc of your party and have verification.The spaceThe space.‚Ä¢The flat is located directly on Hove seafront. Just cross the road to the promenade and the beach opposite.‚Ä¢ If you are booking Airbnb for the first timeplease message us with the full namesagesoccupations etc of your party - a little information about yourselves - and the nature of your trip. Please have your verification process complete.‚Ä¢ Seafront location.‚Ä¢ 950 square feet.‚Ä¢ South facing flat with a private front garden and patio complete with bistro furniture.‚Ä¢ Hugebright and airy 25x21 feet L-shaped lounge/dining/study room with two big South facing sash windows overlooking your private front garden and patio. Relax on the massive new 9 feet by 7 feet L- shaped leather sofa.‚Ä¢Two double bedrooms both with luxury en-suite bath/shower rooms. Underfloor heating in both en-suites. The bath is double ended and the shower cubicles are double size.‚Ä¢ Luxury custom built walk-in dressing room to master suiteand walk-in wardrobe to second bedroom.‚Ä¢ Super fast fibre optic Broadband with 4k Firestick HD TVNetflix app and all the players.‚Ä¢ Family friendly.‚Ä¢ Recently refurbished.‚Ä¢ Luxury 11x6 fitted kitchen with huge solid Walnut worktopsand soft close cupboardsSamsung fridge freezer new 2021brand new washing machinegas hob with wok burnerfan oven grillcombination microwave convection oven and underfloor heating.‚Ä¢ Entire property externally decorated summer 2019.

Title: Annex By The Sea
Description: Brand new beautiful modern self contained studio room.Perfect for couples or small family (travel cot available) looking for an escape by the sea.The spaceThe space.- Private Off road parking.- WiFi.- Own private entrance with access to outside decked area & garden.- Outside table & chairs & Egg Chair.- 1 King size bed40 inch smart TVwardrobeSofaCoffee Table.- Private shower roomwith toilet.- The Body Shop toiletries.- Fully equipped kitchen with mini fridgemicrowavemini ovenhobkettletoaster.- Tea & Coffee provided.- Travel Cot & Highchair available on request can stretch to other baby items if needed please let me know.- Close to Town Centre (5 minute walk)beach (7-10 minute walk) & train station (7-10 minute walk).- Closely located to south downs for walks and historic town of Arundel.Guest access.- Private Off road parking.- Private entrance with access to outdoor space.- Keycode box for self-check in.- Owner always available to assist with any queries.- Check in: 2pm.- Check out: 11am.***can be flexible on check-in/out if no back to back booking so please do contact me to discuss***"Other things to note.Littlehampton Beach.West Beach - opposite side of River with Sand Dunes.- Kite Surfingpaddle boardingsailingfishing.- Tennis courts.- Pitch & Putt & Crazy Golf.- Swimming Pool & Gym.- Restaurants and cafes.Further afield:.- Historic Arundel.- Golf courses.- The South Downs.- Goodwood & Fontwell Racecourses.- Goodwood Festival of Speed & Revival.- Brighton.- Chichester."

Title: Seafront balcony, lovely spacious relaxing flat
Description: "This recently renovated spacious flat is on St Leonards seafrontclose to the new pierWarrior SquareHastingsthe Jerwood gallery etcmany restaurantsthe beachand all sorts of other activities. It has amazing views from its roomy balconyhigh ceilings and a great location. Its laid out in shabby chic stylebare floorboardsrugsopen planetc. Its a very comfortable space and place to relax in. A wonderful antidote to city life..a few minutes here and youre relaxed!"The space"The space.The flat comprises a beautiful and very large room (with two windows and a sizeable balcony looking straight onto the seacomfortable sofasan indoor viewing platform (which you can sleep on at your own risk!)and at the back the kitchen area)the bathroom and the double bedroom. Its a really wonderful place to relax and enjoy yourself in. You canincidentallyhear the soft and lovely sound of the waves as you sit in the flat.PLEASE NOTE - Ive instant booking turned on but Id prefer an enquiry first if possible. Alsothe instant booking says seven days noticebut its worth asking me if you want to book within seven days as sometimes it may be possible. Thanks""Guest access.You have the whole flat to use to yourselves. Its on the fourth floor by the way - theres a two person lift that takes you up there..or stairs of course if youre keeping fit.""Other things to note.As its a lovely quiet space (in a building with a flat on each floor) please have respect for neighbours. I dont have a TV so please bring a computer if you want to watch iplayer via the wifi. I have and ipod/mp3 players and a radio."

Title: Sea views from rooms üèñ Beachwalks & caf√© culture
Description: Situated in Leigh on Seaa stunning 2 bedroom maisonette a stones throw from the beach. You have clear sea views from both bedroomskitchen and sitting roomThere is a private balcony leading from both bedrooms and also from the sitting/dinning room. All balconies have seating to allow you to relax and read a book or have your morning cuppa.Whichever way you walk you will find tasty restaurants and cute coffee bars within minutes.Available on the beach-sup lessonsphotography & yoga.The spaceThe space.Spacious sea views.The maisonettes is bright and airy with fabulous views. It has all the luxuries you would require of a home.You will find a fully equipped kitchencoffee machinebullet and all the utensils you may require.The bathroom consists of a deep bath and a modern overhead chrome shower.There is a large table with stunning new knocker back chairs with a beautiful chandelier above for that special evening meal.Guest access.Guests will have sole access to all areas-one double bedroom and one single bedroomkitchenbathroomsitting room and dinning room and 3 fantastic balconies with views across the Estuary.Other things to note.Your holiday home is extremely cleancomfortable and welcoming.I am happy to arrange restaurantscelebration cakes or anything else I can help you with to ensure you have a fabulous stay.I will offer discounts for longer stays.

Title: Cottage by the beach with fantastic sea views
Description: Coastguard cottage in a idyllic location between the beach and a woodland conservation area on stunning coastline. Beautiful walksfantastic viewsgorgeous sunsets over a historical Fort next door. Perfect for family holidays and groups of friends.The spaceThe space.The best things about Sea View Cottage are waking up in the master bedroom to a fabulous and uninterrupted view of the seaand sipping a glass of wine or a cup of tea in the sea facing garden at sunset while watching the boats sail by. There are also great views over the sea from the living room downstairs.The cottage itself was built in 1855 and is packed with original featuresincluding an open log burning fire and original doors. It has been renovated for 2017including a new heating system with modern electrical heaters for maximum comfort.Other things to note.Sorry but Sea View Cottage does not accept dogs at the momentbut we do have other cottages which are dog friendly.

Title: "Ocean Waves " Beach House  on the Sea front
Description: Renovated seafront house 10 minutes walk to local village shopspubcafesrestaurants and supermarket.Local water sports: surfingwindsurfingkite surfingkayaking & boogie boarding.20 min drive to Chichester25 min drive Goodwood.The space"The space.SITUATED ON A PRIVATE ROAD Ocean Waves has been refurbished to create a cosy and relaxing beachfront family home.On the first flooryoull find it easy to relax in the upstairs loungewith unobstructed views of the sandy beaches and ocean.The house has a large open plan kitchen/dining area with plenty of seating for ten people and patio doors which can be opened to enjoy the sound of the waves. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you will need to self-cater during you stay. The kitchen includes a dishwasherovenhobmicrowavefridge and freezer with ice maker.The downstairs lounge is a separate space which is ideal for relaxing with a book or playing games with the family. The room has a piano and a comfortable sofa bedif needed.Ocean Waves has 5 bedroomstwo on the ground floorone of which is a large super king (this can be configured in to 2 separate single beds if requested at time of booking)and the other with adult sized bunk beds. On the first floor there are three additional bedrooms which consist of one doubleone king and one super king (the super king has unobstructed sea views.)The first floor also has a spacious family bathroom with a shower (no bath). An additional shower room and separate toilet can be found on the ground floor.Outsideyou can relax on the private sea front terrace. The property also has a front and back garden with access to the beach and parking for 4 cars.Carbon Monoxide and Smoke Detectors are situated on both ground and first floor.WiFi and Sky TV included"

Title: Right on the beach
Description: The Bitter End beach house sits on the beach facing the sea with nothing between you and the water except sand and shingle. At high tide the sea is about 30 feet from the decklow tide the sandy beach is almost half a mile wide. Camber Sands is 3.5 miles from the historic town of Rye in East Sussex. The house looks out over Rye Bay to the west and Dungeness to the east. For the best rate book direct through Julie at camberbeach dot ukay.The spaceThe space.Our home is a four bedroomed two storey detached beach houseat the end of a private un made up lane. It is nestled next to the dunesa site of special scientific interest (SSSI). No traffic noisejust the sound of the ocean. As at Sept 2020 ours is one of only three houses in Camber to rent through Airbnb that sits on the beach with direct access to it.Sitting room with wood burnerbaby grand piano and pool table. Dining table seats 8.Kitchen with range cookerAmerican fridge freezerdishwasher and washing machine.Four bedrooms; one with a 6\ super king bedone with a 5‚Äô king bedone with a 4\6" double bed and the fourth bedroom has a 5\ king sized double bed and a single bed.Bathroom with bath and loo downstairsseparate loo also downstairsshower room with loo upstairs.Deck outside with table to seat 10. Wet suitsbody boardskites and beach toys provided.The house is cleantidy (our personal belongings are all packed away during rentals) and warm (full central heating and a wood burner) but please bear in mind that it is our family home and so it is equipped as we like itrather than as one might for a full time rental. For examplethere is the usual \essential\ stuff in the drawer of the kitchen table - bits for things that no one now recognises but that we are afraid to throw away.As it is a beach house the floors downstairs are painted concrete which is easy to sweep but please consider bringing slippers; we have some hotel ones to use if you forget and clean dressing gowns on the backs of doors.

Title: Sunny room with view of the sea.
Description: "Beautifullargesunny bedroom available in 1930s Art Deco block right on Worthing seafront. The room has a direct view of the seaso you can sit back and relax watching the sunrise and sunsetthe fishermen and kite surfers. The flat is in a convenient location for walking into Worthing and traveling to Brighton."The space"The space.I am renting a double bedroom in my lovely 1930s Art Deco flat on Worthing seafront. The views are stunning and the sea is forever changing. The room has loads of spaceincluding a wardrobe for hanging clothestable and comfy lounge chair. The double bed base has a futon mattressso is firm and comfortable.The bathroom is sharedand there‚Äôs a separate toiletwhich is also shared. A kettle and tea/coffee is provided in the room. Guests are welcome to store food in the fridge in the kitchen.It‚Äôs easy to get to Brighton and Hove on the 700 buswhich goes from directly outside the flat every ten minutes. Access to the DownsChichester and surrounding areas is excellent by either train or car."Guest access.Excellent free parking available at the front of the property.Please contact me so we can make specific arrangements for your arrival.Other things to note.Please be aware that the flat is on a busy coastal road and there‚Äôs some light traffic noise. Howeverthe room has double glazing so reducing the noise level.

Title: MARINA VISTA THREE SEAFRONT APARTMENT
Description: Four Exclusive Seafront Apartments available on a per night basis. Perfect for Short Stays / Hoilday letsThese apartments start from great prices.The spaceThe space.Main front door leading to one flight of communal stairs taking you up to the apartment.Entrance to the apartment to inviting long hallwayFirst door on your left leads to a good size Double Bedroom with King Size Bed2x Bedside TablesChest of DrawersMirrored Wardrobes & Flat screen TV.Second door on left leads to the Bathroom with brand new suite to include Shower/BathBasin & W.C. Special feature within this carefully crafted designer bathroom is the built in TV. UNFORTUNATELY THE TV IS NOT WORKING AT THE MOMENT. Third door on the left gives a convenient storage cupboard for all your coatsbagsshoes or a pushchair.Straight ahead from the main entrance leads directly into the bright & welcoming open plan kitchen & living space. Furnished and decorated to a high standard with a flat screen TVbluetooth speakersofa bedtable & 4 dining chairs. Brand new quality kitchenfully equipped with Fridge/FreezerBosch Induction HobExtractor FanBosch OvenKettleMicrowaveBuilt-in Water Filter TapKnife Block SetPotsPansCutleryGlassesCupsPlates & Bowls. BooksDVDSThe Apartment has wooden floorboardsneutral walls & ceilings throughout.Guest access.Guest will have full access to the whole apartment."Other things to note.We have no parking spaces available with these apartmentsbut we can leave parking permits for you when you arrive. Please take note of these important details about the parking permit.We do charge ¬£2.50 a day per vehiclePlease leave money on side when you depart-We are Zone A.-Make sure you are in the right zone to avoid parking tickets.-One permit is required per calendar day and only valid for the date validated.-Scratch off the daydatemonthand year.-Daily visitor permit hours is 9:00 am to 6:00 pm (Monday to Saturday)Heres the list of the roads where you can park. Please check if these are still Zone A as we will not take any responsibility for any parking tickets.Please make sure you read the road sign and it clearly says you are in the ZONE A areaIf you head towards M&S take your 2nd right which will be West buildings then 1st right into Augusta place this area is all ZONE AOTHER ZONE A ROADS YOU CAN PARK DOWN.NEW STREET.AUGUSTA PLACE.CHANDOS ROAD.LIVERPOOL GARDENS.SHELLY ROAD.BUCKINGHAM ROAD.GRAHAM ROAD.SALISBURY ROADIf you still are unable to park anywhere there is a multi-storey car park above the bowling alley called Grafton Multi Storey** Please notewe will not be held responsible if a parking fine is given to you **Not suitable for anyone who struggles to climb one flight of stairs."

Title: Family home on the beach
Description: Our beachside family home is the ideal getaway for families. With 4 bedrooms (1 superking1 double and 2 bunkbeds- top bunk only suitable for children)2 bathrooms and large living/dining area and fully kitted kitchen- you will find all the space you need for a holiday on the beach. The enclosed private garden leads directly onto the beach. There is parking for 2 cars which is on a private road. The house is within walking distance of the town centre with many pubsrestaurants and shops.The spaceThe space.Leading directly onto an area of private beachour home is the ideal getaway all year round. The garden is enclosed making it safe for our younger guests. In the winter we have a wood burning stove to ensure cosy evenings.Our house is in a very quiet residential area so we do ask you to respect our neighbourswhich is why we have a strict no parties or events rule.Please check out all the photos before booking.üîπPlease note- at this time we are requesting that all guests bring their own bedding and towels due to Covid protocols and guidelines.This is a well loved family home.Guest access.You have access to the whole houseexcept the private garageOther things to note.No dogs allowed.No parties or events allowed.The house is at the end of a private road. Please be very aware when parking as the road is only accessed by 3 houses each with private parking areas. Please do not block or obstruct access to the other properties at any time.This is a family homeand you will find personal items stored.Please respect our privacy and do not use these.We are asking all guests to bring their own bedding and towelsdue to Covid protocols and guidelines. The health and safety of our guests is very important to us.
