Title: Stunning Seafront Penthouse, Private Sun Terrace
Description: "Small but stunning seafront facing penthouse right at the front and the top of this iconic 1930s Grade II* listed building. Enjoy uninterrupted panoramic sea views from the living roombedroomand private sun terrace (accessed from both the living room and bedroom). A very special placevery well equipped with everything you may need for your stay including White Company towels and Egyptian cotton bedlinen. On-site parking also available at an additional nightly ratea rarity in Brighton."The space"The space.Situated right at the top and front of this beautiful iconic Grade II* listed buildingthis small but stunning penthouse apartment directly faces the sea enjoying panoramic uninterrupted sea views from the living roombedroomand the 7.3 x 1.7m private sun terrace (with doors opening directly onto the terrace from both the living room and bedroom). The apartment offers a great value alternative to seafront hotel roomsoften twice the price for just a bedroom/bathroom with either a tiny or no balcony. On-site parking is also available at a nightly ratea rarity in Brighton.There are lifts to take you up to the top floor and the apartment is furnished and equipped to a very high standard with everything you may need for your stayincluding high quality Egyptian cotton bedlinen and fluffy White Company towels. Fast wi-fi is available throughout the apartment and there are wall-mounted LCD televisions in both the living room and the bedroom with Virgin cable TV and Netflix. On sunny days the large private sun terrace enjoys the sun all day long and even in winter the sunsets from the terrace and the apartment are absolutely stunning.The beautiful bespoke Italian blue granite kitchen is very well equipped for self-catering and the stunning bespoke designer bathroom has luxurious under-floor heating and a rainfall shower. Were delighted to be in Tripadvisors top 5 guest-rated of all holiday apartments in Brighton and Hove and to hold their coveted Certificate of Excellence for the fourth year running.Embassy Court is a beautiful and historic listed 1930s Modernist building and the apartment and its top floor neighbours were the first ever purpose-built penthouses in the UK so it has a lovely architectural significance. The architectWells Coates (who also designed the famous Isokon building in London) made pleasure and making the most of the wonderful top floor views his top priority for the apartment: the private sun terrace and the windows and glass doors run the length of the apartment giving wonderful light and a stunning sense of openness and space with the panoramic views. Youll see from the photos that the bedroom is small but looking right out to sea you can sit up in bed and look out at the amazing views!Please note that the while the apartment can sleep four (with use of the sofabed by prior arrangement) it is small and best suited to two adults with up to two children. We are unable to accept bookings for three or four adults.LIVING ROOM (4.2m x 3.2m).Directly faces the seafront with sea views stretching across the entire length of the room and doors opening onto the lovely private sun terrace. Real Scandinavian wood floorssofa seating for fourwall-mounted LCD TVdining table and chairs for fourtwo glass electric radiators.KITCHEN (2.6m x 1.9m).Fully fitted and well equipped kitchen with Italian blue granite surfaces and Siemens appliances (dishwasherwasher-dryerfridge-freezermicrowaveglass convection hob and oven)plinth heating. Far-reaching views across the rooftops of Brighton and Hove to the Sussex Downs. Real Scandinavian wood floors.BEDROOM (2.7m x 2.5m).Directly facing the seafrontvery small bedroom with enormous stunning sea views along the length of the room and doors opening onto the lovely private sun terrace. Double bedwall-mounted LCD TVsmall wardrobereal Scandinavian wood floorsglass electric radiator.BATHROOM (2.4m x 2m).Bespoke Italian fully tiled bathroom with luxurious under-floor heating and deep bath with rainfall shower over.SUN TERRACE (7.3m x 1.7m).Directly facing the seafront with breathtaking panoramic viewsfully tiled private sun terrace with designer planters from Chelsea Flower Show award winner Fernando Gonzalezdining table seating for four.Step out of the front door of the building and you are on the seafront. The flat is located close to central Brighton with all its attractionsshopsrestaurantsthe Pierthe i360and The Lanesand has many fantastic amenities on its doorstep including one of the best restaurants in Brighton (The Gingerman). WaitroseSainsburysand the wonderful Taj supermarkets are a few minutes walk and there is a small convenience store next door to the building. Brighton and Hove stations are five minutes by taxiGatwick Airport thirty minutes by train and London fifty minutes by train.On-site parking can be arranged in advance at an extra nightly rate cheaper than on-street or the local car parks. There is lift access but as a listed building with some steps and the lifts being very small we regret that there is no wheelchair access. For children we happily provide the following free of charge: travel cot with mattresshighchairwooden bed safety railschildrens platescupsbowls and cutlery.If you are interested in staying with us please let us know a little about yourself and your trip along with any questions you might have and we‚Äôll get back to you asap."Guest access.You are booking the entire apartment to enjoy.Other things to note.Please note that the apartment is small and best suited to two adults and up to two children. We‚Äôre unable to accept bookings for three or four adults.

Title: Stunning sea views from spacious 2 bed apartment
Description: The self-contained 2 bedroom apartment is located on Hastings seafront with wonderful views to Hastings pier and the English channel. The accomodation has just been completely refurbished with new carpetsfreshly paintednew bathroom and ensuite bathroom to the master bedroom. There is an open plan kitchen & living area with dining table allowing wonderful views of the English channel throughout the open plan living. There are two large double bedrooms & one with own ensuite bathroom.The space"The space.There is direct beach access - a short stroll across the coastal road and youre on the beach or on the promenade.The apartment is within walking distance to Hastings town centre and the historic old townland based fishing fleet and allows for a pleasant walk along the promenade to Burton St Leonards with its collection of antique shopsart galleriesand restaurants.Weather permitting you can have enjoy the beach and spend a day swimming or a family picnic on the beach. Walking and cycling are great ways to explorekeep fit and enjoy the long promenade. Using the 7km beachside traffic-free route is the perfect way to discover the extensive Hastings seafront ‚Äì with plenty of fascinating places to stop and explore along the way.The accommodation has double glazing throughout and GCH.The apartment is located on the third floor (its a period building with no lift) but the climb is worth it to enjoy the magnificent views.The holiday flat is immaculately presentedafter just completing refurbishment in April. It has a modernbrightsimple and uncluttered feel.Both bedrooms have huge wardrobes which are ideal for families or friends to store clothing etc.The dining table extends to comfortably seat 6 people.The open plan nature of the accomodation allows either family or friends to enjoy the holiday together.The communal hallway and stairs leading to the holiday flat are scheduled to be redecorated in the winter."

Title: Scandi Beach
Description: A stunning and unique Scandinavian inspired architectural house right on the beachShoreham-by-sea.360 views of the sea and the Downs behind the town. Spacious accommodation with six bedrooms; superbly equipped kitchenmagnificent barstylish dining areacosy seating downstairs with entrance on to patio leading to barbeque/firepit sunken garden.Upstairsspectacular lounge with magnificent outside terrace. Large screen television on both floors. Ample parkingWe also offer cateringThe space.Designed by award winning architectthe villa is spacious and delightful to be in.Guest access.Guests can access the whole of the villa including the front drive and back garden. The villa is situated on the beach itselfOther things to note.SCANDI BEACH.SHOREHAM BEACH.Please can you ensure all guests have read the house rules.Welcome to SCANDI BEACHwe hope you have an enjoyable stay.NOISE & OUTSIDE AREAS.Keep your noise at a tolerable level especially when eatingdrinking & entertaining.When entering or leaving property please be respectful to our lovely neighbours and do not congregate in the street.We ask guests to refrain from excessive noise outside the property after 10.30pmand any complaints from neighbours about guests disrespecting this will receive a ¬£150 fine. Please keep noise inside the property also to a minimum after 10.30pm and continuing festivities to be moved to the more private first floor and balcony.KEYS & CHECK OUT.On check-in we provide you with 2 sets of keys.Ensure all doors are locked when leaving the property and when retiring for the evening.Please leave our lovely property as you found itwe provide all cleaning products and have a hoover and mop within the property. Please do not move furniture as scratches the floor.If you spill drinks on the wooden floor please mop up as it will stain if left to settle.Leave 2 sets of keys on departure (¬£75 charge/set unreturned).No candles or naked flames please.Please do not download any illegal music or films on our internet please.FOOTWEAR.Please NO stilettoes at all. We have beautiful wooden flooring so kindly ask you to refrain from spoiling with shoes.SMOKING.If you need to smoke please do so in the back garden preferably exiting from the SouthWest patio door so to be a distance from the neighbours. Smoke on the balcony on the first floor after 1030.DECORATIONS.If you put up decorations please do not use sellotape or blue-tac as it damages the paint work. Any decorations left such as glitteror confetti an additional ¬£50 will be added to the cleaning fee subtracted from the damage deposit.IF CONFETTI GETS WET IT STAINS AND SUBSEQUENTLY RUINS FLOORSRUBBISH & RECYCLING.Please do not leave rubbish inside the property. The recycling and and refuse bin are outside at the entrance.COMPLAINTS.You are staying at the heart of Shoreham Beach; a very tight community. This is also a residential area with families living close by so please be mindful of your noise and behaviour.Councils enforce specific rules regarding noise and behaviour within short terms lets. If we receive a complaint from the neighbour this will result in deductions from your deposit.If we receive a complaints regarding these house rules we will deduct ¬£150 from the security deposit2 complaints your whole deposit with be withheld. Three complaints during your stay will result in an immediate eviction from the property.

Title: The Blue House on the Beach in Camber
Description: "The Blue House is a truly stunning house - its location is spectacular - situated on the miles of sandy beach in Camberclose to Rye within easy access from London. Finished to the highest standards with bespoke kitchenApple TVluxurious beds and sofas - it is an ideal escape for a coastal retreat. Good for couplesfamiliesbig groupsand furry friends (pets). Please do get in touch!"The spaceThe space.Want a beach holidaywith sand between your toes from the moment you arrive ‚Äì this stunning beach house is built on the foreshore of Camber Sands offering a truly luxurious escape. Please read the access information before booking.This stylish and contemporary air conditioned house sleeps 8 guests in four bedrooms.This property brings the sea to your doorstepimmerse yourself in water activitiesjaunts in the dunes or collapse on the deckor if its a little cool or windy snuggle up on the sofa in the living room with a good book or pair of binoculars ‚Äì Apple TV and in built ipad Sonos system are available when you get bored of the view!Downstairs the living room over looks the deckthere is a bespoke kitchen (dishwasherovenmicro/grill ovenfridge/freezer and separate drinks fridge) which offers plenty of scope to cook up a stormeat at the handmade dining table overlooking the beachor fire up the BBQ on the deck. There are two bedrooms downstairs; a large superking bedroom (Surf) with wardrobe and a twin bedroom with 3ft beds and Apple TVsharing a double shower wetroom. The laundry room is equipped with a washing machine and separate dryer and has a side entrance for access to the house.Upstairs the two stunning superking bedrooms (Beach & Dunes) are both beautifully appointed with free standing baths and the front bedroom with an additional showerand USB ports by the bed. All linen is white superior Egyptian Cotton. Beautifully decorated throughout in muted colours that don‚Äôt jar with the incredible view.Simply put it is the perfect retreat in all weathers ‚Äì a log burning stove for cosy autumnal and wintery escapessliding doors onto a decked terrace enclosed to offer security and privacy.Dogs are very welcome but please be aware of the dog restrictions on the beach between 1 May ‚Äì 30 September. There is an additional charge of ¬£35 for 2 dogs.*New for 2021 stays - Smokeless wood burning fire pit and Ooni Pizza oven* .ACCESS INFOThe Blue House is accessed from the car park via the beachif you have a 4√ó4 you are allowed to drive onto the beach and park ONE car in front of the house at the discretion the beach inspector in peak periods (high tides and full beach) . Do not park between the houses as this is owned by the neighbours. there is a car pass that enables one car to park for free in the car park for the duration of your stay. There is a barrier that the beach inspector will put up if there is deemed a risk to beach goers and will prevent access ‚Äì this is usually at high tide with a full beach or servere adverse conditions.WE DO NOT ADVISE LEAVING ANY CAR ON THE BEACH IN BAD WEATHER AS THE SALT AND SAND COULD SERIOUSLY DAMAGE THE PAINTWORK AND IT IS ENTIRELY AT THE OWNERS OWN RISK."Guest access.Access to The Blue House is across the beach - one (proper) 4x4 may park drive across the beach and park in front of the house (150m) - if you dont have a 4x4 there is one pass for the car park - other free parking is available in Camber but not guaranteed."

Title: "A little piece of heaven"
Description: SEAFRONT RETREAT."A little piece of heaven" stylish artists apartment in between St Leonards and Hastings perfectly situated to easily reach the heart of both communities. With stunning sea views and Hastings pier in sight this is a wonderful bolt hole to escape to.The spaceThe space.Whitebright and fresh it makes a great base from which to explore this ever changing seaside resort with new shopscafesbarsrestaurants and galleries opening up at a record pace!.The apartment is very comfortable with everything you could need to enjoy your stay.We have a king size bed with two mattresses for extra comforta brilliant showtime side lit mirrorbrilliant if you want to get glammed up for the evening!.Curl up in the swinging chair with a glass of wine and watch the ever changing tidesfishing boats and kayaks.Stroll into the Old Town and browse the antique shops,quirky bars and lovely restaurants or walk to Norman Road St Leonards and sample the delicious food at the Russian bar/restaurant Kino Teatr or watch a movie in their wonderful theatre  Guest access.Guests have use of whole apartmentOther things to note.To get to the breathtaking views on the second floor there are 4 flights of stairs to climb so maybe not suitable for some :-)

Title: Marine Parade, Worthing
Description: Get-away with Sea Views.Make yourself at home in this 2 bedroomed First Floor Regency Apartment HOLIDAY LET on Worthing‚Äôs vibrant seafront. Listen to the seagulls and sounds of the buzzing promenade. Enjoy stunning views while relaxing on the large comfortable sofa in this ideal holiday home for a family or friends.The spaceThe space.The lounge/kitchen/diner has impressive floor to ceiling sash windows with panoramic views across the promenade and sea. There is a large family sofa and dining for 4 people. The well-equipped kitchen includes ovenhobmicrowave and fridge/freezer. There is a smart tv with Amazon and Netflix and free wi fi.The comfortable master bedroom has an oak bedlarge wardrobearmchair and an en-suite shower room. This bedroom window has a distant sea view.The second bedroom has two 3-foot wooden single beds and an open wardrobe.Next to the second bedroom is a bathroom with a washer/dryer.The property benefits from central heating.

Title: Lancing Beach Apartment
Description: An apartment directly on the beach at LancingWest Sussexwith a whole wall of glass facing the continually changing view of the sea and sky. Easy access to BrightonWorthing & Shoreham - Trains / buses / roads. Located above the award winning Perch on Lancing beach restaurant - pop downstairs for an early morning breakfast or bring your coffee back to the balcony to enjoy the view.The spaceThe space.This is a brand new purpose built apartment in a modern design low energy eco buildingwhich is situated directly on the beachIt is on the first floorwith an outdoor balcony over looking the beach and sea. There is a cafe / restaurant on site as well as a well equipped gymthe gym can be used by purchasing a day pass for only ¬£5the usual day rate is ¬£10. There is a kite surfing school on this beach. Also this coast line boasts wonderful off road walks and cycling along the coastal path with Shoreham to the East and Worthing to the Westboth in easy walking distance."Guest access.The apartment has its own front door and a shared locked entrance lobby where cycles or water sports equipment can be stored safely. There is an entry phone access for safety. There is a large car park adjacent to the Green where you can park for ¬£1.50 a day."Other things to note.The cafe is open every day and some evenings during the summer months. There is a local pubchippyGreekChinese and Indian restaurants all in very close walking distance. Worthing is less than 2 miles away and there are restaurants & cafes of every typea large shopping centrea museum2 cinemasa theatre and well stocked library. There is a local hospital with an A & E department less than 2 miles away. The vibrant & cosmopolitain town of Brighton is only 11 miles to the East.We keep a variety of guide books for people new to the area.

Title: Apartment
Description: Light roomy space with outside garden 5 minutes walk from seafrontThe spaceThe space.5 minutes walk to seafront 20 minutes walk to Brighton pier and 2 minutes from Hove seafront.Rock water is nearby as is Hove lagoonGuest access.Owing to covid and stringent regulations we cannot provide parking permits at this time. The local council will only issues‚Äù permits by signature post or personal collection by the property owner who does not live locally. We are hoping to be able to provide permits by March 2022.Other things to note.Please can guests be aware that an elderly lady lives abovethank you.The heating is programmed on a timer but can be overridden using the + and - buttons on the timer control in the hallway. Also there is a controller in the kitchen beneath the boiler. Press the button on it and the boiler will kick in. Any issues with that just call!

Title: Sea front flat with a stunning view!
Description: This specious two bedroom flat on the sea front with an amazing view is the perfect place to relax and unwind.Explore the sights and local attractions of St Leonards on Sea - there is so much to see and do here.The space"The space.You will have this second floor flat to yourself.The open-plan lounge/kitchen is filled with light and air.As a self-catering apartmentyoull find everything you need for a perfect stay.The kitchen has a fridge/freezera hoban ovena kettlea toastera microwave and a washing machine.This two bedroom flat contains one bedroom with a double bed and one bedroom with a king size bed.Main bedroom has a desk and a chair.There is one bathroomwhich has a batha separate shower and a sink and there is a separate WC.Linen and towels are all included to make your stay more enjoyable.The Welcome Pack includes information on local eating placesamenities and attractions."

Title: MP713 - Camber Sands Holiday Park - Sleeps 6 + 1 small dog - 2 Bedrooms - Quiet Area
Description: With all the modern amenitiesour contemporary accommodation will allow you to relax and unwindwhilst being only a few minutes walk to 7 miles of sand and sea. If you are looking for funthe Holiday Park boasts facilities such as Swimming PoolsRestaurantGo-KartsMini GolfSoft Play and plenty of evening entertainment for all the family.As of 1st January 2021 all bookings include linen and towels dressed onto the beds plus a cleaning pack.The spaceThe space.Modern 2 bedroom luxury caravan with patio doors leading out onto a gated wrap around decking area. This is the perfect caravan to relax and enjoy the surrounding countryside. This caravan has everything you should need including a dishwasherwashing machinefree WiFiSmart TV in living room and a master bedroom with a TV and en-suite bathroom. The caravan is located over the back part of the park where its nice and quietbut only a short stroll to the facilities or beach. Parking is located nearby in allocated parking bays.LOUNGE ‚Äì Bright living areawith double french doors opening up onto deckingPlenty of comfy seatingsmart TV with freeview. Additional sleeping with pull out sofa-bed.KITCHEN ‚Äì Lots of worktop and cupboard space equipped with everything you may need if you choose to stay in and cookfreestanding table and chairs.BEDROOMS ‚Äì Spacious Master bedroomwith TV and en suite bathroom. Second bedroom with 2 single beds. Sofa bed in living roomBATHROOMS ‚Äì Main bathroom has good size showertoilet and sink. En suite in master bedroom with toilet.PARKING - Short distance away on a first come first served basisDISTANCE TO PLAY AREA - 3-4 minute walk.DISTANCE TO BEACH ‚Äì 4‚Äì 5 minute walk.DISTANCE TO ENTERTAINMENT - 3-4 minute walkPETS - 1 small pet allowed (¬£25 additional surcharge)As of 1st January 2021 all bookings include linen and towels dressed onto the beds plus a cleaning pack.PLEASE NOTE ENTERTAINMENT PASSES ARE NOT INCLUDED WITH YOUR STAY AND WOULD NEED TO BE PURCHASED EITHER IN ADVANCE OR UPON ARRIVAL. YOU REQUIRE THESE TO HAVE ACCESS TO RESTAURANTSBARSOUTSIDE AREAS AND ALL OTHER FACILITIES AFTER 5PM. YOU WILL ALSO REQUIRE ENTERTAINMENT PASSES TO ACCESS SWIMMING POOLS AT ANY TIME.You will enjoy access to the full holiday home with no shared access"Other things to note.Important Information.*BarsRestaurantsshops and all facilities including Evening Showbar Entertainment and swimming usually starts from February Half Term through to the start of November and require passes for access after 5pm. Passes are also required for the activities and are bookable via Parkdean Resorts Office upon arrivalwe arent able to assist with this as we are completely different companies. Slots are not guaranteed and are subject to their availability.The exact season start and end date is not guaranteed if you are booking early or late in the seasonPlease check the dates and schedule before you book.The passes can be purchased via us at the same price as park and we leave them in the property for you for when you arrive. If you would like a quote for us to provide these please message.*Linens and towels will be provided for all guests listed on the booking - so please ensure the guest details are correct on your booking.*The park is BBQ friendly but we do not supply or hire BBQsyou will need to provide your own. They are not permitted close to the properties & must NOT be on the decking (if applicable).*Camber Getaways are a local agent who look after privately owned properties for their owners. You will be sent checking in and property details 1-2 weeks prior to your arrival via emailso please ensure you check your messages and emails."

Title: Sea Scene's ,  Hayling Island
Description: Sea Scenes is a homely two bedroom groundfloor apartment located on Hayling‚Äôs beautiful stretch of beach and perfectly situated for stunning views across the Solent.Hayling Island is ideal for holiday makers and families as it retains all the attractions of a traditional seaside resort. One of the biggest attractions is the Funland Amusement Park at Beachlandswhich has everything from roller coasters to a games arcade and a soft play area. The Hayling Seaside Railway that runs from Beachlands to Eastoke Corner is equally popular.The island is also well known for its watersports ‚Äì in fact windsurfing was invented here ‚Äì and miles of glorious seafront. The local water is perfect for sailingwindsurfingpower boatingjet skiing and more.There are various great places to eat if you don‚Äôt feel like cookingfrom nice restaurants to pubs and of course a wide range of takeaways. Hayling is also well served by shopsso anything you need during your stay is right on hand!Howeverif you feel like venturing out and exploring nearby areasthe attractions of PortsmouthSouthseaEmsworth and Staunton Country Park are all close by.The property itself is well furnished and feels comfortable and welcoming.The living/kitchen area is open and spacious with amazing views overlooking the sea. The living area consists of comfortable sofas and a smart TV. The kitchen area is well equipped with a kettleNespresso makercafetierecookerfridgefreezermicrowavetoasterwashing machine and dryeralong with a wooden dining table that seats four.The master bedroom has a queen size beda stylish dressing table and a smart TV. The second bedroom has a single bed which can be pulled out to make a comfortable king size bedplease note: once the bed has been pulled out there is limited room in the bedroom.There is a stylish walk in shower and a separate WC.There is no BBQ provided for the gardenhoweveryou are more than welcome to bring your own and enjoy the amazing scenery.WIFI is included with this property and there is enough parking for 2 cars.
